8a1(phal chen): sems las skye ba'ang yod pa min// sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyod yul ni// skye ba sred pa la rab tu gnas// ji ltar rab ring ldan pa'i mig/ nang na'ang
8a2(phal chen): med cing phyira'ang med// de bzhin 'jig rten sangs rgyas dag/ nang na mi bzhugs phyi na'ang med// 'jig rten gyi ni don gyi phyir// rkang gnyis kyi ni mchog byung ste// 'jig
8a3(phal chen): rten du ni ma byung yang // 'jig rten dag tu skye bos mthong // sangs rgyas rnams la zhing mi gnas// rgyal ba bdag la nyin mtshan med// skad cig ma yin zla ba min// rgyal ba la
8a4(phal chen): ni lo mi gnas// 'jig rten dag nas 'di skad brjod// nyi ma che ge mo zhog tu dang byung byang chub rgyal bas 'tho'o// sangs rgyas nyi ma'i rjes mi 'brang / de la bskal pa yod pa yin// dus
8a5(phal chen): kyang ma lus med pa ste// dus gsum yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas/ mgon po rnams ni mnga' bar 'gyur// ji ltar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ni// nams kyang mtshan dang mi
8a6(phal chen): gnas te// nyin mtshan zhes kyang rab tu brjod// de bzhi ma sangs rgyas chos nyid do// bskal pa gcig dang dus gsum du// 'dren pa bzhugs pa ma yin te// dus gsum
8a7(phal chen): zhes kyang rab tu brjod// sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos nyid ltos// de nas byang chub sems dpal rdul dang bral ba'i rgyal mtshan gyis// sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi brlabs kyis
8a8(phal chen): phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te// de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// yang dag sangs rgyas sku gcig ste// 'dzin pa thams cad don gcig kyang // tshang ma
8b1(phal chen): gzhan dang gzhan dag tu// phyogs bcur kum rab tu snad // gang gis ma lus thams cad kyi// chos kyang ngas rnams sum khyab pa// sems can mam mtha pa ma/ b+h+ya
8b2(phal chen): yul rnams kya 'ja ltas// sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos nying na// nang gi sras kyang snang ba min// de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis rlabs// phyi rol sus kyang ma snang nga//
8b3(phal chen): mang kun du las rnams kyis// ji ltar las rnams bsags pa'i bzhin// de bzhin so sor phye ba'i skus// rigs kyisu byung bar rab tu bstan// rgyal ba'i chos ring ma ga
8b4(phal chen): par/ sangs rgyas sku ni 'di 'dra bar// grangs su 'grang bar mi nus te// bsam pas lta yang shes mo nus// ji ltar bdi gcag sems kyi las// bsam gyis ma khyad
8b5(phal chen): 'byung ba// de bzhin sangs rgyas bsam mi khyab// sems kyi 'phrin las mi mnga'o// ji ltar zhing rnams bsam yas pa// sa las rnam par dag par mdzes// de bzhin
8b6(phal chen): sangs rgyas bsam mi khyab// 'gro ba dag na mdzes par snang // ji ltar las rnams 'jug pa ni/ rkyen gyis rab tu 'byung 'gyur ba// de bzhin rgyu rnams mthun pa las/
8b7(phal chen): sangs rgyas shin tu mthong bar 'gyur// yid bzhin nor bu'i rgyal po ni// ji ltar yid bsam rdzogs byed pa// de bzhin sangs rgyas chos nyid kyang // rtag tu smon lam
8b8(phal chen): rdzogs pa sgrub/ mtha' dang dbus med 'jig rten 'dir// 'jig rten mgon po 'dren par 'gyur// de'i smon lam de dag gos// phyogs bcu 'di ngas rgyal bas ga/
15a1(phal chen): 'gyur ro// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po drad pa can yang dag par rje shes pa dang ldan pa sems kyi bdag nyid shin du zab cing yangs pa
15a2(phal chen): yang la yang dag par rtogs pa mi banan pa yon 'ang spyad par ma shes kyi thar gyur pa/ chos la shin tu nga ba'i sems mngon par skyes pa/ chos kyi snang ba'i 'od kyis rab tu snang ba
15a3(phal chen): don thams cad mthong ba/ chos mngon par shes pa/ ye shes rig pa brtsod pa med pa lhur byed pa/ sems can thams cad dge ba'i chos spyod pa la rab tu sbyor ba/ sems can thams
15a4(phal chen): cad kyi nyes par sems bskyed pa la 'khrul pa med pa de dag yang dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo ba na gnod par byed pa thams cad kyi skyon gyis thogs par mi 'gyur ro// sems
15a5(phal chen): can mi sman pa'i tshul gyis ldog par mi 'gyur ro// sems can gyi blta ba'i rnyog pas dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngo ba dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad kyi sems 'phrus
15a6(phal chen): par ldog par mi 'gyur ro// sems kyi sems kyi rgyu skor bas/ byang chub sems dpa ga rgya chen po zags pa las ring bar myi 'gyur ro// 'gro ba rnams cad yongs su bsgrub pa la
15a7(phal chen): lam ga la ma'i rnaMg pa thams cad kyis btsal bar mi 'gyurar/ byang chub sems dpa'i rtsom pa rten tha sems can rgya drin mi 'thob mamang bas ltung par mi 'byung / khyu nAban+d+ha
15a8(phal chen): na bas mun pa'i dbang pos bum pas mi 'gyur ro// dge za'i rtsa badzi lta pa bzhin las byis pa'i skye bo dang 'chags pa las 'phang bar mi 'gyur ro// sems can gyi rgyan gyi
15a9(phal chen): ba'i dge ba'i ru ba sems can
15b1(phal chen): rgya bang gi 'gyur// bam po snyam bcu rtsa gnyis pa'o// naci 'byor zhes/ dkyil lakhor 'dun bsgrub pa med par 'gro ba thams cad ma
15b2(phal chen): dag par bya ba'i phyir 'byung ba ste/ sems can gcig la dmigs shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu dge ba'i rtsu ba yongs su
15b3(phal chen): bam yin/ 'di lta ste zhing rnam par dag pa bya ba'i phyir zhing gcig la dmigs te/ byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi sems la mngon par slob ma yin/ 'di lta ste sangs rgyas pa
15b4(phal chen): ba rnams par dmigs pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas gcig la dmigs te/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dad pa'i skye ba ma yin/ 'di lta ste ye shes gcig rjes su rtogs pa'i
15b5(phal chen): ye shes gcig la dmigs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi smon lam skye ba ma yin gyi/ 'di ltar sems can thams cad yongs su bsgrub pa'i phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam
15b6(phal chen): yongs su bsgo'o// ning thams cad yongs su sbyang ba'i phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su bsngo'o// sangs rgyas thams cad la mchod cing rim tho bya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas
15b7(phal chen): thams cad la lta ba la dmigs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dad pa skye'o// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi ye shes kyi rjes su rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub
15b8(phal chen): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na meng pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngo ba rnams kyi sgor lam skye'o// de yang 'di ltar byang chub sems
17a1(phal chen): cad bde ba'i rim gro gang dang ldan pa'i bde ba'i rim gro de dag sems can thams cad kyis thogs par gyur cig/ sangs rgyas kyi gnas rab tu thob pas
17a2(phal chen): tshad med pa'i gnas su gyur cig/ sems can de dag thams cad kyi sdug bsngal gyi phung po sgrib pa'i las sna tshogs las byung ba bsgrub pa'i las de dag gis bsgribs pas/
17a3(phal chen): sangs rgyas mi mthong ba dang / chos mi mthong ba dang / dge 'dun mi shes pa'i bslab pa'i las rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bsags pa'i sdug bsngal gyi phung po de dag bdag gi lus
17a4(phal chen): 'dis sems can dmyal ba'i skye gnas/ ngan song gisa'i gnas de dang de dag zung bar bya'o// sems can dngag thams cad mi gi ba'i rdza ba 'ongs de nas brtson to// 5/
17a5(phal chen): gisuM de dag gi sdug bsngal dang / nyon mongs pa de dag byung bar bya'o// spro bar bya'o// mi ldog par bya'o// de las ma 'bros par bya'o// mi skrag par bya'o// mi 'jigs pa
17a6(phal chen): bya'o// zhum pa med par bya'o// mi skyo bar bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bdag gis na sems ca thams cad bskal bar smon lam btab pas na/ sems can thams cad kyi
17a7(phal chen): khrur bkur dgos so// 'di ltar bdag gis sems can thams cad la yongs su dgrol bar bya'o// 'di ltar bdag gis sems can thams cad bskal bar bya'o//
17a8(phal chen): skye ba'i dzis pa nga napa dpan pa yon pa das 'tsha 'a dgan pa sa 'chi ba dang / myong 'a dab pa dang tsha pa ma pams cad kyi can pa dang mamam
17b1(phal chen): thams cad kyi dgon pa dang / 'khor ba thams cad kyi dgon pa dang / lta ba'i thibs po thams cad kyi dgon pa dang / dge ba'i chos thams cad sbyor ba'i dgon pa dang / man
17b2(phal chen): ba las blang ba'i dgon pa dang dgon pa de dag thams cad nas bdag gis sems can sring pa'i thabs 'khris pa/ ma rig pa'i sgrib pas bsgribs pa/ srid pa'i sred pa dang
17b3(phal chen): ldan pa/ zer ba'i mthar gyur pa/ sdug bsngal gi shing rtags kyis bskor ba/ bdud kyi las la rten pa/ mi mkhas pa/ bsod nams 'gags pa/ the tshom du gyur pa/
17b4(phal chen): rtag tu yid gnyis dang ldan pa/ mi bde ba mthong ba 'byung ba la mkhas pa/ chub mas bskor ba'i lo ma lta bur 'khor zhing 'phyan pa de dag thams cad yongs su thar bar byas
17b5(phal chen): zhes/ de la byang chub sems dpa' snying rje chen pos yongs su rgyas pa'i sems dang ldan pas/ sems can gyi khams 'khor ba'i 'dam du 'bying ba mthong bas/
17b6(phal chen): sems can de dag la srid rtse ba chen po skyes pa/ phal cher gdags pa'i sems rab tu bskyed pa/ sems can rnams kyi don chen po bya bar dga' ba/ sems can
17b7(phal chen): mang po rab tu 'gro bar dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngo ba yongs su bsngo ba chen po la bzhugs pa/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i byang chub sems
17b8(phal chen): dpa' thams cad kyi yongs su bsngo ba la rab tu zhugs lapa/ bsngo ba chen po'i mangs/ sems can thams cad la dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngob/ sems can ma
27a1(phal chen): cad kyis brgyan pa'i gtsug lag khang grangs med pa dang / bgam gyi rgyan grangs med pa dang / skar khung gi rgyan grangs med pa dang / rta babs kyi rgyan
27a2(phal chen): grangs med pa dang / pu sha'i rgyad dang / zla gam gyi rgyan dang / khang pa brtsegs pa'i rgyan dang / bla bre'i rgyan grangs med pa dang / gser gyi dra ba'i khab grangs med pa dang /
27a3(phal chen): spos dang / bdug pa'i dam pa thams cad kyi rgyan grangs med pa dang / gos thams cad gding bar bting ba'i rgyan gyis thams cad du brgyan pa gtsug lag khang grangs med pas
27a4(phal chen): bsnyen bkur byas par gyur cig/ de ltar mchod pa che rgya chen po sbyar te/ sangs rgyas thams cad la yid kyi dbang po shin tu dang bas mchod pa dang / rim gro rgyun mi chad pa
27a5(phal chen): sangs rgyas phudud du bya ba'i phyir phyir mi ldog pa las byung bas phyag 'tshal zhing mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad
27a6(phal chen): rim po bya bas bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du pa zang par ma 'gyur cig/ 'gro ba thams cad dad par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsu ba
27a7(phal chen): yang dag par bsdu ba dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi sdug bsngal gyi phung po rnam par zlog pa dang / sems rgya chen po bskyed pa la mos par bya ba dang / rgyan chen pos
27a8(phal chen): yang dag par brgyan pa dang / tshad med par rnam par bri ba'i brgyan pa dang / brtsams pa'i mthar phyin par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas 'byung ba zhin tu gnapa brjod
27b1(phal chen): par bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / mchod rten sna tshogs bsnyen bkung bar bya ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bstan pa ma
27b2(phal chen): dag par bzung ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs shing 'tsho ba zhes pa la de lta bu'i rim gro byed pa dang / de dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang / sangs rgyas
27b3(phal chen): ngagathams cad kyi sgra badrang mchong pa la rab tu btsun par bskal pa grangs med pa zad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur ba'i rgyun dang brjod
27b4(phal chen): pa yon tan mtha' yas pa bsngags pas bsgrub pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad yongs su smin par bya bar bsgrubs pa de dag mthar thug par ma gyur cig/ de ltar rim
27b5(phal chen): byed pa las phyir ldog par ma gyur cig/ rgyun gcod par ma 'gyur cig/ sems yongs su skyo ba med pa yang thob par mgyur cig/ mngon par chags pa med pa'i se
27b6(phal chen): 'du shes rnam par spangs pa dang / mi gnas pa'i chos nyid dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba rlom sems thams cad bcom pas rlom sems med par 'gyur ba dang / chos 'gyur
27b7(phal chen): ba med pa yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin gyi rgyas btab pa'i chos kyi sgo dang / tshe dang skye ba thams cad du 'khor bar gyur pa'i sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa dang / skye ba med
27b8(phal chen): pa'i rang bzhin la dpyod cing dmigs pa'i chos kyi rgyas btab pa'i sems bskyed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs pa'i yongs su bsngo
28a1(phal chen): ba dang / chos kyi rang bzhin la rab tu brtson pa'i yongs su bsngo ba mnyam pa nyid dang / mngon par 'du shes bya ba med pa'i tshul la zhugs pa'i
28a2(phal chen): mngon par 'dra bya ba med par mngon par sgrub pa dang / dngos po thams cad kyi 'du shes dang bral ba'i bsngo ba'i tshul dang / bsngo ba la mkhas pa'i rnam pa tshad med pa
28a3(phal chen): dang / byang chub sems dpa'i bsngo ba srid pa kun las 'phags pa dang / bsgom pa'i sgo mtshan ma la khas pas gnas pa dang / byang chub sems bad pa'i spyod pa de dag
28a4(phal chen): ba'i rtsa ba nye bar len pa'i byin gyis rlabs can dang / byang chub tu sems bskyed pa bsngo ba chen po yongs su sbyangs pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la gnas pa'i
28a5(phal chen): mos pa yongs su rgyas pas gnas thams cad yang dag par bcom par gyur cig/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar
28a6(phal chen): nas kyang 'khor ba'i rgyud du chud zos par mi 'gyur ba dang / ci nas kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa chung zos par mi 'gyur ba dang / ci nas kyang srid
28a7(phal chen): pa'i 'dra 'dis chung bas par mi 'gyur ba dang / tso nas kyang sems can gyi khams thams cad bskal pa dang / tsa nas kyang ste ba dang 'tsho pos ston du mi 'gyur 'ang
28a8(phal chen): ci nas kyang chags pa med pa'i lags kyi sa spar bar mi 'gyur ba dang tsa nas kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa cig nas cig turgya zang par mi 'gyur ba dang /
28b1(phal chen): ci nas kyang 'jig rten gyi chos kyis kun tu blangs par mi 'gyur ba dang / ci nas kyang pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyis rnam par dag par 'gyur ba dang / ci nas kyang mas
28b2(phal chen): bakhyen pa'i stobs phun sum tshogs par 'gyur bar yongs su bsngo ste/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' dang sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa'i sems bsdu
28b3(phal chen): mur pa med pa dang ldan pa ni// chos dkar ba sdang bar gyur pas nye bar brtan cing yongs su ston pa'i mchog skyes bu dam pas spyad pa dang ldan pa dang / yongs su dag pa
28b4(phal chen): yid kyis yang dge bar rtog pa dang / sems dang 'dra ba'i chos thams cad la zhugs pa dang / sgyu ma dang 'dra ba'i las yongs su shes pa dang / mig yor lta bu 'dzin
28b5(phal chen): las kyi rnam par smin pa la mos pa dang / sprul pa lnga bu'i mngon par 'du byed pa la gnas pa dang / s+tha garnyan lta bu'i las la rten pa dang / grib ma lta bu'i byang chub
28b6(phal chen): sems dpa'i spyor pa'i rjes su song ba dang / chags pa med pa'i chos kyi mig rab tu skyes pa dang / bya ba med pa la 'bum klas pa'i rjes su song ba dang / bra
28b7(phal chen): rigs rab tu thob pa dang / gnyis su med pa dang ldan pa'i 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas pa'i chos thams cad la rab tu zhugs pa dang / chos mtshor ba'i ma
28b8(phal chen): ma thob par bya ba dang / chu byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad kyi rjes su song ba dang / mtshan mthams cad la zhen pa med pa dang / thun mong gi las la mkhas
29a1(phal chen): pa'i rjes su song ba dang / chos dkar po thams cadang rgyun ma chad pa dang / chags thams cad kyi mngon par ma zhen pa dang / chags pa med par 'gro ba
29a2(phal chen): la rten pa dang ldan pa yin te/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shin tu bsam pa'i blo dang ldan pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba la rmongs pa med pa/ chos thams cad
29a3(phal chen): dang 'gal ba med pa'i chos cang rgyu dang las dang / bya ba dang / 'gal ba med pa yang dag pa mthong ba/ yongs su bsngo ba la mkhas pa/ ngo bo nyid kyi tshul dang las rnam par smin pa
29a4(phal chen): mngon par bsgrub pa'i pha ro tu phyin pa/ chos thams cad la blta zhing rnam par dpyod pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa/ yongs su bsngo ba'i ye shes chen po mngon par shes pa/ las
29a5(phal chen): shin tu rig pa'i dge ba'i rtsa dang ba ldan pa la mngon par 'du bya ba med par spyod pa'i sems dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa de dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar ci nas kyang 'gro ba
29a6(phal chen): thams cad yongs su tshul ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi las rigs badrad rtsi las dang bral ba/ las g+ha rnams pa yongs su byung ba'i bdag nyid can thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
29a7(phal chen): sa shing rjems so pa'i sems dang ldan par 'gyur bar yongs su bsdu'o// bsngo ba de yang tshang med pa'i ye shes khong du chung bar bya ba'i phyir yang dag par mthong bar
29a8(phal chen): ro// dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'jig rten gyi yul dang rnam par bral ban mangs pa thams cad rnam par thal bar yongs su bsa'o// sems can shin tu rnam par byang bar bya na
29b1(phal chen): phyir yang yongs su bsgo ste/ ye shes rnams par dag mthar thug par zang pa tshul gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'khor ba'i chos kyis mi bskyod cing sangs rgyas kyi dge ba
29b2(phal chen): mapar 'byung bar sems bskyed pa dang ldan par yongs su bsngo'o// dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo ba'i tshe yang bdud kyi las thams cad las rnam par bzlog ste/
29b3(phal chen): mnyam pa nyid kyi rgyal yongs su bsngo ba'i ye shes kyi rjes su bsngo ba'i ye shes kyi rjes su song ba las rgyas 'debs par byed do// dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad mkhyen pa 'ing
29b4(phal chen): kyi longs spyod kyi phyir yang chos thams cad 'jig rterten las 'das par khong du drad pa'i yongs su bsngo bas yongs su bsngo'o// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
29b5(phal chen): chen po dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo ba ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i theg pa'i dkyil 'khor yongs su grub pas/ 'gyod pa med pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ldan pa yin te/
29b6(phal chen): kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yongs su bsngo ba mi phyed pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ste gnyis pa'o// yongs su bsngo ba de dang ldan pa'i byang chub
29b7(phal chen): sems dpa' ni dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongs su bsngo zhing / sangs rgyas grangs med pa mngon sum du bya ba mthong bar 'gyur ro// chos brjod du med pa'i yongs su dag pa
29b8(phal chen): 'ang yongs su rdzogs par byed do// sems can thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyang khong du chud par byed do// chos thams cad la 'jug pa rmongs pa med pa med pa la yang rab tu 'ju
30a1(phal chen): go/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs/ bdud kyi las thams cad rab tu 'jom pa yang yongs su sgrub po// mngon par skyes pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyang
30a2(phal chen): yongs su rdzogs par 'grub par 'gyur ro// chags pa med pa la rab tu 'jug pa'i phyir gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa yang dag par grub bo// chos thams cad kyi don mthong ba yang
30a3(phal chen): rab tu thob bo// sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'i 'du shes kyi gnas kyang rab tu rtogs par byed do// 'gro ba thams cad yongs su snang bar bya ba'i yongs su
30a4(phal chen): dag pa'ang yongs su dag sgrub bo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan gyis/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshi
30a5(phal chen): sra bcad pa 'di dag smras so// de dag yin ni dbye ba med bsgyur cing // ji snyed las dang yang dag rtsom byed kun// 'di nas rgyal ba mngon par mnyes 'gyur ba// de ltar 'jig rten
30a6(phal chen): pa yongs su bsngo byeng // sangs rgyas bsam du med pas bsnyen bkur cing // sprin dul sdom pa mchog gi tshul khrims kyi// ci nas 'gro kun rnam par dag gyur cig/ de ltar 'dri/
30a7(phal chen): rten 'phan byung yongs smra ba cwo// snod 'din thos kyi gzhal med lang// maM ga rnam pan papa'i rnam pa dang // lba ba lngab rnam pa gdugs kyis rnam pa dang // dzin nam
30a8(phal chen): mkhas la bsnyen papar byed// de ltar skyes pa'i seng gi drang srong rnams// banal tha bsamams bslad cing bkur byas kyang rgyal bgyis bu 'dul ba mtshang byas pas// rnams
30b1(phal chen): dngos par tshor bar mi 'gyur ro// deng ga rgyal ba kun la mas bye cing // phyogs rnams kun gyi 'jig rten sgron ma rnams// ma'i seng ge mtshungs me chis dang // 'jig cer na
30b2(phal chen): bcud gnas bzugs pa mthong // bskal ba bsam gyis mi khyab rnam mang du// mi ngoms yid kyis byin pa gtong byed cing // dge ba de la rjes su sems byed pas//
30b3(phal chen): pa brgyar yang ngoms par mi tshor ro// 'gro ba'i 'du shes rnam rtog ba shes kyang // de la de ni mi rtog rnam par rtog/ de dag 'gro ba'i dbang po ma lus shes// de dag par
30b4(phal chen): rtag tu 'jug par byed// de dag dga' zhing mnyam par bzhag pa'i sems// dad pa 'od gsal srizhu ldan pa rnams// bsam yas bskal par 'jig rten 'gro ba na phyir/
30b5(phal chen): yongs su dgrol ba'i sems kyis spro bar byed// de dag bde gshegs mya ngan 'das pa la// sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad yid 'ong ba'i// mchod rten bsam gyi mi khyab rtsig byed cig
30b6(phal chen): mchod pa byed kyang nam yang tshim pa med// mtshungs med de dag sku gzugs rnam dag pas// rab tu 'od 'bar gsar gyi snying po can// rgyal ba'i sku gzugs ri rab mnyam pa
30b7(phal chen): dag/ bye ba phrag rgya mtha' yas rab tu byed// zil non dam pa rnyed pa de dag ni// bsod nams yangs pa'i stobs te sgrub pa na// de dag yongs su bsnga'i shes par
30b8(phal chen): rtogs shing // dngos dang dngos med thams cad rab tu bsgom// 'di 'dri ye shes tshul la yongs bsngo bas// de phyir 'khor bar zad par mi 'gyur te// chos nyid
31a1(phal chen): shes mchog dang dram pa dag/ de la chos rnams skye ba gang yang med// des ni 'jig rten mkhyen pa rnam dag ltar// sems kyang rab tu rnam par dag par 'gyur// nges
31a2(phal chen): mi zang mthar phyir tshul ston pa'i// 'dus byas bsod nams zad par 'gyur ba med// gang rnams byang chub sems dang ldan 'gyur cing // 'jig rten kun na gnas pa med pa dag/ 'gro ba kun la rjes
31a3(phal chen): su chags pa yin// phyogs rnams kun tu'ang mtha' yas rab tu 'gro// gang gis mi yi dbang po kun 'byung ba// de 'dra'i sems su yongs su bsngo ba byed// 'gro ba thams cad sems dang ma
31a4(phal chen): rtogs kyang // 'gro ba kun du sems ni dmigs pa med// de dag dngos po thams cad ma lus par chos rnams dngos med ji bzhin 'jug par byed// ci nas 'jig rten lam du mnyam med
31a5(phal chen): par/ rnam dag mig can yongs su bsngo ba byed// des ni srid rnams yongs su dag par bsngo// yongs su srid la rtogs par mi byed de// dngos dang dngos med tshul ni shes byed cing /
31a6(phal chen): 'ad gas la dang pas sems kyang rtsi par byed// sangs rgyas shing gas gnas par mi byed de/ zhing rnam par ma lus kun na'ang ga nas tshwa 'chang // 'dus byas chos kyis rnams pa
31a7(phal chen): byed de// rangs rang bzhin la yang mi gnas sa// tsan mo rgyal bkun gyi ngan ma khyen dang / tsaM nas bla ming sangs rgyas rgyun 'dzub tsa// ts+tshin+ta rgyal brnams cung mnas 'gyur ba
31a8(phal chen): dgror 'di dgalas ni yongs su bsngo// migs dam pa rnams pa rnal gas pa// rang ga nang kyis dam pardzun byed cig/ de 'dra gyi rnams padas me nga sam thos
31b1(phal chen): 'dra' bas danams gnas pa meng par 'gyur// de dga'agro ba kun gyi skabs yin te/ las kyi mtha' rnams thams cad rnams par spong// 'pho ba 'am la pam nga ba bas
31b2(phal chen): 'jig rten yongs su spang ba gang yang med// chos dang bar du mya ngan 'das pa pa// gang phyir gzhan min zangs pa'i sa la srung // gang gis rgyal 'gyur sangs rgyas gyur ba'i rna
31b3(phal chen): de ltar dag pa'i mangs pa yongs su bsdu// 'jig can 'gro ba'i rlung la rlom sems med// 'dus byas rnams la'ang de dag chags pa med// tshig gi lam la rengag 'angs rmon
31b4(phal chen): tshig med lam la'ang rnams kyang mi gnas so// chos rnams thams cad ma lus bsrung mdzad de// mi yi dam pa sangs rgyas ji snyed pas// 'gro chung thams cad rnam pa
31b5(phal chen): phye bas mkhyen// thugs kyi rnam par dbye dang rtog mi mnga'o// rgyan gcig las ni rgyan rnams kun 'byin kyang // rnam par rtogs pa med pa'i chos byed de// de dag thams ca
31b6(phal chen): dngos po med spyod med pas// 'jig rten rtog pa med par rab tu shes// mi phyed pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ste// yongs su bsngo ba gnyis pa'o//
31b7(phal chen): bam po sum cu rtsa gsum pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yongs su bsngo
31b8(phal chen): sangs rgyas thams cad la yang dag par bskyed pa zhes bya ba gsum pa gang zhe na/ kye rgyal po'i sras ngag 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'das pa/
32a1(phal chen): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yongs su bsngo ba la rjes su slob po// ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yongs su bsngo ba
32a2(phal chen): la'ang rjes su slob bo// da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams yongs su bsngo ba la yang rjes su slob bo// de byang chub sems dpa' spyad pa la spyod pa'i
32a3(phal chen): tshe/ mi mthun pa ma yin zhing yid du 'ong bar reg pa'am/ mi mthun pa ma yin zhing yid du 'ong ba'i chos sam/ mi mthur pa ma yin ning kha na ma tho ba med pa rnam par dag pa
32a4(phal chen): ba yangs pa 'od gsal ba gang gis yid dga' ba skye zhing bde bar 'gyur ba/ dad pa skye ba/ dga' ba skye ba/ rab tu dga' bar gnas pa/ spo ba rab tu 'byung ba/ yid mi bde
32a5(phal chen): brnam par bzlob pa/ sems bde bar gyur pa/ nyams dga' bar 'gyur ba/ bsam pa 'dam par 'gyur ba/ dbang po sim par 'gyur ba'i gzugs gang ji snyed yang
32a6(phal chen): pa deng ga thams cad mthong bar 'gyur te/ de bde ba'i 'dra shes de dag mthong ba'i/ 'di ltar yongs su sde ste bdag gis bde ba yongs su bsngo 'dis/ sangs rgyas
32a7(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das de dag sangs rgyas kyirnam par spyad pa'i ba ba bsam gyis mi rtsub pa dang / b+h+rUM b+h+r-i zhing yang ldan par gyu c-i/ sangs rgyas kyi
32a8(phal chen): bde ba mtshungs pa med pas yang dag par bzung bgyur cig/ sangs rgyas kyi thugs rjes chen po'i bde ba mtha' yas pa phyir cing yang shin tu bcan par gyur ci
32b1(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar ba'i bde ba tshad med pa dang yang dag par ldan gyur cig/ sangs rgyas kyi chos 'phrul tshang med pas shin du bzung bar gyur cig/ sangs rgyas kyinA
32b2(phal chen): mchog gi mthu' phyang ba'i brnyed par dka' bas shin du khyab par gyur cig/ sangs rgyas kyi stobs kyi bde ba chang med pas shin du bde bar gyur cig/ tshor ba thams cadana'i
32b3(phal chen): skye ba med pa'i/ bde bas 'gyur ba med par bde bar gyur cig/ chags pa med par gnas pa rtag tu mnyam par bzhag pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa bde ba gnyis su med cing ya
32b4(phal chen): dag par spyod pas 'khrug tshad med pa'i bde bar gyur cig ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnams la
32b5(phal chen): yongs su bsngos nas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la yongs su bsngo ba byed de/ 'di ltar bsam pa yongs su ma rdzogs par bya rnams kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par
32b6(phal chen): 'gyur ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// lhag pa'i bsam pa yongs su ma dag pa rnams yongs su dag par bya ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su ma rdzogs pa thams cad yang
32b7(phal chen): su rdzogs par ba dang / byang chub kyi sems rdo rje lta bu shin tu brtan par bya ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i go cha phyir mi ldog pa rgyud mi 'chang bar bya ba dang / byang chub tu gzhol
32b8(phal chen): ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su bsrung ba dang / 'gro ba thams cad dang mnyam pa'i byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa'i smon lam yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / bya
33a1(phal chen): chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi rnam par spyod pa thob par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dbang po thams cad kyi mngon par shes pa shin du rno bar byab/
33a2(phal chen): dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du thub par 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsgo ste/ de ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba de ga rnams
33a3(phal chen): cang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi don du yongs su bsngo'o// de yang dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ngun segal gtogs btsam du sangs rgyas zhi ba'i sgra thos sam/ chos mnyan 'am/
33a4(phal chen): 'phags pa'i dge 'dun bsnyen bkur byed dam/ gang ci yang rung ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad la bar chad med par yongs su bsngo'o// sangs rgyas rjes su
33a5(phal chen): pa yongs su rdzogs par yongs su bsdu'o// chos rjes su dran pa rab tu sbyor bar yongs su bsngo'o// 'phags pa'i dge 'dun la rim gro bya bar yongs bsngo'o// sangs rgya
33a6(phal chen): mthong ba dang mi 'bral bar yongs su bsngo'o// sems can rnam par dag yongs su bsngo'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos khong du chud par yongs su bsngo'o// tshad ming pa'i yon tan
33a7(phal chen): larab tu 'jug pa'i yongs su bsngo'o// mngon par shes pa dang dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par dag pa'i yongs su bsngo'o// chos kyi the tshom rnam par gsal ba'i phyir yongs su
33a8(phal chen): bkra'o// ji la nabyas dang/ ringasangs rgyas rnam pa ngag pa bstan pa la srung ba'i sems can rnamapa la yongs su bsngo pa'i bzhin sa/ byang chubasams dpa' sems pa/
33b1(phal chen): rgyam na pa dag pa'i rtsa ba das sems can rnams cad la yongs blam na// 'ang ldar sapas can dmyal ngan la marnam par bzlog pa'i phyir yangasas bapa'o// tshul ba b+h+ya
33b2(phal chen): rgyun gcod pa'i phyir yongs su bsdu'o// gshin rje'i 'jig rten rtsa ba nas gcad pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// ngan song gi rgyun thams cad ma lus par rgyun gcad pa'i phyir yong/
33b3(phal chen): suM bsngo'o// sems can de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa'i byang chub tu mos shing phyir mi ldog pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// lhag pa'i bsam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
33b4(phal chen): du sems bskyed pa'i rlab bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mi spang ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// thams cad mkhyen pa'i sa shin tu bde ba thob par
33b5(phal chen): bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// sems can thams cad shin tu rnams par dag par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// sems cam thams cad me shes mtha' yas pa khong du chung
33b6(phal chen): bar bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// byang chub sems dpa' ni dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yang rung ste byang chub tu dmigs pa dang ma bral ba'i sems dang / thams cad mkhyen pa
33b7(phal chen): padamigs po brtson pa'i yid la byed pa dang / bdag gdul ba dang / pha rol btul ba la gzhol ba'i lhag pa'i bsam pa dang / bdag dang gzhan yongs su ston par sbyor dang /
33b8(phal chen): thabs mkhas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshul dang / mi shes kyi rjes su 'brang bas yongs su smin pa'i byed par thar pa dang / sems bskyed pa gnas pa med pa dang / 'grob
34a1(phal chen): pa'i mnyam par gzhag pa dang / sngon snying rje chen po bskyed pas khyim na gnas pa dang / byams pa'i sems dang ldan pas rang gi chung ma'i rjes su 'brang
34a2(phal chen): ba dang / sbyor ba nyams pa med pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lam shin tu rnams par dag pas rtsom pa dang / yang dag par brtsom pa dang / bsgrub pa dang / yang dag par sgru
34a3(phal chen): pa dang / stong pa dang / yang dag par bskyed pa dang / dmigs pa chen pos yang dag par sdud pa dang / grub par byed pa dang / rgya cher byed pa dang / yongs su rdzogs byed pa dang /
34a4(phal chen): na gnas po dang / bu dang 'tshogs shing gnas pan 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste/ byang chub sems dpa' khyim na gnas pa'i tshe/ gang ci yang rung ste/ gos dang / zas dang /
34a5(phal chen): mal stan dang / nad kyi rkyen sran dang / yo byad dang / 'gro ba dang / 'ong ba dang / spyod pa dang / lba ba dang / spen pa dang / skye mched 'byung ba'i las dang / spyod lam la gnas
34a6(phal chen): pa dang / spyod lam brtul ba dang / lus dang ngag gi las spyod pa ngas/ dbang po drug bsdams pa dang / rang gi lus phyo ba dang / minye ba dang / khrus byung ba dang zas pa
34a7(phal chen): dang / 'angs pa dang / 'chos pa dang / myangs pa dang / brkyang ba dang / bskum pa dang / lci ba dang / kun tu lta ba dang / log pa dang / sad pa dang / rang gi lus bstan par
34a8(phal chen): bya ma tha kyi ma mas pas ma pa ma ma
34b1(phal chen): phan pa dang / bde ba der sems dang / byang chub tu smon lam tshad med par btab pa/ sems tshad med pa ldan pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya chen po yongs su sdud pa/ 'gro ba
34b2(phal chen): thams cad bskyob par brtson pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba la rtag tu brtson pa rlom pa dang / bag med par bzlog pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i chos nyid la rab du brten pa/
34b3(phal chen): rnam par shes pa dang / sems bskyed pa dang / yid la byed pa gzhan med pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byang chub la mngon par gnas pa/ nyon mongs par byo
34b4(phal chen): thams cad las phyir phyogs pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi srab pa la slob pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i lam nyams pa me
34b5(phal chen): pa/ ye shes kyi sa laM bsnyen pa bstan pa'i gnas dang ldan pa/ dge ba'i rtsa bas shes rab che ba bung ba bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba'i chos tshogs chen po bzlog
34b6(phal chen): pa 'gro ba thams cad las rgyud shin tu 'phags pa 'du byed la mngon par bzhen pa med pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gdam ngag mthun par 'dzin
34b7(phal chen): pas/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du ma bsngos pa gang yang med de/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khyim na gnas pa'i tshe/ dge ba'i
34b8(phal chen): rtsa ba de dag yang dag par sdud cing sgrub bo// yongs su bsngo ste/ de ltar de chung ngu na/ khyi'i lam gyi rgyu du gtogs pa dang / de ma yin pa'i byol song gi ri
35a1(phal chen): su gtogs pa la zas sna 'ga' 'am/ kham 'ga' yongs su gtong ba byed kyang de thams cad de dag nyid la phan pa dang / de dag nyid la/
35a2(phal chen): bde ba dang / byol sang gi skye gnas de dag sdug bsngal gyi rgya mtsho dag dang / sdug bsngal gyi rgyu de dag dang / sdug bsngal gyi phung po dadag dang / sdug bsngal
35a3(phal chen): kyi tshor ba de dag dang / sdug bsngal bas gas pa de dag dang / sdug bsngal mngon par 'du byed po de dag dang / sdug bsngal gyi gnyer de dag dpe/ drug
35a4(phal chen): kyirtsab de dag dang / sdug bsngal gyi skye mched de dag nas/ sems can de dag yongs su sgrol ning rnam par bzlog pa'i phyir yongs su bsdu'o// de la dmigs
35a5(phal chen): pas sems can thams cad mngon du byed do// dmigs par byed do// yid la byed do// dge ba'i rtsa ba de dang de dag la 'ang sngon du 'gro bar byed de/ 'di lta
35a6(phal chen): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo'o// byang chub tu sems bskyed pas yongs su 'dzin to// dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag la nye bar gajog go// 'khor ba'i
35a7(phal chen): dgon pa las rnam par bzlog go// sangs rgyas kyi bde ba bsgribs pa yang mngon du byed do// 'khor ba'i rgyud las 'byin par byed do// sangs rgyas
35a8(phal chen): chos la brtsod byams pas kyang yongs su rgyas par byed // sring rje cher thos kyang ringag la brtse bar byedad/ bde ba rnams par dag pa yang rings
35b1(phal chen): yongs su bsngo'o// dge ba'i rgyu yongs su bsrung bar bya ba'i bar yang rab tu 'jug ste/ de dag sangs rgyas kyi chos la nye bar snang ngo // de dag bdung
35b2(phal chen): yul las rnam par bzlog go/ de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul 'jug par byed do// de dag 'jig rten gyi rgyud thams cad las byin du bskyed par byed do//
35b3(phal chen): de dag de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs la yang dag sgrub par byed do// de dag dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la rab tu gzhog ste/ de ltar byang chub sems
35b4(phal chen): dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ci yang rung ste/ yang dag par bslab pa dang / yang dag par sgrub pa dang / yang dag par sgrub par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad 'di ltar/
35b5(phal chen): yongs bya sngo ste/ 'di snyam du sems bskyed de/ ji ltar 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa la spyod cing sangs rgyas la
35b6(phal chen): rim gro mdzad pa'i dmigs pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi dmigs pa la brtson par mdzad pa'i tshe// gzugs la gnas pa med pa dang /
35b7(phal chen): ba la mngon par ma chags pa dang / 'du shes kyi rnam pa phyin ci log med pa dang / 'du byed mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / rnam par shes pa mngon par
35b8(phal chen): chags pa med pa dang / skye mched drug las byin tu 'phags pa dang / 'jig rten gyi chos dang mi 'grogs pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das par yongs su
36a1(phal chen): bsngo ba dang / nam mkha' lta bu chos 'byam klas pa rab tu mkhyen pa dang / chos thams cad gnas pa med par rab tu rtogs pa dang / chos
36a2(phal chen): thams cad ma skyes pas 'byung ba dang / chos thams cad ma 'gags par gzigs pa dang / mi bden pa'i chos thams cad la mngon par chags pa las gyen tu 'pha
36a3(phal chen): ba dang / chos thams cad mi rdur zhing bden par gzigs pa dang / chos thams cad 'pho ba med pa la shin tu mos pa dang / chos thams cad kyi yang dag pa'i mtha'
36a4(phal chen): mnyam pa la gnas pa la gnas pa dang / chos thams cad mtshan nyid las med pa'i mtshan nyid las shin tu 'phags pa dang / chos de lta ba'i mtshan nyid can thams
36a5(phal chen): cang rang bzhin med pa'i rang bzhin tu rtogs pa dang / sgo kun nas dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par bsgrub pa la brtson pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor
36a6(phal chen): gyis gzigs pa thams cad la shin tu gnol ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngos pa de bzhin du bdag gis kyang chos nyid de dag kho na la mos par byaste/
36a7(phal chen): chos de lta bu la btsun pa'i sems bskyed pa/ chos thams cad dang ma 'gal ba/ s+thA m+b+ha lta bu'i chos las byung ba/ mig sar byung chu'i zla ba lta ba'i rna
36a8(phal chen): ba/ me lang gi dkyil 'khor la gang gi dkyil 'khor yod pa'i rgyu dang ldan pa'i las kyi mthu dang / de bzhin ga shegs pa'i mthar phyin par las kyi rgya mngasas
36b1(phal chen): shes pas yongs su bsngo'o zhes sems bskyed de/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
36b2(phal chen): rnams kyi rjes slob cing dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs bsngo'o// 'das pa rnams la ji lta ba bzhin du ma byon pa dang / de bzhin du da ltar byung ba dang /
36b3(phal chen): bzhin du 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi yongs su bsngo ba'i rjes su bslabs te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de /
36b4(phal chen): yongs su bsngo'o// yang 'di ltar sems bskyed do/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di ltar yongs su brdzun
36b5(phal chen): zhes byang bar thugs su chud pa de lta bu'i bsngo ba rab dam pa/ mchog bla na med pa/ mnyam pa med pa mi mnyam pa dang / mnyam pa 'dra ba med pa/
36b6(phal chen): mtshungs pa med pa/ gtso bor gyur pa/ thu bor gyur pa/ kun tu snyoms pa/ mi mnyam pa med pa bdag nyid che ba dang / shin tu yangs pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams
36b7(phal chen): par dag pa/ kha na ma tho ba med pa/ brjod du med pas yongs su bsngo'o snyam du sems bskyed do// byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba de ltar yongs su
36b8(phal chen): bsngo ba ni lus kyi las rnam par dag pas/ lus rnam dag pa yin/ ngag gi las rnam par dag pas ngag rnam par dag pa yin/ yid kyi las
37a1(phal chen): rnam par dag pas/ yid rnam par dag pa yin/ kha na ma tho ba med pa la gnas pas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la gnas pa yin/ kha na mtho
37a2(phal chen): med pa'i las dang ldan pas dge ba'i rtsa ba la brtson pa yin/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rab tu brtson pas sems nyams pa med pa yin/ chos thams cad byed pa
37a3(phal chen): med pa la zhugs pas shin du che ba la gnas pa yin/ 'jig rten gyi chos mgos pas 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos dang 'byor pa yin/ ye shes dang mngon par shes pa'i
37a4(phal chen): las dang ldan pas 'byam klas pa mtha' dang 'bus med pa thams cad rab tu shes pa yin/ gnas thams cad yang dag par bcom pas yongs su bsngo ba la mkhas pa yin
37a5(phal chen): ba/ kye rgyal ba'i sras ngag 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yongs su bsngo ba gsum pa sangs rgyas thams cad la yang dag par bskyed pa nas
37a6(phal chen): bya ba ste/ bsngo ba de dag la gnas pa'i sems dang ldan lnga pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ra de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'phrin las kyi zil dang ldan pa yin/
37a7(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi phur sum tshogs pa la zhugs pa yin/ ye shes kyi yul la zhugs pa yin/ byang chub sems dpa'i las dang ma bral ba yin/ thabs mkhas pa rnam pa
37a8(phal chen): dpyod pa la mkhas pa yin chos kyi dbyings la rab tu zhugs pa yin/ byang chub sems dpas yongs su smin par bya ba'i mtshams sbyong ba las mkhas pa dang ldan
37b1(phal chen): yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i thams cad kyi rigs dang rgyud du chud pa yin/ chos thams cad kyi rgyus mtha' dang dbus med pa la mkhas pas rab du dbye ba khong du chud pa yin/
37b2(phal chen): 'jig rten du skye bar snang yang 'jig rten gyi chos mi brjod pa yin no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyis sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam pa
37b3(phal chen): bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// de dag bsngo ba bslab pa la bslabs pa ste// skyes bu'i gtso bo ji snyed 'das pa dang // gang dag ma byon gang dag bzhugs
37b4(phal chen): pa'i rnams// de dag spyod pa'i rjes su dpa' ba slob// bde ba ji snyed gang dag rgyu ba dang // skyes bu'i gtso bo gang dag rab bsngags pa// mig tu 'ong zhing dag pa rgya chen rnams/
37b5(phal chen): 'jig rten mkhyen pa rnams la yongs bsngo// lus kyi bde ba gang dag shes pa dang // mig bde ngo bzhin rna ba'i bde ba dang // sna dang lce yi bde ba mtha' yas pa// de dag tshul ba kun la
37b6(phal chen): yongs su bsngo// 'gro ba kun na dge ba gang yod pa// skyes bu 'dul bas thugs su chud pa rnams// de dag thams cad ma lus bsdu byas te// 'jig rten phar phyir de la rjes su dgal
37b7(phal chen): 'jig rten mkhyen pa'i de la dgar byas nas// skyes bu seng ge'i bde ba gang mnga' ba// de 'dra'i bde dang 'gro ba ldan 'gyur zhes// 'gro ba kun la de dag bsngo ba byed// 'jig
37b8(phal chen): rten pa dag na bder 'gyur gang yod pa// skyes bu dam pas thugs su chud pa'i rnams// bde ba de dang 'gro kun ldan 'gyur te// 'jig rten sngon ma bzhin du kun gyur cig/ bde ba
38a1(phal chen): de dag yongs su bsngo byed kyang // mtshungs med rtag tu 'gro bar byed pa dag/ sems can phan pa rtag tu bzhugs pa'i rnams// yongs su bsngo bas rlom sems
38a2(phal chen): nam yang med// de ltar de dag yongs su bsngo ba na// tshe rabs skyes bu seng ge ci 'dra ba// de 'dra'i dam par bsod nams 'di gyur zhes// snying rje chen pos sems yangs yongs
38a3(phal chen): su bskyed// 'jig rten 'di na byang chub spyad pa spyod cing // 'gro ba dag du ji ltar las bsgrubs pas// rgyal bas ji ltar mkhyen pa mtshungs med pa'i// bde ba kun dang bral bar ma
38a4(phal chen): gyur cig/ gang yang 'gro ba kun na yod pa yi// skye mched bsdams pa yang dag skye ba'i rnams// ye shes rang gis bsgrubs pa dag/ skye dgu kun la phar phyir yongs su ban+d+ha/
38a5(phal chen): lus dang ngag dang yid kyilas kyi rnams// gang yang rung ba'i lam na yod ba dag/ ma shes rang gis bsgrub pa'i rnams// gzhi mug meng pas yongs su bsngo ba byed// dza sri
38a6(phal chen): de dag rab tu spyod pa rnams// rgyal sras rnams kyis yang dag bsdu bya ba// de ni mtshungs med rgyal ba'i rjes su byu ba// de dag ni ba'i yid phyir yongs su bsngo// 'jig rten
38a7(phal chen): zang ma lus bsti byas te// 'gro yangs 'dzin ji srid dge yod pa// bde ba de dang yongs su ldan pa'i phyir// de la de dag yongs su bsngo ba byed// bdag la bde ba rnam pa
38a8(phal chen): ma tshol te// bde bkun la'ang rtag par rab tu thugs// sbas pa rnams la nam yang mas pa med// bdag meng chos la'ang dag par 'jug pa yim// rgyal bkun gyis
38b1(phal chen): sang gzigs pa yi// rgyal sras ji snyed yod pa de dag phyir// myur bum lus sangs rgyas gyur cig ces// bsod nams de dag yongs su bsngo ba byed// bdag gis legs/
38b2(phal chen): bsags las ni gang yod pa// de yis 'jig rten ma lus thams cad kyi// lam rgyud 'gro bar gtogs pa'i sems can rnams// de dag ma lus mi'i gtso gyur cig
38b3(phal chen): smon lam mang po ji snyed gang yod pa// mtshungs pa med pa'i rgyal bas snyan pa rnams// rgyal sras bsam pa yongs su 'grub 'gyur te// smon lam de dag rnam par dag
38b4(phal chen): 'gyur cig/ 'jig rten ji srid las kyis rnam zlos pa// phyogs na yod pa thams cad mthong nas kyang // de dag yongs su btsal bsgrub bsgrub pa rnams// mA lus bas
38b5(phal chen): rnams thams cad yongs su bsngo// gnyis kyi chos kyis 'jal bar mi byed de// gnyis med chos ni de dag mngon par shes// gnyis su med dang gnyis su med pa la/
38b6(phal chen): rgyal sras de dag bsam pa mi rten to// 'gro ba'i 'du shes rgyu ba ji srid pa'i// ma lus 'jig rten 'du shes 'jug byed kyang // 'gro ba'i 'du shes rgyu bar rdzogs pa yi/
38b7(phal chen): 'du shes yong min 'du shes med min 'gyur// de dag lus kyis yongs su dag 'gyur cig/ de dag yid kyang yongs su dag pa yin// de dag ngag gis shin tu bsdams byas
38b8(phal chen): shing / de dag yid kyang yongs su dag pa yin// ji dag pade gshegs mya ngan 'das pa jam// ma byon sangs rgyas de dag rjes su sems// phyogs bzungs na bzlas
39a1(phal chen): pa'i sangs rgyas kyang // de dag rjes slob chos rnams ston pa byed// dus gsum rgyal ba'i ye shes mkhyen pa'i rnams// chags pa med pa'i thugs
39a2(phal chen): kyis ji lta bur// byang chub don phyin las rnams bsgrubs mdzad pa// de dag 'jig rten phan phyir yongs su bsngon// mchog gi blo dang tshul khrims ldan pa'i blo// bden
39a3(phal chen): ba'i blo dang gzhan du mi 'gyur blo// yang dag blo dang rnam par dag pa'i blo// de 'dra'i blo'i dam pas yongs su bsngo// sangs rgyas thams cad la yang dag par bskyed pa
39a4(phal chen): bya zhes bya ba ste// yongs su bsngo ba gsum pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yongs su bsngo ba ban pa rnams
39a5(phal chen): tshad rjes su song ba zhes bya ba gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i rtsa ba la brtsom par byed pa'i cha//
39a6(phal chen): ba'i zla ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste/ 'di ltar dziH/ yang dag pa'i thams cad du rjes su song zhing dngos po thams cad kyi rjes su song ba dang / 'gro ba thams
39a7(phal chen): cad kyi rjes su song ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi rjes su song ba dang / zhing thams cad kyi rjes su song ba dang / chos thams cad kyi rjes su sang ba dang // namam
39a8(phal chen): thams cad kyi rjes su song ba dang / dus gsum thams cad kyi rjes su song ba dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas thams cad kyi rjes su sang ba dang / spyod pa'i/
39b1(phal chen): thams cad kyi rjes su song ba de bzhin du/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di yang dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas skye da de rgyas skye ba thams cad du rgyas par/ 'dus pa'i dus kyi sangs rgya
39b2(phal chen): thams cad mchod cing bsnyen bkur ba'i rgyur gyur cig/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi smon lam yongs su rdzogs pa'i rgyur gyur cig/ da ltar byung ba'i
39b3(phal chen): dus kyi 'jig rten gyi khams nam mkha'i ra dbyings kyis klas pa'i chos kyi mthas gtugs pa lnga rdzas dang / lha rjes ma yin pa'i rim gro 'byam klas pa dang ldan pa/
39b4(phal chen): sangs rgyas thams cad mngon par gyur pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'khor dkyil 'khor gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rgyan rnam par dgod pa'i rgyur gyur cig
39b5(phal chen): blo bdag nyid che ba la mos shing tu yangs pa'i don tu bsgrubs pa med pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad cher yongs su bsngo ba'i phyir// 'jig rten gyi khams dbus med pa
39b6(phal chen): thams cad sems bskyed par rgyas par rgyas par gyur cig/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbus med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams
39b7(phal chen): dang / nam mkha'i dpyongs mtha' dang dbus med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams dang / nam mkha'i dbyings 'byam klas pa la rab tu gnas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi
39b8(phal chen): rgyud dang / las gzhan dang gzhan gyis shin tu bsgrubs pa'i phyogs byams klas pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med par rnam par rgyu ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams
40a1(phal chen): dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa 'jig rten gyi khams kyi khongs mtha' yas pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi dmigs pa la gnas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams
40a2(phal chen): dum dang / 'jig rten gyi khams sna tshogs 'byam klas pa dang / sa mtshams med pa'i 'jig rten gyi 'khor dang / bsngal gzhir rgyu ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par grub pa dang /
40a3(phal chen): spyi'u tshogs su rgyu ba'i phyogs kyi 'khor gyi rgyud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa dang / sems can gyi 'khor 'khor mtha' dang dbus med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam
40a4(phal chen): klas bshin tu bstan pa thams cad ma lus pa de dag na bzhugs shing 'tsho ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi 'phrul pa dang / cho 'phrul yang dag par ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa
40a5(phal chen): dedag chas kyi dbyings malus pa dang / nam mkha'i dbyings sun pa marnyed la/ 'grob rnams cad yongs su gzugs par bsgrub pa'i de bzhin pashegs pa'i byi
40a6(phal chen): rlabs yang dag par ston pa sangs rgyas kyi gzigs pa l-i sa 'byam klas pa'i mngon par shes par thugs su chud pa rab tu brjod pa rnam par 'phrul pa mtha' drung dang
40a7(phal chen): med pas rab tu byung ba/ chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin gyi rjes su song brda dad pa'i chos kyi dbyings zhe marnam pa la rab tu zhugs pa// de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying pa
40a8(phal chen): lus su gcig gi/ 'gro ba thams cad la yang dgu par ston pas na phyir ldog pa med pa/ 'jig rjen gyi khams thams cad mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas pa/ thugs
40a9(phal chen): chos thams cad kyis rab du zhugs pa
40b1(phal chen): su chung bas thams cad mngon par mkhyen pas/ chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin gyis shin tu 'phags pa/ sgrib pa med pa'i gyi rlabs kyis phyir mi ldog pa/ sangs rgyas kyi
40b2(phal chen): dge bas yang rtsabs yang dag par byung ba'i phyir chags pa med pas gzigs pa'i bdag nyid chen po can bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
40b3(phal chen): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la me tog gam/ spos sam/ 'phreng ba 'am/ byug pa 'am/ gdugs sam/ rgyal
40b4(phal chen): mtshan dang / rin po che 'am/ mar mes de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'am/ mchod rten la yang rung te/ dmigs pa tshad med pas sbyar ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs thams cad kyi
40b5(phal chen): dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dang gang skyed kyang rung ste/ 'khrug pa med pa'i sems dang rtse gcig tu gyur pa med pa'i sems dang / g.yo ba med pa'i sems dang / rmongs pa med
40b6(phal chen): pa'i sems dang / gnas med pa'i sems dang / mi gnas pa'i sems dang / srog med pa'i sems dang / mi g.yeng ba'i sems dang / zhi ba'i sems bya ste/ 'di ltar
40b7(phal chen): yongs su bsngo zhing 'di snyam du dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di chos kyi dbyings shin tu bstan pas 'dus pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad mkhyen pa'i byang chub kyis 'dus ming mang po dang /
40b8(phal chen): tshig dang nges pa'i ngag mtha' yas pa dang / dus tha dad par mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang / phyi ma'i mthar thug pa'i bskal par byin gyis rlabs pa
41a1(phal chen): sku tshe tshad dang mtha' dang / dbus med par shin tu bstan pa'i sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / da ltar byung ba'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
41a2(phal chen): byang chub kyis rgyas pa dang / chos kyi dbyings de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'bru rang gnas/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang /
41a3(phal chen): kyi dbyings yongs su gang ba'i 'khor dkyil 'khor dus ji ltar ba bzhin du yang dag par ston pa'i sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi spos kyi gdugs
41a4(phal chen): chang med pa yongs su 'byung bar gyur cig/ spos kyi ba ngan tshang pa yongs su 'byung bar gyur cig/ spos kyi gzhil med khang tshad med pa yongs su 'byung bar gyur te/
41a5(phal chen): glos kyi drab tshad med pa yongs su 'byung bar gyur cig/ spos kyi sku gzugs tshang med pa yongs su 'byung bar gyur cig/ spos kyi 'od tshad med pa yongs su 'byung bar gyur ci/
41a6(phal chen): sngas kyi 'od zer tshang meng pa yongs su 'byung bar gyur gyi/ sa kyi sbyir tshang med pa yongs su byung gyur cig// sras kyi gang rgyu rgyang med pa yongs su 'byung bar byur
41a7(phal chen): ga/ spos kyi 'chags su tshad med pa yongs su byung bar gyur cig/ rdzas kyi gtsug lag khang chang meng pa yongs su 'byung bar gyur cig/ sum kyi zhing tshad med pa yongs su
41a8(phal chen): 'byung bar gyur cig/ sras kyi ri rab tsha mang po yongs su 'byung bar 'gyur gyi// thos kyi rgya mtsho tshang med pa yongs su 'byung bar gyur cig/ spos kyi chu klung chang min
41b1(phal chen): pa yongs su 'byung bar gyur cig/ sras kyi shing tshad med pa yongs su 'byung bar gyur cig/ spos kyi rna bza' tshang med pa yongs su 'byung bar gyur cig/ sras
41b2(phal chen): tshad med pa yongs su 'byung bar gyur cig/ spos kyi pho brang tshad med pa yongs su 'byung bar gyur cig/ me tog sa gdugs dpag tu med pa yongs su 'byung
41b3(phal chen): gyur cig ces bya ba nas/ tshul de bzhin du me tog gi pho brang gi bar du dpag tu med pa yongs su 'byung bar gyur cig/ 'phreng ba'i gdugs grangs med pa yongs
41b4(phal chen): su 'byung bar gyur cig cig ces bya ba nas/ 'phreng ba'i pho brang gi bar du grangs med pa yongs su 'byung bar gyur cig/ byug pa gdugs bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs
41b5(phal chen): 'byung bar gyur cig ces bya ba nas/ byug pa'i pho brang gi bar du bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su 'byung bar gyur cig/ phye ma'i gdugs mtshungs pa med pa yongasu
41b6(phal chen): 'byung bar gyur cig ces bya ba nas/ phyi ma'i pho brang gi bar du mtshungs pa med pa yongs su 'byung bar gyur cig/ rab za'i gdugs kun du mtha' yas pa yongs su
41b7(phal chen): 'byung bar gyur cig ces bya ba nas/ na bza'i pho brang gi rab tu mtha' yas pa yongs su 'byung bar gyur gyi// rin po che'i gdugs kun du mu med pa yongs su 'byung
41b8(phal chen): bar gyur cig ces bya ba nas/ rin po che'i pho brang gi bar du kun tu mu med pa yongs su 'byung bar gyur cig/ mar me snang ba'i gdugs gzhal du med pa yangs
42a1(phal chen): yongs su 'byung bar gyur cig ces bya ba nas/ mar me snang ba'i pho brang gi bar du gzhal du med pa yongs su 'byung bar gyur cig ces bya ba nas/
42a2(phal chen): mar me snang ba'i pho brang gi bar du gzhal du med pa yongs su 'byung bar gyur cig/ ltab lhub kyi gdugs brjod du med pa yongs su 'byung bar gyur cig ces bya ba nas// lpa
42a3(phal chen): lhub kyi pho brang gi bar du brjod du med pa yongs su 'byung bar gyur cig/ nor bu chen po che'i gdugs brjod du med pa'i yongs su brjod du pu yongs su 'byung bar gyur
42a4(phal chen): ces bya ba nas/ nor bu rin po che'i pho brang gi bar du brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa yongs su 'byung bar gyur cig/ de bzhin du nor bu rin po che'i rgyal mtshan
42a5(phal chen): dang / nor bu rin pa'i che'i ba dan dang / nor bu rin po che'i bla ze dang / nor bu rin po che'i dra ba dang / nor bu rin po che'i sku gzugs dang / nor bu rin po che'i 'od dang /
42a6(phal chen): bu rin po che'i 'od zer dang / nor bu rin po che'i sprin dang / nor bu rin po che'i gtan dang / nor bu rin po che'i 'chags dang / nor bu rin po che'i gtsug khang dang / nor bu rimam
42a7(phal chen): tshe'i ming dang / nor bur rin po che'i ri rab dang / nor bu rin pa che'i rgya mtshod dang / rnyong bu rim pa che'i chuklung dang / nor bu rin ba rgya'i shing dang / nor ba rin pa che'i na pa
42a8(phal chen): dang / nor bu rin po che'i bad+mad dpa / nor bu rin po kye'i bzang brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du mad pa'i ngag kyang ldan nas gnas par gyur // bigs pa raral pa
42b1(phal chen): grangs med pa'i rgyan rnams kun nas gnas par gyur cig/ grangs med pa'i gtsug lag khang dag kun nas gnas pa'i gyur cig/ grangs med pa'i khang pa brtsegs
42b2(phal chen): dag kun nas gnas par gyur cig/ grangs med pa'i rta babs dag kun gnas par gyur cig/ gangs med pa'i zla gam dag kun nas gnas par gyur cig/ grangs men
42b3(phal chen): pa'i rin po che'i pu shu dag kun nas gnas par gyur cig/ grangs med pa'i rin po che'i skar khung rnam pa tha dad pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig/ rin po che'i kha dog
42b4(phal chen): rnam par dag pa zangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig/ grangs med pa'i rgyan rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa/ thams cad dpe med pa dag kun nas gnas
42b5(phal chen): par gyur cig/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad ma lus sangs rgyas kyi rim gro dang / rgyan rnam pa 'di lta bus rnam par dag par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad ma lus
42b6(phal chen): par stobs bcu'i sar 'byung bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad shes par bstan pa'i phyir chos kyi snang ba bsgribs pa'i med pa skye bar gyur cig/ 'gro ba thams cad
42b7(phal chen): gdul ba'i phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad ma lus par yongs su bsngo bar gyur cig/ 'pho ba med pa'i chos nyid du dus thams cad ma lus pa la 'jug par bya ba'i
42b8(phal chen): phyir nam mkha'i dbyings ma lus pa thams cad dang / 'dra ba'i sems tshad med pas zhis thams cad yongs su rgyas par gyur cig/ 'tsho ba thams cad kyis
43a1(phal chen): sangs rgyas mthong ba yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad rab tu dbul bar gyur cig/ 'gro ba thams cad kyis theg pa cher po shin du
43a2(phal chen): grub pa dang / chos thams cad ma lus pa la mngon par chags pa med par bya ba'i phyir/ dge ba'i rtsa ba ma lus pa la gnas pas/ kun nas gnas par gyur cig/ spyod pa mtha
43a3(phal chen): yas pa byin gyis rlabs pa dang / chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbus med pa la 'jug pa'i bya ba'i phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la yongs su spyod par gyur cig/ de bzhin gzugs
43a4(phal chen): pathams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongs su 'gyur bar shog cig/ sems can thams cad kyis thams cad mkhyen pa'i
43a5(phal chen): khong du chud bar bya ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba lus par brgyan du gyur par shog cig/ ci nas kyang bdag med pa'i chos kyi dbyings las chos thams cad 'da' ba mi 'gyur bar da
43a6(phal chen): ba'i rtsa ba bdag gis sems can sangs rgyas thams cad la bsnyen bkur yongs su spyod pas yang dag par zin par gyur cig/ chags pa med pa la 'jug pa'i phyir
43a7(phal chen): thams cad yang dag par zin par gyur cig// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dge ba'i rngub thams cad kyi grogs gcig tu mthun pas yang dag par zin par gyur gyi
43a8(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad smon lam yongs su rdzogs pas yang dag par zin par gyur cig/ bsgrib pa meng pa khong du bar bya chuba'i phyir/ byang chub
43b1(phal chen): sems dpa'i chos snang ba thams cad yang dag par min par gyur cig/ mtha' dang dbus med pa la mkhas par bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i thams cad kyi rnam par
43b2(phal chen): 'phrul pas yang dag par zin par gyur cig/ sems chad med pas yongs su rgyas par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spobs dang mi bsnyengs pas yang dag par
43b3(phal chen): par gyur cig/ mi gnyis pa'i snang ba grub pas/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / spobs pa dang / gzungs kyi sgor 'jug pas yang dag par zin par gyur cig
43b4(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul ba dang cho 'phrul chen po shin tu bstan pa bsgrub pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi tshul la mkhas pas yang dag
43b5(phal chen): par zin par gyur cig skye ba dang / rnam par 'tshang rgya ba dang / 'khor lo bskor ba dang / mya ngan las 'da' ba dang / nye bar gshegs pa bstan pa dang / tshong pa dang rim
43b6(phal chen): zo dang / sems can 'dul ba la 'jug pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs dus gsum du byon pa mtha' dang dbus med pa thams cad ma lus pa'i skye ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi
43b7(phal chen): byang chub mngon par 'tshang rgya bas yang dag par zin par gyur cig/ 'jig rten gyi khams cad ma lus pa bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par zin par gyur
43b8(phal chen): cig/ bskal pa 'byam klas pa mtha' dang dbus med pa thams cad ma lus par byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i 'brel ba rgyun mi mchad pas yang dag par zin par gyur ga
44a1(phal chen): 'jig rten du skye ba'i yul thams cad ma lus par thams cad du skye ba shin bstan pas yang dag par zin par gyur cig/ sems can gyi khams thams cad ma
44a2(phal chen): lus par byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pas yongs su smin par byas pas yang dag par zin du gyur cig/ sems can gyi nyon mongs pa dang / bag la nyal ba
44a3(phal chen): dang / bag chags thams cad ma lus par rnyog pa med pa'i tshul gyis yang dag par zin par gyur cig/ sems can gyi dbang po 'byam klas pa thams cad ma lus par mtha'
44a4(phal chen): dang dbus med pa la 'jug pas yang dag par zin par gyur cig/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi mos pa dang lhag pa'i bsam pa thams cad ma lus par nyon mongs pa med cing yongs su
44a5(phal chen): dag par zin par gyur cig/ 'gro ba thams cad yongs su sbyin par bya ba dang / 'dul ba thams cad ma lus par dus la ji ltar 'bab bzhin du kun tu bstan pas yang dag par
44a6(phal chen): par 'gyur cig/ sems can thams cad ma lus par 'gro ba thams cad sprul pa lnga zur khod du chung bas yang dag par zin par gyur cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs
44a7(phal chen): rnams cad ma lus par sangs rgyas byung ba thams cad kyi bstan pa bza zhing bsrung bas yang dag par zin par gyur cig/ ces sems bskyed cing de ltar byang chub
44a8(phal chen): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ngeg pa'i rtsa ba 'dag dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bsngo ste/ las kyis ni rnam par smin pa yongs su rtogs par mabya/
44b1(phal chen): rnam par smin par ni las yongs su rtog par mi byed de/ chos kyi dbyings rtog pa med pa la yang dag par 'jug go// de dge ba'i rtsa ba byed pa med pas gnas pa yinan/
44b2(phal chen): chos nyid g.yeng ba med pa la yang rab tu brtson pa yin no// de ni chos thams cad la yang dang bas yang dag par 'jug ste/ chos gang rang bzhin gyis yongs su grub pa byed pa
44b3(phal chen): 'am/ rnam par byed pa de dag gang yang mi mthong ngo // chos nyid dbang po med pa'i mthar thugs pa la yang dag par 'jug ste/ chos kyi dbyings lta ba po med par yang
44b4(phal chen): rab tu shes shig/ chos thams cad shes pa po med par yang rab tu rtogs so// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor chad
44b5(phal chen): med pa rab tu shes pa/ chos thams cad kyi rkyen gnas khong du chud pa/ chos thams cad lus pa med par rab tu mthong ba/ chos thams cad 'dod chags dang ba'i mthar
44b6(phal chen): phyin par rjes su lta/ 'jig rten 'gyur ba thams cad sprul pa lta bur rjes su rtogs pa/ chos gcig la sems can thams cad du rjes su mthong ba/ chos kyi dbyings mi
44b7(phal chen): gnyis par rab tu mi rig pa/ las kyi dmigs pa dang nye ba len pa la mkhas pas ma btang ba/ 'dus byas kyi khams 'dus ma byas su mngon par bsgrubs pas
44b8(phal chen): zhig par mi byed pa 'dus ma byas su sgo gdags pa thams cad kyis rnam par mi rtog pa/ chos thams cad rab tu zhi ba la gzhol ba dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par bsgrub
45a1(phal chen): pa thams cad mngon par bsgrub pa/ sems can thams cad yongs su bskyab par bya ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ chos rgya mtshothams cad mngon par shes pa
45a2(phal chen): rmongs pa med par chos nyid la brtson pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba nam mkha' lta bu thams cad yongs su bsngo ba/ bsod nams kyis rgyas par 'gro bas 'jig rten 'da' ba'i lam
45a3(phal chen): du zhugs pa 'jig rten gyi chos kun nas mi rgyu ba/ mig la rab rib med pa/ ye shes kyi snang ba rab tu thob pa// thabs mkhas pas yongs su bsngo ba'i ngang tshul can te/
45a4(phal chen): ci nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gau brlabs pa dang / ci nas kyang zhing thams cad yongs su dag par 'gyur ba dang / ci nas kyang sems can thams cad yongs su
45a5(phal chen): par 'gyur ba dang / ci nas kyang 'jog rten thams cad du song nams kyi ni dam par 'gyur ba dang / ci nas kyang sems can thams cad kyi ring dpon du thog mar 'gro dag
45a6(phal chen): ci nas kyang snad kyis pa'i dkyil 'khor skye dgu thams cad la 'char bar 'gyur ba dang / ci nas kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyis dbyings thams cad rgyas par 'gyur ba
45a7(phal chen): ces kyang 'grob thams cad kyi don du 'gyur ba dang / ci nas kyang yon tan thams cad kyi sems can gyi kham rnam par spyong par 'gyur ba de ltar ngas pa'i
45a8(phal chen): ngag yongags pas s+t+wa~M/ de de ltar yongs su bslabs sangs rgyas kyi rigs yang dag par 'dzin pa yin/ thams can gyi gos yongs su smin par byud ba yin/ ni
45b1(phal chen): gi rigs rnam par spyod pa yin/ chos kyis rigs 'gal bar mi byed pa yin/ las kyi rigs yongs su shes pa yin/ mi gnyis pa'i rigs mnyam par byed pa yin/ phyogs
45b2(phal chen): kyi rigs su khyab par 'gro ba yin/ 'dod chags bral ba'i rigs la yang dag par rtog pa yin/ shin tu mos pa'i rigs rab tu sgrub pa yin/ dbang ba'i rigs shin du sna
45b3(phal chen): byed pa yin te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis yongs su bsngo ba bzhi pa ste/ thams cad du rjes su song ba zhes bya'o// de la
45b4(phal chen): nas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongs su bsngo bar byed de/ de de ltar yongs su bsngobs 'jig rten gyi khams thams
45b5(phal chen): cad du yang dag par bstan par bya ba'i phyir thams cad du rjes su song ba'i lus kyi las rab tu thob bo// sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du rnam par bstan pa bsgribs pa med pa'i
45b6(phal chen): phyir thams cad du rjes su song ba'i ngag gi las rab tu thob bo// sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad bstan cing bzung ba'i phyir thams cad rjes su song ba'i yid kyis las rab tu
45b7(phal chen): thob bo/ rjes su 'brang bar bya ba'i phyir thams cad du rjes su song ba'i rdzu 'phrul dang rnam par 'phrul pa rab tu thob bo// chos thams cad la yang dag par 'jug par bya'i
45b8(phal chen): phyir thams cad du rjes su song ba'i khong du chud pa rab tu thob bo// sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa tshim par bya ba'i phyir thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'i bzungs dang /
46a1(phal chen): spobs pa thob par bya ba rab thob bo// spu'i sbubs gcig tu 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad bzung bar bya ba'i phyir thams cad rjes su song ba'i chos
46a2(phal chen): kyi dbyings la 'jug pa rab tu thob bo// sems can gcig gi lus su sems can thams cad kyi lus yang dag par bzhol bar bya ba'i thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'i lus la 'jug
46a3(phal chen): pa rab tu thob bo// bskal pa thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang / mi 'bral ba la 'jug pa'i phyir thams cad du rjes su song ba'i bskal pa'i grangs la 'jug pa rab tu 'thab bo//
46a4(phal chen): cig banyis gis de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba thams cad mngon sum du bstan pa'i phyir thams cad du rjes su sang ba'i skad cig 'brub rab tu thob bo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i rgyal
46a5(phal chen): mtshan gyis sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te// de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// 'jig rten mtha' dang dbus med gang la yang // de dag
46a6(phal chen): gnas 'cha gang yang yod pa min// sems can phan pa'i don lus phyir mi ldog/ mi rab de dag ye shes 'di 'dra'o// zhing rnams la yang gnas par mi byed de// phyogs rnams
46a7(phal chen): la yang de dag gnas mi 'cha'// che dang chos kyis rlom sems mi byed do// 'jig rten ngag la rnam par rtog mi byed// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten dgan ci yong ba'i// 'gro ba de dag ma
46a8(phal chen): khrum kun bsdus cing/ 'angs pa dngas med chos la dab sbyar 'jug// de dag thams cad ma lus dus su pas// 'dus byas 'dus ma byas kyi chos grangs shing/ 'jig nanas
46b1(phal chen): la rnam par rtog mi byed// ji ltar 'jig rten de bzhin chos rnams te// de ltar 'jig rten sgron ma rnam par dag/ ji snyed las rnam yang dag rnam pa gang // rab dang 'bring dang de ba
46b2(phal chen): tha ma'i rnams// de dag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten mkhyen pa'i rnams// ji snyed bzhugs la yongs bsngo ba byed// de dag yongs su bsngo ba'i mthar phyin pa// sangs rgyas
46b3(phal chen): mchog rjes bslab bya bslabs pa'i rnams// ye shes dam pa rjes su sems byed cing // mi'i dam pa'i chos rnams rab tu thob// sems can phan pa'i don kun gzhugs shing
46b4(phal chen): 'gro ba kun tu 'jig rten sgron ma bzhin// phyogs rnams kun tu ma lus gyur cig ces// dge ba de dag yongs su bsngo ba byed// de dag sems can rnams par rtog mi byed/
46b5(phal chen): chos la'ang rnam par rtog pa mi byed de// 'jig rten gyis kyang rlom sems med pa yin// 'gro ba kun nas phyir yang mi ldog go// brtan pa de dag zhi ba rtag tu ni// de dag mya
46b6(phal chen): ngan 'das pa'i spyod yul 'thob// sems can rgyud na'ang mi sbyong tshul ma yin te// 'di 'dra'i ye shes dam pa khong du chud // de dag nas yang rdog dang rnam rtog med// rnam par
46b7(phal chen): smin la'ang de dag gnas mi 'cha'// 'jig rten thams cad rgyu dang bcas pas na// chos rnams rgyud med par yang lha ma yin// de dag spyod yul 'di'ang thob pa ste// de la na
46b8(phal chen): dang rnam par rtog pa med// blo mchog de dag 'gro kun kha lo sgyur// ye shes tshul la mkhas pas yongs su sngo// thams cad du rjes su song ba zhes bya ba ste// yongs su bas
47a1(phal chen): ba bzhi pa'o// bam po sum cu rtsa bzhi pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ma
47a2(phal chen): su bsngob/ bsod nams mi zad pa'i mdzod ces bya ba gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di dag la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsgribs pa'i las thams cad las
47a3(phal chen): bag yangs su bya ba'i phyir/ bshags pa dang 'brel pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'am/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad dang / 'das
47a4(phal chen): pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sems can gyi khams thams cad dus gsum gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba la rjes su yi rang bas rjes su yi rang ba dang / 'brel pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'am/
47a5(phal chen): 'das dab dang / mabyon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la nan tan du bya bas phyag pa dang / 'brel pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'am/ sangs rgyas kyi chos
47a6(phal chen): cad la brtson pas sangs rgyas thams cad la gsol ba gdab pa dang / 'brel pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'am/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom
47a7(phal chen): ldan 'das rnams kyi dge ba'i rna mi zad pa gang la byang chub sems dpa' brtson par bya ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'byam thos pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa de dag la yang dag par 'as
47a8(phal chen): par byed pa 'am/ gang yang 'das pa dang / mabyon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mngon par byang chub pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de ngas la rjes sus ra
47b1(phal chen): bar byeng cing dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag la gnas par byed pa 'am/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'das pa dang / ma byod pa dang / nga ltar byung ba'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bas sems
47b2(phal chen): can mamatha' dang dbus med pa dul bar gyur pa de dag la rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas khong du chud bar byed pa 'am/ gang yang 'das pa dang / mdzan
47b3(phal chen): pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang po thugs bskyed pa nas bzung ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad la sems yang dag par
47b4(phal chen): byung bar gyur pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'chang rgyo bar gyur pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa yang dag par bstan pa'i bar gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba de
47b5(phal chen): ngag thams cad sangs rgyas thams cad dang rgyud kyi tshul gcig tu gyur pa'i ye shes kyi byin rlabs kyis rjes su yi rang ba'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag yongs su mya nga
47b6(phal chen): las 'das pa'i bstan pa yang dag par bzung ba nas nye bar bzung ste/ chos thams cad kyi mthar thug gi bar du dge ba'i rtsa ba ji snyed yang dag par 'grub par 'gyur ba 'am/
47b7(phal chen): sangs rgyas la dmigs pa'i bsam pa 'byam klas pa brjod du med pa dang / rang gi dmigs pa la dge ba'i rtsa ba gang brtsams pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsgrib
47b8(phal chen): ba med par dmigs pas thar phyin par byed pa yang rung ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par phye ba tshad med cing 'byam klas pa dmigs pa rgya chen po grangs med pas bsags pa de dag tham
48a1(phal chen): cad 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste/ dge ba'i rtsa gang yang dag par bsgrubs pa dang / gang mos par byas pa dang / gang rjes su yi rang ba dang / gang yod
48a2(phal chen): su rdzogs par byas pa dang / gang yongs su grub par byas pa dang / gang spyad pa dang / gang 'thob par byas pa dang / gang sems pa dang / gang rtsom pa dang / gang mthu dang ldan
48a3(phal chen): bar byed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag gis gang ji snyed du sngon gyi 'das pa'i dus na thams cad 'byam bu'i dus la 'jug pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams shin tu bstan pa grangs
48a4(phal chen): las 'das pa thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyu byung ba dang / gang ji snyed du de bzhin nyid kyi gi skabs thams cad kyi sngon gyi mu'i bskal ba'i mthar gyur pa/ sa
48a5(phal chen): mtshams med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rigs mtha' yas pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyis thugs su chung ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pas
48a6(phal chen): rnam par shes pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i sems kyis yang dag par bzung bdag tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan yongs su dag pa 'byung ba dang / gang yang las dang rgyu
48a7(phal chen): 'thun pa'i 'bras bu'am/ gang yang spyod pa las yang dag par byung ba 'am/ gang yang sems can bskal bar bya ba'i tshogs rnam par bstan pa 'am/ gang ma
48a8(phal chen): rnams pa rnam par dag pa 'am/ ga'i yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis shes par bya ba 'am/ gang yang sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul ba yang dag par/
48b1(phal chen): bstan pa 'am/ gang yang byang chub sems dpa' sa rnams su rnam par rig pa 'am/ gang yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'phrin las 'jig rten las 'das pas byung ba'ang/
48b2(phal chen): gang yang byang chub sems dpa'a'i kun tu babang po'i spyod pa 'byam klas pas 'byung ba'am/ gang yang mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin rlabs
48b3(phal chen): kyis byung ba 'am/ phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal par mngon par 'tshang rgya ba rgyun chang pa med pa'i 'jig rten gyi kham kyi tshul thams cad shin du bstan pa nam mkha'i dbyings kyis
48b4(phal chen): 'byam klas pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyi mthas gtugs pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad 'byam klas pa/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus mtha' yas pa'i ris su shin tu bstan pa/
48b5(phal chen): ma 'ongs pa'i lam gyi rgyud rnam pa tha dad pa grangs med par brjod pa/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus rgyud 'chad pa med cing / sa mtshams kyi mtha' med pa/ de bzhin gshig
48b6(phal chen): pa'i ye shes kyis mngon par bslab pas thugs su chud pa 'ongs pa'i dus kyi skad cig rgyun 'chad pa med pa/ chos kyi dbyings dang / 'jig rten gyi khams dang / bskal
48b7(phal chen): ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyad pa/ thabs mtha' yas pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyis mngon par 'tshang rgya ba tshad med par gyur pa dang / ma 'ongs pa'i
48b8(phal chen): dus sa mtshams med cing ris su mi chod pa dag tu/ ma byon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos kyi dbyings thams
49a1(phal chen): cang du khyab par gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan dang / rgyan yongs su dag pa rin po che'i rgyan rnam par bye ba du ma dang / smos kyi rgyun ying
49a2(phal chen): du 'ong ba dang ldan pa thams cad dang / me tog thams cad kyi rgyad kyi char rab tu 'bab pa/ rna bza' thams cad kyi rgyan gyi rgya sprin sna tshogs yon tan thams cad kyis brgyan pa
49a3(phal chen): tha dad pa'i mdzod de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyan gyi byin gyis rlabs kyis rnam par bres pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rgyan rab tu brgyad par bya ba/ rnam pa sna tshogs tha da /
49a4(phal chen): pa brjod du med pas rab tu brgyan cing grub pa grogs bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ rnam par dag pas yongs su bsgrubs pa de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i byin gyi
49a5(phal chen): rlabs kyi rgyun gyis rnam par dag pa/ rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / gang yang ma byon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yangs
49a6(phal chen): mu dag pa byang chub sems dpa'i mig 'jig rten las 'das pa/ thun mong ma yin pas rnam par mthong ba/ byang chub sems dpa' mthu chen po'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rab tu myong
49a7(phal chen): bar 'gyur ba chos thams cad sgyu ma'i rnam pa lta bur khong du chung ba/ chos thams cad kyi mthu sprul pa lta bus rnam par dag pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i las 'byam zas so//
49a8(phal chen): mnyam pa nyid kyi rjes su song bas rnam par dag pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi tshul bsam gyis mi khyab pa la zhugs pa/ sangs rgyas
49b1(phal chen): kyi khyu mchog gi mthu 'phyang ba/ yang dag par rgyu ba/ sangs rgyas kyi 'od bla na med pas snang bar byas pa/ rgya che ba sna tshogs pa/ tshad med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnams yang dang
49b2(phal chen): bar gnas par 'gyur ba dang / ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas de dag thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par 'gyur ba de bzhin du nga ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sangs
49b3(phal chen): rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa rab tu phyung ba/ shin tu grub pa rnam par dag pa/ rnam pa sna tshogs tha dad pa kun nas yon tan can bsngags par bya ba tshad med pa/ dri zhim po bsam
49b4(phal chen): gyi khyab pa/ mtha' yas pa/ shing tshong med pa dang ldan pa/ rgyan grangs med pa can/ gtsug lag khang grangs med pa dang ldan pa/ yid du 'ong ba'i sgra zangs med pa yod pa/ mtha'
49b5(phal chen): yas pa yang dag par ston pa/ rjes su spyod pa'i grogs tshad med pa dang ldan pa/ yon tan sna tshogs zad mi shes pa dang ldan pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ spos thams cad
49b6(phal chen): cad kyis brtan pa/ 'phreng ba thams cad kyi brgyan pa/ phye ma thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ rin po che thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ na bza' thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ rgyal mtshan
49b7(phal chen): thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ ba dan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi snam bu kun tu bting bas brgyan pa/ rin po che thams cad kyi stegs bu sa brgyan pa/ bser
49b8(phal chen): gyi dra ba grangs med pas kun tu yog par brgyan pa/ chu klung grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ grangs med pa'i sprin gyi char rab tu 'bab pas brgyan pa/ rol mo brdung ba dang /
50a1(phal chen): dkrol ba'i tshogs grangs med pas yid du 'ong ba/ rnam par dag pa de dag dang / de bzhin du ma lus pa thams cad rab tu bzung ste/ sangs rgyas zhing gi yon
50a2(phal chen): tan dang rgyan yongs su dag pa gang ji snyed pa gang dang gang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis rab tu mkhyen pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i ma
50a3(phal chen): gtugs pa zhing gi gnas su gyur pa thams cad phyogs kyi 'khor mtha' yas par shin tu bstan pas phyogs bcu rnam par bkod pa/ 'jig rten gyi khamasa'i bye ba klas pa la
50a4(phal chen): rnam pa sna tshogs kyis mngon par 'du byas pa/ nam mkha'i khams dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyis yongs su bsdus pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams phyogs gan
50a5(phal chen): dang gzhan gyi rjes smra spong bar rab tu gnas pa/ las rnam patha dad pas shin du byung ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med par shin tu bstan pa/ 'jog rten gyi 'ang
50a6(phal chen): gnas nam mkha'i gos gcugs pa/ zhing gi rgyung rnam pa tha dad pa brjod du mod pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' dang dbus med po'i chos kyi dbyings kyis shin tu
50a7(phal chen): bstan pa de ltar ma lus pa thams cad yongs su bzung ste/ chos kyi dbyings rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rgyam la 'jug pas rgyan rnam par dag pa rnams
50a8(phal chen): tshad dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yangs su rig pa thams cad ji skang du ba shad pa dang / ji skad du brjon pa dang / ji skad du gsal bar byas pa dang / ji skad du ses pa dang /
50b1(phal chen): rgyas kyi zhing dge bA dang
50b2(phal chen): nang sus pa nga/ myung du sgrubs pa dang / mang du bkrol pa dang / dzin dadu ltar bur ba gas pa dang / man zlar dam pa bkong ba di deng gdu basbyin gnas
50b3(phal chen): skyes pa'i sangs rgyas kyi dngagi rgyan dang / sangs rgyas kyi ring rnam par dag pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma rnam pa song ngag / sangs rgyas kyi thong gi bangag nyid che ba dang
50b4(phal chen): rgyas kyi zhing yangs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi 'ang bde bar bskyang ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing zil gyis mnon pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing bang ma shes pa da / sangs rgyas kyi na pa
50b5(phal chen): hU~M che ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi 'ang mi 'phrogs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi 'jigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'od gsal ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing ling du 'ong ba dang /
50b6(phal chen): spangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mthun pa med pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing kun tu snang ba dag tshungs rgyas kyi zhing ma mas/ sangs rgyas kyi shing rab tu srung ba dang / sangs rgyas
50b7(phal chen): zhing rnam par brgyan pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab tu brgyan pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing shin tu rnam par phye ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing mchog dang / sangs rgyas kyi
50b8(phal chen): gtso bo dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing phul dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing dam pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gya nom pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing zhin
50b9(phal chen): chu rnam pa thad du byung ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing bla med pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing mnyam pa med pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dra ba med pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha'
51a1(phal chen): yas pa dang / de ltar yongs su bzang ste/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyun rnam par dag
51a2(phal chen): pa gang ji srid pa'i rgyan rnam par dag pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dag gyur cig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad 'di lta bu'i rnam par dag pa dang
51a3(phal chen): ldan par gyur cig/ 'jig rten gyi khams re rer yang 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan rnam par dag pa gang
51a4(phal chen): smad pa de dag thams cad yang dag par gnas par gyur cig/ grub par gyur cig/ rnam par dag par gyur cig/ yongs su dag par gyur cig/ yang dag par grub par gyur cig/ rab tu
51a5(phal chen): byung bar gyur cig/ kun tu brgyan par gyur cig/ cang bar gyur cig/ byin gyis brlabs par gyur cig/ 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu ji ltar ba de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams
51a6(phal chen): thams cad du'ang ma lus par yongs su bzung ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing chos dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mtha' gtugs pa/ thams cad ma lus par de skad kyi rgyan gyi
51a7(phal chen): ljongs sna brgyan par gnas par gyur mo/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad mA lus par dus gsu mthams cad kyis ngas rgyas kyi zhing gisan ngan rnam par bye bA d+yang / sangs rgyas
