51a8(phal chen): kyi zhing btsun dang / sangs rgyas kyi snying bdag cing tsab dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing bzhin mngoms pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing chang meng ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi nang sangs pa /
51a9(phal chen): rab su brgyan par gyur
51b1(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi zhing blangs med pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing bsam gyis mi khyad pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi cing mtshungs pa med pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas pa ji snyed pa de ngag /
51b2(phal chen): gyis rnam par dag par gyur cig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa' yongs su rdzogs pa/ rjes su 'jug pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams la'ang rab tu 'ju
51b3(phal chen): ba/ kun tu spyod pa mang ba/ sems can gyi khams rtogs par byas pas/ khong du chud pa chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa rab tu rdzogs pa/ nam mkha'i dbyings la 'jug pa/ rmongs pa/
51b4(phal chen): med pa/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa rab tu thob pa/ bsam gyis khyab pa'i chos rjes su dran pa'i tshul can tshad tshang pa'i dge 'dun rjes su dran pa rab tu zhugs pa/ gtong
51b5(phal chen): la shin tu mos pa/ gtong ba'i rjes su dran pa rab tu/ ye shes kyi 'od zer dang ldan pa'i chos kyi nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor can chags pa med par lta ba/ dmigs su med
51b6(phal chen): pa las rab tu byung ba/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi gnas su gyur pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba dam pas thog mar 'gro ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba'i dbang gis sangs kyi byang chub tu byung ba/
51b7(phal chen): de bzhin gsheg pa'i stobs kyi rjes su song ba/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi yul gyi 'od zer rab tu 'gyed pa bdud kyi las thams cad rnam par sbyangs pa/ sems can gyi
51b8(phal chen): khams thams cad kyi rang bozhin khong du chud pa phyin ci log med pas yang dag par byung ba/ dge ba'i rtsa ba dang smon lam la gti mug med pa sha stag gis yongs su gang bar
52a1(phal chen): gyur cig/ byang chub sems dpa' de lta bu'i tshul can/ de lta bu'i spyod pa la zhugs pa/ de lta bu'i yon tan dang ldan pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba mtshungs pa med pa can rtag
52a2(phal chen): tu sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin la gla zhol ba sangs rgyas kyi byang chub snang ba rab tu thob pa/ mun pa med pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes dang ldan pa/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad lus gcig
52a3(phal chen): gis khyab par byed pa'i rnam par 'phrul pab chen po yang dag par ston pa/ ye shes chen po khong du chud pas mthams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi spyod yul dang ldan pa/ chos kyi dbyings
52a4(phal chen): mtha' yas pa'i tshig rab tu dbye ba mngon par bzhu ba sgrub pa la mkhas pa zhing thams cad kyi rjes su song ba/ gnas med par sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad na gnas pa/ nam
52a5(phal chen): mkha'i dbyings su mos pas mi gnas pa'i yid dang ldan pa/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad du rnam par phye ba'i bsam pa can/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin bsam
52a6(phal chen): gyis mi khyab pa la mnyam par gzhog pa la mkhas pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i spyod yul gyi sangs rgyas kyi ning la gnas pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyis rlabs
52a7(phal chen): sa par bya ba la mkhas pa/ chos grangs med pa bstan cing bshad pa la 'jigs pa med pa/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / nga ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad
52a8(phal chen): kying ge pa'i rjes sus pa/ de bzhin pa gags pa thams cad kyi chos kyi dbyings la gnas pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyirgyas btsun mangs su 'dzin pa #
52b1(phal chen): gyis mi khyab pa rnam par dbye'o zhing rnam par mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas pa/ grangs med pa'i skad rnam pa tha dad pa shes pa/ bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa
52b2(phal chen): sa khong du chud ngu pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams kyi rjes su song zhing chags pa med par spyod pa nyon mongs pa med pa'i tshul la chos su rtogs pas gnas pa med pa/ sems bskyed
52b3(phal chen): pa yangs bzhin tu rnam par bsgoms pa rab tu thob pa/ ye shes gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i rgyud la mkhas pa/ don gcig nas gcig tu bstan pa/ rab tu grub pa
52b4(phal chen): de lta bu dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag yongs su brgyan par gyur cig/ yongs su gang bar gyur cig/ rnam par mdzes par gyur cig/ rjes su dong bar gyur cig/
52b5(phal chen): kun tu gnas par gyur cig/ bsgoms par gyur cig/ shin tu bsgoms par gyur cig/ sbyangs par gyur cig/ shin tu sbyangs par gyur cig/ zhi bar byas par gyur cig/
52b6(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi zhing ra re'i phyogs re re zhing byung yang byang chub sems dpa' tshad med pa/ grangs med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ gzhal du med pa/ mu med pa/ sa
52b7(phal chen): mtshams med pa/ dpag tu med pa/ brjod du meng pa/ brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pas yongs rgyas par gyur cig/ phyogs gcig ji lta ba de bzhin du sangs
52b8(phal chen): rgyas kyi zhing chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa/ mA lus pa/ lus pa med pa lhag ma med pa/ thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa' 'di
53a1(phal chen): lta bu'i tshul can gyis yongs su rgyas shing yongs su gang bar gyur cig/ ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs
53a2(phal chen): su bsngo ste/ tshul de lta bus sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad dang / tshul de lta bus 'byung ba thams cad dang / tshul de lta bus sems can gyi khams thams cad rnam par dag pa
53a3(phal chen): dang / tshul de lta bus sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byang chub dang / tshul de lta bus smon lam thams cad dang / tshul de lta bus 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sangs rgyas
53a4(phal chen): skyes pa mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba dang / tshul de lta bus de bzhin gshegs pa sku che tshad med pa dang / tshul de lta bus thogs pa med par chos kyi dbyings thams cad du
53a5(phal chen): chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba phyir mi ldog pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems de dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdzas
53a6(phal chen): su sang ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag po dang / sems can thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'i byang chub sems dpa' yongs su dag pa dang / sangs rgyas sna ba thams
53a7(phal chen): cad kyis malus par gang bar byas pa'i chos kyi dbyis yongs su dag pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi ning thams cad ma lus par shin tu byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'o ska
53a8(phal chen): thams cad mkhyen par 'byung ba meng par yongs su bsngos pa dang / rnam mkha'i mams chang med pa'i rjes su pa'i sems kyis dang/ sangs su bsngo pa'i sems kyis ma/
53b1(phal chen): khyab pa'i rjes su zhugs pa dang / yongs su bsngo ba'i mnyam pa nyid las kyi rnam par smin pa thams cad las rnam par grol zhing shin tu mos pa dang / yongs su bsngo ba'i khyab par
53b2(phal chen): mtha' yas par 'brel par byas pa dang / yongasu bsngo ba'i tshul chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi rjes su song bas/ yongs su bsngo ba'i tshe bdag la mi rtog go// bdag gi lus la
53b3(phal chen): rnam par mi rtog go// sangs rgyas la mi rtog go// sangs rgyas la rmi rtog go// sangs rgyas kyi chos la rnam par mi rtog go/ zhing la mi rtog go// zhing gi yang dag par sbyong bas rnam par ngag
53b4(phal chen): pa la rnam par mi rtog go// sems can la rnam par mi rtog go/ sems can gdul lab la rnam par mi rtog go// las la mi rtog go// las kyi rnam par smin pa la mi rtog go// sems pa la chag
53b5(phal chen): par mi byed do// bsam pas kyang mngon par chags par mi byed do// rgyu chung gzon par mi byed do// rgyu dang 'bras bu chud gzon par mi byed do// dngos por nye bar len par mi byed
53b6(phal chen): do// dngos po'i chos la chags par yang mi byed do// 'khor ba'i rgyu rnam pathadad pa gcig tu mi byed do// zhi ba rnam par brtags pa med pas rlom sems mi skyed ngo // de bzhin
53b7(phal chen): gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul gyis bsnyems par mi byed do// chos gang gis kyang chos la gnas par mi byed de/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems
53b8(phal chen): dpa' chen po chen dge ba'i rtsa de dag nye bar stobs so// khong du chung ngu chud par byed do// yongs su bsngo'o// yongs su sbyin par byed do// mnyam par byed do// sgrub po//
54a1(phal chen): mtshan mar mi byed do// dmigs par mi byed do// mi 'jal lo// mi rtog go/ rnam par mi rtog go// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar yongs su ba
54a2(phal chen): ba ni 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad rjes su dran pas dge ba'i rtsa ba mi zad pa yin/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la yang dag par 'jug pas
54a3(phal chen): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad mi zad pa yin/ ning rnam par dag pas yongs su bsngo bas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba mi zad pa yin/ sems can gyi khams rnam par dag pa la rnam par dag dpyod pas dag
54a4(phal chen): ba'i rtsa ba mi zad pa yin/ chos kyi dbyings su 'jug pa la zhugs pas dge ba'i rtsa ba mi zad pa yin/ nam mkha'i khams ltar tshad med pa'i sems la yongs su sgom pas dge ba'i rtsa bam
54a5(phal chen): mo da pa yin/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul la shin du mos pas dge ba'i rtsa ba mi za pa yin/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi las la brtson pas dge ba'i rtsa ba mi ra
54a6(phal chen): bA san/ dus bsum rab tu rnam par 'byed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba mi zad pa yin te/ nga ni sems can gyi khams thams ca la sems can med par rab tu rtog cing mangs su
54a7(phal chen): tshes thams cad la grub med par yang du chung cing yongs su bsdu'o// chos thams cad la byed pa med par yang dag pa ji lta bAzhin du shes shing yongs su bcoM'o// dge ba'i rtsab ma
54a8(phal chen): ca la bang rab med par sems yang yongs su badz+ra'o// chos thams cad namamangs pa med pa rab tu na tshad yongs su b+ha 'o// chom thams cad kyi dran pa yang sa
54b1(phal chen): nang yongs su bcwo'o// dngos po thams cad la ma gnas pa yang dag pa mi b+hA ba bzhin du shes shing yongasu bsdu'o// ni thams cad la yang dag par mi gnas pad rdzun
54b2(phal chen): yongs su bsngo'o// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la mi gnas pa nyid du zhing yongs su bsngo'o// dmigs pa thams cad la dmigs su med pa nyid du shes pas mthong zhing long
54b3(phal chen): su bsngo'o// de de ltar yongs su bsngo bas zhing gang yang kun nas nyon mongs pa dang bcas par mig lam du snang bar mi 'gyur ro// kun tu lta yang sems can gang yang mi mthur
54b4(phal chen): pa mthong bar mi 'gyur ro// spyod pa'i tshe chos gang yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // ye shes kyi 'jig pas gang la yang 'jug pa med do// nam mkha'i dbyings thams
54b5(phal chen): cad la yang btuganas te/ dri mang shin du shes so// bsod nams kyi stobs tshad med pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgras chos thams cad gang bar shin tu shes so// sems can
54b6(phal chen): thams cad tshim par bya ba'i phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad du 'gro ba yang dag par spyod do// de'i sems bskyed pa re re zhing yang sems can brjod du med pa stobs bcu'i sar
54b7(phal chen): yang dag par grub bo// des sems can thams cad bsod nams thams cad kyis yongs su bzung zhing thob par bya ba'i phyir dge ba'i tsa ba rnam par dag pa bsod nams thams
54b8(phal chen): cad kyi 'byung gnas dang ldan pa/ thams cad rab tu grub bo// de yo byad ci 'dod pa phun sum tshogs pas bsod nams kyi brjod yid bzhin gyi nor bu lta bu dang ldan pa yin no//
55a1(phal chen): de gang dang gang du 'gro ba de dang de dag ngu zhing thams cad rnam par spyod zhing 'gro'o// de gang dang gang du spyod pa de dag sems can brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du
55a2(phal chen): med pa rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir bsod nams kyi stobs kyis yongs su bzung ba la rab tu gzhog cing yang dag par spyod do// de ltar yongs su bsngo ba de la rnam pa de lta bu'i
55a3(phal chen): rgyu 'thun pas/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na gzugs med pa yin/ 'jig rten thams cad kyis zil gyis non pa'i bsod nams can yin/ bdud thams cad kyis
55a4(phal chen): gzi' brjid mi zad pa yin/ phyir rgol ba thams cad kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba mi 'phrogs pa yin/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i yid yang dag par rtog pa dang ldan pas/ smon lam shin
55a5(phal chen): du che ba dang / sems rab tu yangs pa yin/ sems bskyed pa gcig gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing chad med par 'gro ba yin/ ye shes kyi stobs mtha' yas pas sangs rgyas thams ca
55a6(phal chen): kyi yul yongs su shes pa yin/ sangs rgyas thams cad la shin tu ngang ba yin/ ye shes mtha' yas par shin tu 'jug pa la rab tu gnas pa yin/ nam mkha'i dbyings kyi
55a7(phal chen): klas pa'i byang chub tu sems mngon par bsgrubs pa'i mthus nam mkha'i dbyings kyis klas par chos kyi dbyings shin du yangs pa yin no// kye rgyal sdus dag 'di ni byung chu
55a8(phal chen): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yongs su bsngo ba lnga pa/ bsod nams mi zad pa'i mdzod ces bya ba ste/ de la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni mi mang /
55b1(phal chen): ba'i mdzod bcu rab tu thob bo// bcu gang zhe na/ sgra'i sbubs gcig tu sangs rgyas grangs med pa 'byung ba la 'jug pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas blta ba'i gter mi zad pa
55b2(phal chen): mdzad rab tu thob bo// chos thams cad gcig tu rab tu gnol ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / ye shes kyi phyir chos la 'jug pa'i gter mi zang pa'i mdzad ra
55b3(phal chen): thob bo// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bstan pa yongs su bzung chung mi zos bya ba'i phyir dran pas gzung ba'i gter mi zang pa'i mdzong rab gnyer mi rung ba'i mdzad
55b4(phal chen): rab tu thob bo// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi tshul dang / dgongs pa shin tu bstan pa la mkhas par bya ba'i phyir blo gros rnam par nges pa'i gter mi zad pa'i ma
55b5(phal chen): rab tu thob bo// chos kyi tshul rnam par dbye' ba la mkhas par bya ba'i phyir rig pa 'dzin po'i gter mi zad pa'i mdzod rab tu thob tha// chos kyi tshul rnam par dbye' ba la mkhas
55b6(phal chen): bas par bya ba'i phyir rig pas 'dzin pa'i gter mi zad pa'i mdzod rab tu thob bo// nam mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam pa'i blos dus gsum thams cad khyab par bya ba'i phyir blo tshad
55b7(phal chen): med pa'i gter mo sang pa'i mdzod rab tu thob bo// sems can thams cang tshim par bya bas mi zang par bya ba'i phyir bsong nams kyi gter mi zad pa'i mdzod rab tu thob bo// sarba
55b8(phal chen): can gyi mun pa dang / rab rib dang / ling tog dang / gti mug dang / ma rig pa'i mun pa rnam par bsal ba'i phyir ye shes dang dga' ba dang / blo'i gter mi zad pa'i mdzod rab tu
57a1(phal chen): thob bo// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos nyid tha mi dad pa rab tu bstan pas/ sems canathams cad shes par bya ba'i phyir spobs pa rnam par nges pa'i gter
57a2(phal chen): du thob bo// byang chub sems dpa'i spyong brgyun mi 'chad pas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid chags pa med pa'i thabs skyon med pa'i dbang bskur ba'i phyir skabs bcu dang / mi 'jig
57a3(phal chen): pa'i gter mi zad pa rab tu thob ste/ gter mi zad pa'i mdzod bcu po 'di dag rab tu thob bo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyis sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi
57a4(phal chen): rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag sngas so// bsam pas mthu' stobs rnyed pa de dag ni// mtha' yas chos la kun du
57a5(phal chen): bsgyur cing // bsod nams gter la rjes su yi rang ba// de dag chags med tshul gyis yongs pasngo// dus gsub rgyal ba su dag ji srid pas// rnam dag zhing rnams 'chi
57a6(phal chen): rten rnam sbyangs pa// yon tan kun dang ldan zhing 'phags pa'i rnams// de 'dra'i rnam dag zhing du yongs su bsngo// dus gsum rgyal ba ji snyed bzhugs pa yi// tshul rnam
57a7(phal chen): kun la rjes su sems byed cing // thams cad lus pa med par nges bzung ste// de 'dra'i zhing ni bstan pa rnams kyis brgyan// dus gsum bskal ba ji snyed yod pa yi//
57a8(phal chen): zhing gcig yon tan dag gi blang byas kyang // bskal pa ji snyed de dag zar 'gyur gyi// wang gi yon tan bsngags pa ma zang // 'di 'dra'i nang rnams thams cad ma lus
57b1(phal chen): par/ mi'i mchog gis ji sed mthong 'gyur ba// thams cad ma lus zhing gi yon tan gyis// ji srid 'jig rten de dag brgyan par snang // de dag kun kyang rnam dag yid dang ldan/
57b2(phal chen): de dag rgyal ba'i gsung skyes sras yin te// yon tan kun gyis brgyan pa'i sems dang ldan// zhing gi phyogs rnams rab tu rgyas par byed// de dag lus ni mtshan gyis shin
57b3(phal chen): tu brgyan// de dag dpe' byad bzang pos lus kyang mdzes// de dag mtha' yas yang dag so so shes// 'gro ba'i rgya mtsho mi zad ji bzhin no// de dag spyong yul dag dang
57b4(phal chen): yang dag ldan// ting 'dzin kun la gnas pa rjes su 'thob// mtshungs med shin tu rnam par dag pa'i yid// thams cad phyogs rnams su ni 'od kyang 'gyed// 'di 'dra'i
57b5(phal chen): zhing rnams ma lus bzung byas te// nyan thos spyod yul dag la dang med pa// rang rgyal thams cad shin tu spangs gyur te// mi'i dam pas shin tu gang gyur cig/ deng /
57b6(phal chen): de 'dra'i yongs bsngo sems ldan pa// gang gis ma lus 'jig rten byang chub tu// dus gsum rgyal bas mngon par sangs rgyas pa// de dang ldan par yongs su bsngo
57b7(phal chen): bar byed// phyogs bcu kun na ji srid yod pa'i// bdud dang nyon mongs de dag rab tu 'jom// dpal ldan mthun can gzhan gyis pha ma mi nus// rnam par nges par
57b8(phal chen): rnam chos kyi dam pa spyod// de dag smon lam mthu stobs yangs pa yi// yongs su bsngo ba chags pa med gyur cing // bsod nams zad med de dag mdzod du zhugs//
58a1(phal chen): de ni dus gsum kun tu zad mi 'gyur// de dag spyod pas chos la 'jal bar byed// de dag byed pa med pa'i chos la zhugs// g.yo med chos kyang de dag
58a2(phal chen): rab tu shes// las kyi rnam pas yongs su mi shes so// gzugs ni ma yin 'od kyang gzugs med min// 'du shes yod min 'du shes med pa min// dngos po yong ma yin
58a3(phal chen): dngos po med pa yin// dngos med thams cad rang bzhin khong du chud// yod pa'ang ma yin med pa'ang ma yin te// rgyu'i rgyud la mngon par chags mi byed/ rkyen la'ang
58a4(phal chen): 'jug par de dag mi byed de// nam yang de dag chags par mi byed do// 'gro ba 'di na sna tshul ji srid pa'i// de la nam yang chags par mi byed de// 'du shes bsam pa brda
58a5(phal chen): yang rab tu shes// bdag med chos kyang so sor shin tu rtogs// de dag sems can mi 'bral cis 'gyur ba// de 'dra'i chos nyid mnyam pa rab tu rtogs// de 'dra'i zhing dang
58a6(phal chen): de bzhin las kyi rnams// dus gsum thams cad ma khrus bzung byas shing // gas pas de dag de bzhin yongs su bsngo// las kyi rnam par gang gis skye ldan zhing / rang pas
58a7(phal chen): gang dang mtshan nyid gang yin dang / den ci 'ja'i chos nyid yod po dag/ de dag bzhin de dag dag par yongs su bsngo// gang gi yid kyis ngo bo nyid 'jal ba// rang bzhin bya
58a8(phal chen): pa med par de dag shes// 'grol de dag mi gnas len pa med// 'gro ba kun phyir yongs su bsngo bar gzhol// spyod yul ma lus thams cad gzung byas shing // 'od gsal
58b1(phal chen): mas ca rjes su mams par byed/ mgus pa banan chad kyang de gags / gang gis lha ba thams cad ma lum kyang / khasam pa mthun par dngam par thungs pa ma
58b2(phal chen): rnams// ga tu dag ji ma kun gdung med// chags med kun gyi tshul yang rjes sna rdzogs// de dag kyis na tshas rnams ma mashigs/ mangs kyang tshas rnying gi pa
58b3(phal chen): ba med/ chos la chags par de dag mi byed de// de dag 'jig rten sgra bskan 'dra ba yin// gang gis dus gsum 'jig rten skyes pa yi// 'thob rkyen 'byung chos kyang rang tu//
58b4(phal chen): bsam pa ngag dang bag chags khong du chung // thams cad 'jig par byed pa gang yang med// de dag las dang las min rab tu shes// las dang rnam par 'gal bar mi byed
58b5(phal chen): lus kyi rnam par smin pa chung mi gzo// rgya las byung ba'i chos kyang shin du ston// 'di na sems can gang yang 'khor ba med// sems can 'byung bar de dag mi byung
58b6(phal chen): sems can rnams la gnas pa med par smra// sems can rgyud kyi brda yang rab tu rtog/ bsong nams mi zad pa'i mdzod ces bya ba ste// yongs su bsngo ba lngang/
58b7(phal chen): kye rgyal ba'i sras dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yongs su bsngo ba drug pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid kyi rjes su song pa
58b8(phal chen): zhes bya ba gang zhe na/ rkye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal por gyur te/ srid chen po thob nas/ 'tshe ba dang / phyir rgol ba ba
59a1(phal chen): ste/ rgyal po chen por grags pa dang / srid chen po'i khams la gnas shing / srid yangs pa la dbang bar gyur nas 'khon med cing / lhong pa med par srid la
59a2(phal chen): gnas pa/ chos kyi rgyal srid kyis skyong bar byed pa/ chos dang mthun pa chos kyi rjes su snyegs pa/ phun sum tshogs pa'i srid chen po thob pa/ sa chen po la gdugs gcig tu gyur pa
59a3(phal chen): 'khor lo thogs pa med pas sbyong ba/ dri ma med pa'i thabs thob pa/ dri srid la pha rol gyi sdes gtse ba med pa/ chos dang ldan pas dbyig pa med pa dang / mtshon cha med pas 'gro
59a4(phal chen): ba rnams shin tu sbyong ba/ chos kyi rjes su zhugs shing bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis 'gro ba sdud pa/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur pa/ 'gro ba thams cad la mdzod kyis
59a5(phal chen): shin tu stobs de dbang phyug de lta bu la gnas shing de lta bu'i chos la gnas pa/ g.yog dang 'khor bang ba shin tu 'dus pa gzugs dang ldan pa/ 'gro ba thams cad lda
59a6(phal chen): mi ngoms pa/ yid la la na mtha ba med pa// bsad nams rnam par dag pa dang ldan pa/ zil gyis mnon pa'i mtshan dang ldan pa lus shin du rnam par bye ba/ many+dzu
59a7(phal chen): pa dang ldan pa/ bstan pazang ba/ tshul dang mthun pa'i lus dang ldan pa/ stobs dang ldan pa/ thub pa med pa'i lus dang ldan pa/ stobs chen po dang ldan pa/ maH
59a8(phal chen): lus kyis bzung ba/ rnam par dag pa'i lus dang ldan pa/ bsgribs pa meng ba'i las rnam par dag pa dang ldan pa des/ zas mongs su gtong ba'am/ bzung bdang /
59b1(phal chen): / gan pa'am/ thams sa mags/ zang ba'am/ rnam sas/ 93sa/ ma2sa snam rgyu rnamams/ ma ma'am/ da la
59b2(phal chen): sman dang / yo byad rnams sbyin pa'am/ ring po ches gzhal ba'i snod sna tshogs bkang zhing yongs su gtong ma shing na sna tshogs dang / shing na dum bkang ming chad med
59b3(phal chen): po che dang / nor yongs su gtong ba dang / glang po che cang shes sam/ rta cang shes rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa gtong ba dang / spong ba rnams la ci rigs su rgyal po'i stan 'cha
59b4(phal chen): po gtod pa 'am/ gdugs gnong ba 'am/ rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan gtong ba 'am/ rin po che gtong zhing sbyin pa 'am/ rgyan dang lnga ba lhub kyi sbyin pa yongs su gtong bu 'am/
59b5(phal chen): cod pan nam/ gtsug gi nor bu dag dbang phyug la sbyin po nas dbang bskur bas mtshon chas bcings shings btson ra na 'dug pa'i sems can rnams mthong nas/ nor tham
59b6(phal chen): cad yongs su gtong ba dang / g.yog dang bajig tu bcas te byin nas/ btson de dag nas sems can rnams yongs su thar bar byed pa/ gsang par khrid pa mthong nas bdag
59b7(phal chen): gi lus dang srog yongs su btang ste/ gsang pa de bru bar byed pa/ gtsug pung dang thor bag tu bcas pa'i mgo bo dag kyang slong bas bslangs nas/ mi gtong ba med pa'i sems
59b8(phal chen): kyis gtong ba/ mig gnyis yongs su gtong ba 'am/ rna ba dang / sna yongs su gtong ba 'am/ so dang lce yongs su gtong ba dang / mgo yongs su gtong ba 'am/ rga lag
60a1(phal chen): yongs su gtong ba 'am/ rang gi lus kyang dral zhing slong ba la khrag yongs su gtong ba 'am/ sha dang rkang yongs su gtong ba'am/ slong ba la rang
60a2(phal chen): gi lus la snying phyung ste/ yongs su gtong ba'am/ slong zhing len pa sna tshogs lar+N+Na ma dang / mcher ba dang / mkha' ma dang / pho ba rnams yongs su gtong pa'am rang gi lus
60a3(phal chen): las yan lag dang / nying lag dang / rus pa bslangs na dad pa'i sems kyis yongs su gtong ba 'am/ spong ba la mos par lta bas pags pa dang / mdog yongs su gtong
60a4(phal chen): ba 'am/ rka lag las so sor yongs su gtong ba 'am/ chos 'dod pa'i phyir rang gi shi dang sen mo yongs su gtong ba 'am/ chos shin tu dkon pa tshol zhing mes gang ba'i 'obs
60a5(phal chen): mi 'greng lag tag mdun tu mchod par byed pa 'am/ chos bsrung ba'i phyir sdug bsngal myong ba thams cad kyang rang gi lus kyis bzod par byed pa 'am/ chos tshol zhing chos kyi
60a6(phal chen): tshig dang / yig 'dru tshigagi phyir yang rgya mcho ma ldan pa'is chen po mangs su gtsang ba'am/ tsasethams cad kyi dbang phyug byed pa'am/ mi dge pa'i chos las thamasas
60a7(phal chen): rnams bzlog ste/ dge ba'i chos la rab tu sbyor ba 'am/ skyes bu'i mtshan gcod pa mthong nas sdig pa'i las de dag las sems can de dag rnam par bzlog par byed pa 'am/
60a8(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa mngon par sangs rgyas par 'jig rten thams cad du sgrog cing gtsug lag khang dang / pho brang gi longs spyod kyi phyir sa dang khams yongs su gtong ba 'am/ rim
60b1(phal chen): bya bar byor ba dang/ las byed pa'i mas gtan pa'am/ mang ba langs tho bya ba'i phyir bdag nyid 'bral pa 'am/ rnam sa dngangs pa'angs shAng pa
60b2(phal chen): nas rang gi lus kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la rim gro byed pa'am/ bdag nyid sems can thams cad la gnod pa 'am/ sangs rgyas thams cad la rim gro bya ba'i phyir rgyal dri
60b3(phal chen): yongs su gtod 'am/ slong ba rnams la ci rigs su yul dang mir bcas pa 'am/ slong ba rnams ci rigs su khyim thams cad yongs su sbyin zhing gtong ba 'am/ bza' shing
60b4(phal chen): gir basbyin pa 'am/ slong ba sna tshogs dang / len pa sna tshogs dang / sems can sna tshogs dang / gang zag sna tshogs sems sna tshogs dang ldan pa la phyogs tha dad pa nas
60b5(phal chen): 'ongs pa/ chad las 'das pa'i mi dang / mi sna tshogs dang / sbyin pa'i garas sna tshogs la mchod sbyin byed pa khrag khrig brgya phrag stong du ma grangs med pa rnams byed cing
60b6(phal chen): yongs su gtong ba 'am/ de sbyor ba'i dmigs pa'i dngos pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/ sems 'di ltar bskyed de/ yongs su bsdu nang dge ba'i rtsa brnams
60b7(phal chen): kyi sring po'i rjes su song ba/ gzugs shin tu gzung ba dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi snying po'i rjes su song bas tshor ba shin du bzung ba/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi snying po'i
60b8(phal chen): rjes su song bas/ 'du shes shin du bzung ba dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi snying po'i rjes su song bas/ 'du byed shin du bzung ba/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi snying ma
61a1(phal chen): rjes su song bas/ rnam par shes pa shin du bzung ba/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi snying po'i rjes su song bas/ srid pa thams cad shin du bzung ba/ dge ba'i
61a2(phal chen): thams cad kyi snying po'i rjes su song bas/ 'khor shin tu bzung ba/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi snying po'i rjes su song bas/ longs spyod shin tu bzung ba/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
61a3(phal chen): cad kyi snying po'i rjes su song bas/ sbyin pa shin du bzung ba/ dge ba'i rtsa ba dag 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste/ bla na med par dmigs nas bza' ba dang btung ba 'di dag 'di ltar bta
61a4(phal chen): pa dang / 'di ltar sbyin pa dang / 'di ltar chags pa med pa dang / 'di ltar bcings pa med pa dang / 'di ltar nye bar btang ba/ 'di ltar ma bzung ba dang / 'di ltar lhag par bsam pa dang /
61a5(phal chen): 'di ltar dngos po yongs su btang ba 'am/ 'di ltar dmigs pa la mi gnas pa dang / 'di ltar gtong ba dang ldan pas sems can thams cad ye shes kyi kha zas dang ldan pa dang /
61a6(phal chen): bla med pal 'artson pa sems kyi bas yongs su shes pa dang / chags pa med pa'i bas dang / dga' ba'i bas dang / mang meng med pa'i zas dang / mi shes kyis 'tshe ba dang /
61a7(phal chen): kyis brtan pa dang / dge ba'i rtsabs yongs su bzung ba'i chos kyi sku dang / ye shes kyi skul yang dag par spyod pa dang / sbyin pa'i gnas dang / spyi snying brtse ba'i khazas rab tu
61a8(phal chen): len par gyur cig ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zas sbyin pa de dag yongs su bstan// byang chub sems dpa' btung ba'i sbyin pa gtong ba'i tshe/
61b1(phal chen): 'dagar mangs sa bas ste/ dge pa'i kya sa sems canamams cad rgyas kyi 'thung ba 'byung ba la btsun pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lam dang ldan 'das sa
61b2(phal chen): skom brgyan chad pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi legs kyi snyam pa las mi ldog pa dang / 'dod pa'i yul la sgom pa las mi ldog pa dang / chos kyis tshim pa'i dga' ba rab tu
61b3(phal chen): pa dang / chos kyi sku shin tu tshim pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyis tshim par byed pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang / shes rab rgya mtsho la zhugs pa dang / chos kyi ri rab dang ldan pa dang
61b4(phal chen): chos kyi btung bas ngoms par gyur cig ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i btung ba'i sbyin pa de dag yongs su bsngo'o// byang chub sems dpa'i
61b5(phal chen): khro ba'i sbyin pa skyod thams cad bsal nas/ rnam par dag pa sbyar ba dang / dang ra ba dang / kha ba dang / bro ba dang / tsha ba dang / skab sna tshogs kyi ro mchog dang ldan pa/ shin tu/
61b6(phal chen): 'jam pa'i ro mchog gi rnam pa dang ldan pa/ ro sna tshogs bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong bsags pa dang ldan pa/ khams rnams mnyam zhing 'khrugs pa med par gzhon/
61b7(phal chen): pas lus kyi stobs non par byed pa/ sems dga' ba dad cing mos pa dang / spro ba dang / gsal ba bskyed pa/ zhim zhing tshul dang ldan pa'i ro'i dam par gyur pa/
61b8(phal chen): nang gi dbang po rnam par dag par byed pa/ lho la bde bas yang dag par rton pa/ sgom pa thams cad sel bar byed pa/ nang thams cad zhi bar byed pa nad med par bya
62a1(phal chen): ba rnam pa 'di lta bu'i ro dam pa sna tshogs bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med pa/ slong zhing len pa sna tshogs la sbyir zhing yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/
62a2(phal chen): dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste/ sems can thams cad bdud rtsi'i ros brtan pa'i sems kyis ro bro ba'i mchog dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams
62a3(phal chen): cad kha zas kyi ro thams cad kyi las yongs su shes shing chos kyi ro'i ye shes la rab tu gnas par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad gnas pa'i mchog kyi grong khyer du phyin te//
62a4(phal chen): chos kyi ro du ma'i chos kyi dbyings rab tu rtogs par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad chos kyi dbyings thams cad du rgyas par byed par 'gro ba thams cad yongs su smin par bya
62a5(phal chen): ba dang / 'dul ba la zhugs shing chos kyi sprin gyi char 'bebs par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i chos kyi dga' bas rgyud tshim par gyur te/ ye shes mchog
62a6(phal chen): rol sems rnam par gnog par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad tshornams ca kyi mtshan mal ma 'dzin pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos la btsun pa'i sems dang ldanan/
62a7(phal chen): ro'i mchog thams cad la chags pa med par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad du rab tu 'jug par byung bas chos kyi rogacig par gyur cig
62a8(phal chen): sems can thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa'i theg pa las phyir mi ldog cing / ro mchog ga jo ba nyid la byung bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad dbang po thams cad dbyir
62b1(phal chen): mashes la mngon par mkhas pas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyir tho dad pa med par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad bsgoms pa med pa'i sangs rgyas kyinas kyig rim par bya
62b2(phal chen): chos kyi ras yid rgyas par gyur cig ces de ltar ra'i sbyin pa'i tshogs la brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyi ye shes chags pamang ba dru
62b3(phal chen): po sna tshogs bsgrub pa'i phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo'o// byang chub sems dpa' gzhon pa'i sbyin pa gtong ba'i tshe// dge ba'i rtsa rnams 'di ltar yongs su sngo ste/
62b4(phal chen): sems can thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa'i theg pa la bzhon par gyur cig/ theg pa chen po rab tu thob cing rnam par zhig pa med pa'i theg pa dang / mchog gi theg pa dang /
62b5(phal chen): dam pa'i theg pa dang / mgyogs pa'i theg pa dang / stobs chen po'o theg pa dang / bsod nams dang ldan pa'i theg pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i theg pa dang / byang chub
62b6(phal chen): sems dpa'i theg pa dang / mtha' yas pa'i theg pas byung ste/ yon tan thams cad phun sum tshogs par gyur cig ces de ltar/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
62b7(phal chen): chen po bzhon pa'i sbyin par gtogs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo'o// byang chub sems dpa' gos kyi sbyin pa gtong ba'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems
62b8(phal chen): can thams cad kyis khrel yod pa dang / rdo cha shes pa rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// chos kyis rab tu yog pa'i lus kyi phyir yongs su bsngo'o// kha ro//
63a1(phal chen): che byad ngan pa thams cad rnam par bzlog pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// lus sba bar bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// lus kyis 'khrung na lus la bar
63a2(phal chen): bar reg par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// kha dog dag par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// kha dog 'jam par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// mdog shin du 'jam par bya
63a3(phal chen): ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// bde bar 'gro ba rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs bsngo'o// sangs rgyas bde bar bsnyen bkur bar bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// bla na med
63a4(phal chen): pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dag par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo'o bar byed do// de ltar byang chub
63a5(phal chen): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po me tog gi sbyin pa byed pa'i tshe/ dri sna tshogs kyi me tog rnam dang / kha dog rnam pa tha dad pa'i me tog dang / yid du 'ong ba'i metog du ma
63a6(phal chen): dang / mig tu 'ang ba'i mchog dang / mi mthun pa med pa'i thanag dang / dris thams cad na yong pa'i thechog dang // wA rdzas dang mi'i ma gangs/ 'odadi mdzes pa'i mam
63a7(phal chen): shin tu dri che zhing yid du 'ong bar mdzes pa'i me tog dang / 'di lta bu me tog rnams sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mngon du gyur pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su
63a8(phal chen): mya ngan las 'das pa'i mchod rten rnams la 'bul ba dang / chos dkon mchog la mchod pa byed pa dang / dge 'dun dkon mchog la 'bul ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gan
63b1(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' la 'bul ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / pa dang / ma rnams la sbyin pa byed pa'i tshe/ chung ngun bdag gi lus dang / de ma yin pa gan
63b2(phal chen): bkren pa 'phongs pa slong zhing len pa sna tshogs la nges de dag sbyin par byed pa'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste/ sems can thams cad chos thams
63b3(phal chen): cad kyi me tog rgyas pa'i sems dang ldan pas sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin kyi me tog rgyas pa rab tu mthong bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas la rab tu dga'
63b4(phal chen): brnyed nas/ bltan mi ngoms par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sems can kun gyi sems mi 'khrugs pas ldan yid du 'ong bar gyur cig/ sems can thams
63b5(phal chen): dge ba'i las la lta zhing nye bar spyod pas lta ba yangs par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad dge ba'i thashes gnyen thams cad lnga lta ba dang / sems can ma nyams pas
63b6(phal chen): rjes su lta ba'i dran pa dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'gro ba kun gyi nyon mongs pa'i dug bsreg pa'i phyir dug sman bzang po nyams su myong ba lta bu
63b7(phal chen): gyur cig/ sems can thams cad ye shes kyi rgyal po chen po la 'gro ba thams cad 'god pas smon lam chen po mthong bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sems can
63b8(phal chen): kun gyi rab rib dang / ling tog dang / mur pa bsal ba'i phyir nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'char ba mthong bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad byang chub kyi zla 'ong dge ba rnam
64a1(phal chen): par spel ba'i phyir zla ba lta bu mthong bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad dge ba'i bshes gnyen mthong zhing chos kyi rnam pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad rab tu
64a2(phal chen): thob par bya ba'i phyir/ sems can thams cad kyis rgya mtsho'i rin po che'i gling du 'jug pa mthong bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad kyis bsgribs pa med pa'i ye shes mdza
64a3(phal chen): ba rnam par dag pa rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba'i me tog yongs su gtong bar gtogs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag de ltar yongs su bsngo'o//
64a4(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' phreng ba'i sbyin pa byed pa'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de sems can thams cad blta na mdzes pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// blta na yid du 'ong ba'i phyir yongs
64a5(phal chen): su bsngo'o// blta na bzang ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// blta na sdug pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// blta na mngon par dga' ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// blta na mya ngan med
64a6(phal chen): med pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// blta nA rab tu dga' ba'i phyir yongs su bsgo'o// bltan ying mi bde ba med pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// sangs rgyas mthong ba dang ldan
64a7(phal chen): pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// bla na med pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i mthong ba rnam por rig pa thob pa'i phyir yongs su bsgo ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
64a8(phal chen): chen po'i bring ba'i byin pa byed pa'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams ca la yongs su bsngo'o// byang chub sems dpa' sram kyi sbyin pa byed pa'i tshe/ dge pa'i rtsa ba de das semams
64b1(phal chen): #/ lta mas 'a #
64b2(phal chen): dang / ma 'dres pa'i tshul khrims dang / rnyog pa med pa'i tshul thams dang / 'gyod pa med pa'i tshul khrims dang / kun ras 'khor ba med pa'i tshul khrims dang / yongs su
64b3(phal chen): bamed pa'i tshul khrims dang / log par ma zhugs pa'i tshul khrims dang / mtha' yas pa'i tshul khrims dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i tshul khrims dang / bya chub sems dpa
64b4(phal chen): rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul khrims dang ldan par gyur cig/ tshul khrims kyi phung po gang dang sangs rgyas thams cad ldan pa'i de'i tshul khrims yongs su dag pa dang / sems cams
64b5(phal chen): cad ldan par gyur cig ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spos kyi sbyin pa byed pa'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad kyi tshul khrims kyi phung po yongs su rdzogs
64b6(phal chen): par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// bam po sum cu rtsa lnga pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' byug pa'i sbyin pa byung ba'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag
64b7(phal chen): 'di ltar yongs su sngo ste/ byug pa sbyin pas yongs su bzung ba'i dge ba'i ngas sems can thams cad btang ba thams cad yongs su gtong zhing sbyin pas bsgos par gyur cig
64b8(phal chen): sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims kyis shin tu rnam par dag cing tshul khrims kyis bsgos par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad chags pa med pa'i bsam
65a1(phal chen): parab dus bcing bzod pas bsgos pas byar cig/ sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpa'ajig pa chen po la 'artson 'grus kyi gorgya gos gang bcom pa
65a2(phal chen): kyis bsgos par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad dang ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas mngon du bzhugs pa'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu thos pas bsam gtan gyis bsgos par gyur cig
65a3(phal chen): sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi rgyal po la skad cig gis rnam par dag cig cing shes rab kyis bsgos par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad tha na med pa'i chos
65a4(phal chen): kyi 'jigs pa med pa rab tu thob cing chos kyis bsgos par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad yon tan thams cad kyi ye shes rab tu thob cing yon tan gyis bsgos par gyur
65a5(phal chen): tshig/ sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i pha rol tu phyin pa thob cing byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su bsngo ba thams cad kyis bskos par bar gyur
65a6(phal chen): tsag/ sems can thams cad mi dge ba'i chos thams cad rab tu spangs shing chos dkar thos bsgos par gyur cig ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' yongs su bsdu ba
65a7(phal chen): cad kyis bsgos par gyur cig/ sems dpa' chen po byug pa'i sbyor ba byed pa'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo'o// byang chub sems dpa' mal cha'i sbyin
65a8(phal chen): byeng ba'i tshe/ dge pa'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar mangs sur+b+ba/ sems mams shes rab dang chags chen mthob pa'i phyir lha rjes kyim la cha tum ra
65b1(phal chen): gyur cig/ sems can thams cad so so'i skye bo ma yin pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyi gos go ba'i phyir 'phags pa'i mal rab tu thob par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'khod
65b2(phal chen): ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad yongs su spang ba'i phyir bde ba'i mal rab tu thob par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad rnam par rol pa'i cho 'phrul yang dag par mthong ba
65b3(phal chen): phyir rin po che lta bu'i ma la rab tu thob par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad chos thams cad legs par bkod pa'i gos bgo ba'i phyir mnyam pa med pa'i mal rab
65b4(phal chen): tu thob par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos zil gyis ma nond par dag pas rgya chen po'i mal rab tu thob par gyur cig/ sems can
65b5(phal chen): thams cad chos kyi bde ba dang ldan pas dge ba'i mal rab tu thob par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi dmigs pa la brtson pas shin tu dag pa'i mal ra
65b6(phal chen): tu thob par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis skyab pa dang ldan pas shin tu brtan pa'i mal rab tu thob par gyur cig/ sems cad thams cad sangs
65b7(phal chen): rgyas kyi gzims pa lta bur klo g.yas pas 'bebs pa dang ldan pas/ seng ge'i mal rab tu thob par gyur cig ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' dran pashes gzhin gyis
65b8(phal chen): shin tu bsam pa'i dbang po yang dag par rgyu ba dang ldan pa mal cha'i sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i tshe dge rtswa de dag sems can thams cad la yongs su bsngo'o// byang chub
66a1(phal chen): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas kyi sbyin pa byed pa'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can tham
66a2(phal chen): cad yon tan gyi gnas la brtson zhing / ting nge 'dzin gyi gnas spyod yul du gyur pa dang / gnas pa med cing rten pa med pa'i gnas nas mi g.yo ba dang / gnas thams cad rnam
66a3(phal chen): par bsgom pa dang / 'jig rten gyi gnas las rnam par 'das pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i gnas pa la gnas pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi gnas yongs su zin pa dang
66a4(phal chen): bla na med pa'i gnas kyis mthar pA dang / bde ba'i gnas la brtson pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba'i gnas la shin tu gnas pa dang / bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gnas dang ma
66a5(phal chen): 'bral zhing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa la gnas par gyur cig/ ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten thams cad la phan pa dang / bde bar
66a6(phal chen): sems pa sems can thams cad la yongs su bsngobs yongs su sgrub pa/ gnas kyi sbyin pa yongs su gtsang ba'i/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad la de ltar
66a7(phal chen): yongs su ba'o// byang chub sams dpa' tu ba rgyu kyirgyu pa byed / ba dag 'di mangs su bsab+h+yAM/ ma sems ca 'thab
66a8(phal chen): ba dang bde ba'i sems kyis mags kyinan chen po la sbyong mtshan dag pa'i gags gan gyi chen la srung pa dang / tha ma'i rnam la spyang ba dang / lags par snang ba'i
66b1(phal chen): la spong ba dang / byams pa chen po 'arten la spyod pa dang / snying rje chen po'i rten la spyod pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi rkyen la spyod pa dang / byang chub kyi sems shin du ma
66b2(phal chen): pa'i rten la spyod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi lam gyi rten la spyod cing / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rten la spyod par gyur cing / ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa'
66b3(phal chen): sems dpa' chen po rgyab rten gyi sbyin pa byed pa'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad yon tan thams cad rnam par dag par gyur pa dang / shin tu dag par 'gyur ba
66b4(phal chen): dang / ye shes rnam par dag par 'gyur ba dang / lam rnam par dag par 'gyur ba dang / chos rnam par dag 'gyur ba dang / bsam pa rnam par dag par 'gyur ba dang / mos pa
66b5(phal chen): rnam par dag par 'gyur ba dang / smon lam rnam par dag par 'gyur ba dang / mngon par dag pa'i yon tan dang ye shes rnam par dag par 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir yongs su
66b6(phal chen): bsngo'o/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ste/ til mar gyi mar me dang / mar gyi mar me 'am/ rin po che'i mar me 'am/ nor bu'i mar me 'am/ ro'i mar/
66b7(phal chen): me 'am/ mar me chen po 'am/ a ga ru'i mar me 'am/ tsan dan gyi mar me 'am/ spos kyi ro thams cad kyi mar thams cad kyi mar me 'am/ kha dog mtha' yas par snang
66b8(phal chen): ba'i mar me 'am/ rnam pa de ltar bu'i mar me 'am/ de dag yongs su gtong zhing sbyin pa byed pa na/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'gro ba thams cad la bde ba dang / 'gro ba thams
67a1(phal chen): cad bsdu ba'i phyir 'di ltar yongs su bsdu ste/ mar mi sbyin pas yongs su bsdus pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems camathams cad sangs rgyas mas
67a2(phal chen): cad kyi chos la snang ba mtha' yas par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'jig rten thams cad shin tu za ba dmigs par bya ba'i phyir shin tu gsal zhing dang par gyur cig/ sems
67a3(phal chen): thams cad sems med pa'i khams yongs su shes shing snang ba rab rib med par gyur cig/ sems can me 'ong 'gyed pa'i lus su mngon par byung zhing snang ba mtha' yas
67a4(phal chen): par 'gyur cig/ semam cam thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la phyir ldog pa'i sems dang ldan zhing 'od kun du snang ba dang ldan par gyur gyi/ sems can ma
67a5(phal chen): na sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad snang bar byed pa dang ldan zhing // sangs rgyas kyi 'ong rab tu zab par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad rgyas kyi dbyings thams cad 'angs
67a6(phal chen): gis rgyas par byed cing rdzogs pa med pa'i sdang ba dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i zhing du 'ong gzer rab tung byen cing snang ba ngasas
67a7(phal chen): me par gyur cig/ sems can thams cing ma shes kyi sa mangs 'am tha thams cad snang bar byed pa'i 'ang dang ldan zhing 'di snang ba'i ma mnga'i rgyal pa lta bar
67a8(phal chen): byur mig/ sems can thams cad zhing kun tu 'dra 'gyed pa'i rnam par 'phrul pas byung bu'i kha dog mtha khams par gyur cig ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sem
67b1(phal chen): dpa' chen po mar tha'i sbyin pa rab tu gtong ba'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa ba dag sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / sems camarnams cad la 'ang ba'i 'byor mangs
67b2(phal chen): bsdu'o// sems can thams cad la dge ba'i rtsa bas yongs su gzungs pas yongs su 'dzin to// sems can thams cad dge pa'i rtsa bas yang das par bzung ba
67b3(phal chen): yang dag par 'dzin to// sems can thams cad la dge ba'i rtsa bas bskal pas bgo sha' byed do// sems can thams cad la dge ba'i rtsa ba snying brtse bar byed do// sems
67b4(phal chen): can thams cad la dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bskal pa sbyin par byed do// sems can thams cad dge ba'i rtsa ba rab tu bzung bas rab tu 'dzin to// sems can thams cad dge ba'i rtsa ba
67b5(phal chen): rab tu sbyin pas yongs su rdzogs par byed do// sems can thams cad dge ba'i rtsa bas dmigs par byed do// sems can thams cad dge ba'i rtsa ba mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam
67b6(phal chen): par byed do// sems can thams cad dge ba'i rtsa ba shes par rnam par dpyod pa byed do// de ltar de mar me'i sbyin pas bsdus pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de ni ras kyang sems can thams
67b7(phal chen): cad la dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams rab tu dgod pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo ba thogs med par 'gro ba de de ltar yongs su bsngo'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nang kyi rkyen
67b8(phal chen): sngan dang / yo byad sbyin pa byed pa'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad dmigs pa kun las shin tu langs pa
68a1(phal chen): 'gyur cig/ sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rab tu thob cing lus nang med par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad mi dge ba'i nang bsos par gyur cis/
68a2(phal chen): sman ltar bu gyur cig/ sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpa' phyir ldog pa'i sa la rab tu gnas pa'i tshul gyis sman a gu lta bur gyur cig/ sems can thams cad nyon mongs pa'i
68a3(phal chen): dug gi bsal shing 'byin cing sangs rgyas kyi sman du gyur cig/ sems can thams cad nyon mongs thams cad rnams par spyod pa'i spyod pa dang ldan zhing nye bar 'gro ba'i tshul can gyur cig/
68a4(phal chen): sems camathams cad yin tu mi 'khrugs pa'i chos dang ldan zhing sman kyi rgyal po lta bur gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'gro ba thams cad gso ba la zhugs shing sman gyi sdong po lnga
68a5(phal chen): gyur cig/ sems can thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi snang ba rab tu thob cing nang byang bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du sman gyi sbyor ba la bas brtson
68a6(phal chen): pas 'gro ba thams cad kyi sman la mkhas par gyur cig ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sman gyi sbyin pa byed pa'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad shin tu gso ba'i phyir
68a7(phal chen): yongs su bsti'o// shin tu ba de ni dga' ba'i phyir yongs su bsdu'o// sems nanathams cad shin tu rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsdu'o// sems cathams ca
68a8(phal chen): rgyas kyi glang mi mnga' ba 'a tha chub thuthob par bye ba'i phyir yongs su bsdu'o// sems tsamams cad kyinang gyi zug rngu rnams cad bzlog pa'i phyir mongs su bcwa'o// semams
68b1(phal chen): sa ca kyi rgyu mas mam cad 'am pa'i byor mngasarba gyug// mams thams ma ma sa dang
68b2(phal chen): mongasas babra'o// sems camamams cad stobs thams cad kyis can tshang / bsam pa zhin du mthang bzab par bya ba'i phyir mangs su bca'o// sems sa las ci byas pa
68b3(phal chen): kyi bde ba'i rnam pa zil gyis mi nan pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba'i yongs su bgyu'o// sems camathams cad kyi lus sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyi rabs kyis btang pa'i tshu
68b4(phal chen): yongs su bsdu'o// gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snod sna tshogs dang / bre dang / lnga bres sbyin pa byed pa 'di lta ste/ gser gyi snong dang / gser gyi the dang /
68b5(phal chen): rin po che sna tshogs kyis yongs su bkang ba dang / 'di lta ste dngul gyi snod dang / dngul gyi bre dang / lnga bre rin po che'i sna tshogs kyis yongs su bkang ba dang / 'di lta ste/ bai DUr+ya'i nga
68b6(phal chen): dang / bai DUr+ya'i bre dang / lnga bre rin po che rno ba tha dad pas yongs su bkang ba dang / 'di lta ste shel gyi snod dang / shel gyi bre dang / lnga bre rin po che'i rgyar rnam pa tha dad pas yongs su ba
68b7(phal chen): ba dang / 'di lta ste mu sa ra gral ba'i snod dang mra sar gal ba'i bre dang / lnga the mu tig dmar pos yongs su bkad pa dang / 'di lta ste a sma gar ba'i snod dang / a sma gar ba'i
68b8(phal chen): bre dang / lnga bachen po che'i byi ru dang / nor bu rin po 'od zer snang bas yongs su bkang ba dang / 'di lta ste rin po che shi la'i snod dang / rin po che shi la'i ze dang / lnga bri spos rim
69a1(phal chen): lnga bre kha bas zhim pa'i ra'i mchog sna tshogs kyis yongs su bkang ba dang / 'di lta ste tsan dan gyi snod dang / can dan gyi ze dang / lA bre lnga rdzas lnga bru sa
69a2(phal chen): phrugs kyis yongs su bkang ba dang / 'di lta ste rdo rje'i snod dang / rdo rje'i tha dang / lA ze spos rin po che bye ba khrag khrig bskang du mas yongs su bkang ba dang / 'di lta stes tsha
69a3(phal chen): dngos po rnams pa tha dad pa'i tshogs kyis bkang ba dang / bre dang lnga bre dum sna tshogs sogs par bya ba tshad meng pa nor gyi dbyig dang / byang chub sems dbang dkon mchog rnams
69a4(phal chen): cad la 'bul la 'dul dang gse dbye yongs su bkang ba de dag yon gyi gnas bsam gyis mi khyab par mos pa'i sems dang ldan pas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
69a5(phal chen): rnams la dbul lam/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen shin tu dkon par sems bskyed pas/ byang chub sems dpa' dkon mchog thams cad la 'bral lam sangs rgyas kyis
69a6(phal chen): bstan pa shin tu bstan pa'i phyir 'phags pa'i dge 'dun la 'bral 'am/ 'phags pa'i skye bo la shin tu mos pa'i sems kyis gang cag gi rnam pa can thos dang / rangs
69a7(phal chen): rgyas la 'bral ba 'am/ tham la bsnyen bkur zhing dge pa'i bshes gan la rim gra bya ba'i sems kyis pa dang mdag la smin par byed pa / de dang dag tus na/
69a8(phal chen): sa pa gsas sa nga batha sa ma pa sa rnas pa gyin marna ma sas ma thame phyin ma
69b1(phal chen): semamasasams cad las ma spang ba mag gis byams pa yangams bsgoms gang banang ba sems rgyas das par 'ab pa / da byu ba phru ba
69b2(phal chen): thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gcig tu nges par zhugs pa'i sems kyis sbyin pa thams cad rtsom ning tshogs chen po grangs med pas 'gro bathas
69b3(phal chen): cad yongs su mi gtang zhing / mi spang ba'i sems la shin tu gnas te/ sbyin pa'i dngos po thams cad la mngon par ma chags pa dang yon tan gyi gnas thams cad rab tu bzung ba'i
69b4(phal chen): sems la gnas pas bkren pa dang / phongs pa'i slong ba rnams la snod sna tshogs dang / bre dang / lnga bre'i yo byad kyi tshogs rnam pa tha dad pas yongs su bkang ba de dag sbyin
69b5(phal chen): ba dang / yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste/ dge bo'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad dran pa'i dbang po nam mkha'i dbyings
69b6(phal chen): ltar yangs pa dang ldan te/ 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i skad thams cad bzung ba dang / blang ba dang / yid la bya ba'i dran pa rmongs pa med cing snod tshang
69b7(phal chen): med pa'i snying po can du gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos zab ma rgyun chad pa med pa'i chos can du gyur te/ snang babang po rnams par dge bar gyur
69b8(phal chen): cig/ sems can thams cad 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos yang dag par 'dzin pa'i chos can du gyur te/ bla na med pa'i snod rin/
70a1(phal chen): pam ma zu / sems thamams cad las padas mkhyen pa das ga byung ba'i sa rgyas ma @
70a2(phal chen): dag par bzung zhing sangs rgyas kyi chos yangs pa'i snod gyur cig/ sems can thams cad byang chub kyi sems bskyang ba rgya chen mdun pa la yang dag par can mthas/
70a3(phal chen): che'i sdang rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan bzhin du btsun pa lta bur gyur cig// sems casems cad sangs rgyas kyi megos mna'ad nga nga bus med pa chang med pa la maswA
70a4(phal chen): rnam par dag cing yon tan thams cad kyi snong dang 'byung gnas su gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa'i sgribs pa med pas mas cad mkhyen dngas
70a5(phal chen): ces kyi mthar gtugs te/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi khongs su chud par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sems can gyi khams thams cad ma lus par thams cad
70a6(phal chen): mkhyen pa'i stobs la rab tu gnog pa'i phyir/ phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal bar byang chub sems dpa'i sbyong ba'i snod du gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyasarnams
70a7(phal chen): kyi gsung gi yan lag gis chos bstan pa yang dag par 'dzin pa'i sems dang ldan par gyur te/ yon tan mchog thams cad dang / dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi rigs kyi
70a8(phal chen): gyur // sems ca thams sangs rgyas thams cad kyichos ky-i mangs che nang pa la gsol pa 'amangs padang / rgyas yang bas bal smam na du 'gro ba'i
70b1(phal chen): bar byar ba/ de bzhi gshegs pa thams cad kyil bar kyang kyil 'bam 'jig ca gyi lams rnamam pa'i mams gsugs pa gang bar byengad za gang pa'i spyod du bu
70b2(phal chen): lngar byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag ci nas kyang sems can gyi khams thams cad byang chub sems dpa' kun chu babang po'i spyod pa la smod lam yongs su rdzon
70b3(phal chen): pa'i snod du 'gyur ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shing rta sna tshogs dang / shing na du ma dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi shing mchar
70b4(phal chen): pa rag sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' gcig tu rgyud pa dang / bla ma dang / bstod pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang / dge 'dun dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas
70b5(phal chen): dang / sbyin pa'i gnas sna tshogs slong zhing len pa dang / phyogs gzhan nas 'ongs pa'i gang zag sna tshogs dang / phongs pa dang / bkren pa spong ba dpag tu med pa dang / byang //
70b6(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i sgra thos te 'ongs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i yid ches pas skabs phye ste 'ongs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sngon gyi smon lam dang / sbyin pa'i sku
70b7(phal chen): thos te 'ongs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam dang / sems kyis bos shing bstabs pa de dag la sbyin zhing gtong ba lta ste/ nor bu'i shing rdal rgyan gyis shin tu mdzes
70b8(phal chen): pas byas pa dang / gser gi shing rta la dril bu'i dra ba rab tu 'khol ba'i rgyan rin po che'i srad bu'i lda ldi bkye ba dang / sbyin pa 'am/ bai DUr+ya'i shing rta la rin po che bye ba khrag khrig
71a1(phal chen): brgya stong du mas rnam pa sna tshogs kyis shin tu smras pa 'am/ sbyin pa 'am/ dngul gyi shing rta la shin tu dag pa'i gas rab tu bzang po'i thabs g.yogs shing rnaH
71a2(phal chen): gis bcas pa'i/ rin po che bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dums brgya na cing ba grubs pa sbyin pa 'am/ gser gyi shing rta la rin po che'i drab/ rgyan thams ca dun su ma tshags pa
71a3(phal chen): brgyan cing glang po che cang shes la bcas pa sbyin pa 'am/ tsan dan gyi shing rtal rin po che'i dam sgra sna tshogs kyis shin tu sbas te/ rin po che'i seng ge'i khris brgyan pa/
71a4(phal chen): na cung brgya phrag stong zhon pa/ rgya thams cad dang / rin po che sna tshogs thams cad kyi gdugs phun sum tshogs pa/ skyes bu cang shes brgya phra stong du mas drang ba
71a5(phal chen): sbyin pa 'am/ shes gyi shing rnal rin po che dmas kha dog rnam pa shin tu mdzes par byas shing / na chung bye ba khrag khrig brgya slong grangs med pas yongs su gangs
71a6(phal chen): rin po tshwa'i mkhrigasas par rnas pa/ rgyal na nga / bdan snga tshogs kyis byangs pabanas brtan btsun pa 'am/ yaska ga pa'i ga sa
71a7(phal chen): dums shin du mdzes par byas te/ spos sna tshogs rje zhim pos gdugs pa/ rdzas kyi dam pa thams cad kyi byug pas rab tu byugs pa/ mchog kyi rgya thams ca
71a8(phal chen): kyis tshal bar bkang ba/ bu ma brgya phrag stong gis rin po che'i srang bu thogs te/ 'khrul pa med par drang ba sbyin pa 'am/ drizhim pa sna tshogs kyi nga
71b1(phal chen): sa da nas rnams kyi thar rnas pa/ dan ma tsha'i rnabs smras par gyu smra sa/ sa sa pa ma sa ba rnam pa dug pa ma
71b2(phal chen): cher na dga' bzhin du 'thun pa mtshams kyi lha'i bus dra ba/ rin pa che'i 'amam pa 'dzin po thathams cad ga sbyin tu brnyan cing mdzes par
71b3(phal chen): sbyin pa 'am/ rin po che thams cad tshogs pa'i 'od 'byung ba'i shing rta la kha dog rnam par sna tshogs su snang ba'i rin po che rnam pa du ma'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa ri
71b4(phal chen): po che sna tshogs kyi dra ba'i bla res bres/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi 'phreng ba mtha' yas pa kun nas sbyangs pa la bu dang bu mo bskyon pa/ spos sna tshogs kyi phye mas
71b5(phal chen): mtha' 'khor shin tu sbyangs pa/ sbyin pa byed pa na de dag las sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams shing rta 'bul ba'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa ba'i de ltar yongs
71b6(phal chen): su bsngo ste/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas la yon chad med pa 'bul bar dad cing / sbyin pa'i gnas kyi dam pa la shin tu mos par gyur te/
71b7(phal chen): sems can thams cad sbyin pa'i gnas kyi mtha' yas pas rnam par dag pas/ sangs rgyas la rab tu chen par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad
71b8(phal chen): gtod pa rgya chen po yongs su grub pas sangs rgyas thams cad yongs su gtong bar mos par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi rnam
72a1(phal chen): par mthar pa'i bsgribs pa med pa rab tu thob cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs kyi smon lam dang ma bral te/ sangs rgyas la bskyed pa'i yon tan thos cad mkhyen pa'i
72a2(phal chen): mishes thams kyis myong bar gyur cig/ sems cam mas nang smra'ayas pa'i mags la shin du mis shing sangs rgyas lagasan gsol bzang mi shes par gyur cig/ sems can rnams
72a3(phal chen): cad bran med pa'i ye shes kyi rgyal pos rnam par dag cing me shes kyi mchog la rab tu rten par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyis rdzu 'phrul thams cad du 'gro ba thob ste/
72a4(phal chen): dudaga' bar 'gro bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad ye shes mtha' yas pa'i 'byung gnas la rab tu 'khong pa 'grub pa'i phyir ye shes chen po la rab tu rten par gyur ci/
72a5(phal chen): sems can thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi zhing las rnam par skye ba'i chos can du gyur cig/ bsod nams kyi zhing dam par gyur cig/ sems canathams cad dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams
72a6(phal chen): nang bskyed pas/ sangs rgyas kyi sogs la mos shing sangs rgyas thams cad la mi dga'i ba mang pa'i sems su zur rtsig// sems can thams cad sems kyi skang cig gcig gis chos
72a7(phal chen): gyi dbyings thams cad ngal byed par zhugs te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yongs su bsgrub pa lhun gyis grub pa thub par gyur ci// sems can thams cad sangs rgyas skyes
72a8(phal chen): thams cad kyi drung du phyin pas/ byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pas nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad du shin tu rnam par bya ba'i las la rab tu thugs par gyur cig/ se
72a9(phal chen): thams cad gnas dpe med pa'i lus rab tu thob pas ngal zhing drug ma med par 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'gro bar gyur cig/ sems cathams cad phyir mi sdom ma
72b1(phal chen): yid kyis jirje 'gro ba dang ldan zhing lus kyi mgyogs pa phun pa sum tshogs pa dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sems skad cig gis bsam pa dang / khams khyab par
72b2(phal chen): byed pas sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad yang dag par ston pa'i snang ba dang ldan zhing / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs dang / khyu mchog gi mthu 'byin pa'i
72b3(phal chen): pha rol tu phyin pa thob par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyod pa'i rjes su 'gro ba bde bar 'gro ba rab tu brtson par gyur cig/ sems can
72b4(phal chen): thams cad stobs bcu'i ye shes thams cad ma lus pa'i mthar thug pas 'gro bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad chos kyi dbyings thams cad tha dad par 'jug pa la 'jig rten gyi
72b5(phal chen): khams kyi rgyud thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thob par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad phyir mi ldog pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul dang tshul shes te/ byang chub
72b6(phal chen): sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa khong du chud pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa thob pas 'dod par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad chos nyid thams cad kyi rjes su song zhing chos ji la
72b7(phal chen): ba bzhin du mthong bas 'dra ba med pa'i ye shes kyi tshul thob par gyur cig ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mngon du gyur pa 'am/
72b8(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos rten la rta 'bul ba'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad de de bzhin gshegs pa'i theg pa bsgribs
72b9(phal chen): ba med par gyur pa'i mthar byin par yongs su bsngo'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i bshes gnyen la shing 'bul ba'i che// dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag
73a1(phal chen): sems can thams cad la 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad byas pa'i drin mi gtong bya'i phyir dge ba'i gshes gnyen mo gtsa
73a2(phal chen): ba'i sems sbyor ba med par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad skal ba mnyam pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su 'dzin pa'i phyir dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang dor 'thun par gyur cig/ sems
73a3(phal chen): can thams cad gtor ba dang yongs su gtong ba thams cad kyis dge ba'i bshes gnyen la phan 'dog pa'i phyir dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bla ma'i rim 'gros cher brtson par gyur cig
73a4(phal chen): sems canathams cad dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang nye bar byas te spyad pa sgrub pa'i phyir bsam pa dge ba dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems camams cad dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang 'thun pa'i bsten
73a5(phal chen): bkur ldanan tan byed pas dge ba'i bshes gnyen mthong ba rab tu thob par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sems 'khrul pa med cing mnyam pa dang / nges pa med cing rnyog pa med pa'i phyir dge ba'i ba
73a6(phal chen): gnyen la grol ba'i bsam pa can du gyur cig/ sems can thams cad yo byad ni 'dod pa rab tu bslab pa'i phyir dge ba'i bshes gnyen la lus yongs su gtong bar gyur cig/ sems can
73a7(phal chen): thams cad byams pa dang ldan zhing 'khon med par rim tho byung ba'i phyir dge ba'i bshes gan gyi yongs su bzung zhing rab tu brtan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas rgyamam can
73a8(phal chen): thulan pa yangs pa man pa'i phyir dag pa' bshes parten dang 'dra par thar gyi// mas camamam cad sma mam gcig pas byang chub sams dang myong ba la 'byung ba dang thams
73b1(phal chen): mas na kya ga pa'in sakyim par tsun pa 'angs kyas pa dang ldan nang mtshan pa / mas
73b2(phal chen): cad kyi yul la rnam par 'phrul pa'i ye shes mngon par shes pas shes rab bzang pos chos kyi brtson 'grus la shin tu byung bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad chos thams cad brdung /
73b3(phal chen): ba'i phyir pha rol tu phyin pa'i mthar gtugs pas khong du chud pas rig pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa thob par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad thogs pa med pa'i theg pas/ thams cad
73b4(phal chen): mkhyen pa nyid kyi mthar gtugs te theg pa chen pos mngon par spyod cing / yang dag par gnas par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad pa'i phyogs las phyir mi ldog pa'i yid dang /
73b5(phal chen): ldan zhing 'gro ba thams cad shes pa'i ye shes 'dzin par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos la ji ltar thos pa bzhin du rmongs pa med pas chos thams cad la
73b6(phal chen): rab tu gzhol zhing ji lta ba bzhin rtogs pa'i mngon par shes pa dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad bsgribs pa med pa'i ye shes kyi chos thams cad la 'byung
73b7(phal chen): ba'i mthar thug ste/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yongs su bzung ba'i ying dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad mnyam pa med pa'i rdzu
73b8(phal chen): 'phrul gyi rkang pa dpe med pa rab tu thob bas mgyogs pa dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas 'gro bar gyur cig/ sems can
74a1(phal chen): thams cad 'gro ba thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang / theg pa chen pos 'dul ba la rab tu zhugs pa'i 'gro zhing 'od phun sum tshogs par
74a2(phal chen): gyur cig/ sems can thams cad ye shes kyi shing rdzas 'gro ba'i mthar thug pa'i gti mug med par 'gro bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad bsgrib pa med
74a3(phal chen): pa'i ye shes kyis thams cad 'gro ba'i tshul shes shing chags pa med pa'i shing rta bzhor pa dang ldar par gyur cig ces de ltar sems dpa' sems dpa' chen na
74a4(phal chen): dge ba'i bshes gnyen la shing rta 'bul ba dang / yongs su gtong bas yang dag par bzung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems ni thams cad sangs dang / byang
74a5(phal chen): chub sems dpa' thams cad la tshul gyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas brnyem cig gyur ba yongs su sgrub pa rnal dgu par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// byang chu
74a6(phal chen): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa thams cad la shin tu bslabs pa'i sems dang ldan pas/ shes rab kyis shin tu rtogs pa'i bsam pa can yon
74a7(phal chen): spyan gyis rnam par dag pa'i yod dang ldan pa 'thun par yongs su gtong ba'i bsam pa na/ dge 'dun rim po che shin tu dkon pa'i bsam pa dang ldan
74a8(phal chen): tshogs chen po che la shin tu das mamo'i bsam paben snyan pa rab tu bzung ba'i yid dang ldan pa/ lus pa'i bsam pa shin tu brtan pa'i bsams can rin
74b1(phal chen): thabyed pa dang ltun ba/ rmAn sbyin chen par mtsha sgyushAn tu byas byas pa man par mam+b+han me za ba ga
74b2(phal chen): ma nga bas 'digs pa ni rlom pa med par dam na shegs pa'idape 'dun ga ma sh+yaing d+hA 'phrul ba dang / 'a
74b3(phal chen): la shing rta phul bas yang dag par bzung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dris sems can thams cad sangs
74b4(phal chen): bstan pa la yang dag par gzhol bas yang dag par zin par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'phags pa'i skye mched las chos gzhan med par shin tu
74b5(phal chen): bsgrub sems ngar du gzhol bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos gcig nas gcig tu brgyad pas yang dag par bzung bas 'phags pa
74b6(phal chen): rnyed par gyur cig/ sems na thams cad 'jig rten kun gyi shes pas par bya bas grangs su bgrang bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad chos kyi dbyings
74b7(phal chen): mi gnyis pa'i rang bzhin shes pa khong du chud pas chags pa med pa'i dbyings la sa yang dag par gzhol bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad de bzhin
74b8(phal chen): gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul gyis yang dag par byang bas cang shes kun nas bskor bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad dang bral bas nyon mongs
74b9(phal chen): 'anyon monges pa'i rdul ldan pa cad
75a1(phal chen): pa med pa'i chos la spyod par gyur/ sems can thams cad 'phags pa'i dge 'dun so so'i skye bo med pa'i sas bla na med pa'i dge 'dun dkon mchog
75a2(phal chen): rdzu brjod par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad tshogs pa med par gyur pa'i ye shes la shin tu brtson pa'i chos can du gyur te/ 'phags pa'i chos dang ldan par gyu
75a3(phal chen): cig/ sems can thams cad khams gsum thams cad kyis gos pa med pa'i sems dang ldan ning tshogs kyi rgyal po dam par gyur cig/ sangs rgyas thams cad ye shes
75a4(phal chen): chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba la mkhas pas legs par bcas pa'i ye shes kyi bzhon pa dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'jig rten gyi khams
75a5(phal chen): rgyud brjod du med par shin tu 'gro ba'i 'gros la mkhas pas sems nad cig gi rdzu 'phrul rab tu thob par gyur cing/ sems can thams cad 'jig rten gyi khams thams sa
75a6(phal chen): tu thogs pa med pa'i ye shes dang ldan zhing nam mkha' la bu lus kyi shing rtasgrub par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad nam mkha'i dbyings dang de bzhin gshegs
75a7(phal chen): po'i chos kyi mthas gtugs pas khyab par byed pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'dzin gyi kyil 'khor du 'gro ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i mchog thob par gyur/
75a8(phal chen): cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad ma lus par gang dga' bar 'tsho nang rgyu ba dang ldan pas lus yang dag pa'i khyad par rjes su rtogs pa/
75b1(phal chen): tu thob par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'dzag rten gyi khams thams cad lung yang dag par son pa'i phyir rdzu 'phrul gyi 'khor mtha' yas pa lam
75b2(phal chen): bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du lus 'phos pa med par 'gro ba yang dag par bston pa'i phyir/ rdzu 'phrul chen
75b3(phal chen): po'i khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa thob par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad ming lor lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba mngon par sgrud par
75b4(phal chen): ye shes rab tu thob pasro sangs rgyas kyo zhing thams cad lA mI gnas pa'i lus rab tu thob par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad dus la ji la 'byed
75b5(phal chen): sems can yongs su smin par byed cing 'dul ba mi gtong ba'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi khyad mchog gi mthu phyung ba yang das par bson par
75b6(phal chen): gyur cig sems can thams cad skad cig gcig gis chos kyi dbyings thams cad la chags pa med cing bsgribs pa med pa'i tshul gyis sems skad cig gis byed
75b7(phal chen): thams cad du 'gro ba'i rdzu 'phrul la mngon par mkhas par gyur cig ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge 'dun la shing rta 'bul
75b8(phal chen): zhing yongs su gtong bas yis dag par gzung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag de ltar sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi shing ral gnas pa rnam par 'gyur
76a1(phal chen): // ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad shes pa'i ye shes kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar 'gyur ba'i phyir yongs
76a2(phal chen): smra sla'o// gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i gnas kyi 'du shes nye bar bzhug pa'i sems dang ldan pa'i rim mo cam
76a3(phal chen): zhes dang ldan pa/ bdagro nyid che ba'i yon tan rgya mtsho gang chen mtsho'i tshul la mkhas pa'i yon tan dang ye shes kyi 'byung gnas kyi rigs dang ldan
76a4(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan la rnam par sems pa/ mthu chen po skyes bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du yongs su bsgoms pa sems dang ldan pa
76a5(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dus brjod du med pa thams cad du med ma rdzarol cad spyod rnam par spyad pa la rab tu zhugs pa/ bdud kyi bcings pa thams
76a6(phal chen): nor las sems rab tu grol ba/ bdud kyi bcings pa thams rlung la po sems rab tu grol ba/ bdud kyi du ma'i sde dang / bdud thams cad kyi shes na
76a7(phal chen): stobs rab tu 'jom pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ gzhal med pa'i chos la mkhas pas snang bar gyur ba den thos dang / rang sangs rgyas la shing na 'bul ba'in
76a8(phal chen): shing rta yongs su btab pas yang dag par bzung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su ste/ sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i sbyin gyi mos
76b1(phal chen): smin pas grub pas byin pa'i gnas kyi dam par yid ches par gyur cig/ sems can thams cadadu gcig tu spyod cing mi gnyis par yang dag par spyod pa
76b2(phal chen): 'du' ji med pa la dga' bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'gro ba thams cad bsod nams kyis yang dag par bsdu ba la brtson pas sbyir ba rnam par dad
76b3(phal chen): par byed pa'i mchog tu gyur cig/ sems can thams cad dge ba'i rtsa ba grangs med pa'i 'bras bu rab tu byung bar gyur ci/ sems can thams cad sbyin pa'i
76b4(phal chen): dkyil 'khor mchog gis rnam par dag pas bsgribs pa med par rtogs par khrod du chud par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad kyi rang bzhin byed pa med par
76b5(phal chen): khong du chud pas nyon mongs med pa'i chos la rnam par spyod par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad bsod nams kyi zhing smin pa'i gnas 'gro ba thams cad dag
76b6(phal chen): bar byas pas/ bsod nams tshad med pa shin tu bsogs par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sbyin pa'i gnas su byas te/ phan 'dogs pa rnam pa
76b7(phal chen): dag pas chos 'phrul mtha' yas pas rnam par rol pa yang dag par bston par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad thastobs bcu'i theg pa mchog gi 'bras
76b8(phal chen): bu yongs su stobs pa'i gnas yon tan zad mi shes par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad bsod nams kyi phung po mi zad pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i
77a1(phal chen): mthar thug par 'gyur te/ sbyin pa'i gnas don pA'i 'bras bu dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad ma thos pa'i sangs rgyas
77a2(phal chen): chos kyi tshig dang yi ge 'dzin cing sdig pa'i chos rab tu zhi bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sas rgyas kyi sgra don yod pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par rig pas
77a3(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mthun pa la mos shing brtson par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas thams cad las thos pa rjes su bsgrubs pa'i
77a4(phal chen): chos can du gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad thos pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa thob par gyur cig/ sems cam thams cad zhabs thub pa dgu cu rtse drug gi sa
77a5(phal chen): bra lA ba las rnam par 'dus te/ bsnun pa la gnas pa'i bya ba la mos par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad dge ba'i rtsa ba'i mchog rnams par spel bar/
77a6(phal chen): byed cing 'phags pa mthong ba rab tu thob par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'phags pa mthong zhing 'grogs pa'i bde ba dang ldan zhing ye shes kyis stong
77a7(phal chen): ga zag la mos par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi rjes su thos pa las byung ba'i thos don yod par gyur cig/ sems can rnams cad
77a8(phal chen): bsan parab tu bzung ba dang / yongasas bsrung ba lazugs pas sangs rgyas kyi babar ba'o rlo nas kyi mkhas pa rab tuthob par gyur cig/ sems ca
77b1(phal chen): surgyas kyi
77b2(phal chen): rnam mn-i 'i shAs 'gyur bya ba'i snang ba rab tu thob pas rgyas thams cad thas mashin tu 'dzin pa la zhugs pa \u0f7f/ rnams par rnam gyu
77b3(phal chen): kyis dga' bar spyod cing gtong ba shin tu byed pa dang / mchod sbyin shin tu byas pas sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la yin tan ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pazun sa mtsha
77b4(phal chen): par gyur cig ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas la shing rta 'bul ba'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems cam
77b5(phal chen): cad kyi ye shes dang mngon par shes pa rnam par dag pa mchog dam pa phul rab tu thob cing ci nas kyang mi 'jigs pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / mi
77b6(phal chen): bar rab tu thos par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i gnas dang / len pa sna tshogs phyogs
77b7(phal chen): gzhan dang gzhan nas nas 'ongs pa'i gang zag dang / slong ba phongs pa dang / bkren mang po tshad med pa byang chub sems dpa'i sgra thos te 'ongs pa da /
77b8(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i smor lapa dang / sems bskyed pas mos shing bstabs pa thams cad gtod pas shin tu re ba'i yin cen de dag 'ongs pa mthong mas
77b9(phal chen): slob pa la rim mo bya bas mi ngoms pa'i sems kyis slong ba 'ongs pa rnam la bzod pa gsol ba'i sems bskyed de/ 'di ltar bdag nyid phyogs de dag tu rnye
78a1(phal chen): kyi drung du song ste rim gro bya ba zhig na/ da 'di lta khyer 'di phyin te/ shin tu dal bar gyur to zhes spyi bos btu de bzod pa gsol bas/ slong
78a2(phal chen): thams cad bzod par byas/ rim gror byas ngal ba bsti nas/ ci 'dod pa'i sbyin pa de dag gi shin du rim gro byed de/ 'di ltar nor bu shing rta 'dzam bu'i gling
78a3(phal chen): gI ma cung zad mo rin po chos yongs su gang ba dang / 'di la ste gser gyi shing rta yul gyin rung rin po che shin du rnam par dgo pas yongs su kyang ba dang / 'di na ste bai DUr+ya
78a4(phal chen): chung ma'i 'khor dang / rol mo brdung zhing dkrol ba dang ldan pa'i yongs su bkang ba dang / 'di la ste dul gyi shin tu mdzes pa/ bud med gzhon lA mo'i bu mo lta bros
78a5(phal chen): yongs su bkang ba dang / 'di la ste rin po che bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i shing rta'i 'tshar ma byor mi larta bud med nu shes rin po che'i rgyan paH/
78a6(phal chen): cad kyis brgyan pa tshul mkhas pas yongs su bang ba dang / 'di lta sde can dran gyi shing rta byang chub sems dpa'i banon par 'os pa dang / 'dil bu shil gyi shing rta bud med
78a7(phal chen): babang mo bzhin bzang ba ma brang sdug gu shin tu brtan pa/ gzugs mdzes pa b.lan smras cing mi mthun pa med pas yongasu bkang ba dang / 'di la ste ma sman par bar
78a8(phal chen): rta dbang bskur bas yongs su bkang ba dang / 'dil ste spos dam pa'i shing rgya dang bu mos yongs su bka pa dang / 'dil sa rin po che'i tshogs thams cad kyi brgyam
78b1(phal chen): shAng rnyan ga bshes gcin dbyer mo phyed pas yongs su bkang ba dang / de rnams pa 'di lta bu'i shing rta grangs med pa rnam pa sna tshogs spongs mo pa thams cad la
78b2(phal chen): zhing yongs su gtong bas slong ba 'dod par bya'i dngos po rab tu thob pas yid la bsam shin tu rdzogs nas/ spong ba de dag thams cad sbyin pa thams cad sbyi
78b3(phal chen): tshul gyis yang dag par bzung ste/ shin tu tshim par byas shing bsam pa rdzogs par byas dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / rangs pa dang / yid bde ba skyes par byas
78b4(phal chen): dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su bsngo'o// sems can thams cad byang chub kyi shing drung du bsam gyis mi khyab cing thogs pa med pa'i shing rta'i 'khor lo
78b5(phal chen): mi ldog pa'i 'gro ba dang ldan te/ theg pa chen po'i shing rtu la zhon par gyur ni/ sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad la spyod cing /
78b6(phal chen): ma'i mtha' bskal pa'i mur thug par phyir mi ldog pa'i chos kyi shing rta cang shes la zhon par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad chos thams cad la rnam par
78b7(phal chen): pa'i rlom sems med cing thams cad mkhyen pa'i rigs kyi lam la brtson pas chos thams cad ci yang ma yin pa'i shing rtsa la zhon par gyur cig/ sems can thams
78b8(phal chen): cad thogs pa med pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad 'gro ba la brtson pas kun tu 'gro ba dri ma med pa'i shing rta la zhon par gyur cig/ sems can tha/
79a1(phal chen): cad sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos la dga' bas mos shing yang dag par 'gro ba la brtson pas thams cad mkhyen pa'i theg pa'i shing rta rjes su 'thun pa
79a2(phal chen): la rab tu gnas par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i 'byung ba'i lam bcu dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad la rab tu dga'
79a3(phal chen): ba'i yid dang ldan zhing / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad la spyod pa rnams b.rangag pa'i shing la zhon par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad tshul dang 'dra bar
79a4(phal chen): yul ma gnas pa dang ldan pa dang / skyes bu dam pa de la rten pa thos pas sngon byas pa'i bsod nams shin du bstsags pa dang / yang dag pa'i smon lam la shin du brtsomapa
79a5(phal chen): dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshangs par spyad pa rnam par dag pa yongs su rdzogs pa phun sum tshogs pas 'khor lo bzhi pa'i shing rdul zhon par gyur cig/ sems can thams
79a6(phal chen): cad de bzhin gshegs pa ma lus pa'i stobs dang / ye shes la brtson pas phyogs thams cad kyi chos kyi dbyings su chos kyi snang ba gtong ba la bslabs par gyur cig
79a7(phal chen): sems can thams cad chos kyi shing rtas 'byung ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa thob so/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kya shing rtsal mkhas par gyur nig/ sems can thams cad bya
79a8(phal chen): thams cad du legs pa dang bde ba yang dag par son bsod nams thams cad dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba tshad med pa dang / chos bsam gyi mi khyab pa'i shing rtsal mdzes
79b1(phal chen): par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'jug pa'i dri ma rab tu byang ste sbyin pa gtong bas 'byung ba'i shing rtsa dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems pa ma thams ca
79b2(phal chen): chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbus med pa ma lus pas tshul khrims rnam par dog pas/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ye shes rnam par dab pa'i shAng snang
79b3(phal chen): par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sems 'khrugs pas med pas gnas pas 'gro ba thams cad kyi bsam pa 'khrugs pa med cing bzod pa'i pha rol tu/
79b4(phal chen): phyin pa'i ye shes kyi shing rta dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'byung ba'i shing rtas snying po byang chub tu 'gro bar spyod pa'i go cha bgos pas brtsom
79b5(phal chen): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ye shes kyi shing rta dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad shin tu mgyogs pa'i shing rta so snying po byang chub tu byung ste/ bsam
79b6(phal chen): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ye shes kyi shing rta dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad chos kyi dbyings kyi shing rtal shin tu non zhing sangs rgyas kyi yul sbal
79b7(phal chen): ba'i rgyas par byed pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ye shes kyis shing rta dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad chos yongs su gtong ba la 'jig pa
79b8(phal chen): med pas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rin tu spyir po gtong ba'i phyir nam chos kyi rgyal ze'i shing rtsal lon par gyur ci/ sems cam thams par ches kyi mtsham ming
80a1(phal chen): dang rang bzhin gyi phyogs thams cad la rab tu 'jug pa/ rmongs pa med pa'i phyir smon lam la mi gnas pa'i ye shes rgyu shing rta dang ldan
