80a2(phal chen): par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad theg pa cheran po mnod pas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du skye zhing lus yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir sangs rgyas
80a3(phal chen): thams cad k+Shi shIng rtsal non par gyur cig/ semasan+dan thams cad byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i smor lam skyo ba med par yongs su rdzogs
80a4(phal chen): par byed pa'i phyir thams cad mkhyen pa'i rin po che'i shing rta la zhon par gyur cig/ ces de ltar byang chub sems dbu'i rkyen thos sbyin pa'i gnas dang /
80a5(phal chen): pa dang / spong ba sna tshogs la shin du dga' ba dang / rab tu dga' ba dang / mos pa dang / spro ba'i yid kyi rnam por rtogs pas sbyin pas yongs su bsus
80a6(phal chen): pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad mkhyen pa'i theg pa la non pa shin tu bsgrubs/ ye shes dang sems kyi rnam pa mtha' yas pa
80a7(phal chen): yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bgro'o// / bam po snyam tsas drug pa'o// / 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa
80a8(phal chen): sems dpa' chen po sdong po zong shes yang lag bedu shin tu snyan pa la drug bcu lo baM/ mche ba drug dang ldan pa 'a dag pad+ma la bu btang rnam par
80b1(phal chen): pA dkar cing tsam med pa/ gsu gyi rgyal mtshan can gser gyi rgyan dang ldan pa/ gser gyi d+ha bas las kun nas g.yo Ta gA/ sbru
80b2(phal chen): kyi dra ba'i rgyan tu bcug pa/ gser ltar bltan mdzes pa/ dpag tshad skyong gis khyon dungal ba med par 'gro bar 'gro ba sbyin zhing gting ba'am/
80b3(phal chen): shes gom ba zo mdog bde bar 'dor zhing 'dog pa'am/ bya ltar mgyogs pa dang ldan pa rdog ma lung lor 'khyil ba/ nam 'tshod dang rmi mar ldan pa/
80b4(phal chen): rmig pa'i dbyibs mtho zhing skyon med pa gser gyi dril bu'i dra bas brgyan pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dang / zla ba dang ldan pa/ \u0f89\u0fa4na
80b5(phal chen): nas brgyan po/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi gdod rgyar pak+Sha lu sA la byams pa shin tu mgyogs pa/ phyogs bzhir yid lar mgyogs pa'i shugs dang la
80b6(phal chen): pa/ la rdzas lta bu'i lA lbub thams cad dang ldan pa/ de'i buM b+h+rUM mar bya ba dang / dge ba'i shes gzhan dang / pa dang / ma dang / phongs pa dang / bzen ba ni
80b7(phal chen): ba dang / len pa'i 'gro ba thams cad la sbyin zhing yongs su gtong ba dang / sems yangs pas sbyin pa/ sems la chags pa med pa gtong ba dang / byang
80b8(phal chen): rjes su 'gyor pa med pas yid mgu bar byed pa dang / snying rje chen pos yongs su rgyas pa'i bsam pas gtong ba chen po rab tu gtong zhing / byang chub
80b9(phal chen): bla ma'i skye bo dang
81a1(phal chen): sems dpa'i yon tan thams cad la rab tu rtsol ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rigs su mngon par skyes pa'i bsam pa yongs su
81a2(phal chen): sbyor ba'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste/ sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rkyen gyis byung
81a3(phal chen): so/ cang shes kyi theg pa la rab tu gnas par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro ba'i chos kyi theg pas byung
81a4(phal chen): theg pa bzang po'i bzhon pa la mngon par bzhon par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bsgribs pa med pa'i ye shes
81a5(phal chen): kyi theg pa'i snang bar gyur cig/ theg pa chen po la shin tu mos par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad smon lam thams cad sgrol ba la rab tu zhugs pa/
81a6(phal chen): brtsam pa dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad dge ba'i rtsa ba mnyam par bsgrub pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba rab tu thobapa la pha rol tu phyin pa
81a7(phal chen): theg pa mnyam pa nyid kyis byung bar gyur cig/ sems d+ha m+ba bla ra med pa'i ye shes rin po ches sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos la shin tu 'byung ba'i chos
81a8(phal chen): can du gyur te/ theg pa chen po rin po che yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi me
81b1(phal chen): tog rgyas pa'i sems dang rlung du gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i sbyong bu'i rgyun rnam par bsags pa'i theg pas shin tu byung bar gyur cig/ sems na
81b2(phal chen): cad mtha' mas pa'i theg pa phyir ba la mngon par brtson pa'i ye shes kyi chos can du gyur te/ bsal pa grangs med pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spong
81b3(phal chen): bsam pa/ rjes su sems shing rnam par spyod par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis yang dag pas bsgrubs pa
81b4(phal chen): mkhas pa longs spyod kyi mchog thams cad dang / cang shes kyi theg pa chen po'i sbyin pa byed par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'gro ba kun thams cad mkhyen
81b5(phal chen): pa nyid kyi lam gyi mthar gtugs par mngon par bzung par bya ba'i phyir theg po chen po shin tu mthong bar gshegs shing rab tu rten pa dang ldan par gyur cig ces
81b6(phal chen): de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po glang po cang shes dang / rta cang shes bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med pa'i sbyin pa byed pa'i tshe/ dge
81b7(phal chen): ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad chags pa med pa'i theg pa la mngon par bskyon zhing ye shes kyi bzhon pa yos su grub pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i/
81b8(phal chen): theg pa la bsgribs pa med pa'i 'byung ba'i mthar thug par yongs su bsngo'o// de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgya
82a1(phal chen): por gyur pa/ chos kyi dbang byed pa bstan gyi sbyin pa byed cing rgyal por zhugs pa'i khri sum bzang po bai DUr+ya'i rkang pa can seng ge'i khril gnas
82a2(phal chen): pa/ gser gyi rgyu dang rin po che'i drubs klubs pa/ spyan dog nA bde brag ma med pa dru ma bting ba/ rten mo rdzas kyi dam pa thams cad gyis shin du dran
82a3(phal chen): par byas pa/ nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba rin po che bre ba khrag khrig rgya stong du ma'i rgyan gyi brgyan pa gser gyi dra ba'i bla re bris pa/
82a4(phal chen): rnyil bu'i dra bakhrol ba'i sgra yid du 'ongs pa'i dbyangs 'byung ba/ rin po che'i 'bru bye ba khrag zhig brgya song phrag bcus kun nas bskor te/ rnam par bye bas
82a5(phal chen): shin tu 'phags shing bsnyen mdzes pa/ srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stod grangs med pas kun nas lta ba/ gdugs bkab gcig gis sa chen po tham
82a6(phal chen): ca snang bar dbang bskur ba/ rgyal sring kyi dbang phyug thoms cad la dbang ba'i san du bya ba de la 'dug cig/ 'khor lo thags pa med pas bsnang ba dang
82a7(phal chen): bya ba la rgyal po'i bka' thams cad nyams pa med paranyar ba/ dpal rnam par stong pa dang / hrInI la dang / nor bu rin po che'i snying ba sasmras pa/ lim da
82a8(phal chen): zla ba dang / skar mche ma la bur rab tu brgyan pa/ rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs rmang du byung bas brgyan pa/ rin po khyad par du 'iphags pa'i rgya mtshos smras pa/ rgyam
82b1(phal chen): rgyal man+dan dang / bkra shis dang / bum pa sna tshogs yongs su gang ba dang / dga' ba 'khyil ba'i rgyan sna tshogs kyis rnam par brgyan pa/ 'jam du
82b2(phal chen): chu klung gi gser gyi gyim bag dri ma med cing rdul dang bral bas bka' ba de la 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad kyi bdag po spyi bo nas dbang bskur bas mngon de
82b3(phal chen): dbang skur ba'i bsod nams kyi stobs dang ldan pa/ byams pas dbang bskur ba/ pha rol gyi 'khor bcom pa dang ldan pa/ bka' la zlog pa med de/
82b4(phal chen): 'dug na dga' ba/ de ltar bu'i stan gyi rnam pa'i tshul de 'dra ba sbyin zhing yongs su gtong ba dang / de dang de dag rgyal po bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med pa
82b5(phal chen): la khri snyan pa de ltar sbyin pa byed cing yongs su gtong ba dang / yongs su dga' bar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sbyin pa'i kyi dam pa la gsol ba'am/ skyes bu/
82b6(phal chen): dam pa dge ba'i shes gnyen nam/ 'baganyis pa'i dge 'dun dkon mchog gam/ chos smras pa dang / chos l-i dga' ba'i'i phyir yongasu g.yon
82b7(phal chen): pa'i sems kyis sam/ phongs pa dang / bkren pa slong ba dpag tu med pa dag gam/ sems can thams cad la phan gdags pa'i phyir yang rung ste/
82b8(phal chen): sbyin zhing yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste/ dge ba'i rtsub 'dis sems can thams cad sangs rgyas
82b9(phal chen): pa dang / ma dang/ bla ma'i skye bo 'am/ nyar thos dang / rang rgyal ba'i sbyin pa'i gnas sem byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa thams cad dam/ de bzhim gshes pa'i sem gyi mtshor ba'i phyir ram/
83a1(phal chen): chos thams cad rnam par 'tshang rgya ba'i ye shes dang ldar zhing shin tu byang chub pa'i stan dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad bdud
83a2(phal chen): kyi dkrugs ma dang / dpung rab tu gzhom pa'i phyir chos kyi dbang phyug thams cad kyi rdo rje ri ri rnam pa thams cad du thub pa med pa lus dang ldan ning 'gro ba thams cad
83a3(phal chen): la dbang ba'i snyan pa rab tu thob par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'gro ba thams cad kyis blta bar 'ongs shing / sangs rgyas rnam par rol pa'i seng ge'i
83a4(phal chen): bdun rab tu thob par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'gro ba kun la chos kyi dbang phyug gis sbyong ba'i phyir bstan gyi rgyan dang / 'khor lo rnam par dag pa
83a5(phal chen): brjod du med pa rab tu thob par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad dge ba'i rtsa ba chog sa chen po rnam par dag pas khams gsum pas zil gyis mi nor ba'i sngam
83a6(phal chen): rab tu thob par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad bskal pa grangs med par sangs rgyas kyi gdan gyi yon tan bsngags pa mthar thug ma med pa dang ldan zhing 'jig rten
83a7(phal chen): gyi khams brjod du bstan gyis rgyas par byed pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad chos kyi dbyings thams cad lus kyis rnam par byed pa'i
83a8(phal chen): gcer rkyen pa'i tshogs kyi gan la gnas par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad ji war dam bcas pa'o sems can gyi khams thams cad la chos kyi sbyin pas rim
83a9(phal chen): brjod du medapa'i yang
83b1(phal chen): zo byed pa'i phyir rgyun gyi rnam pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i stan rab tu thob par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad rdzu 'phrul dang / rnam
83b2(phal chen): bar 'phrul po thams cad drung / sangs rgyas kyi khyu mtshig mtha' byang ba yang dag par bskur ba'i phyir/ dge ba'i smar la rab tu gnas par zer cig/
83b3(phal chen): can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i bdag nyid che ba thams cad dang / khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba yang dag par bston pa'i phyir rin po che thams cad kyi snyan pa dang
83b4(phal chen): spos thams cad kyi sman dang / me tog thams cad kyi stan dang / gos thams cad kyi spyan dang / phrer ba thams cad kyis bstan dang / nor bu rin po che thams
83b5(phal chen): stan dang / bai DUr+ya'i sna tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i stan dang / 'jig rtem gyi khams thams cad brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa ltar tshad med pa'i
83b6(phal chen): snyan dang / 'grob thams cad ma lus par rgyun kyis rnam par dag pa'i stan dang / rdo rje gangan thams cad la 'khod par gyur cig/ ces de ltar byang chub sems
83b7(phal chen): dpa' stan gyi sbyin pas yang dag par gzung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can 'gro ba thams cad kyis ma gos pa'i byang chub kyi stan rab tu thob cing sangs rgyas
83b8(phal chen): chos thams cad rnam par 'tshang rgya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gdugs kyi byin pa byed cing / dbang phyu
84a1(phal chen): gI lAs la dag pa'i gdugs rin po che'i rgyun chen pos shin du brgyan pa/ bye ba zhag khrig brgya stong khyad par du 'phags shing dbang che ba'i tshe
84a2(phal chen): byang du bya ba rin po che'i rtsa ba can dril bu'i drabs kun nas bskor ba/ rin po che'i srad bus gser gyi dril bu sbyangs pa'i sgra byung ba/ rin po che bai DUr+ya'i 'phreng ba rab
84a3(phal chen): tu sbyangs pa che kor nas rnga'i sgra'i dbyangs yid du 'ong ba'i byung ba/ gser gyi dra ba rnam par dag pas g.yogs shing brgyan pa/ rin po che'i dra bas rgya phrag stong gi
84a4(phal chen): bla'i bres pa/ nor bu rin po che'i 'bru grangs med pas smras pa/ rin po che bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas snang tshog su bres shing brgyan pa/ a ga ru dang / tsan
84a5(phal chen): dAn dang / spos kyi dam pa sna tshogs bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dums nyin kor dri zhim par bsgos shing bdugs pa 'dzam bu'i chu klung gi gser ltar 'od gsal
84a6(phal chen): zhing dag pa/ rgyan bye bA khrag khrig brgya stod mtha' yas pas brgyan pa re bas kyang ches lhag pa'i gdugs bye ba khrag khrig rgya stong rmongs med pa dag kha na mthog
84a7(phal chen): med pa'i sems kyis byin pa byed cing / sems can gyi gtso bo mngon tu gyur pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i mchod rten brgyam
84a8(phal chen): ba'i phyir ram/ chos btsal ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dang / reg pa'i bshes gnyen dang / byang chub sems dpa' chos sgrub dgu bram/ ba dang ma
84b1(phal chen): dge 'dun dgan mchog sam/ phas rgyas thams cad kyi bstan pa'am sbyin pa'i gnas kyi gang zag sam tshogs sa mas ba pon dang / b+hu m+WA / byang chub
84b2(phal chen): bgrub pa 'am/ de la zhugs bdag gam/ phongs pa dang / bkren pa spangs pa dang / len pa dag le 'bul ba dang / yongasu gting ba dang / sbyin pa byed
84b3(phal chen): tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas thams cad g.yog pa rab tu thob ste/ dge ba'i rtsa bas yang rig par lon
84b4(phal chen): par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad nyon mongs pa dang / che ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad las yongs su 'das te/ yon tan dang ye shes kyis mngon par
84b5(phal chen): bkang bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'jig rten gyi rdul dang / mun pa dang / yongs su gdung ba thams cad las rnam par 'das te/ lus shin tu ga
84b6(phal chen): par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'gro ba thams cad kyis blta na sdug cing sangs rgyas thams cad la mnga' ba'i ye shes kyi snying po can du gyur cig
84b7(phal chen): sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos la log pa med par brtson pas ma 'khrugs pa'i chos dkar pos shin tu bka' bar gyur cig/ sems can thams na
84b8(phal chen): chos kyi lus kyis sangs rgyas kyi sku'i mthar gdugs te mngon par bkab pa'i lus dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'jig rten kun la stobs ban
85a1(phal chen): shes kyi snying po dang ldan pas
85a2(phal chen): ye shes kyi bla res skyob par gdugs su reng bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad khams gsum thams cad las shin tu 'phags shing
85a3(phal chen): pa med pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par snang bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sbyin pa'i gnas dam pa la bsod nams thams cad kyis mchod pa'i phyir gdugs su
85a4(phal chen): 'ongs par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi gdug so rnam par sangs rgyas pas gdugs dam par gyur cig ces de ltar byang chub sems da
85a5(phal chen): sems dpa' chen po gdugs kyi sbyin pa byed pa'i tshe/ dge dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad gdugs kyis chos la dbang ba'i gdug sa yang dag par ba
85a6(phal chen): bathob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// bdugs gcig gis nam mkha' thams cad kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ chos kyi dbyings mthas gdugs pa'i
85a7(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi 'ams thams cad du sangs rgyas thams cad kyi khyud mchog gi mthu byung ba yang dag par bskum pa las phyir mi ldog pa'i phyir yongs su bsdu'o//
85a8(phal chen): kyi dbyings thams cad gdugs cig gis brgyan te/ de bzhin gshegs pa mthong mchod par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsdu'o// gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan pa
85a9(phal chen): pa ngan yid du 'ong bas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku la mngon par dag pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing / thams cad ma
85b1(phal chen): kyi ra byengs
85b2(phal chen): ra gdug sa canan gyis kun tu mab par bya bar gyur yongs su ban+d+ha'o// sangs rgyas kyi mtsham la mos pa'i sems can thams cad dang / 'gyul 'gas ma
85b3(phal chen): mdzin 'ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// rin po che rnams bdu kyi gdags sna tshogs brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa sangs rgyas cig laphul bas ma
85b4(phal chen): rgyas thams cad la brjod du med pa'i gadregs bral bar sems shing yongs su ma'o// sangs rgyas thams cad gyi byang chub mngon par byang chub pas 'phags par
85b5(phal chen): drugs kyis sangs rgyas thams cad dge ba'i phyir mos sra bzla'o// sangs rgyas kyi sgra'i snyed 'jig rten gyi 'a sa kyis smras pa/ nAmya mu khA'i mtha' gdu
85b6(phal chen): mas ga sa myi ga / ma
85b7(phal chen): thams cad kyi 'bring ba bzlas shing klubs pa dang / sras thams cad kyis mchog badzi rnam pa'i ring 'byor ba'i gdugs dang / don ma na ni byas rnam par na
85b8(phal chen): gzugs dang / rten mdzes shing rnam par dag pa'i gdugs dang / rgyan chad med par yangs shing rgya tsho ba dang / gsen che rlabs kun nas migs par brgyan pa dril dri'i
85b9(phal chen): rna bkun nas spangs pa'i sgra yid du 'ong zhing snyan pa'i byung ba'i gdugs dang / ye shes bslabs pa med cing chags pa med pa'i gdugs dang / sangs rgyas thams/
86a1(phal chen): cad mngon par dag pa'i gdugs yongs su btang ba'i phyir yongs su bsdu'o// sangs rgyas de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ga
86a2(phal chen): kyi sbyin pas yang dag par gzung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad la ye shes mchog gi gdugs kyis mngon par dga' ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// sangs rgyas
86a3(phal chen): thams cad kyi yon tan gyis kun nas g.yogs shing rab tu brlan pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// sangs rgyas kyi ye shes dang yon tan dang / dgongs pa dam pa dag par bya
86a4(phal chen): ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// sems can mtha' yas pa la dbang sgyur ba rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// chos thams cad la ye shes kyis dbang sgyur ba
86a5(phal chen): kun tu rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyis thams cad mngon par g.yog par yongs su bsngo'i don yongs su bsdu'o// 'gro bo thams
86a6(phal chen): cad kyis ye shes mchog badrugs rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs smra bsa'o// sangs rgyam thams cad kyi stobs bcus bla res bres pa'i gdugs su 'gyur bar bya ba
86a7(phal chen): yongs su bsdu'o// chos kyi dbyings thams cad sangs rgyas kyi ning gcig gis yog par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo 'o// chos thams cad la dbang phyug tu dbang thob par bya
86a8(phal chen): phyir yongs su bsngo'o// mthu chem po dang dbang chen po'i mangs kyi rgyur thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsa'o// blo yangs pa dang sems rgya che ba thob par bya ba'i phyir mi
86b1(phal chen): shA'o/ ma na chad med pa' rna ba thams ca mngon par gyu za ma byar ma sa ma'// skyon+ya ma thams pa kyis sems ma bar dag
86b2(phal chen): skye ba sgra// sems can thams cad kyis 'gro ba thams cad mngon par dga' ba'i phyir yongs su drasa'o// me shes chen pos ma'am par dgab bathob
86b3(phal chen): phyir yongs su bzo'o// sems can thams cad kyis bsngo ba'i tshul ma lus par thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// sems dang bsam pa rnam par ngab
86b4(phal chen): 'gyur ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// bas pa ba dge ba dang yid kyi dra bang po rnams par dag pa dang ldan par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsdu'o// 'gro ba thams cad yongs
86b5(phal chen): su bsngo ba chen pos mngon par dag pa cing yang dag par bsdus pa'i phyir yongs su bgro'o// 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgya la ma
86b6(phal chen): dang / ba dan rin po che sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pa'i yu ba can rin po che'i dril bu drab khrol ba'i sgra yid du 'ong ba 'byung ba/ snum+b+ha bu rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs smra
86b7(phal chen): pa/ 'dog dang tshon sna tshogs kyi snam bus brgyan cig cing bsgrengs pa gser gyi dra bas kun nas sbyangs shing klubs pa/ gser gyi dril bu'i sgra 'byung ba dang / dril
86b8(phal chen): bu g.yer ka'i dra ba'i shin tu brgyan pa'i rgyal mtshan dang / be dan bye ba khrag zhig brgya stong kha dog tha dad pa/ 'tshon tha dad pa shin tu mtho ba/ rin po ches rnam pas
87a1(phal chen): / tshogs su brgyan pa/ rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo zla gam gyis mdzes par brgyan pa/ 'dzam bu'i chu klung gis gser gyi nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bcu
87a2(phal chen): pa'i 'od gzer rnam pa sna tshogs 'byung ba rgyal mtshan gyis sa thams cad kun tu g.yog pa/ rgyal mtshan gyi rkyen rnam pa du ma 'od dang ldan pa sa rab tu brgyan pa'i
87a3(phal chen): rgyal mtshan rnam pa sna tshogs bsgreng po'i rlan de ltar bu dag 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad dkyil gyi rnams par smin pa la mos rgyal mtshan gyi brgyan gyis kun tu bya ba
87a4(phal chen): par bya ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyis klas pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad 'byam klas pa la gnas pa/ yaH
87a5(phal chen): pakun du rgyal mtshan gyi byin pa yongs su btang bar mos pas/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rgyas par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa dang /
87a6(phal chen): mos pa'i khyad par rnam par dag bya'i phyir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mngon du gyur pa rnams la 'bul ba'am/ de bzhin gshegs yongs su mya ngan las
87a7(phal chen): 'das pa'i mchod rten nas/ chos dkon mchog mchod pa 'am/ dge 'dun dkon mchog la 'bul lam/ dge ba'i bshes gzhan byang chub sems dpa'
87a8(phal chen): rnams sam/ sam thos dang / rang sangs rgyas sam/ 'khor gyi tshogs su gyur pa 'am/ gang zag mi rnam par gzhan su yang rung ste/ slob pa thams
87b1(phal chen): badral rim thor bya ba'i phyir sbyin nang yongs su gtod na/ rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan ston pas yang dag par bsdus pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yong du
87b2(phal chen): dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad ye shes kyi rgyal mtshan dang bdun la thug po med pas dge ba'i rtsa ba ring / bsod nams thams cad yang dag par brnyed
87b3(phal chen): rgyal mtshan can du gyur cig/ sems can thams cad chos kyi go 'phang bris pa spyod pa'i chos tshad kyis chos thams cad dbang bsgyur ba'i rgyal mtshan bsgreng bar zur
87b4(phal chen): cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byang chub kyi chos yang dag par 'dzin pa'i chos can du brut+te/ rin po che'i go ni la sangs rgyas kyi chos bris pa dang /
87b5(phal chen): ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'gro ba kun la mar me snang bar gyur te/ rgyal mtshan shin tu 'phags par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad bdud thams
87b6(phal chen): par 'jom pa'i phyir thub pa med pa'i rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan du gyur cig/ sems can thams cad bdud thams cad kyis mi thub pa'i chos can du gyur te/ ye shes ring
87b7(phal chen): kyi rgyal mtshan rab tu bsgreng bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad mi lhung ba'i snang ba can du gyur te/ ye shes mthu'o che'i'o tshun dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams
87b8(phal chen): cad ye shes kyi 'khor gyis chos kyi dbyings thams cad rnam par dag par gyur te/ ye shes kyi nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'od zer rab tu 'gyed pa'i rgyal mtshan dang ldan par gyur cig
88a1(phal chen): sems nan thams cad sangs rgyas kyi mchod pa la brtsom zhing rgyal mtshan sna tshogs rab tu bsnyeng ba/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhing brjod du med brgyas
88a2(phal chen): par 'gyengs pa'i phyir rin po'i rgyal mtshan gyi rgyan dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad zhugs pa 'thub pa dgu rtsa drug gi rgyal mtshan gyis dbyen zhing sems 'dod
88a3(phal chen): chags dang bral bar gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyal mtshan rab tu thob par gyur cig ces de ltar byang chub sems pa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal mtshan dang bdan
88a4(phal chen): sbyin pa byed pa'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems cad thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgya che zhing yangs pa dang / zab mo thams cad dang ldan par bya ba'i phyir yongs
88a5(phal chen): sro sngo'o// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyod pa dang rnam par 'phrul pa dang / 'byung ba'i rgyal mtshan dang ldan nings so yang dag par rig pa rnams par dag batho
88a6(phal chen): bar bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin po che thams cad gtong ba la mos pa dang / sems can thams cad nor/
88a7(phal chen): gyis zlum par byed pa dang / rin po che'i mdzad thams cad 'byed pa/ rin po che'i gter thams cad gtong ba dang / rin po rje'i 'byung banas thams cad yongasas
88a8(phal chen): gtong ba dang / nor bu rin po che thams cad gyi sbyin pa byed ba dang / re po ldan gyis sems can thams cad la khyab par byed pa dang / rin po che'i tshogs thams cad mangs /
88b1(phal chen): sa mas mas nacad ba dang / na pa mags thams cad mamyothod pa dang / rnam pa thams cad spangs sumam bar sems brnyed gyur na/ rlu na
88b2(phal chen): zag brgya snang zungs med pa la rin po che sbyin pas yongs su bzung ba'i dge ba'i chu ba de das yongs su bas ste/ sems can thams cad rgyan pa'i drung rmongs bze po
88b3(phal chen): rgyus mthong ba rab tu thob par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi 'dzin pas/ chos dkon mchog gi snang bar rab tu thod pa
88b4(phal chen): cig/ sems can thams cad sbyin pa dang / yo su gtong ba shin tu brtan pas dge 'dun dkor mchog yongs su 'dzin par gyur cing/ sems can thams cad phyir
88b5(phal chen): ldog pa'i byang chub kyi sems rnam par dag pas/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems rim po che rab tu thob par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos
88b6(phal chen): la rmongs par gzhol bas ye shes rin po che la zhugs par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad ye shes chen po tshad med par yang dag par bstan par bsnun par byar
88b7(phal chen): phyir byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan rin po che grangs med phun sum tshogs par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad spobs bcu'i ye shes ringan po che mngon par 'cha
88b8(phal chen): rgyab la brtson pas/ yon tan rin po che mtha' yas pa'i bsngags pa dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad ye shes ri po che shin tu yangs pa'i mtha'
89a1(phal chen): thubs pa'i ye shes rin po che bcu drug gi snyoms par 'jug pa rab tu thob par gyur cil/ sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes rin pa
89a2(phal chen): che la rnam par sangs rgyas pas rin po che'i dam pas sbyin pa'i gnas kyi mchog tu gyur cig/ sems can thams cad yang dag par rig pa mi zad pa'i mdzod kyi chos rin pa
89a3(phal chen): rab tu ston pa la btsun pa la brtson pas rin po che'i dbang po dam par gyur TIg ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin po che dag yongs su gtong
89a4(phal chen): zhin sbyin pa byed pa'i tshe/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi sprin rin po che rnam par dag cing nyams pa med pa'i ye shes dam pa rin po che yongs su rdzogs par
89a5(phal chen): bya phyir yongs su bsngo'o// 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus dang yan lag dang / nyid lag thams cad rgyan gyis shin tu brgyan pa
89a6(phal chen): lus bldan sdug pa/ rnam par dag cing mthun pa med pa'i rgyun gyis lus shin tu brgyan pa/ rin po che thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pa byed pa
89a7(phal chen): khrag khrig brgya stong gri shin tu brgyan pa/ sems can thams cad kyi lus rgyamagyis brgyar par brtson pa/ sems can thams cad lci bu'i 'du shes kyis 'jig rten
89b1(phal chen): myi bya ba sangs rgyas kyi bye ba thams cad bstobs pa/ dga' ba sgra rtogs kyis sems cacur bsgyang sla ba byed pa/ rgyun nas bya
89b2(phal chen): tha dad pa dag sems cad thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cat+pal rab tu dgong ba'i phyir sbyir zhing yongs su gtong ba
89b3(phal chen): rgyan yongs su gtang bas yang dag par bsdus pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste/ sems can thams cad ye shes kyi rgyan rnam par dag pa
89b4(phal chen): lA dang bcas pas 'jig rten gyi rgyud tu re par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad bsod nams kyi mtshan rnam par dag pa dang ldan zhing mtshan gyis lus shin tu//
89b5(phal chen): brgyan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad bsod nams brgya pa'i mtshan dang ldan pa'i lus can du red de lus mtshan gyis shin tu brgyan par gyur cig/ sems
89b6(phal chen): can thams cad lus kyi yan lag mtshan kun gyis brgyan pa dang / ldan zhing lus mtshan gyis shin tu rnam par bris pa phun sum tshogs par gyur cig/ sems
89b7(phal chen): can thams cad so so yang dag par rig pa mi zad pa'i mdzod dang ldan zhing tshig gis rgyan gyis shin tu brgyan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad dbyangs kyi yan lag yid
89'a1(phal chen): tshul dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i tshul dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'dul ba thams cad kyi tshul dang / chos kyi 'khor lo mtha' dang
89'a2(phal chen): dbus med pa rab tu bskor ba'i tshul dang / dus brjod du med pa'i tshul dang / chos rnam pa tha dad bstan pa'i tshul dang / 'jigs pa med pa'i mdzangs chams
89'a3(phal chen): med pa'i tshul dang / chos thams cad ma lus par snyan pa'i tshul/ tshul tshul ma yin pa rjes su rtogs pa'i ye shes 'thob par byab rab tu 'thob par gyur
89'a4(phal chen): cig dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis chags pa med pa dang / grol zhing bcings pa med pa'i su phyir mi ldog pa'i sems can byang chub tu yang dag par 'byung ba nyams pa
89'a5(phal chen): ba med par bya ba dang / brtan pa dam pa'i dge ba'i rtsa bas sems can thams cad rnam par dag pa'i mtha' phyin par byed cing / kun du bzang po'i las kyis
89'a6(phal chen): sprul pas 'gro ba thams cad dga' bar byed pa'i lus kyis las yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis chags pa med par dang 'gro zhing bci
89'a7(phal chen): pa med pa'i sems su sems can gyi khams thams cad dga' bar bya ba'i tshig brjod du med pa la rab tu brtson zhing ngag gi las kyi rgyud thams cad rnam par
89'a8(phal chen): ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun tu 'bang po'i byin gyis rlabs la brtson pas/ sems can thams cad kyi rnam par 'arjod pa yongs su shes par bya ba'i
89'b1(phal chen): shes rnam par dag pa yongs su thob par gyur cig/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis kun du bzang ba'i sbyod ba'i spyod yul rab tu rtogs shing / chags pa med pa
89'b2(phal chen): grol zhing bcings pa med pa'i sems su kun tu bzang po'i 'gro ba 'byam klas pa thams cad dong / zhing 'byam klas pa ma thams cad dang / sems can 'byam
89'b3(phal chen): klas pa thams cad/ mngon par shes pa dang / ye shes brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i chos 'byam klas pa dang / chos 'byam klas pa'i brgyan
89'b4(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi mdzod thams cad nas 'byung ba dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa rnam par dag pa'i sems kyi rgyud mnyam pa nyid kyis
89'b5(phal chen): zhugs pa'i ye shes 'byam klas pa rab tu rtogs par gyur cig/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis chags pa med pa dang grol zhing bcings pa med pa'i sems su sangs
89'b6(phal chen): rgyas thams cad kyi sku las byung ba'i rnam par dag pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa rnam par dag pas mos par grub pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs
89'b7(phal chen): la brtson pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi gzi brjid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi yul la yang dag par gnas pa dang / ye shes kyi mtha' yas
89'b8(phal chen): bas snang bar byas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i las kyi mngon par byung ba dang / tshig rab tu dbye ba thams cad la mkhas pa rnam par dag pa/
90a1(phal chen): / dra 'ong zhing rnam par dag pa dang ldan zhing / lomatan gyis brgyan pa'i dbyings dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas
90a2(phal chen): kyi chos kyi tshig gi tshul rnam par dag par 'gro ba kun mgu bar byed cing / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyis tshig yid du 'ong bar brgyan pa dang ldan par gyur
90a3(phal chen): cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kun la lta bas snyoms par gyur cig/ 'jug cing sems kyi sku brgyar par gyur cing/ sems can thams cad
90a4(phal chen): snang ba thams cad chos snang ba thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos rab tu thob cing gzugs thams cad kyi rkyen gyis rab tu brgyan par gyur cig/ sems can tham
90a5(phal chen): cang chos snang ba thams cad kyi ye shes kyis dran pas sems ye shes kyis yang dag par brgyan pa dang ldan par gyur cig ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sem
90a6(phal chen): dpa' rnon po lus kyi rgyun de dag yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos chen mod thams cad kyi yon
90a7(phal chen): shes kyi yongs su mas te/ sems pa thams cad kyi'is rlung rgyal dang / rgyangs pa dang / rigs pa med par bya ba'i phrin mongs su /
90a8(phal chen): 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen por bar phya ga la spyi bos nas dbang bskur bas/ mngon par dbang bskur ba gcod pan dang / bcug
90b1(phal chen): rna par 'phel bar byed pa
90b2(phal chen): na b+h+ya nga pa yangs sam ba nga / mngan par ban sa pa nga / sems ca ma byu
90b3(phal chen): sra ga 'ong ba'i spyod sgyu smos pa rgyun yongs su rtsom pa dang / sbyin pa la dbang sgyur ba rab tu 'jug pa dang / sbyin pa'i ye shes la rab tu spong ba dang / sbyi
90b4(phal chen): gtor ba'i dbang ba yongs su bskyed pa dang / sbyin pa btong ba'i b+h+yod+ha rjer byed pa'i tshe/ cod ben dang gtsu gi rin po che yongs su gting bas yang dag pa ra du
90b5(phal chen): pa'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su s+ho ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba'i 'dis sems can thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cadaN+DI spyi bo nas bsku
90b6(phal chen): bas/ dbang po thams cad la shin tung bang bskur bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad ye shes kyi gtsug gi pha rol tu phyin pa thob pas spyi bo'i gtsug tor ba
90b7(phal chen): mgo dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'gro ba kun gyi yon tan gyi spyi bo'i mthar phyin pasa?/ ye shes rin po che mchog gis sems can thams cad
90b8(phal chen): yang dag par sdud par bya'o/ sems can thams cad 'gro ba kun gyi spyi bos phyag bya bar 'os shing / ye shes rin po che'i 'gog la yang dag par gnas par gyur
90b9(phal chen): cig/ sems can thams cad chos kyi skying ba la dbang sgyur ba rab tu tho ba ste/ ye shes cod pan shin tu bcings par gyur cig/ sems car thams cad 'jig rten ldan
91a1(phal chen): gyis blta bar mi nus pa'i chos can du gyur te/ ye shes kyi nor bu rin po ches mgo rab tu rgyan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad spyi bor gyur pa'i
91a2(phal chen): ye shes kyis sangs rgyas kyis chos thams cad la rnam par lta ba'i chos can du gyur te/ spyi bo shin tu btsun pa dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad ye shes rin
91a3(phal chen): po che rgya mtsho'i snying rnam par dag pa dang ldan zhing stobs bcu'i rgya macod pan gyis mgo rab tu brgyan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'dod pa'i khams kyi dang po nas/ bdu
91a4(phal chen): thams cad rnam par 'jom pa'i phyir sa'i dam pa la gnas par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad stobs thar thug ste/ chos kyi ye shes kyi spyi bo rnam par dag par gyur cig
91a5(phal chen): sems can thams cad mkhyen pa'i dbu zil gyis mi non pa'i ba'i snang ba rab tu thob skye/ rgyal po'i mchog dam par gyur cig ces/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems
91a6(phal chen): dpa' sems dpa' chen za da pan dang / gtsug gi rin po che mongs su gtong ba'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa ba des sems can thams cad kyis ye shes mchog gi 'byung ba nas rnam
91a7(phal chen): par dag padang / ye shas kyi cing pan dang / nor bu rim po che rab tu thob pa 'gyur yongs su za bu 'di// 'ang ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen thams
91a8(phal chen): bcu cing / ma sa pa'i sems drug pasam pa/ lus papal gyi makyi thar pa/ shing zlag dang gams sgos dang / 'ang da nam/ lus la
91b1(phal chen): sa 'a/ rgyu ba'i rnam pan/ ma bde bas sa na mamyur ba/ skabs myed par byu ba/
91b2(phal chen): med pa mun pas log cing khebs pa/ shin tu bye ba/ brlal lcags sgrog gis bsgrogs bde la phung dpo mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' snying
91b3(phal chen): rgyal po mig bzangs kyis ji ltar byas pa bzhin du bdag dang 'khor du bcas pa/ nor thams cad dang bcas par yongs su btang ste/ byin nas bcom denas rje
91b4(phal chen): dag yos su thar par byed do// des btson ra de nas sems can de dag zar bar byas nas kyang nor gyi sbyin pa thams cad mngon par byin nas/ sman dang / sman pa dang /
91b5(phal chen): kyi rnam pas lus nad med par byas te/ bde ba dang / yid dga' ba la rab tu bkod nas chos rin po che thos po byas te/ dga' ba'i gtam gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba la bkod nas
91b6(phal chen): sangs rgyas bstan pa las mi nyams par byed do// de de ltar sems can btsonar nas bkye bas yang dag par bsdus pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste/ dge
91b7(phal chen): ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad sred pa'i bcings pa dang zhags pa las shin tu rgol bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad ye shes mthong ba'i pha rol tu phyin
91b8(phal chen): 'khor ba'i rgyud shin du chang par gyur/ sems can thams cad bag la tshal ba shin tu bcom ste/ kun nas 'khor ba dang / rnam par bral bas ma rig pa'i mun pa
92a1(phal chen): rab rib dang / ling thog rnam par bskul cing / rab rib med pa'i ye shes yang dag par mthong bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'gro
92a2(phal chen): ba kun gnon par bya ba'i ye shes kyi mthug par gyur te/ khams gsum pa'i bcings pa thams cad dang bral bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad nyon mongs
92a3(phal chen): pa med pa'i sar ye shes pa sgribs pa med pa mthong ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa thob cing / nyon mongs pa'i bcings pa thams cad shigs par gyur/ sems can thams
92a4(phal chen): cad rloms sems kyi g.yo ba rnam par rmya ba/ thams cad dag par gzhon pa'i phyir/ g.yo ba med pa'i ye shes la yang dag par gzhol zhing g.yo ba dang rlom sem+b+ha
92a5(phal chen): kyis bcings pa thams cad dang bral bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad du chags pa med par gnas shing 'dod pa'i dri ma thams cad dang bral te/ 'dod pa'i bci
92a6(phal chen): pathams cad rnam par snang bar gyur cig/ sems can thams na dro bos pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad la btud pas lhag pa'i bsam pa shin du 'grol bar gyur gyi
92a7(phal chen): sems can thams cad chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthar gdubs pa dag du sems chags pa med pa dang / 'jo' zhing bcing bamed bur gyur ci/
92a8(phal chen): sems can thams cad 'jig rten gyi khams thaMng du 'gro ba thams cad ming du smin par bya ba dang / 'dul ba dang / theg pa chen po lang grong pa'i phyir rnam par rgyu
92b1(phal chen): nang byang chub sems dpa' mngon par shes par 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'dod par gyur cig cer de ltar byang chub sems dpa' bems dpu na
92b2(phal chen): can thams cad brtson du dang / btson+d+ra sa nas bkye bas yang dag par bzung ba'i dge bo'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad shAn tu grol zhing de
92b3(phal chen): babs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyis la gnas par 'gyur ba'i phyir yongs su bkra'o// radi wA yang sems can la la zhing cog dang / bral ba'i phyir
92b4(phal chen): du khrid bya sdug bsngal gyi rnam pa gzhan dang gzhan gyis mi bzad cing 'dor ba cing ba skye'o brgya phrag song gis kun nas bskor cing 'dzam bu'i gling tu gtogs
92b5(phal chen): bai sna tshog sa sa? rba shel zhing dkri pa/ gnyen bshes kyi rgyud dang / mdza' bo ri rgyud thams cad dang bral bar gyur pa/ ral grib gats+tshab cing gshegs pa
92b6(phal chen): gsal shing bsgreng ba la bskyon pa/ lus thams cad kun ni sna klags te me 'bar ba'i nang du dor ba'am/ sdug ba sprul gyi rnam pa mi bde ba thams cad kyis
92b7(phal chen): mi bde bar bya re/ gtso bo sna tshogs thams cad du bskyed pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po su mthong bar gyur nas/ de la byang chub
92b8(phal chen): sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen po de gsang bar bya ba de'i don tu lus yongs su gtong ste/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' mi pham pa dang / rgyal po
93a1(phal chen): khyad par du 'gro bas ji ltar byas pa dang / de ma yin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan rnams kyang sems can
93a2(phal chen): bsnad pa blu ba'i don du lu swA gtong zhing sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba thams cad nyams su len pa de bzhin du gtong ba byed cing di skad du smra'o// khyed kyis maM bde ba
93a3(phal chen): 'di dag bdog la gyis shig/ lus 'di yongs su gtong gis nga'i srog gcod par gyis shig/ ra la ni rtsibs so cog kyang me nyin pa med kyis/ khyed kyis
93a4(phal chen): 'di la ci bya bar 'dod pa de las grangs med pa'i rgyud tu sdug bsngal gyi rnam pas bcos pa thams cad kyis mi bde ba sna tshogs su gyis shig ces te//
93a5(phal chen): 'di ltar bdag gis bsad par dkris mthong yang bdag gi lus dang srog gis mi zla ba ni bdag la tshul dang mi 'dra'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bdag gis ni sem
93a6(phal chen): can thams cad la dmigs te/ 'gro ba thams cad bsrung ba'i phyir thams cad mkhyen bzhid du sems bskyed do snyam nas/ bdag gis lus dang srog yongs su gtang
93a7(phal chen): bsad par bya ba de blus nas dge ba'i rtsa ba de 'di ltar yongs su bsngo'o// sems can thams cad gzhan gyi gtse ba sdug bsngal le bar byung bas/ lus dang srog shin tam
93a8(phal chen): 'phrog par byar cin/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas thams cad las mkhyen pa'i byang chub spobs bcu raM lung bstan pa'i gnas rab tu thob par gyur cig/
93b1(phal chen): can thams cad ngan song thams cad kyi lam las yos su 'das te/ 'jigs pa thams cad las rab tu thar bar gyur cig/ sems cad thams cad 'chi ba med par
93b2(phal chen): ye shes kyi dbyings su zhugs pas/ kha na ma tho ba med pa'i las dge ba thams cad spyod pas ral gris gtsub pa lta bu'i mi bde ba thams cad las 'ad
93b3(phal chen): par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad byang chub kyi shing dam pa'i drung du phyin cing 'jig pa med par bdud kyi sde thams cad rnam par 'thor bas bag tsha dang /
93b4(phal chen): 'jigs shing skrag pa thams cad dang bral bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i chos kyi 'jigs pa med pas drug cing khyu mchog dang seng ge'i nga ro 'byin
93b5(phal chen): pas 'khor gyi 'jigs pa med pa dang / bag tsha ba thams cad dang bral bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad kha na ma tho ba med pa'i las yang dag par spyod cing
93b6(phal chen): 'gro ba thams cad kyi nang na sgribs pa med pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa'i seng dger gyur cig/ sems can thams cad skye bo kun yongs su sbyong ba'i sems dang ldan
93b7(phal chen): zhing 'gro ba kun tu 'jig pa med pa'i khang par gyur cig ces de ltar bsang pa gyur pa dag/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rang gi lus dang srog btang ste
93b8(phal chen): blas nas dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad kyi 'khor ba'i brtson ra'i sdug bsngal kun spangs pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bde ba mi spang ba'i phyir
94a1(phal chen): yongs su bsngo'o// 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la mgo las gtsug phung dang thor bag tu bcas pa bslangs na/ rgyal
94a2(phal chen): po gtsug na rin po che dang / byang chub sems dpa' yan lag dam pa shin tu 'phags pa dang / de ma yin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag gis ji ltar byin pa de bzhin
94a3(phal chen): des slongs pa de dag mthong nas gtong bar mos pa'i tshig dge bas thor pag dang / gtsug pung du chos te/ khyer cig ces bsgobs shing kye chug phyung dang / thor bag tu
94a4(phal chen): bcas longs shig ces nas byang chub sems dpa' 'dzam bu'i gling na btsun pa ma'i dam pa nges pa des yi gcig tu byas te/ yid maM'i khrugs pa dang / yid ma 'dres pa
94a5(phal chen): dang / las gzhan la mi sems pa'i yid dang / 'jig rten las 'phags pa'i yid dang / rab tu zhi ba'i yid dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi yid dang / dag pa'i mi
94a6(phal chen): dang / rnyeng ba'i yid dang / rigs la brtson pa'i yid kyis gtsug bud dang / thor pag tu bcas pa de slong ba la gtong ba'i tshe/ gtsug pud dang / zor bag tu bcas par
94a7(phal chen): mtshon gyis pag ste/ mgo las pab nas bras mo g.yas pa'i lung bral pa ba ste/ rimatho dang bcas pa'i lus kyis po mo bcu'i thal mo sbyar nas 'das pa
94a8(phal chen): mabyon pa dang / de ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byang chub kyi spyod pa rjes su dran pa'i sems bskyed pa dang / dga' bas rnam pa spel ba'i lhas pa'i
94b1(phal chen): padang / chos kyis yongs su rgyam pa'i yad kyi dbang po dang / swAs bsngal cha tshor bas rengs par mi 'gyur ba'i yid kyi dbang po dang dang / dug bsngal ma tshor ba
94b2(phal chen): pa'i mtshan cing dang / tha dad par khod du chung ngu chud pa dang / tshor ba gcig tu nas gcig tu brgyud pa de dag thams cad mi rtag go zhes bya bar rab tu shes pa dang / byang chub
94b3(phal chen): sems dpa' 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i thams cad dang / rgyud kyi tshul gcig tu gyur pa'i gtong ba'i sems dang / sems can thams cad mkhyen
94b4(phal chen): pa nyid du bskyed pa las phyir mi ldog pa'i sems dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa lhag pa'i rnam pas thos pa/ gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa'i dge ba'i shes gnyis
94b5(phal chen): gyis bstan pa'i tshul la gnas te/ gtsug pud dang / thor bag tu bcas pas mgo la phog ste/ yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de 'di ltar yongs su sngo ste/
94b6(phal chen): sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i gtsug gi mchod rten du gyur te/ gtsug tor ltar mi snang bar gyur cis/ sems can thams cad skra shin tu phra ba dang /
94b7(phal chen): nyon mongs pa thams cad rnam par bsal cing sgra rdo rje nag po'i dam pa lta bur gyur cig/ sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i gtsug gi mchod rten du gyur
94b8(phal chen): gtsug tor ltar mi snang bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad skra shin tu phra ba dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad rnam par bsal cing sA rdo rje nag bI dam po
94b9(phal chen): bur gyur ci
95a1(phal chen): / sems can thams cad skra sku gcig skra mtshams legs pa dang skra snyam par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad mgo legs pa las shin tu leg
95a2(phal chen): par skyes pa'i sgra rab tu 'jam pa dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad skra dga' ba khyil ba ltar g.yas phyogs su 'khyil cing / dpal gyi be'u dang dra
95a3(phal chen): shis kyi sgra dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa las rnam par 'das shing / sangs rgyas kyi mtshan dang ldan pa'i sgra thob
95a4(phal chen): par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten 'gro ba thams cad rgyas par rang gi sku las 'od zer rab tu 'gyod par gyur cig/ sems can tham
95a5(phal chen): cad sangs rgyas kyi dbu shin tu rnam par dag pa ltar sgra shin tu mdzes par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sems mnyams shing sangs rgyas kyi dbu skra dang / dbulta bur
95a6(phal chen): mdzes pa dang ldan pa spyi bo la bzhag pa'i mchod rten du 'os pa'i sgra dang / ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi dbu ltar chags pa med kyi
95a7(phal chen): sna mdzes par skyes pas mun pa dang / rdul gyis mi chags pa dang ldan par gyur cig ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gtsug phung dang thor pa gar+b+ha
95a8(phal chen): bcas pa yongs su gtang bas yang dag par bzung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad gyis salta bur shin tu zhi ba'i sems yos su rdzogs par bya
95b1(phal chen): / thams cad rgyas mther ba ma mabs brgya'i mthas gzugs par bya ba ma phyin mongs su bsa'// 'd-i ltar byang chum sems dpa' sem
95b2(phal chen): spyod pa rnams la ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' dga' bar byed pa dang / rgyal po rgyu 'od dang / de ma yin pa'i byang chub sems dab 'a chang ba gnan ngas
95b3(phal chen): pa'i mig yongs su sbyangaso pa'i sems dang / ye shes kyi mig yongasu sbyangs pa'i blo dang / chos snang ba rab tu thob pa'i yid kyi gnas dang / bla na med pa'i
95b4(phal chen): rgyas mngon tu gyur pa'i yid kyi rnam pa dang / mngon par shes pa thams cad kyi mthar pa'i yongs su skyo ba dang / ye shes kyi skye mched la yang dag par gtang
95b5(phal chen): sems dang / rus gsum gyi byang chub sems dpa' dang / mnyam par byas pa'i sbyin pa dang / gtong ba'i sems dang / zhe sdang ba med pa'i mig gis dang /
95b6(phal chen): dngad pa mi zlog pa'i dbrang dang / slong ba rnams la phan 'dogs pa'i sems dang / sangs rgyas kyi spyan la gzhol bas byang chub sems dpa' theg pa chen po da
95b7(phal chen): byams pa dang / snying rje yongs su bsgoms pa dang / dbang po drug shin tu bsnams pas slong ba rnam la mig byin pa de bzhin du de yang mig yongs su gtong
95b8(phal chen): zhing chos de lta bu la zhugs pa'i sems kyis slong ba dang 'dod pa dag la sbyin pa byed cing mchod sbyin gyi don la 'jug pa dang / chos kyi mthu' shin tu bskyed pa
96a1(phal chen): dang / 'jig rten thams cad kyi dga' bar lta ba dang / bag med pa'i sred pa rnam par bzlog par byed pa dang / 'jig rten gyi dga' ba dang / 'dod
96a2(phal chen): pa sna tshogs mthong ba'i rang gi dga' ba khong du chud par byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dga' ba myong bar byed pa dang / ci bsgrubs pa'i dngos pos 'amang
96a3(phal chen): par per byed pa dang / miganyis pa'i smin pa'i rjes su sbyong ba dang / rlom sems med pa'i shin du sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba dang / slong pa rnams kyis dngos pa cing
96a4(phal chen): pa sbyin pa byed pa'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su sngo ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad 'gro ba thams cad kyi mig tu gyur cig/ sems/
96a5(phal chen): nathams cad ye shes kyi mdzod shin tu yangs pas nyams pa med pa'i mig tu gyur cig/ sems can thams cad snang ba mi 'phrogs pa dang ldan par zhing shA
96a6(phal chen): mig rnam par dag pa yongs su grub par gyur cig/ sems ca shi 'pho dang skye bo shes shing lha'i rmig rnam par dag par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad de dam
96a7(phal chen): gas pa'i ye shes kyi rjes su 'dod cing chos tsa mig rab tu thob par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad gtod pa thams cad rnams par bskon pas shes ra
96a8(phal chen): kyi mi ga thob par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad chos thams cad mngotsho par 'tshang rgyas pa'i phyim sangs rgyas kyi spyan dang ldan par gyur cig/ semam canacan
96b1(phal chen): cad chags pa med pa'i mig gi mthar byug ste/ kun tu lA'i mig dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sems can tsarnams mang na
96b2(phal chen): rab rib med pa'i mig dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad skabs bcu mnga' ba'i de bzhin gshegs par byin pas/ stobs pa med pa'i mig
96b3(phal chen): ldan par gyur cig ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mig yongs su gtong ba na/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i tshad kyi mig gi chas sems
96b4(phal chen): thams cad yongs su bsngo ba la nye bar 'god do// // bam po sum cu rtsa bdun pa'o// // 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
96b5(phal chen): po ji ltar rgyal po khyad par du 'gro ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' mdud pa med pa'i spyi gtsug gis yongs su gtang ba bzhin du slong ba nye bar 'ongs pa la byang chu
96b6(phal chen): sems dpa'i spyod pa blangs pa'i sems dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su rigs dang ldan par byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi rigs su 'byung ba'i sbyin pa'i sems dang
96b7(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad rjes su dran pa'i spyod pa la brtson pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu 'thun par skyes pa dang / dbang po dang / ye shes
96b8(phal chen): dang / yon tan gyis shin tu btsun pa dang / khams gsum ma dag cing snying po med pa la snying po rab tu rtog pa dang / sangs rgyas dang chub sems dpa' bal
97a1(phal chen): pa rab tu thob pas rang gi lus la chags pa med pa'i sems dang / gnas med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rjes su dran par gnas pa
97a2(phal chen): dang / dul ba dang zhi ba'i sems dang / dbang po rgyu ba shin tu zhi ba dang / 'gro ba'i mya ngan thams cad nas sems can thams cad 'don par sems pa'i ye
97a3(phal chen): sa 'byung ba'i shes rab dang / bsod nams kyi 'byung gnas dang / rgyung ched du brjod pa rgya mtshos gtong ba'i sems yangs par byas pa dang / don la rnam
97a4(phal chen): par nges pa'i chos dang / mgor po thams cad kyi lam tu 'jug pa dang / chos kyi dbang phyug la ye shes kyis spyod pa dang / rang gi lus snying po myed blangs pa'i
97a5(phal chen): zlos yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/ rna ba dang / sA yongs su gtong bas yang dag par bzung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di ltar yongs su myo si/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dris
97a6(phal chen): sems can thams cad kyi sgra rnams par rig par bya ba la chags pa med pa'i rna ba dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad kyis sgra thams cad skar mi
97a7(phal chen): babazhin du shes par bya ba'i phyir sgribs pa med pa'i rna ba dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi spyan dang ldan pas/ thogs pa med
97a8(phal chen): pa'i rna bdang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad rna ba'i skye mched shin tu snyoms pas rna ba rnam par dag par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad rnam
97b1(phal chen): sa pan pa sgyu na phy-ir bsgrubs pa med du na pa dang ldan par nu na/ mas can pams spya sbyangs rgyu hU~M ga sang khyod du na pa
97b2(phal chen): kyi dbyings la rgan bu'i rna ba dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad bsgribs pa med pa'i chos rnam par rig par bya ba'i phyir nanas
97b3(phal chen): rna ba dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad phyir rgol ba 'jigs par byed pa'i shes pa la mi phyed pa'i rna ba dang ldan par gyur cing / sems can thams cad
97b4(phal chen): ba shin tu dag pa la dbang sgyur bas kun tu 'jug pa'i rna ba da ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi sa na rab tu thob pas bya ba thob pa'i lha'irdza
97b5(phal chen): rab tu thob par gyur cig ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rna ba yongs su btang bas yang dag par bsdus pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can/
97b6(phal chen): thams cad kyi rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngos nas/ sA rnam par dag par yongs su sngo ste/ sems can thams cad legs par mtho ba'i sna dang / dpe
97b7(phal chen): byad bzang po'i sna dang / mtshan bzang po'i sna dang / shin tu yid du 'ong ba'i sna dang / rim gros gzhol ba'i sna dang / mdzes pa 'phags pa'i snang / dgra tham
97b8(phal chen): cad rab tu gdul ba'i sna dang / de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi shangs rab tu thob pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// sems can thams cad ngo la mi sdug pa med
97b9(phal chen): ngo song wAn sdug pa'i sna dang /
98a1(phal chen): pa dang / chos thams cad kyi don dang / chags pa med pa'i ngo dang / blta na sdug pa'i ngo dang / mi 'thun pa med pa'i ngo dang / shin tu rnam par dag
98a2(phal chen): ba'i ngo dang / kha na ma tho ba med pa'i ro dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal gyi dkyil 'khor lta bu'i ngo dang / kun nas blta ba'i ngo dang / yid du 'ong zhing tshad med pa'i ngo
98a3(phal chen): dang ldan par gyur cig ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rna ba dang sna yongs su gtang bas yang dag par bsdus pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems
98a4(phal chen): can thams cad la yongs su bsdu ste/ ci nas kyang sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la shin tu 'jug par 'gyur ba dang / ci nas kyang sems can
98a5(phal chen): thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad shin tu 'dus par 'gyur ba dang / ci nas sems can thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad shin tu shes par 'gyur
98a6(phal chen): ba dang / ci nas kyang sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la shin tu 'jug par gyur pa dang / ci nas kyang sems can thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa
98a7(phal chen): thams cad min tu mthong bar 'gyur ba dang / tsanas kyang sems can thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyis chos kyi sgo khong du chung bar 'gyur ba dang / ci nas kyang sems can/
98a8(phal chen): thams cang shin du zil gyi mnon pa'i yongs su dag pa thob par 'gyur ba dang / tsanas kyang sems can thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyis chos thams khwa snang bar
98b1(phal chen): thob par 'gyur ba dang / ci nas kyang sems can thams ca kyis sangs rgyas gyis zhing thams cad mongs su dag par 'gyur ba dang / seMms kyang semasas natham
98b2(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis rlabs pa'i lus dang ldan par 'gyur ba de la de ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongasu bsngo'o// de lar yang byang chub sem
98b3(phal chen): pa' sems dpa' chen pa smang ba zil gyi mi non pa'i sa la gnas te/ A dum war wAr shin tu dkon par sems dpa'i sems rnams par ngas pa dang / gtong ba
98b4(phal chen): zad cing 'jam klas pa dang / dad cing klung sdug+sa te gtong ba'i sems dang / yongs su gtong ba'i blo mtha' yas pa dang / 'dul ba dang yongs su dul ba'i yid kyang ba
98b5(phal chen): po dang / gtong ba thams cad yongs su gtong ba'i mthar thug pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i smon lam dang / 'gro ba thams cad bde bar byed pa'i gtong ba'i 'bras bu dang
98b6(phal chen): gtong ba chen po dang / shin tu gtong ba dang / rab tu gtong ba dang / mchog tu gtong ba'i sems kyis rang gi lus dang / yan lag dang / gdong gis kyang phan
98b7(phal chen): 'dogs pa dang / mi smod par gtong ba'i sems kyis rnam pa de lta bu'i chos la rab tu gnas te/ ji ltar rgyal po me tog so dang / glang po'i rgyal po'i mche ba drug pa
98b8(phal chen): so ji ltar byin pa de bzhin du rang gi lus dang kha nas so yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste/ sems can thams cad 'gro
99a1(phal chen): ba kun gyis mchod rten du mchod par 'os par gyur te/ mche ba dkar zhing rno ba dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sa
99a2(phal chen): rgyas kyi mtsham rab tu thob pa'i so mnyam ning thags bzang bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la legs par
99a3(phal chen): zhugs shing dul ba'i sems kyis nye bar spyod par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad gdong gi dkyil 'khor lta na sdug cing khA nang dang / so rnam par dag
99a4(phal chen): par gyur cig/ sems can kha dang so dpe mong par rnam par dag cing bzhin dran pa'i rgyan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad so bzang po'i gseb nas
99a5(phal chen): spos zhim po'i mchog grangs med pa'i yid du 'ong ba dga' ba skye ba byung bas yongs su dag cing so bzhi bcu tshang ba dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams
99a6(phal chen): cang shin tu dul ba'i so rab tu thob cing bkra shis dang / dga' bar 'khyil pa dang / pad+ma sna tshogs mdzes par bris pa'i so dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems
99a7(phal chen): can thams cad gdong gi dkyil 'khor nas tshad med pa'i 'od bzer snang ba 'byung bas/ 'od zer bre ba khra ga khrig brgya snong mtha' yas pa rab tu 'byung ba'o
99a8(phal chen): dang ldan par gyur cig cig/ sems can thams cad kha zas la mchags mazhin cing kha zas la mchags nas mtho ba med par spyod pas sbyin pa'i gnas pa'i
99b1(phal chen): mthur thug par gyur te/ sna'i thugs legs shing 'bras nan kha phye ba la bur gyur cig/ sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i dam pa lung ba
99b2(phal chen): cing so'i gsil kun nas 'od 'phro ba kha dog mtha' yas pa'i snang ba 'byung ba dang ldan par gyur cig ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i so'i sbyin pas yang
99b3(phal chen): par bsdus pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can ma lus par thams cad mkhyen pa nying du yang dag par bskyed pa dang / chags pa med pa'i rkyen gyis chos ldam
99b4(phal chen): cad shes pa rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la lce baspangs na/ ji ltar rgyu
99b5(phal chen): bzhin bzangs dang / byang chub sems dpa' phyir mi ldog pa dang / de ma yin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag gyis kyang skyed pa'i skye mched rnam pa sna tsha
99b6(phal chen): dag la gnas shing tshe rabs bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med pa de dag tu yongs su gtang bar gyur pa de bzhin des kyang slong ba de dag rgyal po la 'as hU~M
99b7(phal chen): seng ge'i gdan dag la bkod cing slong ba sa mos pa'i sems kyis yid du 'ong zhing 'dzam pa'i ngagA dang / byams pa'i spyod pa'i sems kyis rang gi /
99b8(phal chen): gtong ba'i tshe/ gshi ba'i sems med pa dang / rma med pa'i sems dang / nyams pa med pa'i sems dang / rigs chen po'i rigs dang ldan pa'i
100a1(phal chen): sems dang / sangs rgyas kyi rigs su byung ba'i sems dang / sangs rgyas kyi rig su byung ba'i sems dang / byang chub kyi sems la dgod cing
100a2(phal chen): gzhag pa'i sems dang / rgyud 'khrugs pa'i semasang ngo / mthu stobs chen po'i shugs kyi sems dang / lus la ma chags pa'i sems dang / tshig tu rjod
100a3(phal chen): pa la chags pa med pa'i sems su byas te/ pus mo'i lha nga sa la btsugs shing bdag kha nas lI phyung ste/ lus thams cad la slong ba dbang du byed du bcug nas
100a4(phal chen): tshig mnyen zhing 'jam pa dang / yid du 'ong ba dang byams par spyod pas tshig pu rjod cing / ci nas kyang khyer dga' zhing yid du 'ong ba dang / mgu zhing rangs par
100a5(phal chen): bdag gi lde long la gang du dgos pa de'i dgos par bsgrubs shig ces nas/ de lce sbyin zhing yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/ lce yongs su gtang bas yang dag par bcu
100a6(phal chen): ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de 'di ltar yongs su ma ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad tshig gi tshul thams cad kyis shes par byed pa'i phyir/ lce shin tu yang
100a7(phal chen): pa dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams car yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin gyi tshig bden pa gnyis su bya ba med pa dang ldan par gyur te gdong gi dkyil 'khor le/
100a8(phal chen): pas lce dang ldan par gyur cig// sems can thams cad sangs rgyas thams cad kyi cho 'phrul dang / rnam par 'phrul pa yangagra par bstan pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyis
100b1(phal chen): thams pa tu khyab pa'i lce dang ldan par gyu m+b+ha/ sems can rnams cadar za ba'an shin tu rnam par dag pa dang man shin tum pa pa' khri nga 'an
100b2(phal chen): cig/ sems can thams cad 'gro ba kun gyi tshogs shes pa the tsom gcod pa'i phyir dem tshig gi dbyangs mtha' yas pa yod pa'i lce dang lngar phyur gyur gyi
100b3(phal chen): nan thams cad lce'i mdzod nas 'ong bar bye ba khrag khrig brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du myed pa 'gyed pa'i phyir snang ba mtha' yas pa byung ba'i le rang ldan par
100b4(phal chen): gyur cig/ sems can thams cad chos thams cad rnam par nges pa'i spobs pa'i tshogs mi zad pas bsten cing / brjod pas tshig shin tu nges pa brjod/
100b5(phal chen): pa'i lce dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad spyod pa kun brjod pa tshad med pa'i mdzod kyi lce dang ldan zhing 'dul ba'i mtha' dang mnyam par sems
100b6(phal chen): can kun gyi tshig thams cad dang / smra ba thams cad rnam por 'brel pa'i lce dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad spyod pa rjes su brjod pa'i tshis
100b7(phal chen): mtsho thams cad la rab tu zhugs pas dbyangs kyi tshogs dang / tshig gi rnam par shes pa'i lce dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad spyod pa thams
100b8(phal chen): cad mngon par brjod pa'i ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thob cing chos thams cad shin ston pa'i lce dang ldan par gyur cig ces de lar byang chub sems dpa' sem
100b9(phal chen): tshig thams car
100b10(phal chen): dpa' chen po thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du dmigs pa'i smon lam la rab tu brtson pa de lce yongs su gtang bas yang dag par bsdus pa'i dge
100b11(phal chen): ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad kyi bsgribs pa med pa'i ye shes tshigs pa med pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// 'di ltar yang
100b12(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad kyi dam pa mgo lta bu'i ye shes la 'jug cing / sems can thams cad yongs su skyebs pa'i mgo byung
100b13(phal chen): chub khong du chud par byed pa dang / chos thams cad kyi mgo mchog tshul gi mgo dang ldan par bya ba'i phyir yang dag par lta ba dang / ye shes rnam par dag pa'i mgo la yang
100b14(phal chen): dag par lta ba dang bsgribs pa med pa'i mgo yos su bsgrub pa dang / sa dam pa'i mgo rjes su lta ba dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi ye shes dam pa mgo lta bu 'dod cing
100b15(phal chen): tshol ba dang / khams gsum pa thams cad kyis ltar med pa ye shes kyi mgo'i dam pa yang dag par sgrub pa dang / phyogs thams cad du phyin pa'i ye shes kyi rgyal po
100b16(phal chen): mgo la mos par byed pa dang / chos thams cad la dbang byed pa zil gyi mi non pa'i mgo yongs su grub pa byed cing de lta bu'i chos lnga spyod par brtson pa'i byang chub
100b17(phal chen): sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi rigs thams cad kyi yongs su gtong ba'i tshul la bslabs pa/ sangs rgyas la mos skyes pa'i dge ze'i rtsa ba rab tu thob pa/
100b18(phal chen): rlung thams sa du thal pa'i lce dang ldan par gyur sh+tsa/ sems canA thams cad razla ba mag shin tu rnam par dag pa dang 'am shin tusgrub pa'i lce dang 'an
100b19(phal chen): cig/ sems can thams cad 'gro ba kun gyi tshogs shes pa the tsom gcod pa na phyir dem tshig gi dbyangs mtha' yas pa yod pa'i lte nga ltur bar gyur ci
100b20(phal chen): na thams cad lce'i mdzod nas 'ong zer bye ba khrag khrig brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa 'gyed pa'i phyir snang ba mtha' yas pa byung ba'i lce dang ldan par
100b21(phal chen): gyur cig/ sems can thams cad chos thams cad rnam par nges pa'i spobs pa'i tshigs mi zad bsra bston cing / brjod pas tshig shin tu nges pa ba
100b22(phal chen): pa'i lce dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad spyod pa kun brjod pa tshad med pa'i mdzod kyi lce dang ldan zhing 'dul ba'i mtha' dang mnyam par sem
100b23(phal chen): can kun gyi tshig thams cad dang / smra ba thams cad rnam por 'brel pa'i lce dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad spyod pa rjes su brjod pa'i tshig
100b24(phal chen): mtsho thams cad la rab tu zhugs pas dbyangs kyi tshogs dang / tshig gi rnam par shes pa'i lce dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad spyod pa thams
100b25(phal chen): cad mngon par brjod pa'i ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thob cing chos thams cad shin ston pa'i lce dang ldan par gyur cig ces de lar byang chub sems dpa' sem
100b26(phal chen): thams drang
101a1(phal chen): dpa' chen po thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du dmigs pa'i smon lam la rab tu brtson pa de lce yongs su gtang bas yang dag par bsdus pa'i dge
101a2(phal chen): ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad kyi bsgribs pa med pa'i ye shes tshigs pa med pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// 'di ltar yang
101a3(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad kyi dam pa mgo lta bu'i ye shes la 'jug cing / sems can thams cad yongs su skyebs pa'i mgo byang
101a4(phal chen): chub khong du chud par byed pa dang / chos thams cad kyi mgo mchog tshul gi mgo dang ldan par bya ba'i phyir yang dag par lta ba dang / ye shes rnam par dag pa'i mgo la yang
101a5(phal chen): dag par lta ba dang bsgribs pa med pa'i mgo yos su bsgrub pa dang / sa dam pa'i mgo rjes su lta ba dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi ye shes dam pa mgo lta bu 'dod cing
