101a7(phal chen): mgol mos par byed pa dang / chos thams cad la dbang byed pa zil gyi mi non pa'i mgo yongs su grub pa byed cing de lta bu'i chos la spyod par brtson pa'i byang chub
101a8(phal chen): sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi rigs thams cad gyi yongs su gtong ba'i tshul la bslabs pa/ sangs rgyas la mos skyes pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rab tu thob pa/
101b1(phal chen): slong ba mtha' yas pas dga' bas yongs su rgyas pa'i sems dang ldan pa yid kying brda bzhin dugs lapa/ rgyud rab tu dang zhing sems dang mA
101b2(phal chen): dang ba sangs rgyas kyi chos la dga' ba'i snang ba thob pa/ byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa shin tu rgya che ba/ rgyun mi 'chang ba sems pa/ gtong ba chen po shin tu
101b3(phal chen): bas/ gtong ba'i yid dang ldan pa/ dbang po shin tu dga' bas nye bar brtan po'i chos can lhag pa'i bsam pa yangs shing dge la rgya che bas sbyin pa gtong bar
101b4(phal chen): mngon par 'dod pa de ltar byang chub sems dpa' ye shes mchog dang skyes bu dam pa ka shi'i rgyal po dang / de ma yin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
101b5(phal chen): po gzhan grangs med pa dag kyang mgo yongs su gtong bar gyur pa de ltar mgo ba'i tshe/ mgo yongs su btang bas yang dag par sdud pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'a
101b6(phal chen): ltar sems can thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyi dbu rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// spyi gtsug ltar mi snang ba dang / skye mched kyis mnon pa dang / zhing thams
101b7(phal chen): cad du mngon par 'gas pa dang / bum pa rgyas pa dang / dga' ba 'byol ba dang / sA dang mgo'i 'od dang / 'od zer sna tshogs kyis rnam par brgyan pa dang / 'jig rten thams
101b8(phal chen): cad rmang du byung ba dang / dpal gyi be'u brgyan pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi dbu ldan pa dang / ye shes kyi mgo rtogs par bya ba dang / 'grob thams cad kyi mchog tu phyin pa'i mgod
102a1(phal chen): ldan pa dang / mgo rnam par dag pa dang / ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyi mgo yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yong su bsngo ste/ de lar byang chub
102a2(phal chen): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mgo yongs su gtong ba'i rgyu/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar 'gro ba thams cad kyis mgo yongs su rdzogs pa dang / ye shes ldan
102a3(phal chen): lag dam pa rab tu thob pa bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen za slong ba rnams la dang pa'i yan lag pa thog mar 'tsho ba sa
102a4(phal chen): phan 'dogs pa'i tshul dang / chos spyod pal brtson par 'gro zhing ldog pa dang / rin po che'i lag thog mar 'gro bas lag pa gtong ba dang / srong ba don yang bar byung
102a5(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i lam la spyod pa dang / lag pa shin tu bkyang zhing gtong ba'i sems ma 'khrugs pa dang / rims par spyad pa'i tshul shin tu nges pa dang / byang chub se
102a6(phal chen): dpa' seng ge'i rdul gyis spyod cing lag pa yangs pa gtong ba la mos pas lag pa yongs su gtong ba dang / tshul gyi gni chen po rab tu yongs su brtan pa la spyod pa'i
102a7(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i yid mo'am/ tshor bas ma yin par 'gro ba las phyir ldog pa'i 'gro bas byang chub tu 'byung bas/ de 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnam
102a8(phal chen): brtson pa dang / rgyal po dga' ldam dang / de ma yin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnan chad med pa rag kyang sde ba'i spyi gnas sna chags das na bam
102b1(phal chen): shing lag pa yong su gtong bas gyur pa de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems yangs shing rgya che ba tshad med pa dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas rgya mtsho mthong bar gyur pa
102b2(phal chen): chos kyi rgyud kyi sgo rnam par phye ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du khyab par gtong ba'i lag pa dang ldan pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i byang chub yan dag par 'dzin
102b3(phal chen): ba'i smon lam can/ sems can bskyed pa rdul med pa dang 'grogs pas kun nas bskor ba med pa'i ye shes dang / chos kyi lus rgyun mi 'chad pa/ mi
102b4(phal chen): shig pa mi chod pa'i lus dang ldan pa/ bdud kyi las thams cad kyis mi skul ba/ dge ba'i shes gnyem gyis nye bar brtan pas sems spel ba/ byang
102b5(phal chen): chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis spyad pa dang / gcig tu gyur pa'i btong bas byung ba de slob pa la rkang lag gi sbyin pa ci yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/ dge ba'i
102b6(phal chen): rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad la 'di ltar yongs su sngo ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du dmigs te rkang lag yongs su btang ba yongs su byin pa
102b7(phal chen): 'di la dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di la dge ba'i rtsa ba ni yod pa de dgra 'di ltar sems can thams cad la yongs smra ba sngo'o// dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can
102b8(phal chen): thams cad rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa thob cing rin po che'i lag pa nges sems can thams cad la sbyin pa'i gnas kyi 'du shes rab tu thob ste/ phan tshun gyis lus
103a1(phal chen): lus la rin po ches 'thor bar gyur cig/ mngon par 'thor par gyur cig/ rab tu 'thor bar gyur cig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams
103a2(phal chen): du khyab pa'i rin po che'i rgyan gyi sprin gyis sangs rgyas thams cad mchod par gyur cig/ sems can de dag thams cad kyang pan rgyun du ni snang ba med pa
103a3(phal chen): sems dang ldan zhing phan tshun du byams pa'i sems dang ldan par gyur cig/ de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rjes su dong zhing 'jigs pa med pa
103a4(phal chen): la banas te/ mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i phyir thams cad lag na rin po thogs pa dang / lag na spos thogs pa dang / lag na gos thogs pa dang / la
103a5(phal chen): na gdugs thogs pa dang / lag na 'phreng ba thogs pa dang / lag na me tog thogs pa dang / lag na phye ma thogs pa dang / lag na lwa ba lbu ba thogs pa dang /
103a6(phal chen): lag gos thogs pa dang / lag na gdugs thogs pa dang / lag myur phreng ba thogs pa dang / lag+ha na me tog thogs pa dang / lag nA bye ma thogs pa dang /
103a7(phal chen): kha ba na lwa ba lbu ba zogs pa dang / lag na me tog mtha' yas par thogs par gyur te/ kun nas sgo dang ldan pa'i thabs la gnas shing / sangs rgyas tham
103a8(phal chen): cad la mchod par brtson pa'i sems dang / sangs rgyas kyi ning kun tu 'gro ba'i rdzu 'phrul dang / sangs rgyas kyi nang thams du thogs pa med pa
103b1(phal chen): lhag pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad yang dag par 'dzin pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang / rdzu 'phrul tsha lag pa mtshan bzang po dang dang ldan pa'i lag
103b2(phal chen): 'od zer gyi mdzod mtha' yas pa'i dkyil 'khor rab tu gtong ba'i lag pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad lag mthil gcig gis g.yos par byed pa'i
103b3(phal chen): pa dang / phra bar 'brel cing sem mo zangs ltar 'dug pa'i lag pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi phyag shin tu yangs pa dang ldan pas/ sangs rgyas thams cad la
103b4(phal chen): mchod par byed par gyur cig ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yom tan rgya mtsho thams cad la rab tu zhugs pa'i sems bskyed//
103b5(phal chen): pa dang / khas len pa'i tshul dang / slong ba thams cad la mngon par mos shing 'dod pas dga' ba dang / spro ba dang / dad pa chen po rab tu thob pa/
103b6(phal chen): dang / spong ba 'bod par bston pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rgya mtsho thams cad kyi rjes su zhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i dge ba'i rtsab than
103b7(phal chen): nga dang / rgyud kyi tshul gcig tu gyur pas rkang lag yongs su btong ba byed cing 'gro ba thams cad kyi byang chub tshol ba'i tshe/ rkang lag yongs su
103b8(phal chen): btang bas yang dag par bsdus pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar thams cad gtong ba'i don du yongs su bsngo'o// 'di ltar yang byang chub sem
104a1(phal chen): dam na nga ma rgya pa myu
104a2(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la mngon par drad pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ tshor bas dengs par mi 'gyur ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ byang chub ma /
104a3(phal chen): thams cad kyi gzong bas sbyin par bya ba'i rjes sa bskyang ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i sbyin pa rgya chen pos btang btu du bshinatu
104a4(phal chen): gtod pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ phyir m+b+ha ldog pa'i sems rgyan ma'i na pad ldan pa/ bdag gis rgyas lnga phangs par mal ba'i sems dang
104a5(phal chen): gyu byung chub sems dang 'tshas pa 'byung gnas dang / rnal ze med bde bar sems padang / dem yin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dum/
104a6(phal chen): dpa' rin po gnyur bsgra myang pa dag kyang sgra ba'i spya ga nas de dang / de dag la ldan pa shed ldan yongs su mthong bar gyur 'drug rlung ba rnams 'a
104a7(phal chen): hUM g+sa kyi thugs dang ba'om/ zhan yongs su byang rabs yang dag par byas pa'i jig pa'i rtsa ba 'dis sem ldan thas ze'i tsho ba dang me
104a8(phal chen): ldam ning byang chub sems dpa' khrus bran sum tshogs pa dang ldan par gyur tshol/ semasan n+ya rnams cu dz+nyA rje'i tshang po dang 'dra ba bar ngan srung ga lus
104a9(phal chen): ma pa'i mi ma
104b1(phal chen): ldan par gyur ga// sems rgyun thams cad ldas nyams pa myed cing dag bstan te/ ldus la rgyu med par gyur cig/ sems ban+d+ha thams ca 'a
104b2(phal chen): kun d+his mAM 'phrogs pa'i sems dang ldan zhing sbru lA lta bu'i lus dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'od dang ba'i lus 'ams pa ma
104b3(phal chen): ldan zhing yid du 'ong ba'i lus dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mi gnas pa ldan zhing chos kyi dbyings su ma
104b4(phal chen): par skyes pa'i lus dang ldan par gyur cig// sems can thams cad gzhan thams cad la rim gro byed pa'i lus dang ldan zhing rin po che lta bu'i 'od yod pa'i lun
104b5(phal chen): dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'chi ba med pa'i dbyings su chos kyi spyod pa la sbyar ba'i lus dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams ca
104b6(phal chen): 'gro ba kun gyis lta mngon yod par skyes pas/ rin po che rgya mtsho lta bu'i lus dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'jig rten kun gyi gtse ba
104b7(phal chen): gos pa med cing bar snang gi rang bzhin gyi lus dang ldan par gyur cig ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rang gi lus la khrag gi sbyin pa
104b8(phal chen): byed pa de'i tshe/ ye shes kyi theg pa dang theg pa chen po lus la rab tu gzhol ba'i sems kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba de yongs su bapa'o// dag pa'i yid kyis
104b9(phal chen): lA na zhing
105a1(phal chen): sna bathA/ sa pan / sa stsa/
105a2(phal chen): yongs su bsnga'o// spros pa'i yid kyis yongs su bsngo'o// zhum pa med pa'i yid kyis yongs su bsdu'o// bde ba'i yid kyis yongs su bsa'o//
105a3(phal chen): dad pa'i yid kyis yongs su bsngo'o// mgu ba'i yid dang / rab tu mgu ba'i yid dang / yid bde zhing rangs pa skyes pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de yongasu bas
105a4(phal chen): 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gtong ba'i sems panal du med pa'i dga' bas rnam par 'phel ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'
105a5(phal chen): dang / mkhas pa'i sbyin pa'i zla med pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / lag pa'i bsam pa dam pa 'jig rten gyi drim bsal ba dang / snang ba thams cad kyis nang
105a6(phal chen): par mi nus pa'i nang gi lus nye bar blangs pa'i yongs su gtong ba dang / yon tan rin po ches yang dag par blangs pa'i dge ba 'byam klas pa dang / byang
105a7(phal chen): chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi yid dam gyis nye bur blangs pa'i sbyin pa'i tshogs chen po dang / spong ba thams cad kyi yid kyis 'dod par bsams
105a8(phal chen): btang yang 'byung bzeng che sems dang / sbyin pa zhing mags pa' dzes tham shin tu bdag sa pa'i las kyi rnam par smin pa'i chen dang / len/
105b1(phal chen): rnams la sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i sems nyams pa med pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad mngon du gyur pa lta bu'i 'du shes su mngon par 'dzin
105b2(phal chen): dang / 'gro ba thams cad la mngon du gyur pa'i sems can thams cad rnam par dag pa la gnas pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad mngon
105b3(phal chen): gyur ba'i sangs rgyas kyi ming gi rgyan thams cad dang / 'gro ba thams cad la mngon du gyur ba'i snying rje chen pos yongs su slob pa dang / ngas rgya
105b4(phal chen): tsang kyi byang chub la mngon tu gyur pa'i stobs ban+d+ha rnam pa dpyong ba dang / 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa'
105b5(phal chen): cad mngon du gyur pa'i dge bo'i rtsa ba 'thun par yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / ma 'jigs pa thams cad mngon du gyur ba'i skyematshan dang / zung
105b6(phal chen): bsngags pa dang / rus gsum mngon du gyur pa'i dus thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / dus gsum thams cad mngon du gyur pa'i dri ma'i mthun
105b7(phal chen): bskal par thug par zhe non pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam dang / yongs su yi 'chad pa med pa'i mngon tu gyur pa'i sems bskyed pa grangs med
105b8(phal chen): de 'i lar byang chub sems dpa'i phan pa tshol ba dang / de ma yin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan grangs med pa ga kyang skye
106a1(phal chen): / sna tshogs dgan gnas shing / sha dang rkang yongs su gtong ba de ltar spong ba rnams la/ lus las sha dang nang yongs su gtong ba ma/
106a2(phal chen): rkang yongs su gtong bas yang dag par bsdus pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad la 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di sems
106a3(phal chen): can thams cad rdo rje snying po ltar mkhregs pa'i yan lag dang ldan zhing mi shigs pa'i lus dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad gseb med pa'i
106a4(phal chen): lus rab tu thob pas/ gsog ma yin pa'i lus dang ldan par 'gyur cig/ sems can thams cad yid kyi rang bzhin gyi lus rnam par dag pa dang ldan ning /
106a5(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyis brgyan pa'i lus dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis lus shin tu grub par bsod nams rgyas
106a6(phal chen): mtshan gyi lus dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems ca thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcub mi dang cing mnyams bzhin te// dpe byang ba
106a7(phal chen): po brgya cus rnam par rmis pa'i lus dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad de bzhin ni shegs pa'i sku rab tu thob pas/ mtha' las 'dasas
106b1(phal chen): tshad med pa'i lus dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad bdud thams cad kyi dkrugs mthag rab tu 'joms pas kun tu khyab pa'i thung la
106b2(phal chen): ldan zhing thug pa med pa'i lus dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams
106b3(phal chen): dang lus gcig par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad na mkha'i dbyings kun tu chos kyi skus khyab par byed pa'i phyir chags pa med pa'i lus mngon par gyur
106b4(phal chen): par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'gro ba thams cad shong ba'i lus dang ldan ning byang chub kyi lus dam pa dang ldan par gyur cig ces de ltar byang chub
106b5(phal chen): dbya' sems dpa' chen po thams cad mkhyen par dmigs pa'i sems dang ldan pa slong ba la sha dang rkang yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag
106b6(phal chen): sems can thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyi sku mtha' las 'das pa tshad med pa rnam par dag par rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o//
106b7(phal chen): 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i rgyud la bslabs pa'i sems rang ldan pas sbyin pa thams cad sbyin pas
107a1(phal chen): stod pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ ston pa'i pha rol tu thun pa chen po thob pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ pha rol tu phyin
107a2(phal chen): pa'i sbyin pa 'grub pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi byin pa'i rjes su bslabs pa'i sems dang ldan pa
107a3(phal chen): sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba thams cad kyis zang za shes pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ snyim pa'i gnas thams cad la shim tu gnas pa'i ma
107a4(phal chen): dI ldan pa/ zung chub zlas dpa' rnams cad kyi ston pa las la rab tu gamam pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas thamams
107a5(phal chen): 'di la bya bas mngon tu b+hu ba'i gdong ba'i sems dang lda / spong ba thams cad d+hA ma 'chad par rgyu ba rab tu mchod pa'i sems
107a6(phal chen): ldan pa/ de ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' yongs su skyob pa med pa dang / rgyal po g.yo ba med pa dang / de ma yin pa'i byang chub
107a7(phal chen): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan grangs med pa dag gis kyang snying yongs su btang bar gyur pa de ltar spong ba kun nas 'ongs pa rnams
107b1(phal chen): kyis bslangs shing rang gi lus las sring yongs su gtang zhing sbyin pa byed pa dang / srong ba dang / thob par byed pa dang / ldan
107b2(phal chen): pa'i bsam pa rnam par spyod pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad rab tu 'grol ba'i phyir stobs bcu'i byang chub la dmigs par byed pa dang /
107b3(phal chen): lam chen pos nan tan byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa la yang dag par gnas pa dang / sngon lam yongs su ma gtong ba dang /
107b4(phal chen): pa byed pa'i tshe dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad la 'di ltar yongs sra bsngo ste/ sems can thams cad rdo rje'i rang bzhin lta bus yo/
107b5(phal chen): su bzung ba'i sring dpal gyi be'u sa brgyan pa dang / ldan zhing rdo rje'i ri 'khor yug thams cad ltar mi shigs shing rdo rje'i snying po la ba'i snying dang /
107b6(phal chen): ldan pa dang bag tsha ba med pa'i snying dang / thub par dka' ba'i snying dang / 'jig rten thams cad kyis mi phrogs pa'i snying dang / dpa' ba'i rnal man
107b7(phal chen): ye shes kyi snying po can gyi snying dang / mthu bo che chen po dam pa'i mtshun gyi snying dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi gtso bo lta bur mi 'phrogs pa'i snying dang / mthu
108a1(phal chen): bo chen ltar mi shigs pa'i snying po can gyis sing dang / bdud kyi las dang / bdud kyi dpung dang / bdud rtsi ste rnams par 'jom pa'i snying dang / brtan
108a2(phal chen): snying dang / gzeng mtho ba'i snying dang / dpa' ba'i snying dang / rtul phod pa'i slong dang / mi 'jigs ming dngas skrag par mi'i gyur ba'i snying dang / rdo rje'i go mchen
108a3(phal chen): yang dag par bgos pa'i snying dang / shin tu btsun pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sring dang / byang chub spangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su rdzogs pas byang chub snang bar
108a4(phal chen): gyur pa'i snying dang / byang chub kyi shing drung du 'dub nas sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rjes su rtogs shing rmongs pa med par thams cad mkhyen po nyid mngon par
108a5(phal chen): 'tshang rgya ba'i snying dang / stobs bcu mngon par byang chub tu thob pa'i snying dang ldan par gyur cig ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying gis
108a6(phal chen): sbyin pas yang dag par bzung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad 'gro ba thams cad kyis gos med pa'i spobs bcu mnga' ba'i thugs pun su mcho
108a7(phal chen): baM yongs su rdzogs pa dang ldan par yongs su bsngo'o// 'di lar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' rkyen ze snang ba mngon par dad par byed pa'i ltab
108a8(phal chen): dang / gsal tsang dga' bar byed pa'i dmigs pa dang / byang chub dang mosam par bya ba'i byams pa dang / ci 'dod pas stong baphra drang bya ba'i sbyin pa dang rgyan
108b1(phal chen): mchud par yid la byed pa'i gtong ba dang / lus la snying po med par rtogs pas snying po blang ba'i sems dang / na bar 'gyur ba'i lus rjes su rnan pa mang
108b2(phal chen): la byed pa dang / srung gi dang / wA dang / khyis bza' bar 'gyur ba'i lus su rab tu rdzogs pa dang gzhan la rag lus shing lus ma rtags par yod la byed
108b3(phal chen): dang / lus kyi rgyus thams cad khong du chud pa dang gzhan la dang po'i sems dang / de lta bu'i chos de dag yid la bya ba la brtson pa de ji ltar byang chub sems
108b4(phal chen): dpa' legs par byin pa dang / rgyal po'i sdig pa gsal ba dang / de ma yin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan grangs med pa dag rga
108b5(phal chen): kyang skyong ba rnams la rgyu m+bu dang / mchin pa dang / mkhal ma dang / glo ba yongs su btang byar gyur pa de ltar rgyu mA dang / mchin pa dang / mkhal ma dang
108b6(phal chen): glo ba yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' spong ba de dag la mi 'gebs pa'i mig lta zhing 'di ltar sems bskyed de/ 'di ltar bdag gis lus
108b7(phal chen): ma rten cing 'di ltar mi gtsang na 'on kyang rgyu ma dang / 'chin pa dang / mkhal ma dang / glo ba lta bu dag kyang sbyong ba dag la dgos po ltar sbyin par bya'o zhes de lta bur
108b8(phal chen): yid la byed cing dga' ba'i rgyu dang / de ltar chos cid shes pa'i bsam pa dang / phreng ba mthong ba dgi ba'i gshes bzhin du 'du shes ze byin pa'i
109a1(phal chen): / rlabs kyis lus snying po med pa de las snying po blang bar 'dod de/ de lta bur yid la byed cing rab tu rtog pa dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ rgyu ma dang /
109a2(phal chen): mtshan pa dang / mkhal ma dang / glo ba de dag yongs gtor ba'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad la 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste/ ts+tsho ma dang /
109a3(phal chen): mchin pa dang / mkhal mA dang / glo ba yongs su btang bas yang dag par smras pa'i dge ba 'dis sems can thams cad ye shes kyi snying po'i lus dang ldan
109a4(phal chen): zhing / lus kyis phyi nang shin tu gtsang zhing dag par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad mkhyen pa'i smon lam yang dag par 'dzin pa'i phyir ye shes kyi lto
109a5(phal chen): yang dag par ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad nang smos zhim po'i mchog thams cad dang / ldan zhing phyi rol tu 'od zer rab tu 'gyod pas bldan bzang
109a6(phal chen): lus dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad rim gyis gzhol zhing mnyam pa'i lus kyi yan lag da ldan te/ gnul bu'i glu dang ldan pa'o lums
109a7(phal chen): gyur cig/ sems can thams sangs rgyas kyi chos tshe dga' bas lus shin tu bskyed pas lus chos tsha bas/ ye shes kyi gas par gyur / rnams can rnam
109a8(phal chen): dga' mas pa kyilam kyis yang ngan par byung bas me shes pa'i lus dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams thangs ma mang dam
109b1(phal chen): rig pa dang ldan pas gzungs kyi snang bas lus kyis nung rnam par dag par gyur cipa/ sems can thams cad nang kyi bsam pa'i skur shAn du sbyangs pas man
109b2(phal chen): dag pa dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams ye shes kyis ngoms par byed pa'i chos kyi sprin gyi rnar rab tu 'bebs pas de ban ni gshegs pa'i sku dang /
109b3(phal chen): kyi rnal 'byor khong du chud par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad phyi rol gyi lus 'gro ba thams cad la ye shes kyi rgyal mtshan mdzes shing snang bar gyur pas/ ma
109b4(phal chen): lus dag cing zhi bar gyur cig ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyu ma dang / mchin pa dang / glo bA de dag rang gyi lus la yongs su gtong ba'i
109b5(phal chen): dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad kyi lus phyi nang yongs su dag cing bsgribs pa med pa'i ye shes la rab tu dgod pa thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su
109b6(phal chen): bsngo'o// 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi'i byang gnas dang / rgyal po'i bskur ma
109b7(phal chen): 'od dang / de ma yin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnan gyis kyang yan lag dang / nying lag dang / rus pa spong ba rnams la yongs su garjo
109b8(phal chen): bar gyur pa de ltar yan lag dang / nying lag dang / rus pa bslangs na spong ba rnams la gtong ba'i tshe/ spong ba mthong ma theg tu sems dga' ba che/ spongs
110a1(phal chen): mthong mthag tu sems dga' ba dang / sems mos pa dang / sems dang bdang / sems rab tu sto ba dang / sems mthar pa dang / b+h+yaH
110a2(phal chen): pa'i sems dang / chags pa med pa'i sems dang / dga' ba'i sems dang / slong ba rnams la rim gro bya ba'i sems rab tu 'thob ste/ de yan lag dang
110a3(phal chen): nying lag dang / rus pa de dag bslangs pas spong ba la yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa bde dgas pas can thams cad la 'di ltar yangs sa pan / 2
110a4(phal chen): gi lus kyi yan lag dang / cing lag dang / rus pa yongs su btang bas yang dag par smras pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad rus pa dang / sha
110a5(phal chen): khrag med par lus dang zhing sprul ba lta bu lus can du gyur cig/ sems can thams cad khros la thub pa med cing zil gyis non pas/ rdo rje lta ba'i snong
110a6(phal chen): kyi lus dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams chags pa med cing rol ba med pa dang bcings pa med pa'i ye shes kyi lus 'byung ste/ thams cad mkhyen/
110a7(phal chen): pa'i sgrub ska dang / ma pa lan pa las bla ma ma sa pa b+hU rgyun thams bang ba than pa d+mas ma par ba smras /
110a8(phal chen): kyi lus dang lda par gyur cig/ mas can thams ca nas kyi kyis dang / dbang mi rol phyin pathob chom mtsha ma
110b1(phal chen): par gyur cig/ sems can thams cung wAm shig shig pa med pas yan lag shin tu brtan pa'i lus dang ldan par zlar hA/ ma
110b2(phal chen): cad 'gro ba kun yongs su smin par byed cing 'dul bzhugs pas 'gro ba thams cad ji ltar mos pa'i lus dang yan lag gi byin gyis rlabs pa/
110b3(phal chen): ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad mthu bo che'i yan lag dang nying lag yang dag par zin pas stobs chen po dang / ldan zhing ye she
110b4(phal chen): la gnas pa'i lus dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad chad cing dub pa med pa'i lus rab tu thob pas lus shin du brten par lus kyi rgyung
110b5(phal chen): 'brel ba dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad mthu dang brtson 'grus chen po dang ldan pa'i lus kyis shin tu brtan zhing stobs dang ldan par gyur cig/ sr-i
110b6(phal chen): can thams cad mtha' yas pa'i ye shes kyis khyu mchog gi mthu 'byin pa'i lus dang ldan zhing chos kyi lus kyis 'gro ba thams cad rnam par brgyan pa'i lus
110b7(phal chen): ldan pa rang gyur cig/ sems can thams cad kha na ma tho ba med cing blta na don yod pa dang ldan te/ bsod nams kyi stobs kyi lus dang ldan par gyur
110b8(phal chen): cig/ sems can thams cad gnas med pa'i ye shes kyi mthar thug ste/ gnas pa'i lus dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas
111a1(phal chen): thams cad kyis bsams pa byin gyis rlabs pa dang ldan zhing sangs rgyas kyis yongs su bzung ba'i lus dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems
111a2(phal chen): can thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam gyi rjes su song bas 'gro ba thams cad la bar 'dogs pa'i lus dang ldan par gyur gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs
111a3(phal chen): kyi chos thams cad la phyir phyogs pa med cing mngon par lta ba'i snang bas sgo kun nas blta ba'i lus dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad thams cad mkhyen
111a4(phal chen): pa'i theg pa la spyod pa mthar byin par bya ba la brtson pas brtsona'i grus dang ldan pa'i lus phun snam tshogs par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad mi shes ba
111a5(phal chen): par gnas pas thob pasang rgyal dang / nom pa dang / dwags can d+hAn 'chad cing rnam par dag pa'i lus dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad mkhyen pa'i ste/
111a6(phal chen): pa la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du las grub par gyur cis/ mams can thams cad 'jig rten du skyes pa'i lus thams cad las rnam par 'das mdo// de banas
111a7(phal chen): pa'i dge ba'i byung ba'i lus su gyur cig ces ldan byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yan lag dang / 'di lag lag dang / rus pa de dag dge sang
111a8(phal chen): rnams la yongs su gtong ba'o ma/ dge ba'ortsa bde dag sems can thams cad kyis thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes zab par za ba dang / na tu rnam par
111a9(phal chen): bar gyur pas brtul zhugs dam pa'i lus dang
111b1(phal chen): pa'i phyir yongs su bsa'o// 'di lar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rang gi lus las spong ba dag gis mgo dang ldan pa'i pags pa ba
111b2(phal chen): pa'i tshe/ mtshon cha thogs pa'i slong ba mthong yang dga' bar byed pa'i dbang pos slob pa la blta zhing / spong ba rnams la drin du gzo ba'i 'du shes nye bar bzhag nas
111b3(phal chen): legs par gting ba'i bsan la slong ba rnams la bkod de/ slong ba rnams la rim gro'i 'du shes nye bar 'jog pa dang / len pa rnams shin du dkon pa'i
111b4(phal chen): 'du shes yang dag par bskyed pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i gzhir gyur pa smon lam par bya ba yang dag par mthong bar sems shing slong ba rnams la phana'o/
111b5(phal chen): pa'i sems kyis rtog cig 'dzum pa dang ldan par lta bas/ slong ba rnams la lta zhing tshur sheg long shig ces bya ba'i tshig brjod pa dang / spong ba rnams bdag
111b6(phal chen): nyid mi dga' bar bya bar gtong ba de ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' dga' ba'i snying po dang ri dgas kyi rgyal po gser gyi rtsi ba logs su ltar mdog dang ldan pa'i
111b7(phal chen): 'phags pa slong ba rnams la yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad la 'di ltar yongs su so ste/ sems can thams cad de bzhin
111b8(phal chen): gshegs pa'i yon tan gyis ma ngoms shing rnam par dag pas shin tu 'jam pa'i mdog dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad rdo rje'i mdog thub par das
112a1(phal chen): ba'i kha dog dang ldan zhing ma 'dres pa'i kha dog dog dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'dzam bu'i chu klung gser gyi snying po ltar dag cing
112a2(phal chen): gser gyi mdog dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams blasam pa ji lta ba bzhin du kha dog rnam par spangs pas dag cing 'dog mtha' yas pa'i mdog dang ldan
112a3(phal chen): par gyur cig/ semasems can thams cad bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du kha dog rnam par spangs pa'i dag cing kha rog mtha' yas pa'i mdog dang ldan par gyur/
112a4(phal chen): sems can thams cad dge sbyong de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu gnon pa'i kham gis rnam par dag cing rlog pa med cing dad pa'i 'dog dang / mdog gi mtshan da
112a5(phal chen): par gyur cig/ sems can thams na du rang bzhin ma dog rnam par dgatsang 'a ga dang mngag ni dab pa dang ldan par gyur tsag/ sems can thams ca
112a6(phal chen): dang dpo byad bzang pos rnam par bris shing sangs rgyas kyi kha dog rnam par dag pas mdog dang n-i/ kha dog shin tu rnam par dag par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad/
112a7(phal chen): ga dang mngag pazang ba zan sum tshogs shing / 'tha ba ban tu mdzog rkang b.rab tu 'bring bar gyur na/ sems can thams cad 'dzin natshwa khams thams
112a8(phal chen): ma ma
112b1(phal chen): gzugs thams cad kyi kha dog rnam par dag ste/ mdog dang kha dog shir tu snum pa dang ldan par gyur ces de lar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen za'ang
112b2(phal chen): lus las mdog dang ldan pa'i pags pa slong ba rnams la yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag par 'gyur
112b3(phal chen): dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa'i phyir yongs su bapo'o// 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po se
112b4(phal chen): la phyin ci log med pa bzhin 'dzum pa/ yid bde ba thob pa/ theg pa chen po la legs par gnas pa/ grangs med pa'i spyir pa can/ sring theg pa nas sbyin pa la
112b5(phal chen): gnas pa gtong ba dang / gtong ba chen po la yid rab tu zhugs pas/ 'jungs pa'i dri ma la mi gnas pa'i sems dang ldan pa phra dog dang 'dungs pa'i dri ma dang
112b6(phal chen): bral ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung la rab tu zhugs pa de ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' lta ba'i brtson 'grus dang 'dzam bu'i gling gi bdag po bzhe
112b7(phal chen): gyi 'od dang / de ma yin pa dang / ci bslangs pa'i dngos po gtang bas/ de ma yin pa byang chub sems dpa' tshad med pa gzhan dag gis kyang sor mo rnam
113a1(phal chen): yongs su btang bar gyur pa lar snang ba rkang lagan sar ma yongs su gtong ba'i / dge pa'i rtsa bded ga sems can thams cad la
113a2(phal chen): ltar bsngo ste/ sor mo byin pa dang / ni bslad pa'i dngos po gtang bas yang dag par bsdus pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad sangs rgyan
113a3(phal chen): kyi phyag sor thob par gyur te/ sor mo ring bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sor me rim gyis gzhol bar legs par grub pas sor mo zlum pa
113a4(phal chen): dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can+da thams cad sor mo rnam par dag pa da ldan ni de sen mo zangs kyi kha dog lta bu'i sor mo dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems
113a5(phal chen): can thams cad chos thams cad 'dzin par brtson pa'i ser mo dpe byad bzang po dang ldar nor skyes bu dpa' bo thams cad mkhyen pa'i ser mo dang ldan
113a6(phal chen): gyur cig/ sems can thams cadu skabs bcu'i phrag por dang ldan par gyur te/ dpe byang bzang pos grub pa'i ser ma dang ldan par gyur cig/
113a7(phal chen): thams cad shin tu sbyangs pa'i sor mo tshul dang 'thun par skyes pas/ sor mo'i dam pa dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad par mi chos nyid kyi
113a8(phal chen): lab dang / bum pa gang ba dang / bkra shis kyis rnam par mdzes pa dang ldan zhing sor me'i rtse mo la 'khor lo yod pa'i ser ma dang ldan par gyur cil
113b1(phal chen): sems ma byams ca smrabs su'i phyug mar ldan las hU~M rnam par smin pa rgyu 'thun pa blang ba lta bu dang ldan ning pad+ma bzang ba dang / sprul
113b2(phal chen): bas sor mo thams cad kyis tshigs dang / yan lag shin tu brgyan cing 'ang byad bzang po'i mdzes par rnam par phye ba'i rgyur ba'i sor mo dang ldan /
113b3(phal chen): gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa snang bar bya ba la brtson zhing 'od zer gyi dra ba'i mdzod rab tu 'gyed pa'i sa rman
113b4(phal chen): dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sor mo shin tu mdzes pa dra bi legs par 'brel ba dang ldan zhing / sor mo legs pa ldan par gyur cig
113b5(phal chen): ces byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sor mo slong ba rnams la sor mo yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/ sems can thams cad rnam par bya ba'i sem
113b6(phal chen): kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad sems can rnams la yongs su bsngo'o// gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'dir
113b7(phal chen): ba la la zhig gis chos 'thob par bya bar bsams te/ des 'di skad du gal te khyod kyi sha dang bcas pa'i sen mo byin na ni ngas khyod la chos bstan par
113b8(phal chen): bya'o// zhes zer ba bzhin yod na/ de la 'di skad du smra ste/ bdag gi sha dang bcas pa'i sen mo tso bder khyer la bdag la chos bsan par mdzod ci
114a1(phal chen): ces nas/ ji ltar rgyal po dbang phyu ga d+hA gyur legs par bya shang brtsol ba dang / byang chub sems phrul dang ma byas pa dang /
114a2(phal chen): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan chad med pa'i chos bzang po nyid la brtson pa 'gro ba kun gyi chos la shin tu legs par yang dag par bsdu
114a3(phal chen): pa'i phyir sha dang bcas pa'i sen mo yongs su btang gyur pa de ltar sbyong ba pa rnams la/ rang gi sha dang bcas pa'i sen mo yongs su gtong ba'i tshed/ dge
114a4(phal chen): ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad la 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi phyag sem mo rab tu 'grub cing / zangs kyi
114a5(phal chen): khrag ltar bu'i sen mo dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad dpe byang bzang po'i sen mo rab tu 'thob cing mdog snum pa sen mo dang ldan par gyur
114a6(phal chen): sems can thams cad sen mo'i dam pa dang ldan zhing 'od 'char ba'i ser mo dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can rnams cad na bzang po dung ldan pa nang thams
114a7(phal chen): bar mkhyen pa'i blam pa na rab tu zab par gyur chen/ sems can thams ca du 'jog rten thams ca rmi zong shing mtshungs pa med pa'i sen me dang zhan par
114a8(phal chen): gyur rog/ sems can thams tsho ma nas 'a rgyas snang bar bri ba la brtson cing shing brgyan pa'i yin po dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams ca
114b1(phal chen): na cing rnamasar dag blan sna ma gang ba dang ldan par rna sa/ mas can thamasas man ng+gA rnams pa gas su
114b2(phal chen): thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'i mnan dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cung byang chub sems dpa'i las rnam par ldan pas rnam par dag
114b3(phal chen): skyed pa'i sen mo dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'od zer kha dog mtha' yas pa rab tu 'gyed pa'i mdzod dang ldan nang / mam
114b4(phal chen): cad mkhyen pa'i phyag sen mo dang ldan par gyur cig ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'dod pa'i phyir sgren mo dang shAr bcas pa yong su 'dod pa'i
114b5(phal chen): dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku dang phyag sen gyi rgyan yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / thos pa med pa'i spobs kyi mthar phyin par bya ba'i phyir yongs
114b6(phal chen): su bsngo'o// // bam po sum cu tu brkyad pa'o// // 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi don du chos tshol ba lhur len pa//
114b7(phal chen): shin tu dkon pa'i chos tshol ba la zhugs pa la chos gtong ba'i gang zag la las me'i rnams su lus bzhugs par byas te/ 'di skad du bal te khyod mi 'grang bdun du banas
114b8(phal chen): pa'i me'i rlabs su mchod pod na ngas khyod la chos kyi sbyin pa bya'o zhes na/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sna de thos nas shin tu dga' zhing yid bde ba
115a1(phal chen): ba dang / rab tu 'dun pa'i yid skyes nas 'di snyam du sems te/ ngan song thams cad dang / mnar med pa'i sdug bsngal nyams su
115a2(phal chen): ba dang / yang bsngo zhing bdag gis dam pa'i chos btsal dgos na/ 'di ltar mi'i me rlabs su mchongs pa tsam gyi dam pa'i chos rnyed par gyur na wA/ kye mdo ltar
115a3(phal chen): dkon pa'i sa sa rgya ste kyi chos de dag kyang sems can dmyal ba'i sbrul bsngal lta bu med par mo'i me'i rlabs tsam du mchod pas rnyed pa 'di ni ngo mtshar che'o snyam nas/
115a4(phal chen): 'di ltar bdag gis mi 'greng bdun du brkos pa'i me'o rlabs su ma chongs par bar bgyis/ khyod kyis bdag la sangs rgyas kyi chos bshad du gsol zhes nas/
115a5(phal chen): lhur rgyal ba legs par bshad pa tshe smra ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje sems dpa' dang / de ma yin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan rna
115a6(phal chen): med pa dag gis kyang me'i rlabs su mchod pa byas pa de ltar chos kyi don du sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba thams cad dang bsko pa'i lus kyis me'i rlabs su mdzad pa'i tshe/ da
115a7(phal chen): ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad la 'di ltar yongs su bas / dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
115a8(phal chen): las shin tu phyir mi ldog pa 'chos can du gyur / thams cad mkhyen pa'i gnas bur gyur cig/ sem chen thams cad sangs rgyas kyi bde thams cad myong bar rnam
115b1(phal chen): ma dus sa thams las byar lom par gyur nag/ sems can thams can 'jugs cung sgrub pa thams sna dang phyul na dablar dubyung ba'i ma
115b2(phal chen): gyur cig/ sems thams cad bde ba dang / yid bde ba dang / chos thams cad kyi rgyan rab tu thob cing chos tshol bas la/ brtson pa la brtson par rjer
115b3(phal chen): sems can thams nad me gsum rab tu zhi bas gnas pa'i sems dang ldan zhing ngan song gi lam thams cad dang / shin tu bral bar gyur cig/ sems can tham
115b4(phal chen): cad sangs rgyas pa'i rnam pa rab tu thob ste/ yid bde ba thams cad dang ldan par gyur/ sems can thams cad me gsum dang bral zhing byang chub kyi sems kyi
115b5(phal chen): 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug zhi bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas thams cad mthong ba'i dga' bas yang dag par spyod cing / byang chub
115b6(phal chen): sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi bde ba rab tu thob par gyur cig/ sems can thams thams cad sranas rgyas kyi chos tha ma/ cad mnyam pa med pa la rab tu gzhol zhing
115b7(phal chen): shin tu thos pa'i chos can du gyur cig/ sems can thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rjes su shin tu song ba'i chos dang ldan zhing / byang chub sems dpa'i mngon//
115b8(phal chen): par shes pas rnams pa rol pa'i bde ba rab tu thos par gyur cig ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos tshol zhing me'i rlabs su mchongs pa
116a1(phal chen): yang dag par bzung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can gyis sgribs pa'i las sbyong ba'i las dang spyod pa'i mthar phyin cing ye shes kyi me shin du rdzogs par
116a2(phal chen): bya ba'i phyir yongasu bsngo'o// 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dam pa'i chos kyi phyir sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba thams cad bdag gi lus kyis bzod pa
116a3(phal chen): byed cing dam pa'i chos brjod pa dang / b+hang chub sems dpa'i lam bas na pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi byang chub bas la bar bying bdang / blan med pa'i mi shes kyi phung po tshogs
116a4(phal chen): dag par rdzogs pa dang / stobs bcu la btsun par byed cing thams cad mkhyen pa'i bar sems bskyod pas 'amangs par byed pa dang / chags pa med pa'i ye shes kyi phung po la nga
116a5(phal chen): mngon par 'thun par yang dag par blta zhing sems can thams cad kyi rnam par dag pa dang / rnam par byung ba yang dag par sgrub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul
116a6(phal chen): larab tu 'jug pa dang / ye shes chen po la brtson ning sangs rgyas kyi byang chub yongs su srung ba'i tshe/ dzA na byang chub sems dpa' chos bzang ba tshol ba dang /
116a7(phal chen): shugs chen po 'dzin pa dang / de ma yin pa'i byang chub sems dbu'i gzhan chad med pa dag gis cad ji 'ir spyod pa pa chenang / de ltag bsngal gyi rnam pa bcos
116a8(phal chen): khams su 'bab pa dang / mug bsngal tshor ba'i badza ba rnam pa sna tshogs spong ba dang / sub bsngal gyi'i rje baM thams cad dang / phred pa ga thams cad rtse na
116b1(phal chen): cing bzod par byed pa dang / dam pa'i chos spyod pa'i gang zag sems gtum pa n+dan/ sdig pa'i las ba sgribs pa/ bdud kyi las kyi byir b+hi swA brlabs padu ba las/
116b2(phal chen): sdug bsngal gyi gnod pa de dag thams cad nye bar len cing gzod par byed pa'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar dam pa'i chos shes par bya'i phyir yongs su bsngo bre
116b3(phal chen): dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad bde ba'i nan tan gyis mngon par shes pa myur ba dang ldan zhing sdug bsngal dang / mi bde ba yongs su spangs par gyur tsa/
116b4(phal chen): sems can thams cad bde ba'i rnam pa thams cad rab tu thob pa la gnas pas/ sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba thams cad dang bral bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad
116b5(phal chen): mig yor lta bu'i bde ba rab tu thob cing sdug pa sngal gyi phung po thams cad 'gags par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad ye shes kyi spyod pa'i mthar phyin te/ sdug
116b6(phal chen): bsngal gyi btson ra nas phyir ldog par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sdug bsngal gyi lam rgyud dang / gtse ba thams cad las phyir log cing bde ba'i las mthong
116b7(phal chen): bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad shin tu rnam par chad pas chos kyi dga' ba dang bde ba'i rnam pas shin tu brtan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad pa
116b8(phal chen): tshun du zhe mi sdang zhing byams pa rab tu thob pas/ sdug bsngal las stsol bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'khor ba thams cad na yod pa'i sdug bsngal rang
117a1(phal chen): tu byang zhing sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bde ba don mdzad par gyur tsag/ sems can thams cad drug bsngal rgya tshor ba thams cung tsas lus la badzad
117a2(phal chen): 'gyur ba med cing / 'dra ba med pa'i bde ba rnam par dag pa dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas bde ba bstabs pa med pa'i mthar byin te bde/
117a3(phal chen): ba'i khyad par thams cad rab tu thob par gyur cig ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad mkhyen pa'i chos kyi brir sdug bsngal gyi
117a4(phal chen): pa thams cad bzod par byed cing / nyams su len pa'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'gro ba thams cad g.yangs las bsrung zhing / thams cad mkhyen pa'i rnam par
117a5(phal chen): thar pa bsgribs pa med pa la rab tu 'gyod pa'i phyir yongs su bsdu'o// 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems pa'i chen po dam pa'i chos btsal ba la shin du brna
117a6(phal chen): pa/ chos kyi tshig dang / ye ge 'khor las yang dag par len pa 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su btsal ba dang rjes su
117a7(phal chen): tsha ga' bas ma na na rnyed 'du phyug/ 'ju na
117a8(phal chen): pa'i lham ldan thams cad las rnam par 'das pa sangs rgyas kyi rgyam sring dang / chos kyi myong ba la mngon par mas pa/ 'jig rtem gyi dga' ba thams cad kyis mam /
117b1(phal chen): pa'i yid la byed pa dang ldan pa/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dga'i bas sems shin tu spel ba/ 'jig rten gyi skyid pa zung zing dang bral ba'i yid dang ldam
117b2(phal chen): spros pa med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos la gnas pa/ rab tu 'thob pa mngon par zhugs pa de sA rgya mtsho'i 'jug pa'i sa chen po grong rdul bye ba khrag khrig brgya
117b3(phal chen): dang / yul dang yul gru bye ba khrug khrig brgya snod dang / skye bo du mas yongs su gang ba bde ba'i rnam pa thams cad dang / skye bos rgyas pa'i khyim gyis sa
117b4(phal chen): bza' shing gi rab bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong rtse zhing dga' bor bya ba'i gzhi dang ldan pa/ chu klung yid du 'ong ba sna tshogs dang / grib shing dang bza' shing ma
117b5(phal chen): dga' bas shin tu brgyan pa/ 'khrug lang med cing shin tu bde ba/ gzhan gyi khams shin tu bcom pa/ bdag gi khams la nyams pa med pa/ gser
117b6(phal chen): ring po ma mdzod dang / zang pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya gang gis brtan pa/ bu dang bla ma dang / rgyu mdu 'khor sna tshogs meng pa/ grong khyer b+he bA ldan dz+nyAm
117b7(phal chen): 'dzi durab yang ba'i kyil dang/ mna'i na
117b8(phal chen): rjo zod pa pa'i rje pa rgya 'du sa ba tu gyu / 'tha mams cad kya #
118a1(phal chen): thar pa bsgribs pa med pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i lam rnams par dag pa tshul ning ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' mthunan pa
118a2(phal chen): dang / rgyal po khyad par dpal dang / de ma yin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan dag gis kyang ji ltar spyad par gyur pa
118a3(phal chen): bzhin du yongs su gtong bar bya ba'i tshe/ sa chen po rgya mtsho'i mthar thug pas yongs su gtang ste/ chos brtsal bas yang dag par bsdus pa'i dge'i
118a4(phal chen): bde dag 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste/ dge brtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad la gshin tu che ba la mngon par mos shing shin tu yangs pa'i btong ba dang ldan da
118a5(phal chen): gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'byor pa med par sbyin pa'i bdag por gyur te/ gtong ba thams cad yongs su gtong bar gyur cig/ sems canatha
118a6(phal chen): cad lus dang srog dang yo byud la mi lta bas chos tshol ba la shin tu brtson par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'gro ba thams cad kyi them gcod pas nim
118a7(phal chen): par bya ba la brtson zhing chos thob par bya bas shin tu dga' bar gyur cig/ sems can thams ca du sangs rgyas kyi chos la yid dga' ba rab tu thob cing
118a8(phal chen): la mngon par dga' bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyis chos tshol ba'i sems chen pos spyod pa dang / byang chub tshad med pa rnyed pas
118b1(phal chen): lus dang / sbrub dang / 'jig rten gyi rting pa langs su gcor bar gyur / sems can rnams thu las dang srog lamal ma 'dul
118b2(phal chen): bAs/ chos kyi rimagro dang snong na rab tu thob par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos shin tu dkon pa mnyan pa la brtson na
118b3(phal chen): bstan pa yang dag par 'dzin par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad byang chub sems pa'i spyod pa bzhin gyi dring mi 'jog pa'i mthur phyin cing sangs
118b4(phal chen): kyi byang chub snang ba rab tu thob par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad rab tu shes pa'i yid kyis the tsam gyi zug rngu dang bral zhing sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad ngo
118b5(phal chen): par rtogs pa med par gyur cig ces/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad sems can thams cad kyis don du chos
118b6(phal chen): btsal ba dang / chos thams cad kyi don dang bde ba'i lam gyi ye shes mthong ba yongs su rdzos par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// gzhan yang byang chub sen
118b7(phal chen): dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi dbang phyug byed cing srog gcod pa spangs pa la sems can rnams rab tu gzhol ba dang / 'dzam bu gling gi grong
118b8(phal chen): grong khyer dang / ljongs dang / pho brang 'khor dang / rgyal po'i gnas thams cad kyi gshan pa dang / gsang po'i gnas thams cad rnams par gcod pa
119a1(phal chen): / rkang gnyis pa dang / rkang bzhi pa dang / ri dgas mang po la mi 'jigs pa'i sbyin pa byed pa dang / ldog pa med pa'i sems kyis byang
119a2(phal chen): chub sems dpa' spyod pa la gnas pa dang / khon med pa'i sems kyis rgyal po'i snyid thams cad la gnas pa dang / sems kyi mi bde ba dang / snur
119a3(phal chen): bsngal thams cad sol ba dang / 'gro ba thams cad la bde bar byed pa'i sems rin po che skyed pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad rin po che dang 'dra ba'i bas
119a4(phal chen): pa rin po cha rab tu sgrub pa dang / ston pa gsum rnam par dag pal bdug gnas shing gzhan rab tu 'jog pa'i tshe/ srog gcod pa spangs pa dang / bsgrub pa lnga la sa /
119a5(phal chen): can rab tu bzhag pas yang dag par bsdus pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su smos/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad byang chub sems na
119a6(phal chen): sems bo thobatsud srog shing brnyan cad du med pa dang / ridi zhing shes rab rab tu zab par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad spangs rgyas rnams cad la rim
119a7(phal chen): byeng ba'i dang ldan nyid ci dpag tu med par thar na/ sems can 'anas pa gzhan gyimanang pas ma' 'gags par mi 'gyur rong/ ming ba ga la/
119a8(phal chen): bar tha / kyang ba 'dra'ad bas pa nga / dang med pa'i ma
119b1(phal chen): rnams cad byar ma'i mtha'i bskul pa bye ba brgyar byang chub sems dpa'i slong ba la gnas shing sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang / 'dul ba la
119b2(phal chen): ti tshe 'gags pa med par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad phyi ma'i mtha'i bskul pa bye ba brgyar byang chub sems dpa'i stong ba 'a brnyas shing phams
119b3(phal chen): mongs su smin par bya ba dam/ 'dul ba la zhugs te tshe 'gab pa med par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad bstobs bcu'o dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag pa
119b4(phal chen): bsags pa'i 'byung gnas su gyur cing tshe'i dngor 'dzin par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad tshe'i tshad 'gag pa med pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / sbyor la
119b5(phal chen): yongs su rdzogs pas dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bsams pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par gyur cige/ sems can thams cad tshe'i tshad zad mi shes pa'i dge ba'i
119b6(phal chen): rtsa ba la brtson zhing / sangs rgyas thams cad mthong ba dang mnyes par bya ba'i dus dang mnyam par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'phags pa'i chos
119b7(phal chen): la dga' ba rab tu thob cing srog gi dbang po 'gag pa med pa dang / 'phags pa'i skye mched la bsgrub par bya ba shin tu bslabs par gyur cig/ sems can/
119b8(phal chen): thams cad mthu stobs dang brtson 'grus zad mi shes pa rab tu thob ste/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi sa dbang sgyur ba la rab tu 'jog pa dang / rga ba dang
120a1(phal chen): med pa'i che phun sum tshogs par gyur ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen po dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad kyis de
120a2(phal chen): bshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i ye shes shin tu rdzogs par 'gyur ba'i phyir srog gcod pa spangs pa dang / som gsum rnam par dag pa rab tu dgod pa'i phyir yongs
120a3(phal chen): bsngo'o// gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos byol song gi skye gnas su gyur pa dang / rkang pazhi pa dang / mir gyur pa rnams kyi pho mtshan
120a4(phal chen): gcad par gyur cig/ skyes pa'i rang bzhin dang 'bral bar gyur pa/ skyes bu'i dngos po zhig par gyur pa nyug rum gyi dngos po la bzhag par gyur pa/ lus la gnod pa/
120a5(phal chen): shin tu mi bzad par gyur pa/ mthong dang skyes pa'i dngos po las bzlog par gyur pa/ pho mos gnyis ka ma yin pa'i skyes su banag par gyur pa/ sdug bsngal gyi
120a6(phal chen): tshor bas mnar bar gyur pa/ lus mi bde bas shin tu gzir bar gyur pa/ skyes par tshul gyis dpag pa tsam du gyur pa/ brten pa'i lus 'gag par gyur pa dang
120a7(phal chen): sems can rnams kyi gnod pa'i rnam pa de lta bu'i ngag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mthong na/ byams pa chen po'i sems can rnams yongs sa rgyas
120a8(phal chen): ci snying rje chen pa sngon tu btang se 'tsho ba thams cad la pan 'dogs pas 'dzam bu'i gling skyes pa las nyams par 'gyur bar thams cad rnam par bzlog go// rab
120b1(phal chen): rgyun gzung du// yongs su sgrub pa// rnam par chad par byed do// chos dang 'thun pa'i mdzod dang / bang babye ba khrag zhig brgya gang dag kyar gtad na
120b2(phal chen): skad du brjod de/ khyod kyis gang gi phyir sdig pa'i las rnam pa 'di la bu bya bar gyur pa de'i bde ba dang / phan pa'i rnam pa thams cad ngas sbyangs kyis spros pa'i la
120b3(phal chen): kyi rnam pa 'di lta bu dag tshul bzhin ma yin pa la 'jug par sems bskyed pas/ bde ba myong ba'i don tu khyod ma byed cig/ de ltar pha rol la sdig pa'i las rnam pa
120b4(phal chen): 'di lta bu dag byas shing bdag gi tshor ba myong bar 'gyur ba 'di ni gnas ma yin te/ de'i gnas med do// 'di ltar sdig pa'i rnam pa 'di lta bu la spyod pa 'di ni sadas
120b5(phal chen): rgyas thams cad kyis smad pa'o zhes nas de ma yin pa'i mi dge ba'i chos gzhan dag byed pa mthong na yang rnam par zlog par byed cing / sems can thams car
120b6(phal chen): sbyin pa thams cad yongs su gtang bas yang dag par sdud do// yo byad thams cad dkyis kyang mngon par sdud par byed do// 'di lta ste dben pa'i chos la yad//
120b7(phal chen): tshos par byed pa dang / dge ba'i las shin tu bsags pa dang / mi dge ba'i las phan tshun du byams pa'i sems kyis spyod pa dang / phan tshun du mi gnod cing mi
120b8(phal chen): gtse ba'i phyir legs par bshad pas kyang shin tu ngoms par byed do// sems can de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa'i tshig thos nas ldog pa'i las de las lA
121a1(phal chen): rnam par ldan// ma spyad do// des la sgrub pa d+ma'i dge pa'i rtsa ba de dag 'di lta / sems can ma

121a3(phal chen): dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa dang / tshangs pa'i spyod pa rnam par spyod cing skyes bu chen po'i mtshan dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad chags pa
121a4(phal chen): med pa dpa' ba'i ye shes la yang dag par gnas pa las phyir ldog rnying shin tu brtan pas dbang sgyur ba rab tu thob par gyur cig/ sems can thams
121a5(phal chen): cad 'dod pa'i dga' bas mi zlogs pa'i sems dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad smad pa med par thams cad mkhyen par 'byung ba'i ye shes
121a6(phal chen): bzang po dang ldan zhing skyes bu dam pa dang pur gyur cig/ sems can thams cad spobs bcu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan zhing skyes bu chen po'i stobs dang ldan
121a7(phal chen): par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad rmad du bya'i tshogs la gnas pa rab tu thob cing / dus thams cad du skyes bu'i dbang po nyams pa med par gyur

121b1(phal chen): snang naldan na gyu ga' ba nga/ rnaman b+hU rnams ldan smra/ nga
121b2(phal chen): yid ches pa'i dul ba dang / ldan zhing skyes bya'i mkhas pa'i dam par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad skyes bu dam pa sangs rgyas kyi mkhyen pa nugs pa'i
121b3(phal chen): ye shes dang ldan zhing byang chub sems dpa'i mthu rtsal dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad smyos bu/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
121b4(phal chen): chen po skyes bye dam pa mangs su dam pa yongs su bsrung ba la zhugs pa/ skal pa dang ldan pa/ 'phagos pa'i skye gnas su skye ba thob pa'i ye shes
121b5(phal chen): gnas dang / rigs la yang dag par brtson pa/ skyes bu khyad par du 'phags pa'i tshul shes pas yang dag par spyod pa/ skyes bu'i tshul bdun yang dag
121b6(phal chen): par mthon zhing rtogs pa'i skyes bu'i mthu rtsal dam pa dang / skyes bu'i mthu rtsal ma nor ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa'i skyes bu'i mthu rtsal dang /
121b7(phal chen): dmag par skyes bu'i bu rtsal dang / brten pa'i skyes bu'i mthu rtsal gyis yong dag bzung ba de skyes bu'i dbang po gtsang ba med par byas pa dang / sgyus
121b8(phal chen): dbang po btsung pa med par byas pa dang / skyes bu'i dbang po brtan par byas pas yang dag par bzung ba'i ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams
122a1(phal chen): cad gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rab mthu rtsal yongs su dag pa rab tu 'thob par 'gyur ba dang / mkhyen pa dang ldan pa'i skyes
122a2(phal chen): bur 'grub par yongs su bsngo'o// gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par sangs rgyas pa 'jig
122a3(phal chen): rten thams cad du grags par byed pa dang / kye ma sangs rgyas 'jig rten du byung ngo // kye ma sangs rgyas 'jig rten du byung ngo // kye ma sangs rgyas 'jig rten du
122a4(phal chen): byung ngo zhes sangs rgyas kyi sgra sgrog cig/ sangs rgyas kyang dbyangs kun tu grags par byed pa dang / sems can gyi nga rgyal dang / bag med pa dang / spros pa
122a5(phal chen): thams cad rnam par zlog pa dang / sangs rgyas mthong bar sems can rnams yang dag par spobs pa dang / sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa la sems can rnams ra
122a6(phal chen): tu bzhog pa dang / sems can thams cad sangs rgyas la gzhol bar byed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi dmigs pa la brtson pa'i sems dang ldan pa'i sem
122a7(phal chen): can thams cad la rim po byed pa dang / sangs rgyas rnam par rdzogs pa sems can rnams la bstan pa dang / sangs rgyas brjod pa la sems ca
122a8(phal chen): rnams yang dag par bzong ba dang / bskal po bri bar yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das skye badzi nan tu ma mam zhes bya ba'i tshis sems cam
122b1(phal chen): rnams la brjod pa dang / sems can de dag gis kyang de'i sangs rgyas mthong bar gyur pa dang / sangs rgyas la rim gro dang zhes byed pa dang /
122b2(phal chen): ba dang / sgrub bskyed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mtsham thar pa dang / sangs rgyas grangs med pa la shin tu bskye
122b3(phal chen): dge ba'i rtse bral po rdzogs pa dang / srog chags ba khrag khrig rgya bong zangs med pa'i sangs rgyas tshi gter rnam par spyod pa dang / srog
122b4(phal chen): bye ba khrag TI ga bad+ma smod blangs med pa de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi drung du yongs su smi par bar byed pa dang / sems can+de de dag kyang byang chub sem
122b5(phal chen): sems dpa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen dam par rab tu shes pa dang / byang chub snyoms dpa'i yid ches pas/ sangs rgyas kyis chos la gonas par gyur
122b6(phal chen): padang / 'dzag rten thams cad du bskal pa mangs med par skyed cing sbeng pa'i dge ba'i rnab sa sangs rgyas kyi mim las yang dag par sgrub pa'i ma/
122b7(phal chen): ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su bsdu ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'das sems can thams cad kyis sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes par byed te/ mi ma zhes pa
122b8(phal chen): byed pa dang / sangs rgyas lta ba dang mi 'bral bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas thams cad lta ba yid la bya ba dang / mi 'bral ning

123b1(phal chen): rgyas byung ba brjod pa la brnyam tshang sangs rgyas tsA m+b+ha dz+nyAn sa rlabs pa cig/ sems can rnams parnams pa ma zhags pa dang / 'ang dag pa
123b2(phal chen): sangs rgyas thams pa 'grogs par gyur te/ dge ba'i gshes gnyen gyis sangs rgyas kyi chos rdzogs par thos par byas par gyur can/ thams tsam

123b4(phal chen): dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas skye ba brjod pas yang dag par gzung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad kyis sangs rgyas mthong bar

124b1(phal chen): sems can thams cad 'gro ba kun yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul ba rnams par dag pa'i lam la zhugs te/ gnas red par gyur cig/ sems

125a1(phal chen): dge ba'i bshes gnyen sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par spel bar brtson pa rnams sam/ 'phags pa'i dge 'dun

125a4(phal chen): pa'i mi gtong ba 'am/ 'phongs pa dang bkren pa spong zhing len pa gzhan dag la bran dang las byed pa'i mi gtong ba'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las 'a

125a6(phal chen): brgya stong mang po 'bul ba byed cing rim gro ba de dag kyang mkhas pa tshul shes pa/ cang shes pa brtson pa/ le lo med pa/ drang ba drang po dang ldan pa/ phan par
125a7(phal chen): sems pa dang / bde bar sems pa/ byams par sems pa/ rim gro byed pa'i ngang tshul can/ khon med pa/ gzugs med par yongs su spyad pa/ bzod
125a8(phal chen): spyan la sna tshogs dang / grangs la shin tu bslabs pa'i shes pa gsal ba can/ rim pa'i tshul shes pa/ dga' bar byed cing rim 'gro byeng po la brtsom ning
125b1(phal chen): snang pa/ byang chub sems dpa' las la byung ba yid du 'thang pa/ rim gro byang dang / sems can du dang gA/ de lta ba'i rim tho ba dag gnas ga ma
125b2(phal chen): ci rigs pa dang / phan 'dogs pa de dang / de dag la 'bral zhing yongs spyag nga bu dang / sbyin pa byed pa'itshe/ dge ba'i rtsa bde dag sems can thams
125b3(phal chen): 'di ltar yongs su bsdu ste/ rim gro ba yang dag par btang ba dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsab 'ongs sems can thams cang bsnyen bkur ba dang / r-in zo za ba
125b4(phal chen): mkhas shing brtson te/ shes kyi sems dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bka' yang dag par len cing sangs rgyas
125b5(phal chen): thams cad dang 'thur pa'i rim gro byed par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad yid la bya ba dang bsam pa dang / rnam par rtog pa gzhan med cing / sangs rgyamathar
125b6(phal chen): cad la rtag tu skabs phye bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad dge ba thams cad yang dag par snang bal brtson zhing / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rigs las mi
125b7(phal chen): pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi rjes su sregs par gyur cig sa/ sems can tharas cab don yod par dus thams cad da phrad cing sangs rgyas thams la dus dang 'thur
125b8(phal chen): par rim gro dang / bsnyen bkur byed par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad ye shes rnar par dag pas mi 'jigs par spyod cing sangs rgyas chos kyi don 'dzi

126a2(phal chen): gyur cig/ des yir ba'i gan sems can thams cad 'jig rter tshwa gnas thams cad yang dag pa 'dzem pas/ sangs rgyas thams cad la lwa ba dang ldan par gyur
126a3(phal chen): cig/ sems can thams cad ngo mtshar du 'dzin pa dang / de ma yin pa'i gnas gnan med cing sangs rgyas thams cad la rjer par gyur cig/ sems car thams
126a4(phal chen): bar sangs rgyas kyi chos blar srid pa la mngon du gyur pa'i sems dang ldan par gyur cig/ sangs rgyas kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i blo gros dang ldan par thar cig ces
126a5(phal chen): lhur byung chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rim gro ba yongs su btang bas yang dag par bsdus pas dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad kyis dra
126a6(phal chen): bral ba/ dri ma med pa rnyog pa med pa'i sar sangs rgyas kyi chos rnam par dag pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi sku gnar la ga lus pa med pa'i ner gyi tshul rab tu thob par bya
126a7(phal chen): ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dma' bar byas shing sa la gding ba'i tshig lam dang 'dra ba'i rin
126a8(phal chen): sa byas te/ sa dang 'dra bar sdug bsngal thams cad bzod pa mi 'gyur ba mi skyo ba/ sems can thams cad la rim gro byed pas ngal ba med pa'i ying dang ldan
126b1(phal chen): ci nas kyang byang chub sem sur pa'i spyod pa rgyun mi 'chad pa dang /
126b2(phal chen): ba/ sems can thams cad kyi sprin bdag dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad ge bar rtogs pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ 'gro ba byis pa sanyes par byas pa'ams su'
126b3(phal chen): rnal gzon pa'i ngang tshul can/ dge bshin tu brtan pa la brtson pa/ yid la byed pa bzang bas gnas pa la brtson pa/ sems can gyi khams thams cad dran
126b4(phal chen): bkur ba'i sems kyis/ bdag nyid rim gro bar 'bul ba'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su bsdu so/ ci nas kyang sems can thams cad shin du
126b5(phal chen): gro byis pa dang / ci nas byang chub sems dpa'i don nyams pa med pa dang / ci nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' lam du legs par zhugs par gyur ba dang / tsa nas kyang byang
126b6(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i mnyam pa nyid khong du chud par 'gyur ba dang / ci nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su bdag nyid bgrang bar 'gyur ba dang / ci nas kyang byang chub
126b7(phal chen): sems dpa'i spyod pa bden pa'i tshig dang 'grogs pa rjes su srung bar gyur pa dang / ci nas kyang khams gsum thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos kyis rnam par dag par gyur pa dang
126b8(phal chen): ni nas kyang lhag pa'i gsam pas rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad khong du chud par 'gyur ba dang / cinas kyang sems can thams cad kyi dgi ba'i rtswa bsgo
126b9(phal chen): med cing rnam par dag par 'gyur ba dang / ci nas kyang sems can de dag thams cad yon tan chen po la rab tu zhugs te/ thams cad nga mkhyen pa'i mthar shin tu
127a1(phal chen): 'thug par 'gyur ba de ltar yongs su bsngo'o// 'di ltar yongs su spro ste/ 'di ltar yongs su sngo ste/ 'di ltar lus kyi rim gro sems can thams
127a2(phal chen): la yongs su btang ba 'di dag dge ba'i rtsa ba gang bsags pa des sems can thams cad yongs su rtogs pa'i chos can tu 'dzin pa'i chos can/ yang dag par len
127a3(phal chen): pa'i chos can mi sprul pa'i chos can/ chud mi za ba'i chos can/ minyams pa'i chos can/ mi 'bral ba'i chos can yid shin du dral ba'i chos can/ mdul bdu
127a4(phal chen): ba'i chos can/ chos kyi nye bar dul ba'i chos kyi rim gro pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad la shin tu che bar sems pa'i sems dang ldan gyur cig ces de ltar byang chub sen
127a5(phal chen): dpa' sangs rgyas thams cad la rim gro'i nam tan du byas te/ sems can 'di dag thams cad dge ba'i rtsa ba des mchod rten gyi dam par 'gyur ba dang / 'gror
127a6(phal chen): thams cad bsnyen bkur bar 'os par 'gyur ba dang / sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi ye shes rdzogs par 'gyur ba'i phyir sbyin pa'i gnas dam par
127a7(phal chen): 'gyur ba dang / 'gro ba thams cad la snyid brtse'i phyir len pa'i dam par 'gyur ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la 'jug pa'i byor bsod nams kyi dmag
127a8(phal chen): dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / ston ma tshad med pa'i phyir sprin pasreg dam pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / khams gsum thams cad nam 'byung ba'i dam par 'gyur na
127b1(phal chen): dang / lamadzal ba bzhin du yang dag par bstan par phyir deng pom dam par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par bzang ba'i byor bzlams
127b2(phal chen): ba rab tu thob par 'gyur ba dang / namakha'i dbyings par chags pa med pa'i lam gyis 'byung bas chos kyi dbyings tshad med pa dam par 'gyur ba'i phyir yang
127b3(phal chen): bsngo ste/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdag rim gro bar phul bas yang dag par bzung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can gyi 'am
127b4(phal chen): thams cad phyag bya bar 'os pa'i ye shes kyi phung po dang ldan par bya ba'i phyir sems can thams cad la yong su bsngo'o// 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' bam
127b5(phal chen): dpa' chen po chos la dga' ba dang / dad pa dang / rab tu dga' zhing dang ba'i sems kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la chos dkon mchog bla na med pa
127b6(phal chen): lams pa'i bsam pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad la par sems pa'i sems bskyed pa dang / chos bye ba grangs med pa bar chad med pa'i chos kyis khong du chun
127b7(phal chen): cing yang dag par bzung ba dang / shes rab chen po che la yang dag par gzhol ba'i dbo'i rtsab ma ngon du gyur pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod pa mtha' yas
127b8(phal chen): brjes dran pa'i sangs rgyas kyi yul dang / don gyi rjes su 'brang bas de bzhin gshegs pa'i ldem po dag khong du chud pa dang / de bzhim gshegs pa'i chos
129a1(phal chen): yongs su 'dzin pa med par 'gro bas gnag la rag las pa med pa'i lus dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad bla na med par
129a2(phal chen): lus kyi rigs dang ldan zhing / sangs rgyas kyi skur mngon tu gyes par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad bzod pa'i stobs kyis sems la thob pa med cing
129a3(phal chen): chos kyi stobs dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnam par dag par dag par dag pa yongs su rdzogs par 'dra ba
129a4(phal chen): med pa'i lus dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad dmigs pa med pa'i dmigs su byung bas 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bsod nams kyi lus dang
129a5(phal chen): ldan par gyur cig ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa l-I rang gi lus phul bas yang dag par bsdus pa'i dben
129a6(phal chen): rtsa ba de dag ci nas kyang sems can gyi khams thams cad dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dang / rlung du yang dag par 'grub par 'gyurab/
129a7(phal chen): bya ba'i phyir sems can thams cad la yongs su bzo'o// 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad la 'byor
129a8(phal chen): kun gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba ltar phan 'dogs pas bdag nyid yongs su gtong ba dang / sems can thams cad kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba la yang dag par sems sa
129b1(phal chen): dang / mar mel bur bdag sems can rnams la bsnyen pa dang / bde ba lngar bdag sems can la byin gyis rlob pa dang / chos kyi ga ni khu bar bangan
129b2(phal chen): 'gro ba thams cad yang dag par 'dzin pa dang / snang ba la bur bdag sems can thams cad la yongs su gtong ba dang / 'gro ba thams cad chen ma
129b3(phal chen): zur bdag sems can la snang bar byed pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rgyud lta bur bdag 'gro ba thams cad la ston pa dang / dge ba'i gshes gnyen lta bur dang
129b4(phal chen): sems can thams cad la bstobs pa dang / las lta bur bdag sems can thams cad la yang dag par bston pa dang / bla na med pa'i bde ba'i rnam
129b5(phal chen): rab tu thob pa ltar bdag sems can thams cad la yod spyod pa dang ston pa dang / nyi ma lta bur bdag 'gro ba thams cad la snyoms par byed pa dang / de lta bu
129b6(phal chen): chos dang ldan par bdag sems can thams cad la yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/ bdag btang bas byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad sangs rgyas rgya
129b7(phal chen): gyisar rab tu phyin par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi ye shes dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can tham
129b8(phal chen): cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du dul ba thob par gyur cig/ sems cam cu sangs rgyas kyi phyir spyod pa la mkhas shing spyod pa phun sum
130a1(phal chen): tshogs dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad don dang chos ye shes dang / mngon par shes pa dang ldan zhing mya ngan las 'da' ba'i mthu yod par gyur
130a2(phal chen): cig/ sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su byung bas rab tu mchim par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs pa dge bas ma rig
130a3(phal chen): pa'i bsam pa spangs par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad byang chub kyi shing drung du dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan pas shin tu byung bar gyur cig/ sems n+dan thams cad 'che ba'i
130a4(phal chen): sems bskyed pa dang bral zhing nyon mongs pa'i dgra shin tu choms par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa yang dag par 'dzin pa'i phyir yongs su srung
130a5(phal chen): bathob par gyur cig cig ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad la bdag la yongs su gtang bas yang dag par smras pa'i dge ba de'agro
130a6(phal chen): ba thams cad la phan pa dang / sems can thams cad kyis bla na med pa'i bde ba dang ldan pa thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// 'di ltar yang byang chub sems sems
130a7(phal chen): dpa' chen po sangs rgyas thams cad 'dzin du gzo ba'i sems bskyed pasu sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rimagro bya ba/ bralar bsam pa dang / de bzhin ga shegs pa thams
130a8(phal chen): kyi byang chub tu lhag pa'i bsam pa rnam par byang ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la sems 'od snang zhing dang bar byin gyis rlabs pa dang / 'jig rter gyi 'du shes
130b1(phal chen): sa ba sa bya zag par bya ba dang / bdas sangs rgyam rgya rnags su bcigs par bzang ba dang / bdag sangs rgyas pams sa dang 'gyu par bzung ba dang / dran
130b2(phal chen): kyi yul las ring du bya ba dang / bdag sangs rgyas gyi yul mos par bya ba dang / bdag sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi snod du byin gyi sa brlab pa dang / del ba
130b3(phal chen): la brtson par byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas thams cad la rim mo byed pa'i che/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de sems can thams cad la /
130b4(phal chen): ltar yongs su so ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de sems can thams cad la 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad sdig to'i las thams ca
130b5(phal chen): la zhe sdang zhing cang shes dang yang dag par 'grogs par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad shin tu bzung ba'i chos can du gyur te/ mi phyed pa'i g.yog dang ldan par
130b6(phal chen): gyur cig/ sems can thams cad dbang bsgyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa thob ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi slob mar gyur cig/ sems can 'ams [।]@
130b7(phal chen): thams cad kyis yongs su bzung bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i chos skyon med pa la yang dag par spyod cing / sangs rgyas tham

131b1(phal chen): dru byas te yongs su bsdu'// ci nas kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir 'gyod pa med pa'i sems shin tu rdzogs par 'gyur

131b5(phal chen): sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde bar sems pa de rgyal po'i snying yongs su btang ba'i tshe/ rgyal po'i srid byin pas yang dag par bzung ba'i dge ba'i

131b9(phal chen): de zhing dge ba rtsa ba
132a1(phal chen): bsngo'o// ci nas kyang phung po dang khams dang skye mched la mngon par zhen pa med pa de ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongasu bsdu'o// cinas

132a6(phal chen): byin pas/ yang dag par bsdus pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad chos kyi dbang phyug gi dam pa thob ste/ chos kyi rgyal po'i sred la dbang sgyur bar
132a7(phal chen): chu thob par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad rgyal po'i dkrugs ma dpa ga thams cad gnom pa'i dz+war/ sangs rgyas kyi rdul sring rab tu thob par gyur ci
132a8(phal chen): sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes chos sangs rgyas kyi chos rab tu brjod pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rgyal srid chen po la rab tu gnas par gyur mi/

132b2(phal chen): sems can thams cad chos kyi dbang phyug sangs rgyas kyi rigs rgyun mi chad par yang dag par 'dzin pa'i tshul bzhon gshegs pa thams cad rtsi pa

132b4(phal chen): chung med pa rjes su sbyong bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas pargyun ma chad pa dang ldan zhing chos kyi dbyings la nges pa'i rgyal srid dang ldan par gyur cig
132b5(phal chen): sems can thams cad 'gro ba kun 'dul ba la thogs pa med pa'i zhugs pas sangs rgyas kyi ning thams cad du ye shes kyis dbang phyug tu gyur cig/ sems can
132b6(phal chen): thams cad 'jig rten gyi khams kun gyi sems can theg pa chen po la rab tu gzhog pa'i tshul gyis 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam
132b7(phal chen): mkha'i mthas gtugs pa thams cad du chos kyi sbyin bdag tu gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / de ltar byung ba'i sangs rgya
132b8(phal chen): thams cad dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi tshul gcig tu gyur to/ ldod pa med pa'i rgyal srid rab tu thob par gyur cig/ ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa'
133a1(phal chen): dpa' chen po'i rgyal ba'i srid yongs su btang ngam yang dag par bzung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag tsunas kyad 'tshub thams cad du bde ba dang legs pa
133a2(phal chen): 'byung ba'i phyir sems can thams cad la yongs su bsngo'o// 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems ma 'khrugs pa dang / byang chub
133a3(phal chen): sems dpa'i sems rtse gcig pa dang / smon lam mtshad med par byas te/ snying rje chen po bskyed cing byams pa chen po'i stobs nye bar bzhag ste/ bsam pa shin tu tshim
133a4(phal chen): par byas nas/ sems can gyi don la bdag rab tu bzhag ste/ ye shes chen po la shin tu mos par byas nas/ sangs rgyas kyis chos lams menyam pa'i sems can pa
133a5(phal chen): dge ba chos cid la rnam par dpyod song / thams ca mkhyen pa'i rgyal srid la rab tu gzhol bar sems bskyed pa dang / chos kyi dbang phyug la shin tu brtson pa'i bas
133a6(phal chen): bya dang / ye shes la dbang sgyur ba thob pa'i yid kyi dbang po dang yon tan thams cad rnam par spyad pa rab tu 'jug pa dang / blo brtan pa dang / ldan pa'i bsam pa yangs pa dang
133a7(phal chen): choms gyur pa'i dbye ba'i rtsa thams cad dang / brtsam par sgrubs bye bar du ldan pa'i sangs rgyas tshumam gyi ldan lam dang / gnam pa dgalas pa med pa'i thams ca
133a8(phal chen): mkhyen pa nyid kyis chos/ shin tu brtan pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i skabs dang / brtsams pa thams cicad mthar pA'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi
133b1(phal chen): ba'i smon lam gyis ming dang / yul du bcas pa dang grong khyer dang / rgyal po'i pho byung 'khor rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par gyud pa thams cad btang bar yongs pa

139a5(phal chen): gyi chos dang rab tu bral bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi pho byung dang / gnas la yang dag par gnas shing khyim dang gluras med par gyur cig
139a6(phal chen): sems can thams cad kyi bar du bcod pa'i nan tan thams cad 'gags par gyur te/ sgrib pa'i chos thams cad shin tu spangs par gyur cig/ sems nAn+ta thams
139a7(phal chen): da gos pa med pa'i sems kyi gnas la rten pas ldan ljin med pa'i sems dang ldan pa 'gyur cig/ sems can thams cad khyim na gnas pas mngon po'i sangs
139a8(phal chen): pa'i mngon ma'i ye shes dang ldan zhing yongs su smon par bye ba la mkhas par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'i sems
139b1(phal chen): ye shes dang ldan ma khyim gyi gnas rnam par rig pa rab tu mthong bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad khyim gyis sangs rgyas tshe rnam par spyod pa rab tu b+hu pAts+tsha /
139b2(phal chen): mtha' yas patshim par gyur cig/ ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' dngu' chen po khyim gyi sbyin pa yongs su btang bas yang dag par bsdus pa'i dge pa'i rtsa ba de dag len
139b3(phal chen): can thams can gyis byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang sngon lam dang / rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su brdzi'o// 'di ltar yang byang chub sem
139b4(phal chen): dpa' sems dpa' chen po bza' shing gi rab dga' ba dang / rtse ba dang / longs spyod mang po sna tshogs kyi gnas yongs su gtong zhing sbyin pa dang / stobs dang / bdag sems
139b5(phal chen): can thams cad kyi bza' shing gI rA ba dga' ba dang rtse ba dang / longs spyod mang po sna tshogs kyis gnas yongs su gtong zhing sbyin pa dang stobs dang bdag sems can thamasas
139b6(phal chen): bza' shing gi rab par gyur ba'i zhing yang dag par lta ba dang / ba go chos kyi dga' bar gyur par 'gyur bar 'jig rten thams cad la yongs su bsgom pa dang / bdag sem
139b7(phal chen): can thams cad la yid bde ba'i sbyin pa byed par byin gyi brlabs pa dang / bdag 'gro ba thams cad du dga' ba mtha' yas pa yang dag par skyed par shin tu bston pa dang //
139b8(phal chen): bdag khams su ma thams cad na chos dkar po skye ba'i sgor gyur par yang dag par 'dzin pa dang / bdag 'gro ba thams cad kyi sems dpa' ba rtag tu skye bar byed par 'jin
140a1(phal chen): rten thams cad du gnas par byed pa dang / bdag sems can thams cad la sangs kyis kyi byang chub stobs par smon 'am 'debs pa dang / bdag skyed du
140a2(phal chen): thams cad kyi pha dang 'dra bar nan tan byed pa dang / bdag khams gsum thams cad na ye shes kyi 'byung gnas su gyur par du rtog pa dang / bdag sems can gyi khams thams
140a3(phal chen): nu yo byad kyis mi brel bar byed par rab tu gzhog pa dang / bdag smon lam thams cad kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad ma dang 'dra bar skyed par yang dag par bsgrub pa'i
140a4(phal chen): tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad kyi skyor gyis skyob pa med par yongs su bsngo'o// sems can thams cad kyi gnod pas 'khrug pa med pa'i semagri yong
140a5(phal chen): bsngo'o// 'jig rten gyi gnas drin du gzo bas yongs su gang bas yongs su gang bas yongs su yi 'chad pa med pa'i yongs su bsngo'o// sems cad thams cad kyi gnod
140a6(phal chen): la ma thob par bya ba la re ba med pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// 'jig rten thams cad la smon pa med pa'i sems kyis yongs su bsngo'o// 'jig rten thams cad kyi sdug bsngal
140a7(phal chen): bsal ba'i sems kyis 'gro ba thams cad la yongs su bsngo'o// bar snang dang mnyam pa'i sems kyis 'gro ba thams cad gos pa med par bya ba'i yongs su bsdu'o//
140a8(phal chen): ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yon du 'gro ba'i sems kyis yang dag pa ji zha ba bzhin du rab tu rtog pa'i tshur yongs su bsngo'o// sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal blang sa

140b5(phal chen): 'di ltar yongasu sngo ste/ sems can thams cad kyis zong nas gong du ye shes kyi bza' shing gi rab tu thob ste/ dge ba'i rtsub bas ba dang / gas rab meng dag pa
140b6(phal chen): 'byung ba dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas thams cad la lta zhing bser bkur ba dang / rim gro byed pa'i phyir 'khrul pa med pa'i chos

142a1(phal chen): ma byon pa dang / ralar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par mnyes par byed pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rigs kyi phyir rjes su 'gyod pa med pas
142a2(phal chen): ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ phyis mya ngan du bya ba med par yang dag par spyod pas khyad par rnam par 'phel bar byed pa dang ba'i dbang po sems skad cig gis tshad med par rnam
142a3(phal chen): par 'phel bar byed par gtong ba dang ldan pa de 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste/ theg pa chen po'i sems bskyed pa'i grub pa'i mchod sbyin byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can
142a4(phal chen): thams cad gtong ba chen po dang shin tu gtong ba dang / rab tu gtong ba dang / gya non par gtong ba dang / 'phrul du gtong ba dang / blan med par gtong ba dang / mnyam pa med
142a5(phal chen): par gtong ba dang / 'jig rten thams cad las 'phags pa'i gtong ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bsngags pa'i chos gtong ba dang ldan zhing sbyin bdag gi dam pa sem/

142a7(phal chen): rjes su sangs rgyas pa dang ldan zhing / sems can thams cad zhi ba'i ye shes la rab tu gzhol ba/ mngon par shes pa'i ye shes thams med pas 'gro ba thams cad la shin tu/

143a1(phal chen): thams cad kyis nye bar bstan te/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi thar sbyin pa la bkod de/ de mchod sbyin gyi rgyan mtha' las rgal ba rnam pa sna tsho
