232b1(phal chen): da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i lus thob par bya ba'i phyir yongasu bsdu'o// dge ba'i rtsa ba des sangs rgyas la dga' ba gcom
232b2(phal chen): la dga' ba dang / sems can thams cad yongasu bskyob pa'i phyir snying rje chen po la dga' ba las phyir mi ldog pa yongasu rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngal
232b3(phal chen): dge ba'i rtsa ba de las kyi rnam pa bsams kyis mi khyab pa la bsgribs pa med pa'i ye shes kyis yang dag par gzhol bar bya ba dang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnam par
232b4(phal chen): dag par thams cad kyi sems dang ba dang po dang par bya ba dang / dge ba phyir yongs su bsdu'o// dge ba'i rtsa ba de ming gi rgyud snrel zhi dang spyi bo tshugs su rgyu ba thams cad/
232b5(phal chen): shin tu bstan pa dang // phra ba dang / rgya che ba dang / yangs pa dang / dog pa dang / tha gyu che ba sna tshogs dang / rnam par dag pa dang / kun gnas nyon mongs thams cad du chos
232b6(phal chen): kyi 'khor lo rgyun mi chad par mnyam pa nyid du yang dag par bskor ba'i yongasu bsdu'o// dge ba'i rtsa ba de sems bskyed pa'i skad cig re re dang / mi 'jigs pa gnas
232b7(phal chen): dang gzhan tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa zang pas chos snang ba sar pa gsar pa rab tu thob cing bstan pa dang / bshad par bya ba'i phyir yongs su ma'o// dge ba'i rtsa
232b8(phal chen): de dag thams cad tshol ba la lhag pa'i bsam pa dang / dang po ma 'khrugs shing mi dma' bas chos 'byam klas pa thams cad ma lus par mngon par shes pa'i drang
233a1(phal chen): #/ chos kyi rdzu 'phrul thob pas sems can thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyi 'khor 'byam klas pa thams cad mngon par dga' ba dang / tshim par chos thams
233a2(phal chen): cad rab tu bstan pa'i phyir yong su bsngo'o// dge ba'i rtsa ba de chos kyi dbyings chad med pa thams cad du song ba'i yongasu bsgol gnas shing 'di ltar yongs su bsngos
233a3(phal chen): te/ chos kyi dbyings tshad med par song ba'i lus kyis yongasasu bsngo ste/ chos kyi dbyings tshad med par song ba'i lus kyis yongasu bsngo'o// chos kyi dbyings tshad med pa
233a4(phal chen): ba'i ngag gis kyis yongs su bsngo'o// chos kyi dbyings kyi tshad med par song ba'i yid kyi las kyis yongs su bsngo'o// chos kyi dbyings chad med par song ba'i gzugs
233a5(phal chen): mnyam pa nyid la gnas shing yongs su bsngo'o// chos kyi dbyings chad med par song ba'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mnyam pa nyid la gnas
233a6(phal chen): shing yongs su bsdu'o// chos kyi dbyings tshad med par song ba'i phung po mnyam pa nyid la gnas shing yongs su bsngo'o// chos kyi dbyings chad med par song ba'i kham
233a7(phal chen): mnyam pa nyid la gnas shing yongasu bsngo'o// chos kyi dbyings chad med par song ba'i skye mchod mnyam po nyid la gnas shing yongs su bsdam// chos kyi nga
233a8(phal chen): tshang med par song ba'i nang mnyam pa chid la gnas shing yongasu bzlog/ chos kyi dbyings tshad med par song ba'i phyir la marnam pa ning la gnas shing yongasu pasa'o//
233b1(phal chen): chos kyang byings chad med par song ba'i brtsams pa mnyam pa nyid la gnas shing yongs bsngam// chos kyi dbyings chad med par mang ba'i bsam pa nyid la gnas na
233b2(phal chen): yongs su bsngo'o// chos kyi dbyings mang med par song ba'i sbyor ba mnyam pazhid la gnas shing yongasu ban+d+ha ra// chos kyi dbyings cang med par song ba'i mos pa/
233b3(phal chen): mnyam pa nyid la gnas shing yongasu bsdu'o// chos kyi dbyings tshad med par song ba'i dbang po mnyam pa nyid la gnas shing yongs su bsdu'o// chos kyi dbyings
233b4(phal chen): tshad med par song ba'i sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' dang da ltar byung ba mnyam pa nyid la nas shing yongs su bsdu'o// chos kyi dbyings tshad med par song ba'i
233b5(phal chen): las kyi rnam par smin pa nyid la gnas shing yongasu bsngo'o// chos kyi dbyings chad chad med par kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba rnam par dag pa mkhas
233b6(phal chen): ba nyid la gnas shing yongasu bsngo'o// chos kyi dbyings tshad med par song ba'i sems can thams cad mnyas pa nyid la gnas shing yongs su bsngo'o// chos kyi da
233b7(phal chen): tshad med par song ba'i zhing thams cad mnyam pa nyid la gnas shing yongasu bsngo'o// chos kyi dbyings chad med par song ba'i chos thams cad mnyam nyid la gnas 'di
234a1(phal chen): yongasu pasnu ma// chos kyi dbyings cad med par song ba'i 'gro ba thams ca du srung bas su banyid rgyu nanas nang yongs su rnam
234a2(phal chen): kyi dbyings chad med par song ba'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mnyam pa nyid la gnas shing yongs su bsngo'o// chos kyis dbyings tshad med par song
234a3(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang smon lam thams cad mnyam pa nyid la gnas shing yongasu bsngo'o// chos kyi dbyings chad med par song ba'i byang chub sem
234a4(phal chen): dpa'i 'byung ba thams cad mnyam pa nyid la gnas shing yongasu bsngo'o// chos kyi dbyings chad med bso ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i yongasu smin par bya ba dang /
234a5(phal chen): 'dul ba thams cad mnyam pa nyid la gnas shing yongs su bsngo'o// chos kyi dbyings chad par song ba'i byang chubang po'i 'khor thams cad mnyam pa nyid la gnas
234a6(phal chen): shing yongs su bsngo'o// chos kyi dbyings tshad med par song ba'i chos thams cad ming gnyis pa'i dbyings mnyam pa nyid la gnas shing yongs su bsngo'o//
234a7(phal chen): chos kyi dbyings chad med par song ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbyings 'khor thams cad mnyam pa nyid la gnas shing yongasu balnga'o// de ltar yongasu su bas
234a8(phal chen): kyi dbyings tshad med med pa dang mnyam pa nyid lus yong su dag pa kun nas gnas par 'gyur ro// chos kyis dbyings tshad med pa dang mnyam pa'i ngag yongs su
234b1(phal chen): dag pa kun nas nus par 'gyur ro// chos kyi dbyings tshad med pa dang mnyam pa'i sems yongs su dag pa nas gnas par 'gyur ro// chos kyi dbyings
234b2(phal chen): med pa dang / mnyam pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang smon lam yongs su dag pa kun nas gnas par 'gyur ro// chos kyi dbyings chad med pa dang ma
234b3(phal chen): pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor yongs su dag pa kun nas gnas par 'gyur ro// chos kyi dbyings tshad med pa dang mnyam pa'i chos thams cad bstan pa dang brjod
234b4(phal chen): bas byang chub sems dpa' thams cad go bar bya ba yongasu dag pa kun nas gnas par 'gyuraro// chos kyi dbyings chang bla dang / mnyam pa'i 'jig rten gyi
234b5(phal chen): khams thams cad ma lus par chos kyi dbyings la yang dag par gzhol ba'i tshul gyis lus 'jam klas rjes su 'gro ba kun nas gnas par 'gyu'o// chos kyis dbyings
234b6(phal chen): tshad dang mnyam pa'i chos snang ba mtha' dang dbus med pa thams cad dang mi 'jigs pa rnam dag par dag pa'i tshig gi gcig brjod pas sems can gyi khams ma lus pa zas
234b7(phal chen): cad kyi ji tsam gcod cing sems dang dbang po dang bsam pa khong du chud par byed pas tshim par byed pa dang / bla na med pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jig
234b8(phal chen): pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi che ba nyid dang ye shes la 'jug pa shin tu 'phags pa dang / chos mngon par shes pa la gnas
235a1(phal chen): par bya ba kun nas gnas par 'gyur te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yongs su bsngo ba/ chos kyi
235a2(phal chen): tshad med pa zhes bya ba bcub ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi sbyin pa las phyogs pa'i dge ba'i rtsab thams cad bsngo ba des yongs su bsngos su byang chub
235a3(phal chen): sems dpa' kun tu bzang ba'i spyod pa dang / smon lam mtha' dang bus med pa yongs su rdzogs pa 'thob par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing chos
235a4(phal chen): kyi dbyings kyis klas pa nam mkha' mthas gdugs pa thams cad yongs su dag pa 'thob par 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad kyis kyang rab tu thob par bya ba la brtson par bya/
235a5(phal chen): bar 'gyur ro// chos thams cad la 'jug pa'i ye shes mtha' dang dbus med pa thams cad yongasu 'grub par 'gyur ro// sems bskyes pa mtha' dbus med pa thams cad kyis
235a6(phal chen): cig re re las sangs rgyas bskyed pa thams mthong ba rab tu 'thob cing khong du chud par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams kyi rnam par 'phrul ba dang / rgya chen po'i rnam par
235a7(phal chen): 'phrul ba dang / bsgribs pa med pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa/ bsam gyi khyab pa'i rnam par dag par 'phrul pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad rnam par dag par 'phrul pa dang / 'di/
235a8(phal chen): rten gyi khams thams cad byin gyis rlob cing brtan par byed pa'i rnam par 'phrul ba dang / shin tu bstan pa brjod du med pa'i rnam par 'phrul ba dang / dus thams cad du rnam
235b1(phal chen): par 'phrul ba'i mngon pa shes pa dang / ye shes dang phyir mi ldog pa'i byin gyis chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbus med pa tham cad ma lus par rgyas par 'gengs pa la 'dun
235b2(phal chen): cing khong du chud par 'gyur ro// kun tu bzang po'i mig mtha' dang dbus med pa mngon par bsgrubs pa yongasu rdzogs pa thob par 'gyuraro// mtha' dang dbus med pa'i chos bstan
235b3(phal chen): bachags pa med pa'i rna ba'i ye shes khong du chud par yang 'dzin par 'gyur ro// chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbus med pa thams cad lus kyi skyil mo krung cig gis yongasu rgyas
235b4(phal chen): bar byin gyis rlobs kyang sems can thams cad la gnod pa med par byed par gyur ro// dus gsum mtha' dang dbus med pa thams cad la 'jug pa'i ye shes 'byam klas pa
235b5(phal chen): yongasu rdzogs pa 'thob cing khong du chud par 'gyur ro// blo mtha' dang dbus med pa thams cad rnam par dag pa dang // sems can thams cad rnams par dag pa dang / chos
235b6(phal chen): thams cad rnam par dag pa dang / skye mched yongs su shes pa'i ye shes thams cad rnam par dag pa dang / mamakha'i dbyings mtha' dang dbus med pa thams cad la 'jug cing rgya
235b7(phal chen): bar 'gengs pa'i ye shes par dag pa dang / sems can gyi ris dang / skyes gnas rnam pa sna tshogs su gyur pa thams cad nas byung ba'i sgra dang smra ba dang / skad thams cad ma lus
235b8(phal chen): pal mngon sum gyi ye shes rnam par dag pa dag pa dang / 'jig rten khams thams cad ma lus par rnam pa mtha' ba'i 'od gzer dang / 'od kyi kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu gang
236a1(phal chen): ma nga bras med pa snang bar byung ba sa pa dag pa d+ma/ shA sa byung smra sgru
236a2(phal chen): rnam par dag pa dang / 'das bram byon pa dang nga wA la byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor mtha' dang dbus pang ba lus pa thams kyi skad cig gcig tu'i jug pa'i ye
236a3(phal chen): shes rnam par dag pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi mngon par 'du bya ba thams cad lam lus pa la 'jug pas/ 'gro ba mtha' dang dbus med pa rnam par dag par bya
236a4(phal chen): rab tu 'thob par 'gyur ro// yongasu rdzogs par byed pa'o// rab tu sgrub po// rnam par dag par byed do// mnyam par byed do// mnyam par byed do// mngon sum du byed do//
236a5(phal chen): rtogs par byed do// khong du chud par byed do// yang dag par sems par byed do// rnam par dag pa thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thob par byed pa rjes su thob par byed do// de nas
236a6(phal chen): de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi rkyen gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgyam ga stong gi rdul shin tho bsnyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rnam badrug tu g.yas
236a7(phal chen): te g.yos so rab tu g.yos so// kun tu g.yos so// 'gul to// rab tu 'gul to// kun tu 'gul to// ldeg gor ba tu ldeg go// kun tu ldeg go// che mchen/ rab tu ches
236a8(phal chen): ces kun tu che mtsham mo// bum thum/ rab tu bum lus/ kun tu phur zur ro// shig shi ka rab tu shig shig/ kun tu ni gzhag// sangs rgyas kyi mthul dza chos nyid rab tu thab pas
236b1(phal chen): lhungs tsa ma thams sbyin gyinang mngon par 'bab bo// lhardzas kyi 'phreng ba 'i sbyin gyi bar mang par 'ab po/ l+h+wa rdzas kyi byam 'atsun gyir mngon par 'ab 'ag
236b2(phal chen): phyogs kyi sprin gyi char mngon par 'bab bo// lha rdzas kyi ring pa ches sprin gyi char mngon par 'bab bo// lha rdzas kyi lha ba ltab kyi sprin gyis mngon par 'bab bo/
236b3(phal chen): spos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par 'bab bo// lha rdzas kyi nor du rin po che'i sprin gyi char mngon par 'bab bo// lha rdzas kyi dus dang 'thun po'i tsan dan gyi sprin gyi che ma
236b4(phal chen): bar 'bab bo// lha rdzas kyi sbrul gyi snying po'i tshan dan na mchog gi sprin gyi char mngon par 'bab po// lA rdzas kyi gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan kha dog sna tshogs
236b5(phal chen): kyi sprin gyi mngon par 'bab bo// lha rdzas kyi lus grangs med pa'i sprin gyi char mngon par 'bab bo// lha rdzas kyi dbyings kyi yan lag brgyad stong brjod du med pa'i tshig dang /
236b6(phal chen): brjod du med pa la rtog pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa yid du 'ong bar spyod pa'i chos chen po'i sprin gyi char mngon par 'bab bo// lha rdzas kyi de bzhin gshegs pas spong ba'i
236b7(phal chen): sangs rgyas bsngags pa bsam gyi mi khyab pa'i sprin gyi char mngon par 'bazo po// lha rdzas kyi legs so zhes bya ba dang / lhung lU ldegs kyi sgra 'byin pa dang / dga' bar byed/
236b8(phal chen): pa'i dbyings kyi sprin gyi char mngon par 'bab bo// lha rdzas kyi lha'i lus bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med cing brjod du med pas rab tu btung ngo // lha yul gyi lha grangs
237a1(phal chen): med pa sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa la brtson par yid la byed cing de bzhin gshegs pa la shin dud pa'i sems kyi rgyud dang ldan pa sangs rgyas
237a2(phal chen): yam tan dang mi 'bral ba'i sems kyis mngon par gnas so// lha rdzas kyi rol mo brdung ba dang / dal ba'i sgra lnga'i rgyu'i dbyangs kyi tshul grangs med par grags pa/
237a3(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa mchog cing yid la bya ba la brtson pa rnams kyang rab tu bsgrags so// lha rdzas las shin tu m+bu'i 'od zer brgya stong grangs med pas kyang 'jig rten gyi
237a4(phal chen): khams chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa nam ka'i mthas gtugs pa thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi tha gru thams cad du rab tu snang bas khyab par byas so// lha rdzas la/
237a5(phal chen): 'das pa'i sprul pa dang sangs rgyas kyi yul grangs med pa bstan pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i cho 'phrul rnams kyang ying dag par bstan par 'gyur ro//
237a6(phal chen): bzhi pa 'di dga' ldan gyi gnas su lha'i dbang po rab dga'i ldan gyi khang pa na ji lta ba de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du yang phyogs bcu rgyas par bka
237a7(phal chen): zhing chos bstan pa 'di nyid du 'byung ngo // sangs rgyas kyi mthus phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi pha rol tu /
237a8(phal chen): nas kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin du phrag bsnyed kyi byang chub sems dpa' lpags nas phyogs bcu bkang ste/ 'di skad zer ro// kye rgyal bachi
237b1(phal chen): sras de la byad rgyas ngasu pan+da thamams tshang 'di bshad pa legs sa lags so// thertul ba'i sras bdag cagasus kyang mang rdo rje'i rdulas can shes na
237b2(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams kyi ming rdo rje'i 'od ces bya ba dag na de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan rdo rje'i dpral zhes bya ba bzhugs pa dag gi rlung nas// 'drir byin te kun
237b3(phal chen): yang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis 'khor gyi rnam par 'di lta bu dag na/ tshig 'di dag dang // yi ge 'di dag dang go bar bya ba 'di dag gi sa don 'di nyid ldog pa meng cing
237b4(phal chen): pa med par brjod de chos 'di nyid bston to// kye rgyal ba'i sras ngag bdag cag kyang de ltar phyogs bcu re re'i gling bzhi bdag gi dga' ldan gyi gnas kyi lha'i
237b5(phal chen): bor bdaga' ldan gyi khang pa rin po che thams cad kyi rgyan ces bya ba dag tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba sbed kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams byin
237b6(phal chen): mngon tu mthong ba sha stag/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis 'khor 'dir phyin to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan gyis phyogs bcur rnam par
237b7(phal chen): te 'khor thams sa cad la bltas nas chos kyis dbyings la rnam par blta ba dang / don dang tshig dang ye ges la rab tu 'dug pa dang / sems bskyed pa mtha' dang dbus
237b8(phal chen): med par yangs pa yongasu bsgom pa dang / 'gro ba la snying rje chen pos khyab par bya ba dang / dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi rigs su sems yang dag par 'brel ba
238a1(phal chen): bya ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yon tanal 'jug pa sanarnam cad kyi rnabs pa'i yus yang ga sar bsgru
238a2(phal chen): sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yang dag par shes par bya ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba ji ltar skyed pa 'ang ji ltar dus la 'bab pa la yang dag par blta ba dang / chos kyi lus
238a3(phal chen): kyi rjes su song ba'i gzugs kyi lus yang dag par bstan pa byed cing sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// de dag chos la
238a4(phal chen): tu mkhas gyur cig/ chos rgyud mtha' yas rnam par dag byas nas chos kyi 'od byed chos la kha lo sgyur/ chos rnams rab rtogs chags pa med pa thob/ de dag chos kyi
238a5(phal chen): lo sbyar 'gyur te// shin tu dkon pa'i chos rnams bston byed cing // chos kyi sgo la rab tu 'azhag bya bar// sems can mtha' yas phyogs su gos par byed/ de dag
238a6(phal chen): kyi gang cen mtsho 'thung zhing // chos nyid sprin char phyogs su rab tu 'bebs// 'jig rten khams su nyi ma gzhir shar cing // sems can phan phyir chos rnams bston pa
238a7(phal chen): byed/ de dag shin tu dkon pa'i sbyin bdag sde// chos kyi rnam tshul shes pa rje su thob/ chos kyi snang bas rab tu sems gsal ba// 'jig med 'jig rten dag du chos ra
238a8(phal chen): sngon shin tu dri mi chos kyi sems dang ldam chos kyi sgo la de dag rab tu gnas/ sgo rnams phyi ma mos de dag shin tu 'phags// 'jig rtem ngag tu chos tshad rnga yang
238b1(phal chen): dag na tu dkon can nas brjod cang / chas tshad bsang rnams yang das rmugs par byed nas nyid bsas pa yongs su ga byung cing// chos kyi gsem
238b2(phal chen): kun la ston/ chos kyi khang par rgyal bas bar bskur ba/ chos nyid ye zhes snying po'i lus dang ldan// chos kyi mtshan gni tshogs pa'i ye shes cas// de dasacho
238b3(phal chen): bzang ba'i chos la gnas// rgyal ba kun gyis gang la bsngon mdzad pa/ rab gi phul gyis gang zhig gnang gyur cing // skye dbang thams cad gang gis bsgred zur
238b4(phal chen): sbyin pa dam pa de dag sbyin pa byed// de dag chos kyi lus ldan shes dang ldan/ 'jig rten mkhas pa chos nyid sprul mang pas// chos kyi sgron ma 'grol phan pa'i
238b5(phal chen): ngoma'ab med par mtha' yas rab bston to// de dag chos bzang dam pa'i rab sbyin nas// dge ba de dag rjes su sems byed cing // 'jig rten dag tu dge ba gang byas paded ni/
238b6(phal chen): yongs su ma ni shes dang ldan pa yin// rang 'byung thams cad gang gis bskyed gyur pa'i// dge rtsa de dag 'gro ba'i don tu shes// thams cad rnam phye par dag gyur cing /
238b7(phal chen): sangs rgyas rgyan gyi pha rol phyin par byed// zhing kyi rgyan mang shin tu rgya che zhing // phyogs rnams kun tu de la tshad med pas// 'jig rten kun tu bsam lus rgyan ldan
238b8(phal chen): pa de 'dzin zhing rnams ma lus kun gyur cig/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i bal ye shes ci tsam pa// de 'drar sems can rnams dag ldan 'gyur te/ rgyal ba'i sras po
240a1(phal chen): po de bzhin tu/ yon tan kun gyis sems brgyan ldan byur jig/ de / rnam 'phrul shin tu rnam yangs pa// gang gis 'jig rten sa lus rgyas ga
240a2(phal chen): de'i spyod la shes rab bzang gnas par// sems cad ma lus 'gyur bar shog/ ji snyed 'jig rten ma lus gang drung / phyogs su rgyal bku gyis sangs rgyas// kun
240a3(phal chen): kun tu bzang po ji bzhin du// legs stod dram pa mchog dang ldan gyur cig/ yon tan rgyun rnams ji snyed gang yang rung / rgyal sras rnams dang rgyal bas thugs chung ba'i/
240a4(phal chen): tan gang la mtha' dang dbus med pa// yon tan de 'drar sems can kun gyur cig/ gang yang rdzu 'phrul spobos dang ldan pa rnams// 'jug pa kun las bslab pa su bsdu
240a5(phal chen): pa/ rnam 'phrul thams cad yang dag ston pa rnams// phyogs rnams thams cad rgyas par 'dod gyur cig/ sems kyi skad cig gcig gis rang byung rnams// 'dren pa sems can/
240a6(phal chen): kun dang mnyam mthong ste// chos thams cad ma lus bsdus byas shing // sgra rtse gcig tu mi mgon sdud gyur cig/ 'jig rten 'di na gro ba gang rgyu ba// gang rnams mi'i
240a7(phal chen): pas ma khyen gyur pa// de dang mnyam pa thams cad ma lus pa'i// 'jig rten mkhyen la mchod pa byed gyur cig/ spos kyi rgyud dang de bzhin me tog dang // gos kyi rgyud dang de
240a8(phal chen): bzhin gdug sa rnams kyis/ chos dbyings ma lus rgyas par gang byas shing / 'jig rten kun tu yid kyis 'gengs gyur cig/ sangs rgyas mtshan gyi rnam pa
240b1(phal chen): yas par swA rtse gcig tu thams cad bsdu ba yis// lhag mam bar lam rnams kun bsdus shing // 'jig rten smon la phyag 'tshal gyur par shog/ rgyal bde
240b2(phal chen): dag kun la phyag 'tshal te// thams cad lus kyi tshul gyis dung byed cing // phyogs rnams kun tu rgyal ba bston pas/ phyi ma'i bskal pa kun zad byed gyur cig se
240b3(phal chen): can gyi yid kyi bla yis// rgyal ba gcig la'ang mchod pa byed gyur cig/ ji ltar rgyal ba gcig mchod de bzhin du// skyes dbang ma lus kun la'ang mchong gyur cig de na/
240b4(phal chen): mchod pa'i yon tan brjod byed pas// 'gro ba kun tu bskal pa zang gyur kyang / skyes bu 'dul ba dpe zla med pa'i/ rgyal ba mchod pa'i mthar thug med gyur cig
240b5(phal chen): bkun nas bskal ma ji sbed pa// de snyed bskal par gyung bar snang byed cing // rgyal ba'i gcig la rim gro bya mas kyang / bskal pa thams cad ma lus zang gyur
240b6(phal chen): cig/ rgyal ba gcig la ci tsam brjod gyur pa// rgyal ba kun la'ang bskal ba de snyed de// bskal pa'i grangs kyis mthar thug ma gyur cig/ rgyal po'i spyod pas
240b7(phal chen): skye ba med gyur cig/ ji ltar chos dbyings rnam par dag pa dang // ji tsam rgyu chen yongs su mtha' yas pa// de snyed rgyan chen me tog bzang po rnams// thub mang sem
240b8(phal chen): can snyed la 'bul cig/ dri zhim ldan pa'i de bzhin phye ma dag/ gtsang zhing rnam dag rnam pa sna tshogs la/ 'gro ba kun ma pe zla dmigs med pa// de 'am/
241a1(phal chen): la bam tsha ba byed gyur ga/ ning rnam pa rgyam sems sumarnam pa yaM// rgyal pa gcig la gdugs rnams 'dul cingapa/ la
241a2(phal chen): la'ang de bzhin dga' byas pas// rgyal ba rnams la gdus mchod byed gyur cig/ byug pa pa ngam pa mchog tu gyur pa rnams// 'gro ba 'din gang la dpe med pa/
241a3(phal chen): de yis sangs rgyas mchod byed spyod pa yis// bskal mang sems can mnyam pa zad gyur cig/ de bzhin byug dang spos kyis phye ma dang / me tog bdug pa ni bza'
241a4(phal chen): spos rnams dang // rin chen ltab lhu ba mchod pa mtha' yas pa'i// rim 'gro skyo ba med par byed gyur cig/ 'jig rten sgron ma sems mnyam pa dag/ skad cig re rer
241a5(phal chen): byang chub 'tshang rgya ba// de dag yon tan mtha' yas brjod byed cing // skyes bu 'dul la mchod pa byed gyur cig/ sems can mnyam pa'i 'jig rten mkhyen pa
241a6(phal chen): la/ sems can mnyam pa'i bskal pa bgrangs byas shing // blo mchog ldan pa'i mchod pa byed pa ni// rgyal bas bshad kyang zad par ma gyur cig/ rgyal ba
241a7(phal chen): nams la 'dra'i mchod byed cing // sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul kun tu 'grengs byed pas// bzang dang ldan pa'i spyod la gnas bcas shing // sangs rgyas ma lus
241a8(phal chen): thams cad mthong gyur cing // 'gro kun dge ba'i ji snyed yod pa dang / byas dang byed gyur de bzhin byed pa dge/ bzang po ji bzhin de 'dra'i sa dag la// kun kyang /
241b1(phal chen): kun nas bzang por der gyur cig/ 'jig rten thams cad ma lus sems can rnams// ji snyed rgyal ba kun gyis thus chud pa// kun kyang mkhas pa kun kyis
241b2(phal chen): ba yi/ kun tu bzang de bzhin 'gyur bar shog/ phyogs rnams ma lus kun ji byas pa/ skyes bu ngam pa de ltar yongasu bsngo// rdo rje rgyal mtshan rgyal bsam
241b3(phal chen): gsungasangs pa// yongs bsngo dam pa mchog dang 'phrul yang yin// de bzhin zhing rnams thams cad ma lus par/ rgyu bzhin kun kyang khong du chud byas te/
241b4(phal chen): sems can ji snyed thams cad ma lus pa// de dag kun kyang kum bzang gyur cig/ sbyin pas yongs bsngo ji bzhin byed gyur cig/ tshul khrims kyis kyang ba
241b5(phal chen): bzhin red gyur cig/ brtson 'grus stobs kyis bskal bar mi ldog cing // bzod pas 'khrugs pa med pa'i yid gyur cig/ bsam gtan gyis kyang rtseg ci
241b6(phal chen): yid ldan zhing / ting 'dzin kun gyi dpyod yul shes gyur cig/ shes rab dus rnams gsum po thams cad du/ 'jig rten dag du mthar dmigs med gyur cig/
241b7(phal chen): lus dang ngag dang yid rnams thams cad kyang // rnam pa kun tu drug mkhas gyur cig/ spyod pa de dag thams cad ma lus par// kun kyang kun tu bzang por byed
241b8(phal chen): gyur cig/ ji ltar chos dbyings rlom pa'i sems med cing // de la spros dang chags pa med pa dang // mya ngan 'das dang bsgribs pa med pa ltar// de bzhin
242a1(phal chen): sems la rlom sems med gyur cig/ chos mkhas yongasu bsngo ba gang brjod pa// de ni rgyal bas gsungs pa'i bsngo ba ste/ mkhas pa
242a2(phal chen): spyod pa ji nas 'grub 'gyur bar/ dge ba yangs pa de'i yongasu bsngo// rgyal ba'i sras kyis 'di la bslab byas te// ji snyed gang yod thams cad ma lus hA/
242a3(phal chen): khams rnams kun kyang yongasu bsdu byas te// ci nas bde gshegs spobs la 'jug par bsngo// yangs pa ji snyed rgyal bas gsung ba dang // kun tu bza
242a4(phal chen): shes gang la gdags pa'i sgras rnams gang na gnas gyur pa'i// spyod pa de dag suM 'dod pas// sems can ma lus thams cad bgrang bar nus// dus sum sems kyangs
242a5(phal chen): lus kun bgrang nus/ ga la kun tu bzang por mi gdugs pa// rgyal sras de yi yon tan mtha' med de// nam kha spu rtses bgrang bar nus kyang srid / zhing rnams
242a6(phal chen): kun gying rdul kyang bzang bar rung // gang la rgyal sras drang srong chen gnas/ spyad pa de dag bzang bar mi nus so// chos kyi dbyings chad med pa zhes bya
242a7(phal chen): ste/ yongasu bsngo ba bcu pa'o// shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdol/ sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las/ rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyis yongasu bsngo ba'i le'u ste/
242a8(phal chen): sum cu ze'o// bam po bzhi bcu rtsa lnga pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das lnga'i rgyal po dbang sgyur gyi gnas kyin
242b1(phal chen): bu rin po che ma da'i khang pa nas// byang chub sems pa'i dge 'dun chen po thams cad kyang // bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir drim/
242b2(phal chen): pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dang gzhan nas 'dus pa/ sdug kun kyang byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes yul dang // spyod yul thams cad rab tu rna
242b3(phal chen): bas gnas pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ye shes kyi yul la 'jug cing / gzhol ba'i spyod yul ma btang ba/ 'gro ba thams cad yongasu smin pa
242b4(phal chen): bya ba dang // gdul bar bya'i dus bzhin du thogs pa'i byin gyi rlabs pa tha dad pas bya ba thams cad yang dag par ston pa la mkhas pa/ byang chub
242b5(phal chen): sems dpa'i smon lam thams cad mngon par bsgrub cing bskal pa dang / zhing dang dus spyod pa la gnas pa'i rgyun mi gcod pa byang chub sems dpa'i
242b6(phal chen): bsod nams dang / ye shes dang rdzu 'phrul tshogs yongasu rdzogs shing 'gro ba thams cad nye bar 'tsho ba mi zad pa la rab tu zhugs pa/ byang chub sems
242b7(phal chen): dpa'i shes dra ba dang / thebs thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dam pa thob pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pas 'khor ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i
242b8(phal chen): sgo yang dag par bstan cing shin tu bsgrubs pa'i rgyun mi gcod pa/ byang chub sems pa'i bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang /
243a1(phal chen): snyoms par 'jug pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang rig pa dang / ye shes la rnam par rol pa'i mngon par shes pas bya ba thams
243a2(phal chen): cad yang dag par bsnyon pa la mkhas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul dang / stobs dang / dbang thams cad thob cing mngon par 'du bya ba/ med pa'i sem
243a3(phal chen): skad cig gis de bzhin gshegs pa thabs kyi 'khor kyi dkyil 'khor du 'dong ba la sngun du 'dren pa'i gtam gyi skyes bu dam pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams
243a4(phal chen): cad kyi chos kyi khor lo yang dag par bzung ba dang / sangs rgyas la mchod pa dang / rim gro rgya chen po bya ba'i don tu mngon par brtson pa/ byang chub sems
243a5(phal chen): dpa'i las thams cad la yang dag par blang blang ba mnyam pa nyid kyi sbyor pas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du lus kyi gzugs brnyan rab tu 'byung ba/ chos
243a6(phal chen): gyi dbyings thams cad du chags pa med pa'i dbyings rab tu sgrogs pas dus gsum thams cad du chags pa med pa'i sems dang / ye shes kyi yul rgyas pa
243a7(phal chen): 'gengs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan dang nan tan yongasu rdzogs pa thams cad bskal pa brjod du med par rgyun mi 'chang bar yang dag par bstan
243a8(phal chen): pa la yon tan bsngags shing brjod pa zang shes bsha stag ste/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying po dang / byang chub sem
243b1(phal chen): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin po che'i snying po dang // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad+ma'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
243b2(phal chen): po dpal gyi snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad+mo dpal gyi snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma'i
243b3(phal chen): snying po dang // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gtsang ba'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po dang / zung chu
243b4(phal chen): sems dpa' sems dpa'i blo zla ba'i dri ma med pa'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyan rnams par dgod pa thams cad rang
243b5(phal chen): snang bar bston pa'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes rnam par snang ba'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems
243b6(phal chen): dpa' chen po dpal yid du 'ong ba'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po can ngan dpal gyi snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa'
243b7(phal chen): sems dpa' chen po me tog dpal gyi ba snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po me tog rgyas pa dpal gyi snying po dang / byang chub sen
243b8(phal chen): dpa' sems dpa' chen po dpal lha'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsod nams dpal gyi snying po dang / byang chub sems
244a1(phal chen): dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsgribs pa med pa'i ye shes rnam par dag pa dpal gyi snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
244a2(phal chen): yan tan dpal gyi snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chem dpal gyi snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dri ma med pa'i
244a3(phal chen): po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji sa dang bral ba'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbas pa sna tshogs kyi rgyun gyi snying
244a4(phal chen): dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od gzer gyi rna ba chen po rab tu snang ba'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di drims
244a5(phal chen): bA'i dpal gyi gzi'i brjid bzang po'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzung zhing dri ma med pa'i dbyig gis sprul pa'i gzi ljid mchis pa'i
244a6(phal chen): snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mtshan thams cad kyis brtan pas rnam par dag pa'i dpal gyi snying po dang // byang chub sems pa
244a7(phal chen): sems dpa' chen po dpal gyi be'u rdo rje 'od 'phro bas rgyan pa'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od 'bar zhing 'phro ba'i dpal gyi snying/
244a8(phal chen): bo dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skar ma'i rgyal po 'ong rab tu snang ba'i sring pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nas
244b1(phal chen): zagapa brlabs pas pa TA dang / byang chub rnams dpa' sems dpa' chan po dbyangs kyi dkyis 'khor bsgribs pa nang pargya ro ldan nas rung bdang /
244b2(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzungs kyi yon tan gyis 'gro ba thams cad kyi sngon lam yang dag par 'dzin pa'i snying po dang / byang chub sems
244b3(phal chen): sems dpa' rnon po rgya mtsho'i rgyan gyi snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ri rab dpal gyi snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sos
244b4(phal chen): dpa' chen po yon tan thams cad rnam par dag pa'i snying po dang // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsnying po dang / byang chu
244b5(phal chen): sems po'i sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas dpal gyi snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par 'grol ba'i zla ba dang / de dag las
244b6(phal chen): stsogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshang med pa gzhal du med pa/ grangs med/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ mtshungs pa med pa/ dpag tu med pa/
244b7(phal chen): kun tu mtha' yas pa/ mu myed pas mtshungs pa med pa/ brjod du med pa'i brjod du med pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying po las sos
244b8(phal chen): pa/ sangs rgyas kyi ning blo tshogs nas 'dus pa ga sug dang / thabs cig tu bzhugs so// de nam de'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' cheman rdo rje
245a1(phal chen): po sangs rgyas kyi mthus theg pa chen po rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dang /
245a2(phal chen): chen po rdo rje'i snying po byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin theg pa chen po rab tu snang ba de la mnyam par bzhag ma thag tu/ de nas de'i tshe phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten
245a3(phal chen): gyi phyogs re re'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba phrag bcu'i rdul shin pa bsnyed pha rol tu nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas k+Shi bye ba phrag bcu'i rdul
245a4(phal chen): sbyin tu tha bsnyed kun kyang / mtshan rdo rje snying po zhes par 'thun pa gsug gis nal mngon par bstan te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis de la 'di skad ces bka
245a5(phal chen): stsal to// rigs kyi bu de ltar khyod byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin theg pa chen po rab tu snang ba la snyoms par zhugs pa legs leg so// 'di ltar rigs kyi bu khyod la byo
245a6(phal chen): bcu'i sangs kyis bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snying kun kyang mtshan rdo rje'i snying po zhes bya bar 'thun pa sha stag gis/
245a7(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das de zhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad 'di'i sngon gyi smon lam gyi byin gyi rlabs dang / khyod nyid
245a8(phal chen): kyi ye shes kyi khyad par gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi chos snang ba bsam gyi khyab par rab tu brjod cing ye shes kyis sa la 'jug par bya
245b1(phal chen): dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams car yang dag par bsdu ba dang / sangs rgyas chos thams cad rab tu dbye ba la mkhas par bya ba dang / chos thams cad la ye shes shin tu yangs
245b2(phal chen): par bya ba dang / shin tu logs par gnas pa'i chos rab tu bstan pa dang / ye shes tha mi dad pa rnam par snang ba dang / 'jig rten gyis kyi chos thams cad kyis gos
245b3(phal chen): pa med par bya ba dade/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yong su dag par bya ba dang / ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i yul khong du chud par bya ba nas
245b4(phal chen): thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi yul gyi bar du khong du chud par bya ba dang / 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i sa ma nor bar rnam par dgod pa shin tu bstan pa dang /
245b5(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la yang dag par dmigs par bya ba dang / zag pa med pa'i chos kyi bye brag rnam par bsgom pa dang / rnam par dbye ba shin tu rnam pa
245b6(phal chen): phye ba'i shes rab kyi snang ba chen po la mkhas pa'i ye shes kyi rgyan thob par bya ba dang // shin tu brtagasu pa'i ye shes kyi sgo la 'jug par bya ba dang / gnas kyi
245b7(phal chen): rnams pa ji rigs su brjod pa dang // spobs pa'i snang ba dma' ba med pa thob par bya ba dang / tha dad pa yang drag par shes pa chen po'i sa shin tu rtogs par
245b8(phal chen): bya ba dang / byang chub sems la dran pa nyam pa med par bya ba dang / sems can gyi khams thams cad yongasu smin par bya ba dang / thams cad du song ba'i blon
245b9(phal chen): thams cad du sangs rgyas skye ba grangs pa la rim gro dang mchod pa chen po bya ba rgyun mi 'chad pa'i smon lam chen po mngon par sgrub po// 'dis
245b10(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsungs pa'i chos kyi tshul yang dag par bzung ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byang chub yang dag par blang ba dang / yang dag
245b11(phal chen): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bstan pa/ yang phrar bsrung ba'i phyir chos kyi dbyings kyis klas par rgya che ba/ na ma ka'i dbyings kyis mthar thug pa'i
245b12(phal chen): phyi ma'i mtha'i thug pa bskal grangs pa thams cad kyi sangs rgyas 'byung ba 'grangs pa'i dam pa'i chos yongs su bzung ba'i rgyun mi 'chad pa'i smon lam chen po
245b13(phal chen): mngon par sgrub po// 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'bram klas pa thams cad ma lus pa'i sangs rgyas skye ba thams cad kyi dga' ldan gyi pho brang ngam pa na/ bcu
245b14(phal chen): pa las sogs te 'pho ba dang / gshegs pa dang / snyun bzhugs pa dang / skye ba dang / gzhon rol pa dang / btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang na bzhugs pa dang / mngon par
245b15(phal chen): 'byung ba dang / dka' ba spyad pa dang / snying po byang chub du gshegs pa dang / bdud 'dul ba dang / mngon par 'tshang rgya ba dang / gsol ba btab pa dang / chos kyi kho
245b16(phal chen): ma chen po bskor ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa chen po ston pa'i drung ngu 'tsho zhing / mchod pa dang / rim tho bya ba dang / dam pa'i chos yang dag par bzung ba spor ba/
245b17(phal chen): mas cad dus mchas tu mngon par bsgrub par byang chos kyi byings kyi mas par rgyan che ba/ rnam mapani dbyings ma par zhug pa/ phyi mchim pa'i slang drug pa/ @#
245b18(phal chen): barmongs pa thams cad du sangs rgyas 'byung ba grangs pa'i drung du 'gro ba nas mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i bar gyi drung du 'gro ba rgyun mi 'chang ba'i smon lam chen/
245b19(phal chen): po mngon par bsgrub bo// 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa tshad med pa mi phrogs tha mi dad pa pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyis/
245b20(phal chen): yang ngan par bsdus pas yongs su sbyang pa'i yan lag dang / nye ba'i yan lag du bcas pa/ mngon par sgrub pa dang / mtshan nyid dang / bye brag gi mtshan nyid
245b21(phal chen): du bcas pa dang / 'grub pa dang / 'jog pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod par gtogs pa thams cad dang / sa ji lta ba bzhin dang / ji lta bur bstan pa dang
245b22(phal chen): pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su spyad pa la gangams ngag dang man ngag sbyin pas nye bar brtan pa'i sems bskyed pa mngon par bsgrub phyir chos kyi dbyings kyis rmas
245b23(phal chen): par rgya che ba nam mkha'i ngo byings kyi mthar thug pa/ phyi ma'i mthar sur thug pa/ bskal pa grangs pa thams cad du spyod pa 'grangs pa/ sems bskyed pas mngon pa
245b24(phal chen): bsgrub pa rgyun ma 'chang ba'i smon lam chen po mngon par bsgrub bo// 'di lta ste// sems can gyi khams thams cad ma lus ma lus pa/ lhag ma med pa maH/
247a1(phal chen): sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying po la reg ma thug tu/ de nyid kyi tshe ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag la smras
247a2(phal chen): par kye rgyal ba'i sras dag byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam 'di ni shin tu za ba par gdon mi za ba ste/ tha mi dad pa bltar med pa chos kyi dbyings kyis klas
247a3(phal chen): par yangs pa/ na ma ka'i dbyings kyi mthar thug pa/ phyi ma'i tha'i mur thug pa sas rgyas kyi zhing thams cad dang / sems can gyi khams thams cad du rgyas par khyab pa/
247a4(phal chen): 'gro ba thams cad yongs su bskyob pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis brlabs pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag des ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
247a5(phal chen): chen po rnams 'angasmra pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi ye shes kyis la yang rab tu 'jug par 'gyuraro// ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
247a6(phal chen): rnams kyi ye shes kyis la yang rab tu 'jug par 'gyur ro// da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis la yang rab tu 'jug par 'gyur ro//
247a7(phal chen): rtul ba'i sras ngag de la bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes kyis rnams// gang la bsams te bdag gis de skad du smras pa/ de dag
247a8(phal chen): ni 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / ngal 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan ldan 'das kyis gsungs so// gsung ngo // gsung bar 'gyur ro// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lnga ste/
247b1(phal chen): rab tu dga' zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po dang / dri ma dang bral ba zhes bya ba chub sems dpa'i sa gnyis pa dang / 'od byed pa zhes bya ba byang
247b2(phal chen): tshu sems dpa'i sa gsum pa dang / 'od 'gro ba can zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa bzhi pa dang / rgyal bar dka' ba zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems
247b3(phal chen): dpa'i sa lnga pa dang / mngon sum zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa'i sa drug pa dang / ring du spong ba zhes pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa bdun pa dang / mig ma
247b4(phal chen): zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa rgyad pa dang / legs pa'i blo gros zhes bya bya chub sems dpa'i sa dgu pa dang / chos kyi sprin zhes bya ba byang chub
247b5(phal chen): sems dpa'i sa bcu pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de rnams ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu ste/ de ni 'das pa dang / mad+yo//
247b6(phal chen): pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gsung so// gsung ngo // gsung bar 'gyur ro// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag bdag gis ni sa
247b7(phal chen): rgyas kyi zhing gang na'ang de bzhin gshegs dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu po 'di dag mi gsung
247b8(phal chen): de ltar bu mthong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam yongs su spyod//
246a1(phal chen): par gnod mi za ba la mkhas pa rab tu 'thob par bya ba'i phyir byin gyis brlabs mdzod do// de bas na rigs kyi bu khyod kyis chos sgor rab tu dbye
246a2(phal chen): lakhas par 'gyur ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las sangs kyi mthu dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes snang ba'i byin gyi rlabs kyis rang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongasu dag
246a3(phal chen): par bya ba dang / chos kyi dbyings shin tu sbyang ba dang / sems can gyi khams thams cad la phan dgas pa dang / chos kyi sku'i ye shes kyi lus la 'jug par bya ba dang /
246a4(phal chen): sangs rgyas thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba yang dag par blang ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du shin tu 'phags po'i lus 'byung bar bya ba dang / 'jig rten gyi
246a5(phal chen): lam gyi rgyud thams cad las yang dgra par 'da' bar bya ba dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi tshul yongs su dag par bya ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye
246a6(phal chen): shes yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir spos pa skyed cig/ de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis byang chub dpa' rdo rje'i snying po la zil gyis mi non pa
246a7(phal chen): lus nyer bar bsgrub pas nga ngo // thugs pa mdzo pa'i skabs pas shin tu bston pa nye bar bsgrub pas // sbyangs pa'i segs rnam par bye ba la/ 'jug
246a8(phal chen): bar bsgrub par mdzad do// dran pa nyams pa med pa'i byin gyis brlabs nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do// blo gros shin tu nges par rtogs pas mkhas pa nye bar bsdu
246b1(phal chen): zam da // rnams cad kyi rjes su song ba'i rjes 'gro ba nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi stobs thub pa med pa nye bar bsgrub pa
246b2(phal chen): mdzad do// de ba zhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa che zhing zhum pa med pa nye bar bslab pa mdzad do// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang tha dad pa yang dag par mkhyen
246b3(phal chen): bas rnam par dbye ba'i chos kyi tshul shin tu rtogs par bya ba nye bar bsgrub pa'i mdzad do// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi rnan
246b4(phal chen): shin tu rnam par bya ba mngon par bsdu ba nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do// / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni nge 'dzin de nyid kyi chos zhing rab tu thob par dang / sngon gyi smon la
246b5(phal chen): gyis mngon par bsgrubs pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa shin tu rnam par bsgrubs pa dang / ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor shin tu spangs pa dang // tshogs shin tu bsdug
246b6(phal chen): pa dang / yongs su spyad ba shin tu byas pa dang / dran pa'i snod chad med pa dang / mos pa rnam par dag cing 'ong shin tu bas gang pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo tha mi dad pa
246b7(phal chen): rlung / chos kyi spyi shes kyi phyag rgyas nan tu btab pa'i phyir re/ de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis de dag ni bzhugs bzhin du rdzu 'phrul gyi mdun
246b8(phal chen): so so nas phyogs g.yas pa brkyangs te byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying po'i mgo la byug pa mdzad do// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis byang chub
248a1(phal chen): chos snang ba'i sgo 'di ni yang dag phul zhes bya ba yin te/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i sa rnams par dgod pa shin tu bstan pa'o// kye rgyal
248a2(phal chen): ba'i sras ngag gnas 'di ni bsam gyi mi khyab pa ste/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes pa'o// de nas de ltar byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying po byang chub sems
248a3(phal chen): dpa'i bcu po 'di dag ming tsam zhig brjod de cang mi zer bar 'dug nas/ de las rab tu phyes te ma bshad pa dang / de nas byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de dag thams cad
248a4(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu po de dag ming tsam zhig thos la/ sa rab tu phyes te ma brjod pas/ sgom par gyur nas/ de dag 'di snyam du sems sa te/ de ltar byang chub
248a5(phal chen): sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying pos byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu po de dag gi ming tsam zhig brjod de cang mi zer bar 'dug nas/ de las rab tu phye zhing mi bston pa de la rgyu
248a6(phal chen): ni gang rkyen nin zhig yod snyam pa dang / de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor 'dus pa de na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par grol ba'i zla
248a7(phal chen): zhes bya ba 'dus shing 'dug 'dug ste/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams par grol ba'i zla bas/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de dag gi sems yongasu
248a8(phal chen): shes nas/ byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying po la glu'i dbyangs kyis tshigs su bcad de don de rnaMs so// ri phyir rtogs pa rnam par dag cing // dran dang ye shes ldan
248b1(phal chen): pa yis sa'i mchog ni brjod byas te// mkhas pas rnam par bye mi bshad// 'di kun nges par rtogs pa ste// byang chub sems dpa' grags chen yin/ ji dri
248b2(phal chen): khyod kyis brjod do// rab tu phye ba bshad mi bgyi// rgyal sras 'jigs med 'di na ni// kun kyang shin tu nyam par 'dod// sa yi don tshul yang dag du/ rnam par byed/
248b3(phal chen): bshad pa mdzong // 'khor 'di shin tu rnam dag ste/ le lo med cing dge dang ldan// dag pa'i mchog la gnas pa ste// yon tan ye shes ldan pa yi// phan tshun cig la gcig
248b4(phal chen): lnga zhing / kun kyang rim gro bcas par gnas// spang ci ji lta spang min pa/ de ltar bdud rtsi mchog kyang 'dod// rdo rje sring po 'jigs meng pa// shes rab chen pos de zam
248b5(phal chen): nas/ 'khor rnams dga' bar bya ba'i phyir// bde bar gshegs pa'i sras la smras// sangs rgyas skur ba yang dag 'byung bas na/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rab
248b6(phal chen): bstan cing // sa rgyud dam pa rnam par dbye bya ba// de ni rmad byung mchog tu dka' ba yin// phra zhing blta dka' rnam par rtog pa spangs// sems kyis dang bral bas
248b7(phal chen): bslab par dka'// mkhas pa rnams kyi zag med spyod yul to// 'gro ba rnams kyis de thos mos par rdo rje lta bur bsam par ba gzhag ste// sangs rgyas ye shes mchog
248b8(phal chen): la mos byas shing // bdag med pa yi sems kyis shes na// ye shes dam pa 'di gzod mnyan par nus// ji ltar bar snang tshon ris bri ba dang // namakha'i dbyings la rlung
249a1(phal chen): gnas ji bzhin du// de ltar ye shes zag pa med pa yang // shin tu blta dka' thub pas rnams par phye// de la bdag gi sems ni 'dis
249a2(phal chen): byed dasang sangs rgyas ye shes dam pa bsam yas la// 'gro ba gang rnams dad par byed dgon zhes// de'i phyir nam smras ma bshad do// de skad ces smra ba dang //
249a3(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' rnam par grol ba'i zla ba bas/ byang chub sems dpa'i rdo rje'i snying po la/ 'di skad ces smras so// kye rgyal ba'i sras 'khor 'di ltar
249a4(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'di dag la bsam pa shin tu sbyangs pa/ kun tu rtogs pa yongs su sbyangs pa spyod par shin tu sbyang ba/ tshogs shin tu bsngags pa

249a6(phal chen): pa dang lhag pa'i bsam ba la ra ba gnas pa/ gzhan drin mi 'jog pa sha stag tshogs pas yongasu dag pa yin gyis// kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin gshegs
249a7(phal chen): pa'i byin gyis legs par bshad pa mdzod cig/ byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag thams cad ni rnam pa 'di ltar bu'i gnas// zab mo la mngon sum du gnas pa
249a8(phal chen): sha m+ba go// ni nas byang chub sems dpa' rnam par grol ba'i zla bas/ don 'di cing gsal bar bslab pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje snying po la tshogs su
249b1(phal chen): ma rgyang chub sems dpa'i stong pa 'i med pa// sa rnams rab bye nam 'gong brtags pa yi// ye shes slong ning byang chub 'thob byed pa/ mtshan dang dam na
249b2(phal chen): rnamirnapa sathong // mabar ni dag pazhin mongs med pa'i mchog/ mos deng bsam pa nyin du sbyangs pa ste/ spangs rdzus bye 'a mang la spyod/ su 'di bdag la yid ces la
249b3(phal chen): yi/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying pos/ byang chub sems dpa' rnam par grol ba'i zla ba la 'di skad ces smras so// kye rgyal ba'i sras 'khor 'di ltar byang chub
249b4(phal chen): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi rnam pa 'di lta bu'i gnas/ bzab mo la bsam pa shin tu sbyangs/ kun tu rtog pa yongs su sbyangs pa// spyad pa shin tu spyod pa/

249b6(phal chen): babral bar mos pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa la rab tu gnas pa// gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa sha stag tshogs pas shin tu dag pa yin na// 'on kyang sems can mos pa chung
249b7(phal chen): du gzhan dag gis zab mo rnam pa 'di lta bu bsam gyi mi khyab pa'i gnas dag thos par gyur la/ thos nas kyang the tsom dang yid gnyis su gyur na/ dge la yun ring por gnad
249b8(phal chen): pa dang / don med pa dang mi bde ba'i rgyur 'gyur bas 'di lta zhig du snying brtse ba'i phyir bdag ni cang mi zer bar 'dug pa nyid du mos so// de nas byang chub chub sems na
250a1(phal chen): rdo rje'i snying pos don 'di nyid gsal bar bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// 'khor 'di rnam dag shes rab yangs pa ste// zab
250a2(phal chen): cing gsal ba'i spyod ldan rtogs shes shing // gzhan dring mi 'jog ri rgyal bzhi mi g.yo// bsam rtog mi 'khrug rgya mtsho chen po'ang // 'on kyang ma togs thos shing ma ches 'a
250a3(phal chen): drungan song ltung // de dag snying brtses ye shes ngas ma shang / de nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams par grol ba'i ba'i zla bas/ yang byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying po la

250a5(phal chen): 'di dag kyang gzhan du mi 'gyur ba dang / legs par yid ches par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras de ni 'di ltar sa shin tu bstan pa/ 'di bshad pa'i
250a6(phal chen): chos nying ra tu thob pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang dgongs par 'gyur/ byang chub sems can thams cad kyang / ye shes kyis 'di yongs su srung ba'i don tu rab tu
250a7(phal chen): nga// de sa pa'i phyir nan/ 'dzin myong pa'i dang zas/ 'di na sa sa rgyas sa pa nga par sgrug ba n+d+ha s+ho// rtul ba'i mas 'as
250a8(phal chen): dper/ yi ge dang 'bru grangs pa'i steng du bstan pa de dag thams cad kyi sngon du 'gro ba yang yi zhi'i byeb mo// tha mar ying le ge'i phyir mo la thug ste/ mi ge'i phyim
250b1(phal chen): nanan na / sa sa
250b2(phal chen): bas su sman du / rab zlu mo sems kyim dzum par 'gyur bam pa'i ma byur gyu par// de rgyal pams
250b3(phal chen): ma po med nga rdzogs pasems kyang sa mas rkyen gyis rnaM thas ma dang/ sa kyang
250b4(phal chen): don 'di nyid gsal bar bsdus pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje snying po la tshigs su bcad de smras pa// sa dang spyong 'jug byang chub 'gyur ba ye shes ba

250b6(phal chen): nga gnas ston la dgongs pa mdzad// 'di ni dang po zhugs pa'i shes spyod 'di'i mthar thug ste/ rgyal ba'i chos rab gzhal yas ji snyed de dag 'byung gas
250b7(phal chen): 'di/ yi ge 'grangs pa phyi mo'i rjes 'gro sngon du 'gro ba ltar// de bzhin mas ma mchog zlo'i yul du tha ma thug par 'dod// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag tham
250b8(phal chen): cad kyis dbyangs kyi rdo gcig tu glu'i dbyangs kyis tshig su gcad de// byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying po la don de nyid kyi phyir gsal ba btab pa// zo yangs
251a1(phal chen): dam pa'i phul mnga' ba// spobs pa mtha' yas rnams par dbye ba rtogs mkhyen pas// yid du 'ong ba'i gsung dbyangs kyis// kun la bar do//
251a2(phal chen): dam pa bshad pa mdzod// dran dang dga' bas spyod dag pa// stobs bcu'i stobs kyi shugs stsogs yon tan ldan pa'i sa'i dam mchog gi rnams// tha dad yang dag don
251a3(phal chen): in rjod par shod// zhi sdom pasmra ba'i smra ba'i lam rnams kun kyis brjod pa dga'// de dag sa dang spyod pa 'dra bas// smra bar dka' na bstan par ga la nus// de ni
251a4(phal chen): lam rnam par sbrengs/ ye shes mngon sgrubs rgyal ba'i spyod yul te// phung po bskye mched khams kyis bskyod pa min// sems kyi mi shes yid kyis
251a5(phal chen): k+Shas// ji ltar bar snang gnas kyi blo'o rjes// shin tu sgra dka' bstan par mi nus pa// de ltar bde gshegs sras kyis rnams kyang // mid dang sems
251a6(phal chen): sa mi nus// 'on kyang thams dang spyi rje'i sgrom la marnaMs// de las phyogs sa rim pa'i rdul bzhin du/ bshad par byas te sems kyi byung
251a7(phal chen): shes tshul gyis rdzogs par bya// de 'dra'i spyod yul phra zhing blta dka' ba// rang rig yin pas brjod par mi nus kyang / 'on kyang bde bar gshegs pa
251a8(phal chen): sa// thams cad 'thun par nan tan gyis so nyon// ye shes sa dang stong 'juga'i 'dra ba// bskal pa bye bar zad par mi nus so// yang dag rdo /
251b1(phal chen): gnas pa lngas/ mngatsas bshad kyis de ga mnyan par gyis/ rgyun ming nan tan yod bar su son gcos pa gshegs byin gyi bdag gis
251b2(phal chen): da la yi ge mnyam pa yi// chos sgyu dam pa bdag gis brjod par bya// 'di ni tshig gis brjod par shin tu dka'/ de ltar chad med bde gshegs
251b3(phal chen): du thigs gcig 'dra bdag gis las 'di la// de ring zhugs kyis bshang ba ma nyams par gyis/ kye rgyal ba'i sras ngag de la sems can dag
251b4(phal chen): khastsoms pa/ spyad pa shin tu spyad pa/ cho gas shin tu bstsags pa/ sangs rgyas khyang ba shin tu bsnyen bskur ba chos dkar po shin tu bsdus pa
251b5(phal chen): sa gnyen gyis shin tu bzung ba/ bsam pa yongs su dag pa/ lhag pa'i bsla ba shin tu rgya chen po can/ mos pa rgya chen po dang ldan pa'i snying rje
251b6(phal chen): don du gyur pa/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la mngon par mos pa rnams rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la sos pa dang / stobs bcu'i stobs
251b7(phal chen): thob par bya ba dang / mi 'jigs pa chen po thob par bya dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos mnyam pa nyid thob par bya ba dang / 'gro ba thams cad yongs su skye ba par bya
251b8(phal chen): ba dang // snying brtse ba dang / snying rje chen po yongasu dag/ phyogs bcu ma lus par thogs pa med pa'i ye shes mngon du 'gyur bar bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing
255a1(phal chen): sems dpa' ni snying rje chen po sngon du 'gro bas/ lhag pa'i bsam mnyams shing mi dma' bas de bas kyang de bas kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad
255a2(phal chen): yang dag par bsdu ba'i phyir rab tu brtson par byed do// kye rgya ba'i su dag de dad pa las sbyar ba dang / mos pa mang ba dang / yid ches pa shin tu rnam par dag pa dang /
255a3(phal chen): rtog pa mang ba dang / snying brtse ba dang / snying rje mngon par bsgrub pa dang / byams pa chen po dang ldan pa dang / yid skyo ba med pa dang / ngo tsha shes pa dang / khrel yod
255a4(phal chen): pa'i rgyan dang / bzod cing nges pa dang ldan pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi bstan pa la rim gro dang /
255a5(phal chen): bkur sti dang / ri mo yod pa dang / nyin mtshan du mi mngom par dge dge ba'i rtsa ba stsogs pa dang // dge ba'i banyen la bsnyen pa dang / chos kyi dga' bar gnas pa
255a6(phal chen): dang / mi ngoms par du thos par tshol ba dang / ji skad du thos chos la tshul bzhin du rtogs pa dang / gnas med pa'i yid dang / 'thob pa dang / bkur sI dang /
255a7(phal chen): bsngags pa la chags pa med pa dang / yo byad thams cad la 'phangs par sems shing chags pa med pa dang / sems bskyed pa rin po che lta bus ngoms par
255a8(phal chen): bsgrub pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sa la mngon par mos pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i spobs dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa la dmigs
255a9(phal chen): 'a'adri ba pa
255b1(phal chen): la tu phyin pa'i tshogs yongasu tshol ba dang / stu rang ga yong sa sangs pa dang / ba skad du smras pa de lar byed pa dang cag tu rgyan mi lang bar bad /
255b2(phal chen): tshig gi rjes srung ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la sbyin tu 'gyur bar mi byed pa dang // byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa mi gtsang ba dang // ri'i dbang po rgyal
255b3(phal chen): po ltar/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems mi bskul ba dang / 'jig chen gyi bya ba thams cad la mngon par dga' ba med pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i
255b4(phal chen): ba'i lab dang ldan pa dang / mi ngom par byang chub kyi yan lag gi tshogs rab tu sngags pa dang / rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par gong nas gong du khyad 'bogs pa'i lamachol
255b5(phal chen): ba dang / sa mngasu sbyong ba'i chos kyi rnam pa 'di lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa rab tu dga' ba la
255b6(phal chen): pa yin te/ de yang byang chub sems dpa'i sa rab tu dga' ba la de shin tu gnas shing / rnam pa 'di lta bu'i smon lam chen po dang brtson pa chen po dang // mngon par
255b7(phal chen): bsgrub pa chen po 'di dag mngon par bsgrub te 'di ltar sangs rgyas thams cad ma lus pa lag ma med pa mtha' dag la mchod cing rim gro bya ba'i phyir rnams pa'i
255b8(phal chen): tham cad mos pa rgya chen pos dag pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyis klas par che ba nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthar thug pa/ phyi ma'i mur thug pa/ bskal pa grangs pa
257a1(phal chen): ngag gzugs yod pa pa dang / gzugs med pa dang / 'du shes yod pa dang 'du shes med pa dang / 'du shes yod pa'ang ma yin/ 'du shes
257a2(phal chen): med pa'ang ma yin pa dang / sgo las skyes pa dang / mngal nas skyes pa dang / drong gsher las skyes pa dang / brdzus te byung ba dang / khams gsum du gtogs pa dang /
257a3(phal chen): 'gro ba drug du 'dus pa/ skye ba thams cad du gtogs pa'i sems can gyi khams thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos la gzung ba dang / lam kyi
257a4(phal chen): rgyud 'thad pa thams cad rgyun 'chad pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la dgod pa'i phyir chos kyi dbyings kyi daklas par rgya che ba/ nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthar thug pa
257a5(phal chen): phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa/ bskal pa 'grangs pa thams cad dang / sems 'grangs pa thams cad du sems can gyi khams yongs su smin par bya ba la rgyun mi chad pa'i smon la
257a6(phal chen): chen po mngon par sgrub bo// 'di lta ste// 'jig rten gyi khams yangs pa dang / dog pa dang / rgya chen po dang / chad med pa dang / za ba dang / che ba dang / snrel bzhi dang / spyi'u chus
257a7(phal chen): su rtsu ba thams cad mi lus pa lhags med pa mtha' dag ga cimanyam par yang dag par 'jug pa/ khongs chud par bya ba ngas mig 'phrul gyi rnam pa ler phyogs bcu'i rnas
257a8(phal chen): pamyi ngan pa ma lus pa'i rnam pa la 'jug pa/ rnam par phye ba'i ye shes khong du du chud cing mngon du 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir chos kyi dbyings kyis mas par rgya che ba/ mam
257b1(phal chen): dkyings kyi mthar thug pa/ phyi ma'i ma'i mur thug pa/ bskul pa 'tshangs pa thams cad du 'jig rten gyi khams 'grangs par 'jig rten khams thams cad las 'jug
257b2(phal chen): mo su ngas par bya ba'i spyir smon lam chen po mtshan par bsgrub bo// 'di lta ste/ zhing thams cad snying gcig tu yang dag par gzhol bar bya ba dang / ning gcig zhe
257b3(phal chen): cad du yang dag par gzhol bar bya ba dang / yongasu spyad pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa 'od mang po'i rgyan par bya ba dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa thams cad
257b4(phal chen): bsngal pas/ longasu dag pa'i lam dang ldan pa dang / sems can ye shes kyi 'byung gnas tshad med pas yongs su gang ba'i sangs rgyas kyi yul rgya chen po yang dag par gno/
257b5(phal chen): zhing khong du chud par bya ba dang / byams pa'i tshul gzhan du sems can rnams la yang dag par bstan cing shin tu tshim par bya ba'i phyir chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa
257b6(phal chen): rgya che ba nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' thug pa/ phyi ma'i mtha' mur thug pa/ bskal 'grangs pa thams cad zhing 'grangs par sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu dag par bya ba
257b7(phal chen): la rgyud mi chad pa'i smon lam chen po mngon par sgrub bo// 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / bsam pa gcig pa'i spyod pa dang / ltos pa med pa'i dge/
257b8(phal chen): ba'i rtsi ba thams cad stsogs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang dmigs pa gcig cing mnyam pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad pa
258a1(phal chen): 'grogs shing mi bral ba dang / sangs rgyas 'byung ba ji dkar bstan pa dang / rang gi sems bskyed pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
258a2(phal chen): yul dang mthu dang / ye shes khong du chud bar bya ba dang / mnyams shing rjesu 'dra ba'i mngon par shes pa rab tu 'thob bya ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rnam par
258a3(phal chen): rgyu bar bya dang / sangs rgyas thams cad 'khor du gzugs bstan 'byung ba yang dag par bstan pa dang / skye ba'i skye gnas thams cad du rang gi lus rjes su 'gro bar bya
258a4(phal chen): dang / theg pa chen po bsas kyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad spang ba rgyun mi 'chad pa'i phyir chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa rgya che ba
258a5(phal chen): namakha'i dbyings kyi mthar thug pa/ phyi mtha'i mu thug/ bskal pa grangs thams cad du spyod pa grangs par theg pa chen po mngon par sgrub pa la rgyun mi 'chang ba'i
258a6(phal chen): smon lam chen po mngon par bsgrub bo// 'di lta ste/ phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo la yang dag par gnas/ byang chub sems dpa' spyad pa spyod pa dang / lus dang
258a7(phal chen): ngag dang / yid kyi las don yod par bya ba dang / mthong ma thag tu sangs rgyas kyi chos don mi za bar 'thob par bya ba dang / dbyangs brjod ma thag du ye shes khod du chu
258a8(phal chen): bar bya ba dang / dang par gyur ma thag tu nyon mongs pa phyir ldog par bya ba dang / bsam pasman gyi rgyal po chen po lta bu rab tu 'thob par bya ba dang / lus yid
258b1(phal chen): na gyi nor bu 'dab par zla ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad spyad par byin chos kyi dbyings kyi sags par rgya che ba/ mamakha'i kying
258b2(phal chen): kyi mthar thug pa/ phyi ma'i ma'i mu thug pa/ bskul ba 'grangs pa thams cad du phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo bgrangs par spyod pa thams cad 'bras bu/
258b3(phal chen): yod pa/ rgyan mi 'chad pa'i smon lam chen po mngon par bsgrub bo// 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du bla med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
258b4(phal chen): byang chub tu mngon par 'chang rgya ba dang / skra'i sbubs cig dang / tha mi dad pa'i skra'i smra bas thams cad du tshe dang / skye ba dang gzhon nu rol pa dang / bcum
258b5(phal chen): mo'i 'khor gyi nang na bzhugs pa dang / mngon par 'byung ba dang / rnam par 'phrul pa dang / snying po byang chub du gshegs pa dang / bdud gdul ba dang /
258b6(phal chen): mator bar 'chang rgya ba dang / gsol pa gang ba pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo chen po bskor ba dang / yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa chen po bstan pa dang
258b7(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi yul dang / mthu dang ye shes chen po khong du chud par bya ba dang / sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du sangs rgyas
258b8(phal chen): 'byung ba dang / skad cig skad cig du mngon par 'tshang rgya ba dang / rab tu zhi ba 'thob par bya ba yang dag par bstan pa dang / mngon par 'tshang rgya ba gcig gis
259a1(phal chen): chos kyi dbyings thams cad 'phrul bas rgyas par gang ba dang / dbyangs cig pas sems can gyi khams thams cad sems dang bsam pa shin tu/
259a2(phal chen): tshim par bya ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa chen chen po yongasu bstan pa dang / spyod pa rnams rgyun mi 'chang par bya ba dang / theg pa chen po'i sa la chos thams cad rnams
259a3(phal chen): bAr dgod par yang dag par bstan pa dang / chos shes pa'i rdzu phrul gyi rgyu dang / mngon par shes pa dang / dbang gis chos gi dbyings thams cad sprul pas rnam par dgang ni
259a4(phal chen): b+hi chos kyis klas par rgya che ba/ rnam pa'i dbyings kyi mthar thug pa/ phyi mahA'i mur thug pa/ bskal pa bgrangs med pa thams su mngon par 'chang rgyab tshangs
259a5(phal chen): ye shes chen po'i mngon par shes pa/ rgyun mi 'chad pa'i smon lam chen po mngon par sgrub bo/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de ltar rnam pa 'di lta bu'i smon lam chen po dang /
259a6(phal chen): brtson 'grus chen dang / mngon par sgrub pa chen po'i smon lam gi sgo bcu po 'di las stsogs pa/ smon lam rgya stong grangs med pa phrag bcu tshang ba dag byang chub
259a7(phal chen): sems dpe'i sa rab tu dga' ba la gnas pa'i byang chub sems de pa 'a thob bo// mngon par bsgrub bo// smon lam de ngag kyang mthar thug pa'i gnas bcu mngon par bsdu
259a8(phal chen): che/ bcu gang zhen 'di lta ste/ sems can gyi khams kyi mthar thug pa dang / 'jig kyi khams mthar thug pa dang / rnam pa'i khams kyi thar thug pa dang / chos kyi
259b1(phal chen): kyi mthar thug pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i khams kyi mjug pa dang / sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i khams kyi mthar thug pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes
259b2(phal chen): khams kyi mthar bathug pa dang / sems kyi dmigs pa'i khams kyi mthar thug pa dang / ye shes mngon par sgrub pa'i khams kyi mthar thug pa dang / 'jig rten gyi rgyud

259b4(phal chen): ngag sems can gyi mthu' gang tu thug pa de'i thug par gyur cig/ smon lam chen po 'di dag 'di 'jig rten gyi khams kyi mthar gang tu thug pa dang / namakha' khams dang /
259b5(phal chen): chos kyi khams dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i khams dang sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i khams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi khams dang / sems kyi dmigs
259b6(phal chen): pa'i khams dang / lce shes mngon par bsgrub pa'i khams dang / 'jig rten gyi rgyud dang / chos kyi rgyud dang / ye shes kyi rgyud kyi khams kyi mtha' gang tu thug pa de

260a1(phal chen): cho ga chung rda /
