313b6(phal chen): yid la bya ba dang / chos yid la bya ba dang / dge 'dun yid la bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' yid la bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yid la bya ba
313b7(phal chen): dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa yid la bya ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa yid la bya ba dang / stobs yid la bya ba dang / mi 'jigs pa yid la bya ba dang / sangs
313b8(phal chen): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa yid la bya ba nas/ rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi rab du yid bya ba dang mi bral ba yin te/
314a1(phal chen): de 'dod na skad cig yung tsam thang cig tu ting nge 'dzin khrag khrig brgya stong rab tu 'thob cing de dag la mnyam par 'jog pa dang / sangs rgyas tha/
314a2(phal chen): khrig brgya stong mthong ba dang / de dag gi byin gyi rlabs kyang yang dag par shes pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams khrag khrig brgya stong spyod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing khrag khrig
314a3(phal chen): brgya stong du 'gro ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams khrag khrig brgya stong snang bar bya ba dang / sems can khrag khrig brgya stong yongs su smin par bya ba dang / bskal pa khrag/
314a4(phal chen): khrig brgya stong du gnas par bya ba dang / sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i bskal pa khrag khrig brgya stong la rab tu 'jug pa dang / chos kyi sgo khrag khrig brgya stong rnam par 'byed pa/
314a5(phal chen): dang lus bye ba brgya stong yongs su bstan pa dang / lus re rel yang byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor khrag khrig brgya stong yang dag par bstan par bya ba'i brtson 'grus
314a6(phal chen): kyi rnam pa de la bu bcom mo// de yan cad byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam gyi mthuthun rnams smon lam gyi khyad par gyis rnam par 'phrul te/ de dag gi lus sam 'od
314a7(phal chen): ngam rdzu 'phrul lam/ mig gam/ spyod yul la/ dbyangs sam/ spyod pa 'am/ rgyan tam/ byid gyi rlabs sam mos pa'am/ mngon par 'du byed pa dag kyang bskul
314a8(phal chen): bdus dang / bsal ba brgya phrag dum dang / bskal bsod phrag du ma dang / bskal pa brgya song phrag dum dang / bsal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma'i ba
314b1(phal chen): gyis kyang bgrang bar dka'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying pos don 'di nying yang brtag par bya ba dang / bstan par bya ba'i phyir de'i tshe tshigs su
314b2(phal chen): bcad pa 'di smras so// mkhas pas lam gyi spyod pa lnga por yongs su rdzogs nas/ chos rnams mtshan nyid med dang ma skyes dang / ma byung snga nas yongs su zhi zhing /
314b3(phal chen): spros med pa/ yongs su sgom pas ye shes blo can drug pa gnon// chos rnams dben zhes len med rnam par rtog med dang / sgyu ma'i rang bzhin gnyis kyi dngos
314b4(phal chen): las rnam grol bas/ chos kyi tshul la 'gal med rjes su 'thun byed cing // ye shes ldan pa'i dam pa drug pa yongs su gnon// 'thun pa rnol gnas shing ye
314b5(phal chen): shes stobs ldan 'jig rten kun gyi 'byung dang 'jig la rab tu rtog/ gti mug pas 'gro la 'byung ba kun tu bskyed/ gti mug de nyid bral bas 'byung ba med
314b6(phal chen): pa yin/ rkyen kyi rnam pa don dam stong pa rnam par 'byed/ bya ba mi 'gal rgyu rkyen byed pa mnyam par shes/ yang dag ci bzhin byed pa med par las shes nas
314b7(phal chen): 'dus bya sprin sdug lta bur byed pa med par shes/ bden par mi shes de ni yang dag mi rig pa// las ni sems kyi stobs kyis mgo rmongs byung bar gyur// sems
314b8(phal chen): la bton te lhan cig byung ba ming dang gzugs// de ltar sdug bsngal phung po chen po'i bar du 'byung // khams gsum sems can gyi rgyu las byung bar de 'jug sa/
315a1(phal chen): srid pas yan lag bcu gnyis 'di dag sems gcig rten/ 'dod chags skyes pa de las sems su brjod pa yin// de bzhin sring
315a2(phal chen): pa'i dngos po sems kyi rnam pa'o// ma rig bya ba gnyis med rmongs pa'i dngos po la// rmongs par byas shing de nas sems dpa'i rgyu yang 'byin// de bzhin
315a3(phal chen): rga ba phung gzhig bya 'jig byed bar// de las sdug bsngal mi thogs thams cad mi zad 'byung // ma rig rkyen gyis chad par 'gyur ba yod pa min// rnam
315a4(phal chen): par chad cing rgyu rkyen bral bas yod pa 'gog/ gti mug sred pa nyer len nyon mongs lam yin te// las dang sred pa sems pa lhag ma sdug bsngal yin/
315a5(phal chen): gti mug skye mched par du 'dus byas sdug bsngal te// reg dang tshor ba de dag sdug bsngal sdug bsngal yin// yan lag lhag ma 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal
315a6(phal chen): rnam 'phelo// bdag med shes pas sdug bsngal gsum po 'chad par 'khor// mun pa sems dang 'dus byas 'di ni sngon bltas yin// rnam par shes
315a7(phal chen): nas tshor ba rgyud du da ltar byung // sred dang srid par sdug bsngal byung ba'i phyi ma'i mtha'o// 'gags shing zad pa de dag lnga ba chud pa yid// gti mug
315a8(phal chen): rkyen gyis de ga rnam par 'jal bar byung // zad pas byang dus gyon rnams rnam par 'brel pa yin// rdu las rgyu 'byung med na rgyun chang 'gyur// bde
315b1(phal chen): pan shes ldan rang bzhin stong pa de ltar rtog/ rgyud du 'thun pa gti mug mun las byung ba yin// mi 'thun bzlog pa gti mug zad pas mi 'byung ba'o//
315b2(phal chen): pa'i rkyen dang de dag yod dang med pa la// gnas pa med blo rnam pa bcur ni de ltar rtog/ srid pa'i yan lag mtshams dang sems gcig las 'thun dang // ched du
315b3(phal chen): mi byed rgyud gsum rjes 'brang sngon mtha' dang // sdug bsngal gsum dang rgyus 'byung skye dang 'jig pa dang // srid pa'i mthar phyir zad dang rkyen kyi lugs 'thun
315b4(phal chen): bar/ de ltar rjen 'brel 'byung la yang dag 'jig pa pas// rgyu 'dra yang rig ma yin tshor bar byed med cing // rmilam 'dra ba de bzhin mig yor 'jub sa
315b5(phal chen): spyi sla ba'i smig rgyur rang bzhin mtshungs mnyam pa// de ltar ba sgom pa mkhas pa'i stong pa nyid kyi sgo// rkyen rnams med pa de ni mtshan ma med pa ste// log par
315b6(phal chen): sems pas nam yang smon pa yin// gzhan du sems can snying brtse'i don tu skye ba 'dzin// de 'dra'i rnam thar sgo la sgom byed mthu che ba// snying brtse blo ldan sangs rgyas
315b7(phal chen): yon tan mngon 'dod cing // 'dus byas 'dus pa mkhas pa yongs su rtog byed pas// bsam pa nges shing gcig ming legs dang ldan pa yin// stong nyid ting 'dzin
315b8(phal chen): 'dzin stong phrag bcu rnams yongs su rgyas// de bzhin brten pa mtshan ma med dang smon pa med ldan// shes rab shas che 'thun pa'i bzod pas chog cen te// mkhas
316a1(phal chen): / ba'i rnamathar ye shes chags pa med dang ldan// de 'drabs mkhas drang srong chen po mchong byed pas// rgyal po'i bstan pa 'di la shin tu bsngags/
316a2(phal chen): pa yin/ de ni sangs rgyas mdzod rtsab khong du chung bas na// baiDU rgyas btab gser mdog bzhin du sdod pas gsal// zla ba'i 'ong ni 'gro ba'i lus la sem par
316a3(phal chen): byed/ rang bzhin yangs pas mongs su 'grus par mnus so// rgyal sras 'od kyang bdud rtsol ma la shin tu 'das// tsan mongs ngas su bdung dang sdug bsngalan
316a4(phal chen): kyang sel// sa'ang rgyags sna blun pa ste bangam zar 'gyur// 'phrul dag das pa ldan pa'i nga rdul sel la mkhas// me ges lam dang ldan pa pom tso tsam yang/
316a5(phal chen): 'an thos lam las 'dis zhing mi 'phrogs pa'o// bde gshegs sras po brtson 'grus ldan pa 'dod gyur na// ting 'dzin bye ba brgya stong chang ba thob par byed/
316a6(phal chen): snang cig gcig tu phyogs bcur sangs rgyas mang po la// dpying rtsa ni ma gsal nang ldan par byed bzhin// zab bcing ba la dka'abrub ste// nyan thos rang rgyal
316a7(phal chen): shes mi nus// bdag nyid che las drug pa rgyal ba'i sras kyis bshad pa yin// mngon sum zhes bya ba ste// byang chub sems dpa'i sa drug pa'o//
316a8(phal chen): bam po bzhi bcu dgruba'o// dadas sa tshogs med mang tshogs// mang po mkha'al gnas nin ma ngan par zer/ tshig na ma
316b1(phal chen): brjod bzung // dga' ba'i dam pa mchog gis yongs su rgyas// dag 'a don dam sems mdzad cing // yon tan brgya dang yang dag ldan ning dbang sgyur ba/
316b2(phal chen): mi'i bun d+hA ri ka yis// 'gro la phan pa'i spyod rab yang dag bshad// yid 'ong 'od mchog ldan khyod dang // mi'i gtso bo mya ngan yongs su sel mdzad la// dbang /
316b3(phal chen): phyug chen po mkhas gnas shing // spos ste ni yid 'od dam pa mngon par 'thor// tshig sman rab tu brjod pa byed// lha tshogs mang po mkha' las dgar gyur
316b4(phal chen): dbyangs sgrog cing // gang gis sa bstan 'di thos pa// de dag 'thob pa bzang po thob ces zer// rol mo brdung dang dkrol dang dbyangs snyan pa// brgya mang lha'i bu
316b5(phal chen): mos dga' bar byas// bde bar gshegs dang khyod mthu yis// tshig rab 'di 'dra rab tu brjod par 'gyur// zhing dang nges spyod dam pa can// ma dul ba
316b6(phal chen): dul mdzad 'jig rten kun gyis mchod byas pa// 'jig rten kun las 'das pa yi// 'jig rten spyod pa shin tu phra ba bstan// sna tshogs lus kyang rab tu bstan//
316b7(phal chen): lus dang lus la chos nyid phun sum tshogs shing ldan// rnam dpyod zhing gnas mthus bcil ba so// dbyangs su sgrog kyang ye shig brjod mi byed// zhing rnams
316b8(phal chen): brgyan yang 'dod byed cing // mgon po mchod par 'os la mchod rab byed// zhing rgyal bdag du shes pa// ye shes dbang sgyur mchog gis rab tu sel// sems
317a1(phal chen): can yongs su srin byed kyang // bdag dang gzhan gyi 'du shes rnam pa kun tu med// dge ba yangs pa yang dag stsogs// 'od kyang dge
317a2(phal chen): stsogs pa med// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug gis// 'jig rten thams cad rab tu 'bar bar mthong gyur cing // 'du shes thams cad rnam spangs nas sbyi
317a3(phal chen): brtse ldan par brtson 'grus rab tu bcom// lha mang lnga'i bu mo'i yis// gsung ba'i mchog la mchog byas nas// kun kyang mi smyung gar gyur te//
317a4(phal chen): tshel lta zhing gnas// thar pa'i zla bas yang smras pa// 'khor rnams shin tu rnam par dang // sa bdun pa'i rnam pa dag/ rtul ba'i sras kyis bshad pa mdzod//
317a5(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i sring pos smras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag byang chub sems dpa'i sa drug pa la// de ltar sa'i lam yongs su rdzogs pa'i byang chub
317a6(phal chen): sems dpa' ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa bdun pa yongs su gnon to// de thangs shes rab kyis mngon par bsgrubs pa'i lam brtsam pa'i khyab par bcus kyi
317a7(phal chen): sa// brda ga me 'dis ste/ stong ba'idu nga mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa zang pa'i ting nge 'dzi shin tu bsgoms pa'i ying dang yang ldan la/
317a8(phal chen): nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs chen po yang dag par sogs pa yin// bdag med pa dang / gsob med pa dang / gang zag med pa'i chos la 'ang rab tu 'jug la/
317b1(phal chen): chang zang pa bam mngon par bsgrub pa yang yongs su mi gtsang ba yin// bsod nams kyis shin du mtha pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub la/ chos gangs
317b2(phal chen): yang mngon par chags pa med pa yang / khams gsum pa las dben par gyur pa'ang thob la khams gsum pa bsdu ba dang / rgyan mngon par bsgrub pa yang
317b3(phal chen): mngon par bsgrub pa yin/ nyon mongs pa 'bar pa thams cad shin tu zhi zhing rab tu zhi ste/ nye bar zhi ba'ang yin la sems can thams cad gyi 'dod chags dang zhe
317b4(phal chen): sngang dang gti mug dang / nyon mongs pa'i me lce rab tu zhi bar mngon par bsgrub pa'ang mngon par sgrub pa yin/ sgyu ma dang rmi lam dang / mig yor dang sgra brnyan /
317b5(phal chen): dang chu'i zla ba dang / gzugs brnyan dang / sbrul po'i rang bzhin lta bur yod pa dang / med pa dang gnyis ka ma yin pa thams cad kyang khong du chud la/ las dang bya
317b6(phal chen): ba rnam par phye ba tshad med pa'i bsam pa yang mngon par bsgrub pa yin/ zhing gi thag gru nam mkha' dang mnyam par shin tu bsgoms pa'i yid dang yang ldan la
317b7(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyang zhing bsgrub pa dang / rgyan kyang mngon par bsgrub pa yin/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rang bzhin dang / chos dang spyanam mkha'
317b8(phal chen): bur yang rab tu 'jug la gzugs dang mtshan dang / dpe byad bzang po bsdu zhing rgyan mngon par basmra ba pa yang mngon par bsgrub pa yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
318a1(phal chen): gsung rang bzhin gyis zhi zhing brjod du med pa'i sgra dbyangs dang ldan pa yang yid ces la/ sems can thams cad kyi yan lag rnam par
318a2(phal chen): phye ba'i rgyan mngon par bsgrub pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis skad cig gcig du dus gsum du thugs su chud par yang khong du chud la dus dang
318a3(phal chen): bskal pa'i grangs mtshan nyidang tha dad pa la'ang sems can gyi bsam pa rnam par bsgom pa'i phyir rjes su 'jug pa yin te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag thabs dpa
318a4(phal chen): shes rab kyis mngon par bsgrub pa'i lam brtsam pa'i khyad par 'di bcus byang chub sems dpa'i sa drug pa la rnam par dbye ba shin tu byas pa/ sa bdun
318a5(phal chen): yongs su gnon to// kye rgyal po'i sras dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lam gyi tshogs thabs dang / shes rab kyis mngon par bsgru/
318a6(phal chen): pa'i khyad par snang bar 'gyur ba 'di dag mngon par bsgrubs pa byang chub sems dpa'i sa bdun yongs su gnon ces bya ste/ de ltar byang chub sems da
318a7(phal chen): sa bdun la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de ni sems can gyi khams tshad med pa la 'jug go// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sems ca
318a8(phal chen): yongs su smin par mdzad pa dang / 'dul ba'i 'phrin las chad med pa la 'jug go// 'jig rten khams mang po tshad med pa la 'jug go// sangs rgyas
318b1(phal chen): ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa tshad med pa la 'jug go/ chos tha dad pa tshad med pa la 'jug go// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
318b2(phal chen): rnams kyi ye shes mngon par 'tshang rgya ba tshad med pa la 'jug go// bskal pa'i grangs tshad med pa la 'jug go/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam
318b3(phal chen): kyi dus gsum du thugs su chud pa tshad med pa la 'jug go// sems can gyi mos pa'i khyad par tshad med pa la 'jug go// sangs rgyas bcom
318b4(phal chen): ldan 'das rnams kyi mtshan dang / sku sna tshogs ston pa tshad med pa la 'jug go/ sems can rnams kyi bsam pa dang / dbang po tha dad pa tshad med pa
318b5(phal chen): la 'jug go// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi gsung brjod pas/ sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa tshad med pa la 'jug go// sem
318b6(phal chen): can rnams kyi sems dang spyod pa tshad med pa la 'jug go/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi ye shes 'byam klas pas thugs su chud pa med pa la
318b7(phal chen): 'jug go// nyan thos kyi theg pas 'byung ba la mo skye ba tshad med pa la 'jug go// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi lam shin tu bstan ba'i
318b8(phal chen): ye shes tshad med pa la 'jug cing bas par byed ngo // rang sangs rgyas kyi ye shes yang dag par bsgrub pa shin tu rdzogs par bya ba tshang med pal /
319a1(phal chen): go/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi ye shes zab mo'i sgo 'jug pa bstan pa chang med pa la 'jug go/ byang chub sems da
319a2(phal chen): rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i sbyor ba tshad med pa la 'jug go// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi theg pa chen po yang dag par bsgrub pa la
319a3(phal chen): 'jug pa shin tu bstad pa med pa la 'jug go/ de 'di snyam du sems ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams
319a4(phal chen): kyi spyod yul ni de ltar chod pa ste/ de ni bskal pa brgya phrag khrag khrig dang / bskal pa stong phrag khrag dang / bskal pa brgya stong phrag khrag khrig nas de
319a5(phal chen): snyed kyi bskal pa khrag khrig bya brgya stong gis kyang bgrang bar dka' ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams spyod yul de bdag gis lhun gyis grub
319a6(phal chen): par bsgrub par bya'o// rtog pa med pa dang rnam par rtog pa med pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o zhes te de ltar shin tu brtags pa'i ye shes pa
319a7(phal chen): mngon par shes pa ldan zhing rtag tu rgyun mi 'chang par mngon par brtson pa ni thabs dang ye shes rab kyis yongs su bsgom pa'i lam gyi tshogs rgya chen po'i ye shes
319a8(phal chen): la mi g.yo ba'i tshul gyis yongs su gnas pa yin/ de skad cig gcig du yang lam mngon par bsgrubs pa las ldang bar mi byed do// de 'gro yang
319b1(phal chen): ltar bu la shes mngon par bsgrub pa yin/ 'greng ba dang / 'dug pa dang / zhal ba dang rmi lam dag tu yang sgrib pa med cing / spyod lam thams cad lagam
319b2(phal chen): kyang rnam pa 'di bu'i ye shes yid bya ba dang mi 'bral ba yin de'i sems skyed pa re re la yang byang chub sems dpa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bcu yang dag par bsgrub pa
319b3(phal chen): yang dag par 'byung ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de snying rje chen po sngon du btang ba'i sems bskyed pa 'byung ba
319b4(phal chen): re re la yang zhing yang sangs rgyas kyi chos yang dag par bsgrub pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi don tu yongs su sngo bas de la gang sangs rgyas kyi ye
319b5(phal chen): shes yongs su tshol zhing sems can yongs su tshol zhing sems can rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su gtong ba 'di ni de'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//
319b6(phal chen): gang nyon mongs pa'i yongs su gdung ba thams cad rab tu zhing 'di ni de'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// gang snying rje dang byams pa sngon du 'gro bas sem
319b7(phal chen): can thams cad la tshim pa med pa 'di ni de'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// gang gong nas gong du dge ba'i chos tshol bas mi ngoms par dam 'cha' ba 'di ni de'i
319b8(phal chen): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// gang thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mngon du bya ba'i phyir 'gyod pa med pa'i lam dang ldan pa 'di ni de'i bsam gtan gyi pha/
320a1(phal chen): rol tu phyin pa'o// gang rang bzhin gyis ma skyes pa mngon du gyur pa/ 'di ni de'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// gang ye shes tshad med pa mngon
320a2(phal chen): par bsgrub pa 'di ni de'i thabs mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// gang gong nas gong du ye shes la dmigs shes mngon par bsgrubs pa 'di ni de'i smon
320a3(phal chen): smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// gang phas kyi rgol ba thams cad dang bdud kyi tshogs thams cad kyis lam yongs su mi mchod pa 'di ni de'i stobs kyi
320a4(phal chen): rol tu phyin pa'o// gang chos thams cad la yang dag ji lta ba bzhin du rtag pa 'di ni de'i ye shes kyi pha rol tu byin pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de ltar na bya
320a5(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i sa ring du song ba 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' pha rol tu phyin pa bcu po 'di dag de ltar yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/ byin gyi rlab
320a6(phal chen): bcu dang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang / mdor bsdu byang chub kyi yan lag gi chos thams cad skad cig
320a7(phal chen): sa cig tu yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnam par bral ba'i rlabs byang chub sems dpa' sems
320a8(phal chen): dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying po la 'dzi skad smras so// ce rgyal ba'i sas kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa'as bdum
320b1(phal chen): 'di la gnas pa ni 'di la gnas pa 'ba' zhig gi byang chub kyi yan lag thams cad skad cig tu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ram/ 'on te ma yin
320b2(phal chen): gyis bcu po thams cad la'ang de bzhin du yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying pos smras pa/ ce rgyal ba'i sras sa bcu
320b3(phal chen): bo kun la'ang byang chub sems dpa'i byang chub kyi yan lag thams cad skad cig du yongs su rdzogs par lta gyur to// byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu
320b4(phal chen): bo 'di la ni de dag pas lhag par yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa 'di ni nan tan du bya
320b5(phal chen): ba'i spyod ba yongs su rdzogs par byed pa ye shes dang mngon par shes pa'i spyod pa yongs su gnon bu ste/ de ltar kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub
320b6(phal chen): sems dpa'i sa dang po la ni smon lam thams cad la lhag par dmigs pas byang chub sems dpa'i byang chub kyi yan lag thams cad yongs su
320b7(phal chen): rdzogs par 'gyur ro// gnyis pa la sems kyi dri ma thams cad bstsal bas/ gsum pa la smon lam rnam par 'phel ba dang / chos snang
320b8(phal chen): thob pas/ bzhi pa lam la 'jug pas lnga pa la 'jig rten gyi spyod ba'i rjes su 'brang bas/ drug pa la/ tshogs zab mo sgor 'jug pas/ byeng
321a1(phal chen): / chub kyi yan lag thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa bdun pa 'di la ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su
321a2(phal chen): bsgrub pas/ byang chub kyi yan lag thams cad skad cig du yongs su grub par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang nas bzung ste
321a3(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i sa bdun pa'i bar du byang chub sems dpa' sa mngon par bsgrub pa'i ye shes par bsgrub pa'i sbyor ba'i yan lag de dag byang chub sems
321a4(phal chen): dpa'i sa brgyad pa yan cad lhun gyis grub par yongs su 'grub bo// kye rgyal ba'i sras ngag 'di lta ste dper na kun nas nyon mongs shing rnam par dag pa'i 'jig rten
321a5(phal chen): gyi khams dang / shin tu dag pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams ngag gi 'jig rten gyi khams gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi bar ni smon lam dang thabs dang shes rab dang mngon par
321a6(phal chen): pa'i stobs dang / shugs chen po ma gtogs par 'dod dong brgal bar mi nus so// kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa 'dres pa dang / yongs
321a7(phal chen): sa dag pa'i bar yang sngon lam dang thabs dang shes rab dang mngon par shes pa dang / ye shes kyis stobs dang / shugs chen po ma gtogs pa'i 'jang rang ba rgal ba
321a8(phal chen): dus so// byang chub sems dpa' rnam par grol ba'i zla bas sbas pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras 'on ci byang chub sems dpa'i sa bdun pa rnams la/ byang chub sems
321b1(phal chen): dpa'i spong pa nyon mongs pa'i stong pas kun nas nyon mongs par yid ces bya ba yin nam/ byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying pos smras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub
321b2(phal chen): sems dpa'i sa dang po rab tu dga' ba nyid bzung ba yan cad du/ byang chub sems dpa'a'i spyod pa thams cad byang chub du yongs su bsngos pa'i dbang gis 'on mong/
321b3(phal chen): pa'i rnyog pa dang bral bar 'os pa'i tshul gyis lam mnyam pa nyid kyis yod ces par bya ste/ de tsam gyis sa bdun po rnams su nyon mongs pa'i spyod pa las yang dag par
321b4(phal chen): 'das shes na mi bya'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di lta ste dper na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po ni lha rdzas kyi glang po rin po che la zhon zhing gling bzhi dag du'ang 'gro'o//
321b5(phal chen): mi'i sdug bsngal dang phongs pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i zhes pa rnams kyang rab tu shes te/ thon kyang nyes pa de dag gi gos par mi 'gyur ro// de tsam gyis mi'i lus
321b6(phal chen): lus yongs su 'das pa'ang ma yin te/ nam mi'i lus spangs ste tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skyes par gyur pa de'i tshe tshangs pa'i gzhal nyes pa rnams kyang rab tu shes
321b7(phal chen): / 'on kyang nyes pa de dag gi gos par mi 'gyur ro// de tsam gyis ma'i lus las yongs su 'das pa'ang ma yin te/ nam mi'i lus spangs ste tshangs pa'i 'jig
321b8(phal chen): rten du skyes par gyur pa de'i tshe tshangs pa'i gzhal khang na gnas shing stong gsum gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyang mthong de dag du'ang 'gro// tshangs pa'i gzugs brlan
323a1(phal chen): yang kun tu ston te mi zhes kyang mi brjod do// kye rgyal ba'i de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po bzung ba yan chad byang chub sems
323a2(phal chen): dpa' pha rol tu phyin pa'i theg pa la zhon zhing / 'gro ba thams cad du rgyu ba'i tshe/ kun nes nyon mongs pa'i nyes pa rnams kyang rab tu shes te/ yang dag pa'i lam
323a3(phal chen): du zhugs pas kun nas nyon mongs pa de dag gis par yang mi 'gyur ro// 'on kyang de tsam gyis bdun po rnams la nyon mongs pa'i nyes pa rnams las yang dag
323a4(phal chen): bar 'das zhes ni mi bya ste/ nam sbyor ba can gyi spyod pa thams cad spangs te/ sa bdun po rnams brgyad pa yongs su non par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg
323a5(phal chen): pa yongs su dag pa la zhon zhing 'gro ba thams cad du rgyu ba'i tshe kun nas nyon mongs pa'i nyes pa thams cad kyang rab tu shes te 'jig rten gyi bya ba kun las 'das par
323a6(phal chen): zhes pa de dag gis kun nas nyon mongs par gyur cig mi bya'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa'i sa bdun pa 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni
323a7(phal chen): 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa mang po thams cad las kyang shin du shas che bar 'dis ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa bdun pa 'di la spyod pa byang chub
323a8(phal chen): sems dpa' de ni nyon mongs pa can zhes kyang mi bya/ nyon mongs pa med pa zhes kyang mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ non mongs pa thams cad rgyu ba med pas nyon mongasan
323b1(phal chen): ca nas ma rnan// ra bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mngan par 'ad cing bsam pa yongs su rdzogs pas nan mongs pa med pa zhes kyang ma bya'o// de la dra
323b2(phal chen): sems dpa'i sa bdun pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i ni lhag pa'i bsam pas yongs su dag pa'i lus dang pa'i lus dang ldan pa yin/ lhag parje
323b3(phal chen): bsam pas yongs su dag pa'i ngag gi lasu ldan pa yin no// lhag pa'i bsam pas yongs su dag pa'i yid kyis las dang ldan pa yin/ de ni 'di ltar
323b4(phal chen): dge ba'i la gyi lam de bzhin gshegs pas smon pa kun nas nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa de dag las thams cad kyi thams cad du yang dag par 'das pa yin/ gang
323b5(phal chen): 'di dag dge ba'i lam yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bsngags pa/ de dag gi rjes su rtag tu rgyun mi chad par 'brang ba yin/ gang yang byang chub sems
323b6(phal chen): dpa'i sa lnga pa la bzo'i gnas dang las kyi gnas ji ltar mngon par bsgrubs pa de dag thams cad kyang ldan gyis grub par rab tu 'byung ngo // de ni stong gsum
323b7(phal chen): gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na slob dpon du bya ba yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
323b8(phal chen): dpa'i sa brgyad pa yan chad kyi byang chub sems dpa' ma gtogs pa su'ang de dang bsam pa 'am sbyor bas mnyam pa med pa do// 'di ltar yang gang 'di dag bas
324a1(phal chen): gtan rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin de dag dang snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / mngon par shes pa rnam par thar pa rnams kyang thams cad kyi thams cad
324a2(phal chen): kye du bsgom pa mngon par bsgrub pa'i sgo'i tshul gyis mngon tu 'gyur te/ 'on kyang da dung byang chub sems dpa'i sa bdun brgyad pa la ji lta ba de bzhin du/ rnam par smin pa
324a3(phal chen): yongs su rdzogs pa ma yin to// de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i sa bdun pa 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sems bskyed pa thams cad la shes rab dang thabs
324a4(phal chen): dang / bsgom pa'i stobs yongs su rdzogs par gyur te/ sngon pas kyang byang chub kyi yan lag thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa rab tu 'thob po// de de ltar byang chub
324a5(phal chen): sems dpa'i sa bdun pa 'di la gnas pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rnam par dbye ba shin tu rnam par phye ba zhes bya ba la mnyam par gzhog ste/ byang chub
324a6(phal chen): sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin don shin tu bsam pa zhes bya ba dang / khyad par gyi blo gros zhes bya ba dang / rab tu bye ba'i don gyi mdzod ce bya ba dang / chos ji lta ba bani/
324a7(phal chen): durnams par 'byed pa zhes bya ba dang / rtsa bzhin tu gnas pas brtan pa zhes bya ba dang / ye shes dang mngon par shes pa'i sgo zhes bya ba dang / chos kyi dbyangs
324a8(phal chen): yongs su sbyangs pa zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan zhes bya ba dang don sna tshogs kyi mdzod 'khor ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgo zhes
324b1(phal chen): bya ba la yang ma'am par gzhog ste/ de dag la sogs pa mngon par shes pa dang / ye shes chen par sgo'i ting nge 'dzin sa yongs su sbyong bar byed pa brgyam
324b2(phal chen): zag bcu chang ba la snyoms par 'jug go// de thabs dang shes rab kyis yongs su sbyangs pa'i ting nge 'dzin de dag tu thabs dang / snying rje dang snang brtse ba'i mthus
324b3(phal chen): nyan thos kyi sa las 'das pa yin/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das pa yin/ shes rab dang ye shes kyi rnam par dpyad pa'i sa mngon sum du gyur pa yin/ de ltar
324b4(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' sa bdun pa 'di la gnas pa'i tshe/ lus kyi las tshad med pa mtshan ma dang bral ba rab tu 'byung ngo // ngag gi las tshad med pa mtshan ma dang bral
324b5(phal chen): ba rab tu 'byung ngo // yid kyi las tshad med pa dang bral ba shin tu rnam par sbyangs pa mi skye ba'i chos kyi bzod pa snang bar gyur pa rab tu 'byung ngo // byang chub sems
324b6(phal chen): dpa' rnam par grol ba'i zla ba'i smras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras de lta go byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po la gnas pa'i tshe'ang / byang chub sems dpa'i lus dang ngag dang yid kyi
324b7(phal chen): las tshad med pa/ nyan thos dang sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa las yang dag par 'das na ci ro ba/ byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying po'i smras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras de la'ang yin
324b8(phal chen): te/ de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos la dmigs pa'i mthur zad kyi rang gi blos rnam par dpyad pa ni ma yin no// byang chub sems dpa'i sa bdun pa 'di la ni/ rang gi blos ma
325a1(phal chen): spyod yul rnam par spyod pa rab tu 'thob pas/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis mi 'phrogs pa yin/ kye rgyal sras 'di lnga ste
325a2(phal chen): dper na/ rgyal po'i rigs su skyes pa'i rgyal po'i bu/ rgyal po'i mtshan dang ldan pa ni/ btsas ma thag tu rgyal po'i byin gyis blon po tshogs thams cad zis kyis gnon tu
325a3(phal chen): rang gi blos rnam par dpyad pas ni nam nar son par gyur pa de'i tshe/ rang gi blo'i mthus/ blo po thams cad kyi byed pa'i tshul las shin tu 'das pa yin/ kye rgyal ba'i sras
325a4(phal chen): de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' 'ang sems bskyed pa thag du lhag pa'i bsam pa bdag nyid chen pos nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad zil gyis gnon te
325a5(phal chen): rang gi blos rnam par brtags ni ma yin no// byang chub sems dpa' bdun pa 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni ye shes kyi stobs kyi shugs kyis/ 2
325a6(phal chen): thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi byed pa'i tshul las shin tu 'das pa yin no// kye rgyal ba'i sras de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems
325a7(phal chen): dpa'i sa bdun pa 'di la gnas pa'i tshe/ lus dang ngag dang yid kyi zab cing dben la/ rgyu ba med pa dang ldan pa'ang rab tu thob pa yin te/ khyad par gong du
325a8(phal chen): ba'i brtson 'grus kyang yongs su mi gtong ngo // yongs su btsal ba'i brtson 'grus des kyang yang dag pa'i mthar gnas pa'ang gnas te/ khyad par gong ma
325b1(phal chen): shin tu thob par bya ba'i yang dag pa'i yang dag pa mtha' mngon du yang ma byed do// byang chub sems dpa' rnam par grol ba'i zla bas smras pa/ brtul ba'i sa
325b2(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i sa gang yan chad du byang chub sems dpa' 'gog pa la snyoms par 'jug/ byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying po smras pa/ kye rgyal
325b3(phal chen): sras byang chub sems dpa'i sa drug pa yan chad byang chub sems dpa' 'gog pa la snyoms par 'jug ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa bdun pa 'di la gnas
325b4(phal chen): ba'i byang chub sems dpa' ni sems skad cig re re la yang 'gog pa la snyoms par 'jug ste/ 'gog pa mngon du byas zhes ni mi bya'o// de bas ni de'i bas
325b5(phal chen): gyis mi khyab pa'i lus dang / ngag dang yid kyi las dang ldan zhes bya ba yin no// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' yang dag pa'i mtha' lagan
325b6(phal chen): ngas pa'i mnal mdon du yang med byed pa ni ngas // cernal pa'i snal 'di la snang bar dkyil la nag tu mtshan pa da pa dun sun
325b7(phal chen): skal ba'i thabs la mkhas shing rlung la mkhas pa dang / chu la mkhas pa ni rgya mtsho chen po'i chu'i nyes pas mi gos so// kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin du byang chub sems
325b8(phal chen): dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa'i sa bdun pa 'di la gnas shing / pha rol tu phyin pa'i gru chen por zhugs pa yang yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas pas kyang
326a1(phal chen): gnas la/ yang dag pa'i mtha' mtha' mngon du yang mi byed do// de ltar de ye shes kyi stobs dang / shugs 'thob pa ni/ ting nge 'dzin dang /
326a2(phal chen): ye shes kyi stobs dang / shugs kyis mngon par bsgrubs pa'i blo dang / thabs dang shes rab kyis stobs dang / shugs chen pos 'khor ba'i sgo yang ston la
326a3(phal chen): mya ngan las 'das pa'i bsam pa dang yang mi 'bral ba yin/ 'khor mang pos kun nas bskor bar snang yang rtag tu rgyun mi chung bar sems kyi dben pa yang
326a4(phal chen): rab tu thob pa yin/ khams gsum du skye bar yang smon lam gyi dbang gis mngon par bsgrub pa la/ 'jig rten gyi nyes pas kyang mi gos pa yin zhi zhing
326a5(phal chen): rab tu zhi ba'ang yin la byas kyis kyang rab tu 'bar te/ de ltar 'bar yang tshig par mi'i gyur pa yin/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la yang yongs su 'jug
326a6(phal chen): la/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las kyang phyir ldog pa yin/ sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi mthil du yang phyin la/ bdud kyi yul na'ang 'jug par
326a7(phal chen): bas sa bdud byas lus la u \u0f7f ma smra du kyi ladu skyeng sus yang sa du grub ban pa sa susngags
326a8(phal chen): gnas thams cad na'ang 'a jug par spang la/ sangs rgyas kyi gnas kyi bsam pa yang mi gtong ba yin/ 'jig rten gyi bya ba thams cad dang yang ldan par sa
326b1(phal chen): la/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i tshul la yang yang dag par gzhol ba yin/ lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang /
326b2(phal chen): mi'am ci dang mi dang mi ma yin pa dang / brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten gyi mgon po thams cad las lhag pa'i rgyan dang / lba ba lbub shin tu bsgrub pa 'a
326b3(phal chen): rab tu thob la/ chos la dga' yid la bya ba yang mi spong ba yin/ de ltar de de lta bu'i ye shes dang ldan pa byang chub sems dpa'i sa ring du song ba 'di la gam
326b4(phal chen): ba'i byang chub sems dpa' de'i lta ba rgya chen po dang / smon lam gyi stobs kyis sangs rgyas mang po snang bar gyur te/ lta bu rgya chen po dang smon lam gyi stobs
326b5(phal chen): kyis sangs rgyas brgya phrag mang po dang / sangs rgyas stong phrag mang po dang / sangs rgyas brgya stong phrag mang po dang / sangs rgyas bye ba brgya stong phrag mang po dang /
326b6(phal chen): sangs rgyas khrag khrig mang po dang / sangs rgyas khrag khrig brgya phrag mang dang / sangs rgyas khrag khrig stong phrag mang po dang / sangs rgyas khrag khrig brgya
326b7(phal chen): stong phrag mang po dang / sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po dang / sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po snang bar 'gyur ro// des de bzhin
326b8(phal chen): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag mthong nas/ bsam pa rgya chen pos rim gro byed do// bkur sti byed do// bsting snang byed do// /
327a1(phal chen): #/ mchod pa byed do// na bza dang bsod snyoms dang / gzims cha dang / snyun gyi rkyen sman dang / yo byad dag kyang 'bul zhing / byang chub sems
327a2(phal chen): raba'i bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyang yongs su 'bul lo// dge 'dun gyi tshogs rnams la yang dag par mchod pa byed do// dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang bla na med
327a3(phal chen): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i de dag la bsnyen bkur byed cing de dag la rjes dang rim gro nan tan du chos bstan
327a4(phal chen): pa nyan cing len to// 'dzin to// thos nas kyang ma nor ba'i snyoms par 'jugs pa dang / shes rab dang / ye shes rab kyi snang bas rab tu brtson par byed cing nan tan gyis
327a5(phal chen): yongs su 'dzin to// sangs rgyas bcom ldan de dag gis stanaHba ya de dag 'dzin to// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi mngon par rtogs pa yongs su dra bar kyang mi 'phrog
327a6(phal chen): pa yin te/ de sngon pas kyang sems can la phan 'dogs pa'i chos kyi bzod pa rnam par dag par 'gyur ba yin/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i sa ring du song ba 'di la
327a7(phal chen): gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag bstan pas kyang bskal pa brgya phrag du ma dang / bskal pa stong phrag du ma dang / bskal ba brgya stong zag dums
327a8(phal chen): bsal pa bye ba brgya stong phrag dum dang / bsal pa khrag khrig theg dum dang / bskal pa khrag khrig brgya phrag du ma dang / bsal gakhras khrig song dus dang / bskal pa/
327b1(phal chen): khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ba dang / bskal ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya gang phrag du ma bzhin du dgacing yongs su byang bar gnas so// kye rgyal ba'i sas 'das sa 'dzin du
327b2(phal chen): dper na/ gser gyis le sbram de nying rin po che thams cad kyis rab tu sbas pa ni/ ston pas kyang rgyan gyi rnam pa gzhan dang / gzhan gyis ma thub pa dang / ches 'od ga
327b3(phal chen): dang par 'gyur ro// kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa'i sa ring du song ba'i di la gnas pa'i thabs dang shes
327b4(phal chen): rab kyis bsgrubs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sngon pas kyang ches shin tu byung ba dang / ches 'od gsal zhing dang bar 'gyur ro// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad
327b5(phal chen): kyis kyang mi'i phrogs pa yin/ kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di lta ste/ dper na nyi ma'i 'od ni skar ma'i tshogs dang / zla ba'i 'od kyis mi 'phrogs shing 'dzam bu'i gling na rlan gyi bag
327b6(phal chen): yod pa thams cad kyang shin tu skam par byed do// kye rgyal sras de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i sa ring du song ba ni 'di la byanas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa
327b7(phal chen): ba de dag kyang sngon pas kyang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis mi 'phrogs pa yin/ phyin ci log pa bzhin dang ldan pa'i nyon mongs pa'i rlan gyi rnam pa thams
327b8(phal chen): cad kyang yongs su skems so// de'i pha rol tu phyin pa bcu las thabs mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa shas che ba yin te/ lhag ma rnams kyang ji tshul ji nus mi sgrub
328a1(phal chen): / pa ma yin no// kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis ring du spyong ba zhes bya ba ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa bdun
328a2(phal chen): pa mdor bstan pa'o// de la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phal cher lha'i rgyal po dang bsgyur te/ sems can rnams la mngon par rtogs pa'i
328a3(phal chen): ye shes yang dag par bstan pa la mkhan shing mthu yod pa ste/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yongs su 'dri bas mi zad pa yin/ sems can skyon med par shin
328a4(phal chen): tu bzla bar bya ba la'ang mkhas pa yin te/ sbyin pa 'am/ ngag sman pa 'am/ don bsgrub pa'am/ don 'thun pas dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ci brtsom yang rung ste/ de thams cad ji ltar
328a5(phal chen): sems can thams cad kyi mchog du 'gyur/ gtso bor 'gyur/ thu bor 'gyur/ phul du 'gyur/ dam par 'gyur/ bla na med par 'gyur/ 'dren par 'gyur/ yongs su 'dren
328a6(phal chen): par 'gyur ba nas/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la rten pa'i bar 'gyur snyam ste/ sangs rgyas yid la bya ba dang / chos yid la bya ba dang / dge 'dun yid la bya ba dang /
328a7(phal chen): dge 'dun yod la bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' yid la bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yid la byang chub sems dpa'i sa yid la bya ba dang / pha rol tu phyin
328a8(phal chen): pa yid la bya ba dang / stobs yid la bya ba dang / mi 'jigs pa yid la bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa yid la bya ba nas/ rnam pa'i mchog thams cadad
328b1(phal chen): thams cad mkhyed pa'i legs kyi bar du yang la bya ba dang ma 'jal ba ya te/ 'dang na skad cig yung ma thang cag tu ting nge 'dzin byeb khrag zhag brgyan
328b2(phal chen): rab tu 'thob cing de dag la snyoms par 'jug pa dang / sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mthong ba dang / de dag gi byin gyi rlabs kyang yang dag par shes pa
328b3(phal chen): 'jig rten rnam gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong rnam par bya ba dang / sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong yongs su smin par bya ba dang / bskal pa bye ba khrag
328b4(phal chen): khrig brgya stong gnas par bya ba dang / sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po la rab tu 'jug pa dang / chos kyi sgo bye ba khrag
328b5(phal chen): khrig rgya stong rnam par 'byed pa dang / lus bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong yongs su bstan pa dang / lus re re la yang byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor bye ba brgya stong yang
328b6(phal chen): dag par bya ba'i brtson 'grus kyi rnam pa de lta bu rtsom mo// de yan chad byang chub sems dpa' smon lam gyi mthu can rnams/ smon lam gyi khyad par gyis rnam par
328b7(phal chen): 'phrul te/ de dag gis lus sam/ 'od dam ma rdzu 'phrul lam/ mig gam/ spyod yul lam/ dbyangs sam spyod pa 'am/ rgyad can byin gyi rlabs ma mos pa'am/ mngon
328b8(phal chen): par 'du byed pa dag kyang bskal pa du ma dang / bskal pa brgya phrag du ma dang / bskal ba stong phrag du ma dang / bskal pa rgya stong phrag du dang / bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig
329a1(phal chen): brgya stong phrag du ma'i bar gyis kyang bgrang bar dka'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying pos sa'i don 'di nyid yang brtag
329a2(phal chen): par bya ba dang / bstan par bya ba'i/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// ye shes zab mo don dam tshig gi rjes ma stegs drug rtogs pa'i yid
329a3(phal chen): ldan bdag nyid mnyam gzhag pa/ shes rab thabs gnyis zung du 'brel pa mngon pa bsgrub/ mkhas pas sa bdun spyod pa dam pa yongs su gnon/
329a4(phal chen): sring pa mtshan ma med mi smon snying rje byams dang ldan/ chos nyid mnyam pa'i rjes 'gro sangs rgyas mchod par byed/ shes pas shes bya bsod nams nas
329a5(phal chen): kyis mi ngoms pas/ de phyir mkhas pa bdun po'i sa phyogs yongs su gnon/ khams gsum mngon par bsgrub byed shin tu dben zlob// rnon mongs
329a6(phal chen): stobs rnams zhi zhing 'gro bzhi la mos/ mig yor sgyu ma rmi lam mi gnyis chos spyod kyang / snying rjes las spyod ston pa mkhas pas bdun pa gnon/
329a7(phal chen): nam mkha'i bsam pas zhing rnams yod spyod rnam mi rtog/ rgyal ba'i mtshan dang ldan zhing mi g.yo chos dang ldan/ brjod pa'i dbyangs bral 'gro ba dag
329a8(phal chen): bya don tu gnyer/ skad cig sems kyis rgyal bas kun mkhyen yang dag gzhol// chos rnams 'di ba spyod pas snang bathob gyur pas/ 'gro ba 'jon
329b1(phal chen): dus mchog yongs su mnon ces bya// de dgas 'jig nas shing mtha' yas sems can spyong // bde gshegs cang meng las mche ma
329b2(phal chen): dpyod pa byed// zhing dang bskal pa chos grangs tshogs de// theg pa gsum po bstan pa tshad med yang dag 'jug/ bdag gis sems can de dag yongs
329b3(phal chen): su smin bya zhes// de dag de ltar rnam phye shes rab lam ldan pa// spyod lam ldan pa// spyod lam bzhi por mngon par brtson zhing thabs dang ldan// sems
329b4(phal chen): skad cig kun la byang chub yon tan skrag/ pha rol tu phyin pa bcur 'jug yongs su rdzogs par byed// sems skyes 'gro la yongs su bstod ni
329b5(phal chen): sbyin pa'o// chum khrims nyon mongs zhib bzod pa mi 'tshig pa// brtson 'grus de nas khyad par gong du rtsom pa ste// lam las me sgrub de ni legs ldan
329b6(phal chen): bsam gtan mi skye'i bzod pa rdul med mkhas pa'i ye shes rab mchog/ da dung mngon 'dod sngo/ de'i smon lam ste// mi thub stobs yin/ shin tu
329b7(phal chen): rtogs pa ye shes so// de ltar byang chub yon tan thams cad skad cig ldan// dang po dmigs pas yon tan yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur// gnyis la rdza
329b8(phal chen): ma bstsal phyir gsum la bgegs bsal bas// bzhi la lam gyi lnga la mnyam pa nyid kyis ste// mi skye'i snang bas mkhas pa'i drug po rnam par
330a1(phal chen): 'phel/ bdun po 'dir phyin yon tan mtha' dag kun rdzogs par// smon lam du ma sna tshogs mngon par bsgrub pa byed//
330a2(phal chen): ci phyir zhe na ye shes spyod pa 'dir 'grub pa// de ni brgyad pa yan chad kun tu rnam par 'gyur// 'da' dka' phyin ka ye shes mang po'i las kyis 'grub//
330a3(phal chen): zhing gnyis par mtshams ci ltar yongasu brgal dka' bzhin// bdun la spyod pa rgyal po chags med ji bzhin te// lam la gnas pa yin gyi thams
330a4(phal chen): cad rnam brtan ma 'das// brgyad pa'i ye shes sa dang gang che ldan gyur pa// ngo che sems kyi yul 'das ye shes las la gnas// tshangs pa 'a
330a5(phal chen): ba lnga 'ang mi'i bdag nyid min// de bzhin mkhas pa pad+mo bzhin du 'chags spyod// 'od la gnas pa nyon mongs sna tshogs rab tu 'da'// de dag nyon mo
330a6(phal chen): spyod med byang ba'ang thob pa yin// lam la gnas kyang de 'dre'i nyon mongs spyod med min// rgyal ba'i ye shes mngon 'dod de pas zad pa min// 'jig rten
330a7(phal chen): bzo dang las gnas rnam pas tshogs dag/ mkhas pas gtsug lag rgyus la gnas te shes bya dang // bsam gtan mngon zhes stobs snom ldan par gyur
330a8(phal chen): pa'i rnams de bas gsal 'gyur ting nge 'dzin tshogs mngon par sgru ba// nyan thos rang rgyal spyod las yongs su 'das pa ste// bdun pa'i byang chub sems
330b1(phal chen): dpa' spyod la mkhas pa gnas// snan chad bsam pas yin gyi 'di la ye shes gyis// nar bson mthu ldan pa'i rgyal po'i bu bzhin no// shin tu bzab dang ldan pas
330b2(phal chen): gong du rlom byed de// 'gog pa'i sems dang ldan yang mngon par mi byed do// ji ltar rgya mtshor phyin cing gru chen zhugs gyur pa// chu tshul thams cad sngon gyur gru
330b3(phal chen): la sngon mi 'gyur// de dag ston pas thabs dang shes rab mchog dang ldan// shes dga'agro ba kun tu shes spyod yon tan mang // sangs rgyas byed pa yang dri bsam pa
330b4(phal chen): dag mchod// gser snga ma de nyid chen mang pos sbas pa bzhin// 'di la gnas pa'i mkhas pa'i shes rab mchog gi 'od// srid pa'i churnams ji ltar gzhi bzhin
330b5(phal chen): yongs su snyoms// sa mchog 'di la gnas pa dbang sgyur rgyal ba'i 'gyur ye shes dam pa'i 'bras bu ston la mthu yod mkhas 'dod na brtson 'grus dam pa'i stobs
330b6(phal chen): dang ldan gyur pa// sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong chang ba dag/ phyogs rnams kun tu shin tu mnyam par bzhag pas mthong // yan chad smon lam yon tan
330b7(phal chen): mchog can chad kyang med// 'di ni sa mchog bdun pa ste// rang rgyal dbang la spyod pa dang // 'jig rten kun gyis shes par dka'// thabs dang shes rab spyod pa'o//
330b8(phal chen): ring du song ba zhes bya ba ste// byang chub sems dpa'i sa bdun pa'o// / bam po lnga bcu pa'o// mkhas pas spyod pa de 'drangs
331a1(phal chen): pa thos nas su// lha'i tshogs dang lha'i dbang po kun kyang dga'// byang chub sems dpa' 'gro phan brtson pa mang po la// bde bar gsheg
331a2(phal chen): dang rgyal sras rnams la mchod pa byed// me tog 'phreng ba rgyal mtshan pa ngan yid 'ong ba// spos dang bye ma rin chen na bza' rgyan dbyig gis smras pa'i gdugs rab
331a3(phal chen): khrag khrig dang // 'phreng ba'i sprin gyi dam pa'i char yang mngon par 'bebs// lha'i bu mos yid du 'ong ba'i sgra dbyangs glu// du ma'i sal snyan gar gyi mchod pa dang /
331a4(phal chen): ldan byas pa// bde bar gshegs dang rgyal sras mchod don du// thub pa'i yon tan rna mang du byung brjod de// thams cad gzigs rkang gnyis khyu mchog gtso// sangs
331a5(phal chen): rgyas spyod yul 'grol phan phyir bston mdzad pa// dbyangs sprin yid du 'ong bar rab du 'byung ba'i// rnga dang sil snyan sna tshogs lus 'das pa 'byung // sgra'i rtsel
331a6(phal chen): bde gshegs brgya phrag stong snyed de// 'ga' 'ga' khrag khrig bre ba'i phan rdul bas de yang mang zhing mchog dam pa gnyis pa med pa dgan// khyumachog rnams ni rdum
331a7(phal chen): zil chos rnams ston pa mdzad// sku gcig rtse la 'byam kAs dam pa'i zhing mang pa// steng ba ni dum rgya mtsho chen po kun gnas te// 'khar yug bya ba de bzhin
331a8(phal chen): ri rab thams cad kyang // so so'i tshul dang ldan par kun kyang snang gyur te// skra'i rtse mo de la 'gro brgyud du drug po// yi dgas byol song mi dang sems dmyal
331b1(phal chen): / dadu myur spyad pa klung nga// mu man mang po dag/ sna tshogs las kyi yul la kun kyang myod byed de/ rdul thul kun gyi zhing gi spyong yul ban du ni//
331b2(phal chen): tshe'i dab pa'i mchog kyang de tshe 'khor gyur te// 'gro ba'i 'du shes sems dang de bzhin spyod ba la// bde gshegs gsung gi dam pas kun kyang bstan pa byas
331b3(phal chen): sems can lus la bde gshegs zhing mang sna tshogs ste// zhing la sems can rmad snyed lus kyang de bzhin no// lha dang mi'i lam rgyud de bzhin sna tshogs te/
331b4(phal chen): mkhyen nas bde bar gshegs pa chos rnams kun la bston// shin tu yangs pa'i zhing la 'du shes par gyur te// rdul gyi mtshan ma dag la 'du shes yangs
331b5(phal chen): par gyur// de las stsogapa pa de gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul ni// 'jig rten kun gyis brjod kyang zad par mi 'gyur ro// che ba nyid dbyangs de skad du// skan
331b6(phal chen): dbyangs su grags gyur nas// 'khor rnams rab tu dga' zhi zhing // gsung ba'i mchog la lta zhing gnas// 'khor rnams zhi bar shes gyur nas// rnam grol
331b7(phal chen): zla bas yang smras pa// sa brgyad pa'i rnam pa dang // de la 'jug pa bstan par mdzod// byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying pos smras pa// kye rgyal ba'i sras ngan/
331b8(phal chen): de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// byang chub sems dpa'i sa bdun pa la rnam par dbye ba shin tu byas// thabs dang shes rab kyis lam
332a1(phal chen): shin tu sbyangs pa// tshogs shin tu bstsags pa// smon lam chen po btab pa'i stobs dang // thugs can de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis shin tu
332a2(phal chen): brlabs pa// rang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i stobs dang // shugs thob pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa yid la bya
332a3(phal chen): dang ldan pa/ bsam pa dang lhag pa'i bsam pas yongs su sbyangs pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ bsod nams dang ye shes kyi stobs kyis mngon par 'phags/ snong
332a4(phal chen): snying brtse ba chen pos/ sems can gyi khams thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba'i sbyor ba dang ldan pa/ ye shes kyi lam chad med pa'i rjes su song ba de/ chos
332a5(phal chen): thams cad thog ma nas ma byung ba nyid la yang dag pa ji lta ba gzhin du 'jug go/ mi skyes pa dang mtshan nyid med pa dang / skye ba med pa dang 'jig pa med pa dang /
332a6(phal chen): thug pa med pa dang / mi rgyu ba dang / mi ldog pa dang / dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin dang / thog ma dang tha ma dang / dbus mnyam pa nyid dang / de bzhin ni/
332a7(phal chen): kyis rnam par mi rtog pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la 'ang / yang dag pa ji blta ba bzhin du 'jug ste/ des rnam pa thams cad du sems dang / yis
332a8(phal chen): rnam par shes pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang / 'du shes dang bral zhing thogs pa med pa la nam mkha' dang 'dra zhing nam mkha'i rang bzhin du khong du chung pas ma
332b1(phal chen): skye ba chos la bzod pa thob ces bya'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag la de lta bu'i bzod pa dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni byang chub sems dpadzan
332b2(phal chen): mo ba thob ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa'i gnas zab mo shes par dka' ba/ tha mi dad pa mtshan ma thams cad dang bral ba/ 'du shes kyi bgegs
332b3(phal chen): thams cad las phyir log pa tshad med pa nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis mi 'phrogs pa/ dben pa thams cad mngon tu gyur pa/ shin tu
332b4(phal chen): ba yin/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag ni 'di lta ste/ dper na/ dge slong rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa sems thams cad dad la dbang thob pa/ mthar gyis 'gog
332b5(phal chen): pa'i bar du mnyam par bzhag pa yin/ rgyu ba dang sems dang g.yo ba'i rnam par rtog pa dang / 'du shes thams cad dang bral ba yin/ kye rgyal ba'i sras
332b6(phal chen): de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang / byang chub sems dpa'i mi g.yo ba 'di thos ma thag tu ched du bya ba thams cad dang bral te/ lhun gyis grub pa
332b7(phal chen): chos nyid thob cing / lus dang ngag dang sems kyi rtsa ba thams cad dang bral te/ shin du dben pa'i chos nyid la gnas pa yin// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di
332b8(phal chen): lta ste/ dper na mi la la zhig gnyid kyis log pa'i mi lam du bdag chu klung chen pos khyer bstam byed/ de de nas ci phyin du 'bad cing rtsol ba chen po rtsol cog
333a1(phal chen): ba las/ de 'bad cing rtsol ba chen po de nyid kyis sad par gyur na// de sad ma thag tu'abar cing rtsol ba thams cad dang bral bar gyu
333a2(phal chen): ro/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang nyon mongs pa'i chu klung chen po bzhir sems can mang po dong bar shes rab 'bad ci
333a3(phal chen): rtsol ba yongs su rtsom mo// de rtson 'grus chen po dang ldan pas/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa mi g.yo ba 'di thos ma thag du ched du bya ba thams cad dang bral
333a4(phal chen): ba yin te/ de'i gnyis po rgyu ba 'am mtshan ma rgyu ba bdag kyang thams cad kyi thams cad du mi snang bar 'gyur ro// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di lta ste dper
333a5(phal chen): na/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skyes shing gnas pa ni/ 'dod pa la spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams yongs su mi rgyu ba yin// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de bzhin
333a6(phal chen): du byang chub sems dpa'i sa mi g.yol gnas pa'i// byang chub sems dpa' yang sems ca dang yid dang / rnam par shes pa'i yongs su rgyu ba rnams
333a7(phal chen): kyi thams cad du yongs su mi rgyu ba yin te/ de sangs rgyas la yongs su rgyu ba 'am/ byang chub la yongs su rgyu ba 'am/ byang chub sems dpa' la
333a8(phal chen): su rgyu ba'am/ rang sangs rgyas la yongs su rgyu ba 'am/ can thos la yongs su rgyu ba'am/ mya ngan las 'das pa la yongs su rgyu ba'am/ dgra bcom pa la/
333b1(phal chen): yongs su rgyu ba 'am/ phyir ma 'ong ba la yongs su rgyu ba'am/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba yongs su rgyu ba 'am/ rgyun tu zhugs pa la yongs su rgyu ba yang yongs su
333b2(phal chen): rgyun/ 'jig rten pa'i yongs su rgyu ba yongs su mi rgyu ba lta ci smos// kye rgyal ba'i sras dge de ltar mi g.yo ba'i sa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sngo
333b3(phal chen): gyi smon lam gyi stobs dang / shugs la gnas pa de'i chos kyi sgo'i rgyud de la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyis nye bar
333b4(phal chen): sgrub pa mdzad de/ de la 'di skad ces kyang bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu legs so legs so// sangs rgyas kyi chos rjes su rtogs par bya ba la 'di ni don
333b5(phal chen): dam pa'i bzod pa'ang yin na/ 'on kyang rigs kyi bu nged kyi stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos phun sum tshogs pa de/ khyod
333b6(phal chen): la med kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos phun sum tshogs pa de dag yongs su btsal ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom shig/ bzod pa sgom nyid kyang ma btang shig/ rig
333b7(phal chen): kyi bu 'di lta ste/ khyod kyis de ltar zhi ba'i rnam par thar pa thob kyang byis pa so so'i skye bo 'di dag zhi la ma yin rab tu zhi ba ma yin te/ nyon mongs pas
333b8(phal chen): tshogs yongs su rgyu bar rgyur na/ de ltar rnam par rtog pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis yongs su mnar ba la soms// 'di ltar yang rigs kyi bu khyod kyi/
334a1(phal chen): sngon gyi smon lam sems can gyi don yongs su 'grub par bya bar bta' ba dang / ye shes kyi sgo bsam gyis mi khyab pa dran par gyis shig/ 'di
334a2(phal chen): ltar yang rigs kyi bu 'di ni chos rnams kyi chos nyid de/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung / ma byung yang rung chos kyi dbyings dang chos kyi gnas nyid 'di
334a3(phal chen): ni de bzhin du 'dug pa ste/ 'dis ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni tse brjod par bya ba ma yin te/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyang rnam par mi pa'i
334a4(phal chen): chos nyid 'di 'thob bo// rigs kyi bu khyod dang kyi lus tshad med pa dang / ye shes chad med pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa dang / ye shes mngon par bsgrub
334a5(phal chen): pa tshad med pa dang / 'od kyi dkyil 'khor chad med pa dang / dbyangs kyi yan lag rnam par dag pa tshad med pa la ltos// khyod kyis kyang de bzhin du mngon par sgrub par
334a6(phal chen): bya ba dgos so// 'di ltar rigs kyi bu gang de chos thams cad la rnam par mi rtog pa de ni khyod kyi snang ba cig pur zad de/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gzhogs pa
334a7(phal chen): rnams kyi chos snang ba ni 'di 'dra ste/ yongs su mtha' yas par song la yongs su mtha' yas par bsgrubs skye/ de snyed kyi bsal pa bye ba khrag khrig ba
334a8(phal chen): stong gis kyang bgrangs par dgas/ de dag thos par bya ba'i phyir mngon par bsgrub pa skyed cig/ 'di lta raM yang rigs kyi bu phyogs bcu'i zhing chad med pa dang / sa
334b1(phal chen): can chad med pa dang / chos rnam par phye ba tshad med pa la smos ste/ de dag thams cad ma nor bar yang bgrang bar gyis shig ces ste/ ce rgyal ba'i sras ngag del bu'i
334b2(phal chen): shes dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag ye shes mngon par bsgrubs pa'i sgo de dag las stsogs pa gang gis byang chub sems
334b3(phal chen): dpa'i ye shes rnam par bya ba'i tshul mngon par bsgrub pa'i las tshad med pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/ gzhal du med pa de dganye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do// kye rgyal
334b4(phal chen): ba'i sras dag khyed kyis yid ches pa dang / khong du chud par bya bar/ gal te sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' de mngon par
334b5(phal chen): bsgrub pa'i sgor bzhugs par mdzad du zin na/ de nyid de'i mtha' las rgal ba'i mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur te/ sems can thams cad kyi dgongs pa'ang rgyun bcad
334b6(phal chen): par 'gyur ro// de ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' de la ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa'i las gang gis bskad cig du mngon par
334b7(phal chen): bsgrub pas kyang thog sems bskyed pa phyin cad sa bdun pa zhugs shing rjes su song ba'i yongs su rtsom pa'i bar dus mo de dag gis rgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro// songaH
334b8(phal chen): cha deng khrag khrig cha dang khrag khrig brgya'i cha dang khrag khrig stong gi cha dang / khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi cha dang / bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro ma
335a1(phal chen): grangs dang cha dang ba grang ba dang / dpe' dang rgyu yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas/ bskrun pa tsam gyi bar du'ang mi chog pa de snyed du chad med pa'i ye shes mngon
335a2(phal chen): par sgrub pa las nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do// kye rgyal ba'i sras ngag de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sngon chad lus gcig gis mngon par bsgrub pas spyod pa mngon pa sgrub par gyur gyi/
335a3(phal chen): 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni lus rnam par bye ba chad med pas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i mthu yongs su spyad de dbyings mngon par
335a4(phal chen): bsgrubs pa tshad med pa dang / ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa tshad med pa dang / skye ba mngon par bsgrub pa chad med pa/ zhing yongs su spyod pa tshad med pa dang
335a5(phal chen): sems can yongs su smin par bya ba tshad med pa dang / sangs rgyas mchod cing bsnyen bkur byed pa tshad med pa dang / chos kyi tshul khong du chud pa tshad med pa dang /
335a6(phal chen): mngon par shes pa mngon par bsgrub pa'i stobs dang / shugs chad med pa dang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chang med pa rnam par bya ba dang / tshad med pa'i rje
335a7(phal chen): su song ba'i lus dang / drag dang yi dkyilas kyis byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams nad mthu mi sprul pa'i rdul gyis yang dag par bsgrub pa/
335a8(phal chen): ba'i sras dag 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rgya mtsho chen por 'gro ba'i grwani rgyal che chen por ma byin gyi bar du ching bskyed cing 'gro bar bya ba yin te/ rgya ma tsho chen pos
335b1(phal chen): nas ma thag tu rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyis bsrubs ched du bsnong mi dgos pa yin/ des rgya mtsho chen po la zhin gcig gis mchod pa de ni/ sngon ched du bskyod cing 'gro bas
335b2(phal chen): lo brgyar yang de ltar tshad med par mi nus so// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de bzhin du shi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po'i tshogs
335b3(phal chen): yang dag par bstsags pa/ theg pa chen po'i grur zhugs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i mtshor phyin nas/ yud tsam gcig du lhun gyis grub pa'i ye shes
335b4(phal chen): gyis thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes ci tsam yang dag par gnod pa de na sngon gyi ched du bya ba'i las kyis bskal pa brgya stong du yang dag par gnod par mi nus so /
335b5(phal chen): kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la byang chub sems dpa'i sa brgyad pa 'di thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni thabs mkhas pa'i ye shes kyis bsgrub pa lhun gyis
335b6(phal chen): ba grub pa la shin tu zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i blos thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la/ rnam par dpyod cing 'jig rten gyi khams 'byung ba yang rnam par
335b7(phal chen): dpyod do// 'jig rten gyi khams 'dzin pa yang rnam par dpyod do// de 'jig rten ji ltar 'byung ba de yang rab tu shes so// 'jig rten ji ltar 'jigs pa de yang
335b8(phal chen): rab tu shes so// las gang bsags pas 'jig rten 'byung bar 'gyur ba de yang rab tu shes so// las gang bsags pas 'jig rten 'jig par 'gyur ba de
336a1(phal chen): yang rab tu shes so// dus ji srid kyis 'jig rten 'byung bar 'gyur ba de yang rab tu shes so// dus ji srid kyis 'jig rten 'jig par gyur
336a2(phal chen): pa de yang rab tu shes so// dus ji srid du 'jig rten byung nas gnas pa de yang rab tu shes so// dus ji srid du 'jig rten zhing par gnas pa de yang rab tu shes so//
336a3(phal chen): de sa'i khams shin tu chung ba yang rab tu shes so// sa'i khams che ba yang rab shes so// sa'i khams tshad med 'ang rab tu shes so// sa'i khams rnam par
336a4(phal chen): par phye ba'ang rab tu shes so// de chu'i khams shin tu chung ba'ang rab tu shes so// chu'i khams shin tu che ba'ang rab tu shes so// chu'i khams tshad med pa yang /
336a5(phal chen): rab tu shes so// chu'i khams rnam par phyed pa'ang rab tu shes so// de me'i khams shin+da chung ba'ang rab tu shes so// me'i khams shin tu che ba'am tu shes so//
336a6(phal chen): me'i khams tshad med pa'ang rab tu shes so// me'i khams rnam par bye ba'ang rab tu shes so// de rlung gi khams shin tu chung ba'ang rab tu shes so// rlung
336a7(phal chen): khams shin tu che ba'ang rab tu shes so// rlung gi khams tshad med pa'ang rab tu shes so// rlung gi khams rnam par bya ba'ang rab tu shes so// de zhin tu bla /
336a8(phal chen): rdul za ba nyid kyang rab tu shes so// shin du bri ba'i rdul yangs pa'ang rab tu shes so// shin tu phra ba'i rdul chang med pa'ang rab tu shes so// shin tu za ba'i dus
336b1(phal chen): rnam par bye ba'ang rab tu shes sa// 'jig rten gyi khams gan sa'i khams kyi rdul shin du za ba ji snyed pa de dag kyang rab tu shes so// chu'i khams kyi rdul shan
336b2(phal chen): ba ji srid pa de dag kyang rab tu shes so// me'i 'khams kyi shin du za ba de dag kyang rab tu shes so// rlung gi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba de dag kyang rab tu phra ba dag
336b3(phal chen): kyang rab tu shes so// rin po che rnam par phye ba ji snyed yod pa dang / rin po che'i rdul shin tu phra ba ji snyed yod pa de dag kyang rab tu shes so// sems can gyi lus la
336b4(phal chen): rdul ji snyed yod pa de dag kyang rab tu shes so// zhing gi lhun la rdul shin tu phra ba ji snyed yod pa de dag kyang rab tu shes so// sems can gyi lus che ba dang / lus
336b5(phal chen): yangs pa dang / lus phra ba dang / lus rnam par phye ba'ang rab tu shes so// sems can dmyal ba'i lus rdul shin tu phra ba ji snyed kyis byung ba dang / byol song gi skye
336b6(phal chen): gnas pa'i lus rdul shin tu phra ba ji snyed kyis 'byung ba dang / gshin rje'i 'jig pa'i lus shin tu phra ba ji snyed kyis byung ba dang / lha ma yin gyis 'jig rten pa'o//
336b7(phal chen): lus rdul shin tu phra ba ji snyed kyis byung ba dang / lha'i 'jig rten pa'i lus rdul shin tu phra ba ji srid kyis byung ba dang / mi'i rigs su gtogs pa'i lus rdul
336b8(phal chen): shin tu phra ba ji snyed kyis byung ba de dag kyang rab tu shes so// de de lta rdul shin tu phra ba rab tu dbye ba la zhugs pa na 'dod pa'i khams 'jig pa'ang rab tu shes
337a1(phal chen): gzugs kyi khams 'jig pa'ang rab tu shes so// gzugs med pa'i khams 'jig pa'ang rab tu shes so// 'dod pa'i khams 'du ba
337a2(phal chen): yang rab tu shes so// gzugs kyi khams 'du'ang rab tu shes so// gzugs med pa'i khams 'du ba yang rab tu shes so// 'dod pa'i khams chung ba yang
337a3(phal chen): du shes so// 'dod pa'i khams che ba yang rab tu shes so// 'dod pa'i khams tshad med pa'ang rab tu shes so// 'dod pa'i khams rnam par phye ba yang rab tu
337a4(phal chen): shes so// gzugs kyi khams dang / gzug med pa khams chub 'ang rab tu shes so// che ba'ang rab tu shes so// rlung med pa'ang rab tu shes so// rnam
337a5(phal chen): bye ba'ang rab tu shes so// de khams gsum rnam par dpyad pa'i ye shes khong du chud pa mngon par bsgrubs pa'i ye shes kyi snang ba dang ldan la/ sems
337a6(phal chen): can gyi lus rab tu dbye ba la mkhas shing zhing gi lhun rnam par dbye ba'i ye shes las mkhas pas skye mched thams cad mngon par bsgrub pa la blo shin tu
337a7(phal chen): gtong ste/ de ni sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir sems can rnams kyi skye ba dang yongs su 'grub pa ji lnga 'dra ba de lta bur rang gi
337a8(phal chen): byin kyis rlob bo// de stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgyas par bkang zhing / sems can gyi mos pa'i la ba de bzhin du rang gi lus mi
337b1(phal chen): yar lta bu'i ye shes kyi rjes su 'drang ba skye bar bya ba'i phyir mngon par bsgrub ste// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gnyis sam/ gsum 'am
337b2(phal chen): bzhi 'am lnga 'am/ bcu 'am nyi shu 'am/ sum cu 'am/ bzhi bcu 'am/ lnga bcu dag nas brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar dag rgyas par bkang ste/
337b3(phal chen): sems can gyi mos pa ji lta ba de bzhin du rang gyi lus mig g.yor lta bu'i ye shes kyi rjes su dran pas skye bar bya ba'i phyir mngon par bsgrub bo// de de lta bu'i
337b4(phal chen): ye shes dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig nas kyang mi yo la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa de dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dag
337b5(phal chen): du yang snang bar phyin pa yin/ de sems can rnams kyi lus rnam par phye ba dang / mos pa dang bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du zhing de dang de dag dang / khor gyi dkyil khor
337b6(phal chen): de dang de dag tu/ de lta de ltar rang gi lus ston te// de dge sbyong gi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du dge sbyong gi kha dog dang gzugs ston to// bram ze'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor
337b7(phal chen): du bram ze'i kha dog dang gzugs ston to// rgyal rigs kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du rgyal rigs kyi kha dog dang gzugs ston to// rje'u rigs kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor
337b8(phal chen): du rje'u rigs kyi kha dog dang gzugs ston to// khyim bdag gi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du khyim bdag gi kha dog dang gzugs ston to// rgyal po chen po bzhi'i ris kyi 'khor
338a1(phal chen): du rgyal ba zana'i ris kyi kha dog dang gzugs sun to// sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor tu sum cu rtswa sum pa'i kha dog da
338a2(phal chen): gzugs ston to// de bzhin du 'tshe ma'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi dang / dga' ldan gyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang / 'phrul dga'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor
338a3(phal chen): dang / gzhan sprul dbang byed kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang / tshangs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor nas/ 'og min gyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi bar du/
338a4(phal chen): de lta de lta bu'i 'o kha dog dang gzugs ston to// de nyan thos kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la nyan thos kyi lus dang kha dog gzugs ston to// rang sangs
338a5(phal chen): rgyas kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la rang sangs rgyas kyi lus dang kha dog dang gzugs ston to// byang chub sems dpa'as 'dul ba'i sems can rnams
338a6(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i lus dang kha dog dang gzugs ston to// de bzhin gshegs pas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang gzugs na
338a7(phal chen): to/ kye rgyal ba'i sras ngag de ltar sangs rgyas kyis zhing brjod du med pa ji snyed pa de dag gi sems can rnams kyi mos pa rab tu mang ba de dag thams cad du rang gi lus de
338a8(phal chen): ltar rnam par phye ba yongs su storan to// de lus kyi rnam par rtog pa dang / 'dra shes thams cad dang rnam par thal bste/ lus mnyam pa ming thob pas sems can gyi la/
338b1(phal chen): rab tu shes so// zhing gi lus dang las rnam par smin pa'i las dang / nyan thos kyi lus dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi lus dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lus dang / de bzhin
338b2(phal chen): gshegs pa'i sku dang / ye shes kyi lus dang / chos kyi lus dang / nam ka'i lus kyang rab tu shes so// des sems can rnams kyi sems dang bsam pa mngon par bsgru
338b3(phal chen): pa yongs su shes pas 'don sems can gyi lus nam mkha'i lus su byin gyis rlob po// de bzhin du zhing gi lus dang / las rnam par smin pa'i lus dang / rgan thong
338b4(phal chen): lus dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi lus dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lus dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang / ye shes kyi lus dang / chos kyi lus kyang nam mkha'i
338b5(phal chen): lus su byin gyis rlob po// des sems can rnams kyi sems dang bsam pa mngon par bsgrub pa yongs su shes pas sems can gyi lus rang gi lus su byin
338b6(phal chen): gyis rlob po// de bzhin tu zhing gi lus dang / las rnam par smin pa'i lus dang / nyan thos kyi lus dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi lus dang / byang chub sems dpa'i
338b7(phal chen): lus dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang / ye shes kyi lus dang / chos kyi lus dang / nam mkha'i lus kyang rang gi lus su byin gyis rlob bo// des sems
338b8(phal chen): rnams kyi sems dang bsam pa mngon par bsgrub pa yongs su shes so// lus gang dang gang / lus gang dang gang tu 'dong pa de dang de'i lus su lus de dang de
339a1(phal chen): dag gis byin gyi rlob bo// de sems can gyi lus rnams kyi las kyi lus kyang rab tu shes so// rnam par smin pa'i lus dang / nan mongs pa
339a2(phal chen): lus dang / gzugs kyi lus dang / gzugs med pa'i lus kyang rab tu shes so// zhing gis lus rnams kyi chung ba'i rang bzhin yang rab tu shes so// che ba dang chad
339a3(phal chen): med pa dang kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par dag pa dang snrel bzhi dang / spri nag dang / gzhi mnab par yang dag par 'jug pa dang / phyogs kyi dra ba rnam par dbye ba
339a4(phal chen): ba yang rab tu shes so// las rnam par smin pa'i lus rnam par phye ba'i brda ming rab tu shes so// de bzhin du nyan thos kyi lus rnam par bye ba'i brda' dang / rang sangs
339a5(phal chen): rgyas kyi lus rnam par bye ba'i brda' dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lus rnam par bye ba'i brda' yang rab tu shes so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams kyi mngon par
339a6(phal chen): 'chang rgya ba'i lus kyang rab tu shes so// smon lam gyi lus dang / sprul pa'i lus dang / byin gyi rlabs kyi lus dang / gzugs dang mtshan dang / dpe byang bzang po'i/
339a7(phal chen): gyi lus dang / 'od kyi lus dang / yid kyi rang bzhin gyi lus dang / zosong nams kyi lus dang / ye shes kyi lus dang / chos kyi lus kyang rab tu shes so// ye shes
339a8(phal chen): lus rnams kyi shin tu rnam par dpung pa nyid kyang rab tu shes so// yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du brtags pa yang rab tu shes so// 'bras bu'i sbyor bas yang dag par
339b1(phal chen): bzung ba dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa rnam par bye ba dang / theg pa gsum rnam par dgod pa dang / thung mong dang thun mong ma yin pa dang / 'byung ba dang po 'byung
339b2(phal chen): dang slob pa dang ba slob pa yang rab tu shes so// chos kyi lus rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid kying rab tu shes so// 'khrul pa med pa yang rab tu shes so//
339b3(phal chen): brda' dang kun rdzob rnam par dgod pa dang / sems can dang sems can ma yin pa'i chos rnam par dgod pa dang / sangs rgyas chos 'phags pa'i dge 'du
339b4(phal chen): rnam par dgod pa yang rab tu shes so// nam mkha'i lus rnams kyi tshad med pa nyid kyang rab tu shes so// thams cad kyi rjes su song ba dang lus byung na
339b5(phal chen): nor ba med cing mtha' yas pa dang / gzugs mang po mngon zhing gsal bar byed pa yang rab tu shes so// des lus kyi ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa de lta du
339b6(phal chen): rab tu thos pas bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod tu med par rtse byin gyis rlab pa'i phyir tshe'i dbang rab tu shes 'thob bo// dang nge 'dzin shis
339b7(phal chen): pa'i ye shes la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir sems kyi dbang rab tu thob bo// 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rgyun du mas rab tu 'a rgyan cing / shin tu b+hU
339b8(phal chen): ma byin gyi brlabs yang dag par bstan par bya ba'i phyir yo byad kyi dbang tu 'thob bo// las kyi rnam par smin pa'i byin gyi rlabs dus bzhin du ma nor bar bsta
340a1(phal chen): pa'i phyir las kyi dbang rab tu thob bo// 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du skye ba yongs su bstar pa'i phyir skye ba'i dbang tu thob bo//
340a2(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang dus gang du ci dga' bar mngon par 'tshang rgya ba yang dag par snyan pa'i phyir// smon lam gyi stobs rab tu bathob po// 'jig rten gyi
340a3(phal chen): khams thams cad sangs rgyas kyis rab tu gang ba yang dag par snyan pa'i phyir mos pa'i dbang rab tu 'thob bo// sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad durdzu
340a4(phal chen): 'phrul dang rnam par 'phrul dang rnam par 'phrul pa yang dag par bstan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi dbang rab tu 'thob bo// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stongs
340a5(phal chen): dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang / mtshan dang / dpe' byad bzang po dang / mngon par mtshang rgya ba yang dag par bstan pa
340a6(phal chen): phyir ye shes kyi rab tu 'thob bo// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres po dang / mtshan dang /
340a7(phal chen): byang bzang po dang / mngon par mtshang rgya ba yang dag par bsnyen pa'i phyir ye shes kyi dbang rab tu 'thob bo// mtha' dang dbus med pa'i chos kyi
340a8(phal chen): snang ba yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir/ chos kyang bang rab tu 'thob bo// de byang chub sems dpa'i dbang bcu po 'di dag thob ma thag nas/ bsam gyi
340b1(phal chen): khyab pa' ma shes dang ldan pa yan/ tshad meng pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa yin/ yangs pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa yas ma 'phags pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa ma
340b2(phal chen): ras de lta bu'i rjes su song zhing / de lta bu'i ye shes dang ldan pas lus kyi las kha nas ma tho bzhin tu med pa/ yang dag par rgyu zhing 'byung ba yin/ ngag na
340b3(phal chen): kha nas mthob shin du med pa yang dag par rgyu zhing 'byung ba yin/ yid kyi las kha nas mtho ba shin tu med cing ye shes sngon du 'gro ba/ ye shes rjes su 'a
340b4(phal chen): ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas dbang sgyur ba snying rje chen po sngon du 'gro ba/ thabs mkhas pas shin tu rnam par bye ba/ smon lam gyis shin tu mngon pa
340b5(phal chen): bsgrub pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis shin tu brlabs pa/ sems can gyi don bya zhing sbyar ba/ rgyun ma chad pa 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rnam
340b6(phal chen): par phye ba yang dag par rgyu zhing 'byung ngo // kye rgyal ba'i sras de la mdor bsdun/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa mi g.yo ba 'di thob 'apa'i byang chub
340b7(phal chen): sems dpa'i lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par snang ba'i phyir yang dag par bsdu bu rgyu zhing 'byung ngo //
340b8(phal chen): de ltar des byang chub sems dpa'i sam g.yo ba 'di thos pas zhon mongs pa'i rgyu ba thams cad ring bral ba'i phyir bsam pan po ga pas shin tu ba
341a1(phal chen): pa yin/ las dang ma 'bral ba'i phyir lhag pa'i bsam pa bzhin tu brtan pa yin/ sems can gyi don yongs su mi gtong ba'i phyir
341a2(phal chen): snying rje chen po'i stobs shin tu brtan pa yin/ 'gro ba thams cad yongs su skyob pa'i phyir byas pa chen po'i stobs shin tu bstan pa yin// nyams pa
341a3(phal chen): med pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir/ gzungs kyi stobs shin du brtan pa yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rab tu dbye ba'i dga' la mkhas pa'i phyir
341a4(phal chen): spobs pa'i stobs bshin tu brtan yin/ 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas par spyad pa'i rnam pa la mkhas pas mngon par shes pa'i sto bas
341a5(phal chen): shin tu brtan pa yin/ byang chub sems dpa'i bya ba thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba'i smon lam gyi stobs shin tu brtan pa yin/ sangs
341a6(phal chen): rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par bsgrub pa'i phyir pa pha rol tu phyin pa'i bstobs shin tu brtan pa yin/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i yen
341a7(phal chen): rnam pa thams cad du mngon du gyur pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi bas pas shin tu brtan pa yin te/ de de lta bu'i stobs
341a8(phal chen): kyi shugs dang ldan pas bye ba thams cad kyang yang dag par ston pa la bya ba thams cad la kha nam tho ba'ang med pa yis kyi rgyal ba'i sras pa/
341b1(phal chen): na byang chub sebs dang chamags ces brgyad pa ste/ 'phags pa'i phyir ma g.yo ba zhes bya'o// ye shes ma blags pan phyir mi 'gyur ba nas rlun
341b2(phal chen): 'gro ba thams cad kyis shes par dka' bas na/ thob par dka' ba'i sa zhes bya'o// kha na ma tho ba med pa'i phyir gzhon nu 'is zhes bya'o// bsam pa ma
341b3(phal chen): ji lta ba bzhin tu dbang sgyur bas skye ba'i sa zhes bya'o// gzod bya ba med pa'i yongs su rdzogs pa'i sa zhes bya'o// ye shes kyis rnam par dbye ba na
341b4(phal chen): tu byas pa'i mthar thar thug pa'i sa zhes bya'o// smon lam shin tu bsgrubs pa yis/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i sa zhes bya'o// gzhan gyis rnam par mi
341b5(phal chen): khrugs pas byin gyi rlabs kyis zhes bya'o// ba sngon gyi mthar mngon par bsgrub pa'i sa lhun gyis grub pa'i swa zhes bya'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de ltar
341b6(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' de lta bu'i ye shes mngon par bsgrubs pa dang ldan pa zhing sangs rgyas kyi rigs kyi rjes su song ba/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan
341b7(phal chen): gyes shing bsal bar gyur pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod lam dang / spyod pa dang tshul gyi rjes su song ba/ sangs rgyas kyi yul la mngon tu gyur
341b8(phal chen): de ni rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis shin brlabs pa yin/ brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten gyi mgon pos rab
342a1(phal chen): tu bsu pa yin/ lag na rdo rje rtag par rjes su 'brang ba yin/ ting nge 'dzin gyis stobs yongs su ma btang ba yin/ lus rnam par bye ba
342a2(phal chen): tshad med pa mngon par grub pa yin/ lus kyi spyod pa'i stobs thams cad dang ldan pa yin/ mngon par shes pa chen po'i rnam par smin pa yongs su rdzogs
342a3(phal chen): pa yin/ ting nge 'dzin mtha' yas pa la dbang skur ba yin/ lung bstan pa tshad med pa yang dag par non pa yin/ yongs su smin pa'i tshul bzhin du 'gro
342a4(phal chen): ba rnams la/ mngon par 'tshang rgya ba yongs su ston pa yin te/ de de lta bu'i sa dang ldan zhin theg pa chen po'i dkyil 'khor la rab tu zhugs pa/ shin tu rnam
342a5(phal chen): par dpyad pa'i ye shes mngon par shes pa chen po dang ldan pa rtag tu rgyun mi chad par shes rab snang ba'i 'od gzer gtong ba/ chos kyi dbyings chags pa med
342a6(phal chen): pa'i lam du zhugs pa 'jig rten gyi khams kyi lam rnam par dbye ba la mkhas pa yon tan gyi rnam pa thams cadapa yang dag par son pa/ rang gi sems pasdu
342a7(phal chen): pa la dbang sgyur ba/ sngon gyi mtha' dang byi mtha' shin tu rtogs pa'i ye shes can bdud kyi lam thams cad yongs su bzlog pas ye shes dang ldan pa de ni/
342a8(phal chen): gshegs pa'i yul dang / spyod yul gyi rjes su zhugs pa ni 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas shing / mu med pa dag tu byang chub sems dba'i spyod pa phyir
342b1(phal chen): ldog pa'i tshul gyis spyod pas/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' di ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa mi g.yo' ba yin zhes bya'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag del
342b2(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i mi g.yo ba thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyis mngon par bsgrubs pas rtag tu rgyun mi chad par de ban
342b3(phal chen): gshegs pa mtha' yas pa mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba yin/ sangs rgyas mthong ba las chod cing bsnyen bskur ba rgya che bor yang yongs su mi gtong ste/
342b4(phal chen): de bskal ba re re dang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa re re dag bcu yang sangs rgyas du ma dang / sangs rgyas brgya phrag du ma dang / sangs rgyas
342b5(phal chen): stong phrag du ma dang / sangs rgyas brgya stong phrag du ma dang / sangs rgyas bye ba brgya stong phrag du ma dang / sangs rgyas khrag khrig phrag du ma dang / sangs
342b6(phal chen): rgyas khrag khrig brgya phrag du ma dang / sangs rgyas khrag khrig stong phrag du ma dang / sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma la rim gro byed do la ma na
342b7(phal chen): bsti stang byed do// mchod pa byed do// mchod pa mngon par bsgrub pa'i rnam pa thams cad kyang yang dag par 'bul lo// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag
342b8(phal chen): la bsnyen bkur byed cing 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dbye ba sngon du 'gro ba'i chos snang ba nye bar bsgrub par yang ba yang dag par len to// de sdom
343a1(phal chen): pas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi mdzod rab tu thob pas 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par phye ba yongs su dris pa shin tu bstan pas/
343a2(phal chen): mi 'phrogs pa yin/ de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang bskal pa du ma dang / bskal pa brgya phrag du ma dang / bskal pa stong phrag du ma dang / bskal pa brgya
343a3(phal chen): stong zag du ma dang / bskal pa bye ba brgya stong phrag du ma dang / bskal pa khrag khrig phrag du ba dang / bskal ba khrag khrig bcu phrag dum dang / bskul
343a4(phal chen): pa khrag khrig stong phrag du ma dang / bskal pa khrag khrig stong phrag du ma dang / bskal pa byi ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mar shin tu byung ba dang / yongasu
343a5(phal chen): su dag pa dang / shin tu 'od gsal zhing dang bar gnas pa yin// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di lta ste dper na gser gyis le snyam de nyid mgar mkhas
343a6(phal chen): pa des yongs su zin par gyur nas/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi bdag po'i mgul lam/ mgo la btags na/ sems can 'jam bu'i gling ba thams cad kyi rgyam
343a7(phal chen): rnam par ldan gyis mi thub mi 'phrogs pa yin// kye rgyal ba'i sras ngag de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i sa mi g.yo ba 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems
343a8(phal chen): dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sa bdun pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams
343b1(phal chen): kyis bar gyis kyang mi 'phrogs pa yin/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa 'di dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi 'od chen po ni ye shes kyi sgo shin tu
343b2(phal chen): rnam par bye bas sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs nges pa'i mun pa rab tu sel to// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di lta ste dper na sdod pa dbang ba'i tshangs pa ni
