370b4(phal chen): na rdul shin tu phra ba ji snyed yod pa de snyed kyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams dang / de dag pas kyang ches mang zhing tshad med pa'i de bzhin gshegs
370b5(phal chen): ba rnams las skad cig yud tsam thang cig tu chos kyi snang ba dang 'od dang / sprin chen po chos kyi dbyings dus gsum gyi mdzod ces bya ba bzod cing yang dag par
370b6(phal chen): len to// yang dag par 'dzin to// bdag gir byed do// de bas na sa 'di yang chos kyi sprin zhes bya'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i sa
370b7(phal chen): chos kyi sprin la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni rang gi smon lam gyi stobs dang / shugs kyis snying brtse ba dang / snying rje chen po'i sprin chos kyi snang ba
370b8(phal chen): chen po rab tu sgrog pa'i 'brug sgra shin tu sgrog pa mngon par shes pa dang / rig pa dang mi 'jigs pa'i glog rnam par 'gyur ba/ 'od gzer chen po'i rlung gis shin tu bskyod
371a1(phal chen): pa/ bsod nams dang ye shes kyi sprin gyi dra ba stug pos kun nas khebs pa/ lus sna tshogs kyi sprin gyi grong yang dag par ston pa chos
371a2(phal chen): sgra chen po rab tu sgrogs pa/ bdud kyi 'khor thams cad shin tu char gcid pa yongs su bsrang ste/ skad cig yud tsam thang cig tu phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten snga ma
371a3(phal chen): dge na rdul shin tu ze ba ji snyed yod pa de snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyang bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dang / de dag pas kyang ches mang zhing tshad med pa'i 'jig rten gyi
371a4(phal chen): khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong rgyas par bkang ste/ dge ba'i bdud rtsi'i rgyun gyi char chen pos bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can rnams kyi mi shes pa las langs pa'i
371a5(phal chen): nyon mongs pa'i rdul gyi me lce thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed de/ de bas nas 'di yang chos kyi sbyin ces bya'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi sbyin
371a6(phal chen): la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu yang dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa nas bzung ste/ 'pho ba dang / yum gyi skur bzhugs pa
371a7(phal chen): dang snyun bzhugs pa dang / che mngon par 'byung ba dang mngon par 'tshang rgya ba dang / gsol ba gdab pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo chen po bskor ba dang / mya ngan las
371a8(phal chen): 'das pa chen po bstan pa'i bar du sems can gyi bsam pa'i tshul dang / 'dul ba'i ji lta ba bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'phrin las thams cad byin gyis rlob bo//
371b1(phal chen): de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams gnyis nas 'jig rten gyi khams snga ma de dag na rdul shin tu phra ba ji snyed yod pa de dag pas kyang ches mang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams byed
371b2(phal chen): khrag khrig brgya stong chad med pa'i bar dag tu yang dga' ldan gnas na bzhugs pa nas bzung ste/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po bstan pa'i bar du sems can
371b3(phal chen): rnams kyi bsam pa'i tshul dang / 'dul ba'i tshul ji lta ba bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'phrin las thams cad byin gyis rlob bo// de de lta bu'i ye shes dang ldan zhing shin
371b4(phal chen): tu brtags pa'i mngon par shes pa chen po thob pa'i 'dod na/ 'jig rten gyi khams dogs pa yangs par byin gyis rlob po// yangs pa yang dog par byin gyis brlob bo//
371b5(phal chen): 'dod na kun nas nyon mongs pa rnam par dag par byin gyis rlob po// rnam par dag pa kun nas nyon mongs par byin gyis rlob po// de bzhin du rgya chen po dang shin tu yangs pa dang
371b6(phal chen): ma0/ za ba dang / tha gru chen po dang / snrel bzhi dang / spre'u tshugs dang / gzhi mnyams pa las sogs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyang / khru mchog gi mthu byung bas
371b7(phal chen): mngon par bsgrub pa de dang / der byin gyis rlob bo// de 'dod na rdul shin tu phra ba gcig la 'jig rten gyi khams 'khor yug gi 'obs dang bcas pa rnam pa rna thams cad
371b8(phal chen): dang ldan pa gcig kyang byin gyis rlob ste/ rdul shin tu phra ba de'ang mi 'phel la/ bya ba de dag kyang yongs su ston to// rdul shin tu phra ba gcig la 'jig rten gyi khams
372a1(phal chen): gnyis dang gsum dang / bzhi dang / lnga nas/ 'jig rteran gyi khams brjod du med pa'i bar du thams cad kyang 'khor yug gi 'obs dang / bcas pa rnam pa
372a2(phal chen): thams cad dang ldan par phyin gyis rlob ste/ dral shin tu phra ba de yang mi 'phel la bya ba de dag kyang yongs su ston to// 'dod na 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu 'jig rten gyi
372a3(phal chen): gnyis kyi rgyan yongs su ston to// 'dod na 'jig rteran gyi khams brjod du med pa'i bar gyi rgyad yongs su son to// 'dod na 'jig rten gyi khams gcig gi rgyan 'jig rten
372a4(phal chen): gyi khams gnyis su yongs su ston to// 'dod na 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa dag tu yang yongs su ston to// 'dod na 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa rgan
372a5(phal chen): sems can gyi khams ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu sdud de/ sems can de dag la yang gnod par mi 'gyur ro// 'dor na 'jig rten gyi
372a6(phal chen): khams gcig na/ sems can gyi khams ji snyed pa de dag 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med par sdud de/ sems can de dag la yang gnod par mi 'gyur ro// 'dod na sgra'i rtsem
372a7(phal chen): gcig la sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi khams kyar ram pa thams cad dang ldan pa gcig spyod do// 'di na sangs rgyas kyi yul ni rnam pa thams cad dang ldan pa brdang du me pa
372a8(phal chen): bar du stor to// 'dod na 'jig ched kyi khams parjod du med pa dag na rdul shing tuza pa ji snyed yod pa de snyed kyi lus skad cig yung tsam thang cig tu shin du stsal babyer ro//
372b1(phal chen): lus re re la yang skyed kyi lag pa mangs su ston to// lag pa de dag gis kyang phyogs bcur sangs rgyas mchong pa rab tu byung / lag par ris kyang bcig ga
372b2(phal chen): chu klung 'ga' 'ga'i bye ma snyed sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la mngon par 'thor ro// matog ji lta bu bzhin du spos dang / 'greng ba dang / byug pa dang / rgyam
372b3(phal chen): na brda' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / de bzhin du rgyan thams cad kyang yongs su 'bul lo// lus re re la yang de snyed kyi mgo byin gyis rab ci
372b4(phal chen): mgo re re la yang de snyed kyi lce byin gyis brlab ste/ de dag gis kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag yon tan shin tu brjod pa byed do// sems bskyed pa
372b5(phal chen): la yang phyogs bcu rgyas par khyab par 'gro ste/ sems bskyed pa tsam gyis kyang mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa tshad med pa nas/ mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i
372b6(phal chen): rgyan gyis bar du byin gyis rlob po// dus gsum gyi lus chang mong ba yang byin gyis rlob ste/ rang gi lus la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chad med pa rnams kyis
372b7(phal chen): rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan dang / rgyan tshad med pa byin gyis rlob bo// 'jig rten gyi khams 'jig pa dang / 'du ba thams cad kying rang gi lus la byin gyis rlob bo//
372b8(phal chen): rlung gi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyang ba spu'i khung bu gcig nas gtong ste/ sems can rnams la'ang gnod par mi byed do// 'dod na chu'i phung po yan chad 'jig
373a1(phal chen): / rten gyi khams gcig byin gyis rlob bo// der yang bang mo chen po byid gyis rlob bo// bang mo chen po'i 'ong rnam par phye bas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams su med pa
373a2(phal chen): rgyus par gang bar byed do// de la yang byang chub kyi shing chen po yongs su ston nas/ rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i bar du yang dag par sngo
373a3(phal chen): / rang gi lus la phyogs bcu'i nor bu dang / glog dang nyi zla'i 'od byin gyis rlob pa nas/ snang ba dang 'od thams cad kyi bar du byin gyis rlob bo// kha'i dbugs kyis kya
373a4(phal chen): phyogs re re'i 'jig rten gyi khams lus pa g.yo bar byed do// sems can rnams 'jig par yang med do// phyog bcur rlung gis 'jig pa dang / mes 'jig pa dang /
373a5(phal chen): chus 'jig pa yang byin gyi rlob la/ 'dod na sems can thams cad bsam pa bzhin gzugs kyi lus dang gnas yongs su brgyan gyis rlob bo// rang gi lus
373a6(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku byin gyis rlob bo// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la rang gi lus byin gyis rdzob bo// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing byin
373a7(phal chen): kyis rab bo// rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgra byed gyis rdzob bo// kye rgyal ba'i sras de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi san las gnas
373a8(phal chen): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ rdzu 'phrul dang rnam par 'phrul pa 'di ga dang / gzhan yang bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong chad med pa yongs su ston to// de nas 'kho
373b1(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' la dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / ldan ma yin dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten gyi mgon po dang / dbang phyug chen po dang /
373b2(phal chen): gtsang ma'i gnas su gtogs pa kha cig 'di snyam du sems te/ de ltar de ste byang chub sems dpa'i rdul phrul mngon par 'du bya ba'i spyod yul yang de ltar chang
373b3(phal chen): med na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam pa ci 'dra ba zhig yod snyam pa dang / de nas byang chub sems dpa' rnam par grol ba'i zlabs
373b4(phal chen): 'khor de dag gi sems dang bsam pa'i rgyud shes nas/ byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying po la 'di skad ces smras so// kye rgyal ba'i sras 'khor 'di dag
373b5(phal chen): the tshom du gyur na/ de dag gi the tshom gcad pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i cho 'phrul rnam par phye ba cung zad cig kyang mi bstan tam//
373b6(phal chen): bam po lnga bcu gsum pa'o// // de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying po de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams
373b7(phal chen): cad kyi lhun dang / rang bzhin yang dag par ston pa zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs so// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying po byang chub sems dang
373b8(phal chen): ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas zhing thams cad kyi lhuni dang / rang bzhin yang dag par ston pa la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de nas de nyid kyi tshe/ byang chub sems dpa'i
374a1(phal chen): 'khor de dag thams cad dang lha dang k+Shu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten gyi mgon po dang
374a2(phal chen): dbang phyugs chen po dang / gtsang ma'i gnas kyi ris su gtogs pa'i 'khor de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying po'i lus kyi nang na 'khongad par rang /
374a3(phal chen): shes par gyur te/ der sangs rgyas kyi nang mngon du grub par shes so// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'i rnam pa dang rgyan ji snyed pa de dag kyang bskal pa khrag khrig chang bas kyang brjodas
374a4(phal chen): mi nus par mthong ste/ der byang chub kyi shing stong gsum brgya stong phrag bcur khyab pa'i lhun can stong gsum khrag khrig yongs su chung ba tsam du yangs shing chad med pa
374a5(phal chen): yal gcan rtse mo shin tu mtho ba byung ste/ de dang rkyen du 'bab par de'i drung gi snying po byang chub la seng ge'i khri rgya chen po byung nas/ de la de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par she
374a6(phal chen): ba'i blo gros thams cad kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba'i sring po byang chub tu gshegs ste/ zhugs par mthong ngo // de ltar den rgyan ji sbed snang bar gyur pa de dag ni bskal pa khrag khrig
374a7(phal chen): yongs su chang bas kyang brjod par dka'o// des cho 'phrul chen po 'di bstan nas byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de dag thams cad dang / lha dang klu dang / gnad sbyin dang /
374a8(phal chen): dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten gyi mgon po dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris su gtogs pa'i 'khor de dag thams
374b1(phal chen): cad so so'i gnas ji bzhin du bkod pa dang / de nas 'khor de dag thams cad ngo mtshar dang / rmad du gyur nas/ mi smra bar byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying po de nyid la sems
374b2(phal chen): shing 'khod par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' rnam par grol ba'i zla bas/ byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying po la 'di skad ces sbas so// kye rgyal ba'i sas
374b3(phal chen): nge 'dzin 'di'i mthu rnam par bkod pa de ni rmad du byung ba ngo mtshar chen/ kye rgyal ba'i sras ting nge 'dzin de'i ming ci zhes bya/ byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying pos smras pa
374b4(phal chen): kye rgyal ba'i sras ting nge 'dzin 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad lhun dang rang bzhin yang dag par ston pa zhes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnam par grol ba'i zla bas
374b5(phal chen): smras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras 'od ting nge 'dzin 'di'i spyod yul dang / yul dang / rgyan ji lta bu yin/ byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying pos smras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras byang
374b6(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di la ni shin tu goms pa ni/ 'dod na sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di 'dra ba 'jig rten gyi khams chu klung gang+gA'i bye ma snyed dam/ de bas kyang
374b7(phal chen): mang du rang gyi lus la ston no// kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa'i sa chos kyi sprin la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa ni byang chub sems dpa'i ting
374b8(phal chen): 'dzin 'di 'dra ba brgya stong shin tu mang ba rab tu thob ste/ de bas byang chub sems dpa' de'i lus sam/ lus kyi las ni byang chub sems dpa' rgyal mtshab rgyan
375a1(phal chen): 'phang 'thong cid/ byang chub sems dpa' sa legs pa'i blo gros la gnas pa dag nas kyang shes par sgrub ma yin no// ngag ga ma ngag gi
375a2(phal chen): las kyang shes par slab ma yin no// yid dam yid kyi las kyang shes par slab ma yin no// rdzu 'phrul zhes par slabra ma yin do// dus gsum la rnam par
375a3(phal chen): lta ba shes par sla ba ma yin no// ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul la 'jug pa shes par sla ba ma yin no// ye shes kyi yul shes par sra ba ma yin no// rnam par thar
375a4(phal chen): pa'i rnam par rol pa shes par sla ba ma yin no// 'phrul pa'i las shes par smra ba ma yin no// byin gyi rlabs kyi las zhes par sleb ma yin no// mthu'i la
375a5(phal chen): ber sba ba ma yin pa nas/ mdor bsun gom pa 'dor zhing 'degs pa'i las kyi bar tu yang / byang chub sems dpa' rgyal mchab kyi go 'phang thob cing byang chub
375a6(phal chen): sems dpa' sa legs pa'i blo gros la gnas pa'i rnams kyis kyang shes par srub ma yin te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa'i sa chos kyi
375a7(phal chen): ni mdor bsdu ste bstan na yang de ltar chang med pa ste/ rgya cher ni bskal pa brgya stong grangs med pas kyang bstan pa'i mthar thug par mi 'gyur bar shes par bya/
375a8(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par tshul pa'i thams sbas pa/ ci rgyal pa'i sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chung ba'i yul dang byin kyi rabs kyang nges
375b1(phal chen): med na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi spyod yul dang yul gyi rgyud ci 'dra ba zhig yod byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying pos smras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras
375b2(phal chen): lta ste dper na mi la la zhig gis gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas rde'u rgya shug gi tshig gu tsam gnyis sam/ gsum zhig blangs ste/ 'jig rten gyi
375b3(phal chen): khams mtha' yas pa dag na sa'i khams ji snyed cig yod/ rdo ba 'di las ji tsam zhig gis lhag par 'phags shing lhag par chad ces zer ba zhig yod
375b4(phal chen): nakye rgyal ba'i sras de ltar khyod de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ye shes tshad med pa mnga' ba rnams kyi chos nyid
375b5(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i chos nyid kyis 'jal ba ni ye khyod kyi tshig 'di de dang 'dra bar bdag gis dpags so// kye rgyal ba'i sras ji ltar gling bzhi pa'i 'jig
375b6(phal chen): rten gyi khams nas gang blangs pa'i sa'i khams chung la/ lhag ma las pa tshad med pa de bzhin du/ kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa'i sa chos kyi sprin 'di
375b7(phal chen): khan yang bskal ba grangs med par shin tu bstan kyang phyogs tsam zhig bstan tu zad na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sAl spos su 'angag la yod/ kye rgyal ba'i sa
375b8(phal chen): khyod kyis khong du chud pa dang / yid ches par bya na/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'di dag gi mdun na dbang du bzhugs ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras gal te/ phyogs bcu'i
376a1(phal chen): re re'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams mu med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed cig/ sa 'di lta bu thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams
376a2(phal chen): gyis bu ram shing gi tshal lam/ smyug ma'i tshal lam/ 'od ma'i tshal lam/ til gyi ning thibs po bzhin du yongs su gang bar gyur kyang byang chub sems dpa'a'i stong pa
376a3(phal chen): mngon par bsgrub pa/ bskal ba mu med par mngon par bsgrub pa de dag gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes skad cig yud tsam tha cig tu byung ba'i de bzhin gsheg
376a4(phal chen): ba'i yul gyi ba rgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// stong gi cha dang / brgya stong gi cha dang / bye ba'i cha dang / bye ba brgya'i cha dang / bye ba stong gi cha dang / bye ba brgya stong gi cha
376a5(phal chen): dang / bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas/ grangs dang cha dang bgrang ba dang / dpe' dang rgyu dang bskrun patsam du yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// kye rgyal ba'i
376a6(phal chen): sras de ltar ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang / gsung dang / thugs dang / gnyis su med pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i
376a7(phal chen): ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyang yongs su mi gtong la/ sangs rgyas blta ba dang / mchod pa dang rim 'gror yang rab tu byed de/ bskal pa re rel yang de bzhin gshegs pa mtha
376a8(phal chen): yas pa la mchod pa thams cad du mngon par bsgrub pa'i mchod pa rgya chen po'i rjes su song bas mchod pa byed do// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi byin gyi rlabs
376b1(phal chen): sa snang ba yang yang dag par 'janan// nga ldan pas kyang banalnga bcus dang / bsngal ba bcwamag d+ham dang / bskal pa gang zug smra cu
376b2(phal chen): du ma dang / bskul pa bye ba brgya phrag du ma dang / bskal pa khrag khrig phrag du ma dang / bskal pa khrag khrig brgya phrag du ma dang / bskal pa khrag khrig stong phrag du ma da /
376b3(phal chen): bskal pa khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma dang / bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mar chos dbyings yongs su dris pas shin du bstan pas mi 'phrogs par gnas so//
376b4(phal chen): kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di lnga dper na/ wA rdzas rgyan gyi rnam pa mgar bas ma brdungs pa/ rin po che'i dam pas smras pa/ lnga'i rgyal po dbang sgyur gyi yan lag gi dam pa mgo 'am
376b5(phal chen): mgul du btags na/ de ma yin te'i lha dang mi'i rgyan gyi rnam pa gzhan gyis mi 'phrogs shing mi thub pa yin/ kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sa bcu pa chos
376b6(phal chen): kyi sprin 'di thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi rgyud de dag kyang sems can thams cad dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' sa
376b7(phal chen): dang po nye bar gzung ba yan cad byang chub sems dpa'i sa dgu pa thob pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis kyang mi 'grogs pa yin byang chub sems dpa'i sa 'di la
376b8(phal chen): gnas pa'i ye shes snang ba ni sems can rnams thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la gzung ba'i rgyu yin te/ de ma yin pa'i ye shes snang ba gzhan mi 'phrogs so// kye rgyal
377a1(phal chen): pa'i sras 'di lta dper na/ lnga'i rgyal po dbang phyug chen po'i 'od kyis ni skye ba'i skye mched thams cad du yang khyab la sems can rnams kyi lus kyang
377a2(phal chen): sim par byed do// kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu pa 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes snang ba yang nyan thos dang
377a3(phal chen): rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po nye bar bzung ba yan cad byang chub sems dpa'i sa dgu pa la gnas pa'i bar gyi byang chu
377a4(phal chen): sems dpa' rnams kyi kyang mi 'grogs pa yin/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi bar gyi chos nyid la yang sems can rnams rab tu gzhog go// kye rgyal
377a5(phal chen): ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pa la ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis dus gsum gyi ye shes yang dag par bstan to/
377a6(phal chen): chos kyi dbyings rab tu phye ba'i ye shes dang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rgyas par dgang ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du snang bar byed par ba
377a7(phal chen): dang sems can thams cad dang zhing gi chos yongs su shes par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa la 'jug pa'i ye shes nas mdor bsdun
377a8(phal chen): thams cad gakhyen pa'i ye shes thob par bya ba'i bar du yang dag par bstan no// de'i pha rol tu dran pa bcu las yaM shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i shas che ba yin no/
377b1(phal chen): rgyal ba'i sras 'dzin byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos kyi sprin ces bya ba byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu pa mdor bsnur to// mya cher ni bsal ba grangs
377b2(phal chen): pa med pa mu med pas bstan pa'i mthar thug par shes par bya'o// de la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni phal cher lnga'i rgyal po dbang phyug chen por 'gyur te/
377b3(phal chen): sems can rnams la nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa la mkhas shing mthu yod pa yin/ chos kyi dbyings rnam
377b4(phal chen): bar phye ba yongs su dris pa bstan pas mi 'phrogs pa yin/ sbyin pa 'am/ ngag snyan pa'ang / don bsgrub pa'am/ don 'thun pas dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ci rtsom yang ru
377b5(phal chen): ste/ de thams cad ci ltar na sems can thams cad kyi mchog tu 'gyur/ gtso bor 'gyur/ thu bor 'gyur/ phul du 'gyur/ dam par 'gyur/ bla na med par 'gyur/ 'dren pa
377b6(phal chen): 'gyur/ yongs su 'dren par 'gyur ba nas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la rten pa'i bar du 'gyur snyam ste/ sangs rgyas yid la bya ba dang / chos yid la bya ba dang /
377b7(phal chen): dge 'dun yid la bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' yid la bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yid la bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa yid la bya
377b8(phal chen): ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa yid la bya ba dang / stobs yid la bya ba dang / mi 'jigs pa yid la bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa yid la bya ba nas
378a1(phal chen): rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi bar du yid la bya ba dang / tsha 'bral ba yin te/ de 'dod na skad cig yung tsa
378a2(phal chen): thang cig tu ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bye gadrug khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu ma bsnyed rab tu 'thob cing / de drug lnga snyoms par 'ju/
378a3(phal chen): bdang sangs rgyas sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa b+ha b+ho khag khrig brgya stong ga bcu'i 'dzishin dun pa sted mthong ba dang / de dag gi byin gyi rna bam tha la
378a4(phal chen): dag par shes pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug bcu'i rdul shin tu zab stod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhings pa
378a5(phal chen): byas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu zag bskyed du 'gro ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med ni med pa byes
378a6(phal chen): khrag khrig bsna brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu za pa sred snang bar bya ba dang / sems can sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i shin tu phrab
378a7(phal chen): sbeng yongs su smin par bya ba dang / bskal ba sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu za ba sred du gnas par bya ba dang / sngon
378a8(phal chen): mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu 'jug pa dang / chos kyi stosangs
378b1(phal chen): rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rnam par dbye ba dang / lus sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i
378b2(phal chen): shin tu tha ba snyed yongs su bstan pa dang / lus re re la yang byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yang
378b3(phal chen): dag par bstan pa'i brtson 'grus kyi rnam pa de lta bu rtsom mo// de yan cad byang chub sems dpa' smon lam gyi mthu can rnams smon lam gyi khyad par gyis rnam par 'phrul te/ de dag
378b4(phal chen): gi lus sam/ 'od dam/ rdzu 'phrul lam/ mig gam/ spyod yul lam/ dbyangs sam/ spyod pa'am/ rgyan tam/ byin gyi rlabs sam/ mos pa 'am/ mngon par 'du byed pa dag kyang bskal
378b5(phal chen): pa du ma dang / bskal pa brgya phrag du ma dang / bskal pa stong phrag du ma dang / bskal pa brgya stong phrag du ma'i bar gyis kyang bgrang bar dka'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sem
378b6(phal chen): dpa'i sa bcu po de dag ni rim gyis mngon tu gzhol bas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la/ rnam pa thams cad du rjes su song bar blta'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di lta ste dper na
378b7(phal chen): mtsho chen po ma dros pa las byung ba'i 'bab chu ni klung chen po'i rgyud kyi sgo bzhis 'dzam bu'i gling yongs su mngoms par byas nas/ mi zad par byas te/ gong du rnam par 'phel
378b8(phal chen): ba dang / rgya mtsho chen po'i bar bu zhen par gyur te/ chu de ni thog ma nas kyang rgya mtsho chen po la mngon par gzhol ba yin/ kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin du byang chub kyi sems las byung
379a1(phal chen): pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i 'bab pa yang sngon lam chen po'i chu klung gi rgyun gyi sgo nas bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sems can gyi khams ngoms par byas te/ mi zad
379a2(phal chen): par byas nas/ gong du rnam par 'phel ba dang / rnam pa thams cad du thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi bar gyi rgya mtsho chen po la zhen par gyur te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba'i chu de ni thog ma ma
379a3(phal chen): kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rgya mtsho chen po la mngon par bzhol ba'i yin/ kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu po de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi gzhi las
379a4(phal chen): yod par 'gyur te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di lta ste dper na sa chen po'i gzhi las ri'i rgyal po bcu yod par gyur pa 'di lta ste/ ri'i rgyal po chen po kha ba can dang rgyal po chen po
379a5(phal chen): spos kyi ngang can dang / ri'i rgyal po chen po rnam par 'dal ba dang / ri'i rgyal po chen po drang srong ri dang / ri'i rgyal pogs shing 'dzin dang / ri'i rgyal po chen po rta rna ri dang / r-in
379a6(phal chen): rgyal po chen pos 'dzin dang / ri'i rgyal po chen po 'khor yug dang / ri'i rgyal po chen po dpal can dang / ri'i rgyal po ri rab bo// kye rdul ba'i sras de la 'di lta ste dper na
379a7(phal chen): ri'i rgyal po chen po kha ba can ni/ sman gyi rnam par thams cad kyi 'byung gnas te/ sman sna tshogs thams cad blang bas mthar thug pa med do// kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin du
379a8(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i sa rab tu dga' ba la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang / 'jig rten pa'i gtsug lag dang / tshig dang sngags dang / rig pa'i gnas kyi
379b1(phal chen): 'byung banas byin te/ 'jig rten pa'i zug lag dang tshig dang sngags dang / rig pa'i gnas bstan pa'i mthar thug pa med do// de rgyal ba'i sas 'di lta steng bar nga/ ri'i rgyam
379b2(phal chen): ba sros kyi dang can ni spos kyi rnam pa thams cad kyi 'byung gnas yin te/ spos kyi rnam pa sna tshogs blang bas mthar thug pa med do// kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin du byang
379b3(phal chen): sems dpa'i sa dri ma dang bral ba la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims dang / sdom pa dang / rdul thams cad kyi 'byung gnas
379b4(phal chen): yin te/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims dang / sdom pa dang / sdom pa dang / tshul rnam pa sna tshogs kyi spos kyi mthar thug pa med do// kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di lta ste dper na//
379b5(phal chen): ri'i rgyal po rnam par 'dal ba ni rin po che'i rang bzhin shing tu dag pa rin po che'i rnam pa thams cad kyi 'byung gnas yin te/ rin po che'i rnam pa sna tshogs thams cad blang
379b6(phal chen): zang pa med do// kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i sa 'odabyed pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang 'jig rten pa'i bsam gtan dang / mdzod
379b7(phal chen): par shes pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi 'byung gnas yin te/ 'jig rten pa'i bsam gtan dang / mngon par shes pa
379b8(phal chen): rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa yongs su dris pa bstan pas zad pa med do// kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di lta ste dper na/ ri'i rgyal po chen po drang sro
379b9(phal chen): rirab che'i rang bzhin rnam par dag pa dang /
380a1(phal chen): drang srong
380a2(phal chen): / mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa'i 'byung gnas te/ mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa'i drang srong bgrang bas zad pa med do// kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin du byang
380a3(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i sa 'od 'phro ba can la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang lam dang lam ma yin pa'i khyad dang bye brag shes pa'i thams cad kyi 'byung gnas yin te/ lam dang
380a4(phal chen): ma yin pa'i khyad par dang bye brag gi rgyus yongs su dris pa yongs su bstan pas zad par mi 'gyur ro// kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di lta ste dper na/ ri'i rgyal po chen po gzhi shing 'dzin na
380a5(phal chen): rin po che'i rang bzhin rnam par dag pa gnod sbyin rdzu 'phrul chen po ngang ldan pa rnams kyi 'byung gnas yin te/ gnod sbyin rngu 'phrul chen po can bgrang bzad pa med do// kye rgyal ba'i
380a6(phal chen): sras de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i sa shin tu rgyal ba la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang mngon par shes pa dang rdzu 'phrul dang / rnam par 'phrul pa dang / cho 'phrul thams
380a7(phal chen): cad kyi 'byung gnas yin te mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul dang / rnam par 'phrul pa dang / chos 'phrul yongs su dris pa bstan pas bzang pa med do// kye rgyal ba'i sras 'a
380a8(phal chen): lta ste/ dper na/ ri'i rgyal po chen po rta rna ni rin po che'i rang bzhin rnam par dag pa'i shing tog gi rnam pa na thams cad kyi 'byung gnas yin te/ shing tog rnam pa sna tshogs thams cad
380a9(phal chen): bas zad par mi 'gyur ro// kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i sa mngon sum la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la 'jug pa
380b1(phal chen): na tu bstan pa'i 'byung gnas yin te/ nyan thos kyi 'bras bu mngon par khong du chud bar byas pa yongs su dris pa bstan pas zang ba med do// kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di lta sa
380b2(phal chen): dper na/ ri'i rgyal po chen po sa 'dzin rin po che'i rang bzhin rnam par dag pa/ klu rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan pa rnams kyi 'byung gnas te/ klu rdzu 'phrul chen po can bgrang bas
380b3(phal chen): zad pa med do// kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin tu byang chub sems dpa'i sa ring du song pa la gnas pa'i byang chub byang chub sems dpa' yang thebs dang shes rab shin tu bstan
380b4(phal chen): ba'i 'byung gnas yin te/ rang sangs rgyas kyi 'bras bu mngon par khong du chud par bya ba yongs su dris pa bstan pas zad pa med do// kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di lta ste dper na//
380b5(phal chen): ri'i rgyal po chen po 'khor yug rin po che'i rang bzhin rnam par dag pa dbang du 'gyur ba rnams kyi 'byung gnas yin te/ dbang du gyur pa bgrang bas zad pa med do// kye rgyal ba'i
380b6(phal chen): sras de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i sa mi g.yo ba la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang byang chub sems dpa'i dbang mngon par bsgrub pa yongs su dris pa shin tu bstan pa'i
380b7(phal chen): 'byung gnas yin te/ 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par phye ba yongs su dris pa bstan pas zad pa med do// kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di lta ste dper na/ ri'i rgyal po dpal dang ldan pa ni rin
380b8(phal chen): che'i rang bzhin rnam par dag pa lha ma yin rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan pa rnams kyi 'byung gnas te/ lha ma yin rdzu 'phrul chen po can bgrang bas zang ba med do// kye rgyal ba'i sras de
381a1(phal chen): bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i sa legs pa'i blo gros la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang / sems can 'byung ba dang / 'jig pa shes pa'i rgyud thams cad kyi 'byung gnas
381a2(phal chen): yin te/ 'gro ba thams cad 'byung ba yongs su dris pa bstan pas zad pa med do// kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di lta ste dper na ri'i rgyal po chen po ri rab ni rin po che'i rang bzhin rnam par dag
381a3(phal chen): lhartswa 'phrul chen po dang ldan pa rnams rtsa 'byung gnas yin te/ lha rdzu 'phrul chen po can bgrang bas zad pa med do// kye rgyal ba'i sas de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i sa chos kyi tshun lags
381a4(phal chen): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang mi 'jigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi 'byung ba nas yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi phrin las yang dag par
381a5(phal chen): bstan pas yongs su dris pa bstan pas zad pa med do// kye rgyal ba'i sras ci ltar rin po che de dag rgya mtsho chen po las byung zhing rgya mtsho chen po las smos pa de bzhin du/ kye rgyal ba'i sras
381a6(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'is bcu tho di dag kyang rnams ca mthen pa zhing las byung ba'o// thams cad mabyen pa 'inga'i sasum pa lo ma num pa'i sras 'dag ga pe ras bya ma na
381a7(phal chen): rnam pa bcus mi 'phrogs pa'i phyin rgya mtsho chen po'i grangs su 'gro ste/ bcu gang zhin 'din sne rim gyis gzhol ba dang / shi ba'i ro dang / mi 'phrogs pa dang / drugacan gyi grangs yongasas
381a8(phal chen): spangs pa dang / rogacig pa dang / rin po che mang ba dang / zab ci ga rang ba dang / yang sa zhing cha med pa dang / 'byung po mang po'i gnas su gyur pa dang / dbyes kyi tshul ma 'ja' ba nga
381b1(phal chen): chen po na thams cad yongs su 'dzid pas ma 'ams pa'o// ce rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin du byang chub mams dpa' yang spong ba'i rnam pa bcus mi 'ardzogs pa'i grangs su na'o//
381b2(phal chen): bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa'i sa rab tu dga' ba la smon lam chen po rim gyis mngon par bsgrub pas gzhol ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa dri ma dang bral ba la tshul
381b3(phal chen): khrims ngan pa'i ro dang / mi 'grogs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa 'od byed pa la 'jig rten pa rnam par gdogs pa'i grags yongs su spangs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa 'od
381b4(phal chen): 'gro ba can la sangs rgyas la mos pa mi phyed pa'i ro gcig pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa shin tu rgyal bar bka' ba la thabs dang / mngon par shes pa tshad med pas 'jig rten gyi bya ba
381b5(phal chen): mngon par bsgrub pa'i rin po che mang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa mngon sum la rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rab tu brtag pas shin tu zab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'is ring
381b6(phal chen): du song ba la blo dang rnam par 'byed dang / mkhas pa yangs shing chad med pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa mi g.yo ba la rgyun chen po mngon par bsgrub pa yang dag par bstan pa
381b7(phal chen): 'byung po// mang po gnas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa legs pa'i blo gros la rnam par thar pa zab mo dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi spyong ba ji lta ba bzhin du khong du chu
381b8(phal chen): tshul gyi sa las ma 'da' ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa chos kyi smin la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos snang ba'i sprin chen po'i char yang dag par brdung sa
382a1(phal chen): mngoms pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di lta ste dper na nor bu rin po che ni rin po che'i mkhas pas shin du bsregs shing shin tu bsgrubs/ shin tu sbyangs
382a2(phal chen): shin tu dag par byas legs par phug/ rin po rje'i srad bus legs par btags/ rin po che bai DUr+ya'i sra ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la bzhag s+ho/ 'od thams cad byung
382a3(phal chen): gyur la rgyal pos bsngags par gyur te/ rin po che'i rigs bcu las shin tu 'das/ shing tu 'phags par gyur pa de'i tshe sems can thams cad la rin po ches phan gdags pa'i
382a4(phal chen): don tu nye bar gnas pa yin/ kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin tu byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mkhyen pa zhing sems rin po che bskyed pa yang spangs pa'i yon tan gyi sdom pa dang / tshul khrim
382a5(phal chen): dang / brtul zhugs dang / dka' thub gyis shin tu bsregs/ bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pas shin tu bsgrubs/ lam gyi yan la
382a6(phal chen): gi rnam pas/ shin tu sbyangs/ thabs dang mngon par shes pas shin tu dag par byas/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung bas shin tu phug/ thabs dang shes rab rin po che sna tshogs kyi srang bus
382a7(phal chen): na thu btags dpang po rin po che bai DUr+ya'i yu ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la bzhag/ sems can gyi spong ba rab tu brtag pa dang / thos pa'i ye shes kyi 'od rab tu 'byung ba
382a8(phal chen): chos kyi rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi mngon par dbang bskur bar gyur pa de'i tshe/ sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas
382b1(phal chen): blon las rin po che thams cad kyis yang dag par ban gdags pa'i don tu nye bar gnas pa yin te/ de'i tshe thams cad mkhyen pa zhes kyang bya'o// rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' spong/
382b2(phal chen): yang dag par bsgrub cing / rnam pa thams cad tu thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang / yon tan yang dag par bstsags pa rgyas kyi sgo'i rgyud 'di ni sems can dge pa'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa mas
382b3(phal chen): kyi rnalam tu grag par mi 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnam par grol ba'i zlabs smras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras 'on rnam pa thams cad lu thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang / yon tan yang dag par bsam/
382b4(phal chen): pa'i chos kyi sgo'i rgyud 'di gang gi rna lam du grag par gyur pa de dag bsod nams kyi tshogs ci tsam shig dang ldan par 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying pos smras pa// kye rgyal ba'i sras thams cad
382b5(phal chen): mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi mthu tsam pa de snyed kyi bsod nams kyi tshogs ni/ thams cad mkhyen pa zhid du sems bskyed cing bsgrub par dmigs pa la yod de/ chos kyi sgo'i rgyud 'di grag cing mngon par
382b6(phal chen): pa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs kyang de tsam du shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kye rgyal po'i sras rnam par thams cad du thams mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang yon tan yang dag par bsdus
382b7(phal chen): pa'i chos kyi rgyud 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' ma yin pas mnyan pa 'am mos par bya ba 'am/ gzung bar yang mi nus na bsgom pa'i sbyor bas brtson par mi nus pa lta ci smos// de bas na kye rgyal ngan/
382b8(phal chen): sras gang gi chos kyi sgo'i rgyud 'di zlos nas kyang mos par byed pa dang / mos par byas shing 'dzin pa dang / bsgom pa'i rnam pa brtson par byed na sem de dag ni tham cad mkhyen pa'i ye bri sgo dang ldan par shes par bya'o//
383a1(phal chen): de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang chos nyid thob pas phyogs bcur 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing khrag khrig phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rnam pa drug dang lhas chen po/
383a2(phal chen): bcwo brgyad du smos so// rab tu gas so// kun tu g.yos so// 'gul to// rab tu 'gul to// kun tu 'gul to// ldeg go rab tu ldeg go// kun tu ldegs/ ces/ rab tu ches cem/ klas
383a3(phal chen): chem mod bur bur/ rab tu 'ur rung / kun tu rab tu 'ur 'ur ro// shig zhig/ rab shig shig/ kun tu shig shig go// sangs rgyas kyi mthu deng chos nyid rab tu thob pas lha rdzas kyi phreng ba'i sprin gyi cha
383a4(phal chen): mngon par bab bo// lha rdzas kyi gos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo// lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo// lha rdzas kyi gdugs kyi sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo// lha dza
383a5(phal chen): kyi rgyal mtshan gyi rgyur mngon par bab bo// lnga rdzas kyi bdan gyi sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo// lha rdzas kyi rol mo bdung ba dang / dkrol ba dang / glu'i dbyangs kyi sprin gyi sgra mngon par sgrog go/
383a6(phal chen): lha rdzas lnga 'das par thams cad mkhyen pa'i sa la mngon par bstod pa'i glu'i dbyangs kyi sprin gyi sgra mngon par sgrog go// ji ltar gling zla'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i gzhan 'phrul dbang byed
383a7(phal chen): gan su lA'i rgyal po dbang sgyur gyi gzhal med khang nor bu rin po ze'i snying por ji lta ba de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khas thams cad du'ang phyogs bcu rgyas par gang zhing chos bstan pa 'di yang
383a8(phal chen): cad du byung bar gyur to// sangs rgyas kyi mthus phyog bcu nas byang chub sems dpa' sang rgyas kyi zhing khrag khrig phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed phyog bcur rgyas par byed cing / lhag te de dag byin
383a9(phal chen): nas kyang 'di sa ces pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras de ltar khyod cing bya chub mas sa chos nyid 'di brjod pa legs leg sa// kyi rgyal ba'i sas bdag ga kyang rdza rjem rnying bzhi bya bar mi ma thun ma/
383b1(phal chen): ldan sa 'angagarten gyi rnam san bya ba ga na bzhin na nas mamamatshan rdzam N+Dal mam ni bya bangan ga zung sa mangs lam/ gnyen gyi mas nga mas na
383b2(phal chen): tshongs rgyas kyi mthus 'khor gyi rna ba 'di 'dra ba dag la tshig 'di dag nyid dang / yi ge 'di dag nyid dang / khong du chung bar bya ba 'di dag gi dang / don 'di dag nyid lhag chad med par mngon par brjod pa 'byung /
383b3(phal chen): bar gyur to// kye rgyal ba'i sras bdag cag kyang dbang du gyur pa sha stag sang rgyas kyi mthus 'khor 'dir byin te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras 'jig rten gyi khas 'dir bdag cag ji ltar phyin pa de bzhin du sa
383b4(phal chen): bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi kham re re'i gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi gan gyi lha'i rgyal po dbang sgyur gyur gzhal med khang nor bu rin po che'i snying por yang badz+ra/
383b5(phal chen): rgyas kyi zhing khrag khrig phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnam phyin par to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' rje rje'i snying pas phyog bcur rnam par blta ste 'khor ci dkyil 'khor tham sa
383b6(phal chen): bltas nas chos kyi dbyings rnam bralta ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi sems paskyed pa yang dag par rjod su dang / byang chub sems dpa'i yul yang dag par bstan pa dang / spyong
383b7(phal chen): pa'i stobs yongs su sbyang ba dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa yang dag par bsgrub pa brjod pa dang / 'jig rten gyi dri ma bstsal pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes nye bar
383b8(phal chen): bsgrub pa dang / bsam gyi mi khyab pa'i ye shes kyi rgyun yongasu bstan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi yon tan rab tu brjod par byed cing / sa'i don 'di'ang btag par bya
383b9(phal chen): ba dang / bstan par bya ba'i phyir sang rgyas kyi mthus de'i tshe tshig su bcad pa 'di dag smras// zhi dang dul dga' zhing dul ba'i yid ldan la/ na mkha'i dbying snang ma 'a dang mchung 'dra' zhing / za ba'i dri ma rnam sbyangs
384a1(phal chen): rnams shes gnas pa'i// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i khyad par brtson la// bskal pa bye bar dge pa brgya song rab bsugs dang // sangs rgyas brgyad stong ngas
384a2(phal chen): skrod chen po mchod bya ste// dbang sgyur rnams dang rang rgyal mtha' yas mchod byas nas// 'gro bdun la phan byeng byang chub sems sbyab// brtul zhugs dka' thub bka' spyad dul bzod ldan #
384a3(phal chen): ye shes dge 'phags shing // blo gros rigs yangs sangs rgyas ye shes sems ldan gyi/ byang chub sems rab rgyal ba'i stobs dang mnyam 'dra ste// dus gsu rgyal ba ji skad mchod dang ma
384a4(phal chen): pa'i phyir/ nam mkha'i dbyings tshang zhing rnams thams cad yongs su spyod// chos rnams thams cad ji snyed de dag mnyam rtogs pas// 'gro ba dgrol ba'i don tu byang chub sems skye'o/
384a5(phal chen): gzhal yas sems skyes sa mchog rab tu thob gyur nas// sdig pa thams cad bsal phyir rdul med rab du dga'// smon lam stobs dpyad dkar chos yang dag par bsags byos rgyu/
384a6(phal chen): snying rje bco ldan sa'i gong ma yongs su gnon/ 'gro phyir byams sems tshul khrims thos dang yon tan ldan// dri med dri dral rang bzhin yongs dgra bsam pa yis/ 'jig rten
384a7(phal chen): migasu ma bang bar mthang byu na// gsum pa rnam sangs rlangs 'gra pa'idren tug rno// stug rjes ma ga na bcug rngus ma bde ba'i/ 'anas sum ga tu phyug
384a8(phal chen): dargya po ngas// lus byas kyis mthang rgyal ba'i rigs pa ma rnams gang // ni shes 'an sa tha 'angs ldan 'ad pags// rba dang ldan lam kyi sa shes gyu /
384b1(phal chen): na sa rgyas ban+d+ha snang bsnyen / nas/ mamanas ba mamananag tu dran rgyu cing // 'gyu bkun gyis drubyung / 'artul pa nga/ 'brug // gas rnams pa
384b2(phal chen): dang shes rab blod dpyod pas// 'gri den mtha' yas sna tshogs bya ba bstan byas shing // stobs bcu mchod pa sems can den rnams bsgrub pa ste// mi skye mngon sum mtha' yas sa drug
384b3(phal chen): yongs su gnon// 'jig rten kun tu 'gro bas shes dka' spyod byed cing // bdag bral byed mod yod dang med pa rnam bsal ba'o// rang bzhin snying chos yan lag bcu gnyis ra
384b4(phal chen): 'byung nas// bla zhing rno ba'i sems ldan bdun pa yongs su gnon/ thabs dang shes rab sems yangs rab tu thob gyur cing // ring du song ba gdul dka'i ring du song ba gnon// rang bzhin
384b5(phal chen): dul zhing zhi phyir du ma'i sems spangs te// de nas mkha' 'dra ba'i mi g.yo yongs su gnon// de la mkhas pa'i ye shes las rnams sna tshogs phyir// zhi ba de las bslang zhing mi'i
384b6(phal chen): mchog tu bsnams// dbang bcu ldan zhing 'jig rten yang dag nyid dpyod pa'i/ rang bzhin chen po 'gro phyir legs pa'i blo gros gnon// 'di la shin tu phra bar 'jig rten kun dpyang cing /
384b7(phal chen): sems can thibs po'i spyod ldan nyon mongs las dpyad de/ de dag gdul ba'i spyod pas yon tan mang po gnon// bde gshegs mdzod thob don gyi dam pa rab tu ston// dkar chos rim gyi
384b8(phal chen): de dra ba spyod dang ldan gyur bas// sa dgu'i bang du bsod nams la shis tshogs rnying / rgyal ba rnams kyi stobs mchog ngan ngam mngon 'dod pa// ye shes yon tan dbang bskur sangs/
385a1(phal chen): rgyus kun las 'thob// brgya stong phrag bcu'i ting 'dzin grangs med gang yod pa// spyod yul shes pa che nyid shes yangs thob gyur nas// de'i rjes la thams cad mkhyen
385a2(phal chen): bar dbang bskur thob// yul yangs ting 'dzin de dag thob pas de mi sprul/ gang che yis kun mkhyen dbang bskrad thob pa'i tshe/ pad+ma rgya chen rin chen kun gyis brgyan pa 'byung //
385a3(phal chen): tshul mthun khros kyi dbus su gus par 'gyur// rgyal ba'i sras kyis yongs bskur de la lta zhing gnas// de'i 'od gzer khrag khrig mtha' yas stong phrag mang // phyogs
385a4(phal chen): bcu'i 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal kun kyang zhi bar byed// mgo'i gtsug nas 'od gzer bye ba stong 'byung zhing / khyogs rnams kun gyi mi'i gtso bo'i 'khor dur+m+ma// stong gim
385a5(phal chen): dbyangs la bdagazed 'dra bar ba nas// sangs rgyas mchod byir brtson par rgyal ba'i zhabs su 'dod // de che rgyal ba rnams dang rmyis sras rnams kyis kyang // ches rab
385a6(phal chen): sras dbang bsgrung 'thob par mkhyen// mchong ba don tu rgyal sras mtha' yas kun kyang 'ong // de tshe kun mkhyen dbang bskur mi mchog mdzod smra nas/ dbang bsgyur 'a
385a7(phal chen): dam pa byung bar 'byung// 'ad gzer mog+ho gis bskor cing smra ba'i btsug zhug/ gang kyi rgyal mchog pu'i tho bo srid mchog le// dbang bskur bzhin du sangs rgyas kun gyis pa
385a8(phal chen): bskur tshe// phyogs bcu'i 'di cin thams cad kun nas 'ayo bar 'gyur// mnad med par gyi sdug bsngal de che mo ning drug// gang tshe kun mkhyen dbang gi sa mngon par dbang bsgyur
385b1(phal chen): de byeng dums pas chos ston sa mchog da ces bya// mkhas pa 'di la gnas pa'i shes rgyung chang med de// sa rab 'di la gnas pa 'gro kun gco yin no// gzugs dang brdug pa na
385b2(phal chen): de bzhin 'dod pa'i khams yangs dang // sems can khams dang zhing dang chos khams yangs pa dang / grangs dang grangs med na mkha'i khams kyi bar du ste/ chos dbyings yangs pa
385b3(phal chen): thams cad mnor khong du chud// 'di la gnas pa mthu cen sprul pa'i lus kun dang // de bzhin byin rlabs rgyal ba'i ye shes za ba dang // mi mchog gsang ba bskal pa'i grangs
385b4(phal chen): rnams shes bya dang / sku rtse gcig tu 'jig rten khams rnams gzung ba dang // mi'i gtso bo 'byung drang sku tshe 'tshang brgya dang // 'khor lo dam pa bskor dang mya ngan 'da' ba'i rnams
385b5(phal chen): thams cad rab shes gang du rnam thar zhi ba dag/ sngan cad ma thob kun kyang de tshe rab tu thob// 'di la gnas pa'i mthu chen rgyal ba'i chos kyi sprin// thams cad khong du chud byed/
385b6(phal chen): dran pas kun kyang 'dzin/ klu rnams kun gyi sprin char rgya mtsho 'dzin pa ltar// klu rnams kun gyi sprin char rgya mtsho 'dzin pa ltar// de bzhin rgyal ba'i chos sbyin char rten kun kyang 'dzin
385b7(phal chen): rgyal ba gcig las chos gang mthu chen des thos pa// de la phyogs bcu mtha' yas zhing gi sems can rnams// thams cad bde gshegs nyan thos thos pa 'dzin gyur kyang / khyad
385b8(phal chen): chub sems dpas thos pa'i grangs char nyer mi 'gro// ye shes spyod pa'i stobs kyi sngan cad spyad pa'i mthus// skad cig yud tsam thang cig khrag khrig zhing bkang zhing // bdud
386a1(phal chen): ci'i cherang bab ca mongs kun kyang zhi bar byed// de byer rgyal bas 'di ming chos kyi sbyin ces gsungs// 'di bcas mthu chen lnga'i 'jig rten gtsor gyur ba'i
386a2(phal chen): rnams kun tu ma'i gtso bong yul yang ston// rnam 'phrul khrag khrig stong phrag dum yang ston te// byang chub spyad pa de sems 'gro ba myos par 'gyur// mkhas pa legs ldan 'di gnas gom pa
386a3(phal chen): bar ba tsam/ sa dgra ba tu gnas pas shes par mi nus na// sems can gzhan gyis shes par ma 'gyur smos ci dgas// dus gsum nyan thos rang rgyal kun gyis de bzhin no// 'di gnas
386a4(phal chen): thams cad mkhyen par 'gro ba kun la ston// shes pas dus gsum thags med ni chos can// zhing rnams kun tu rgyas bkang ches rnams kun gyi bang // rgyal ba kun gyi yon tan rjod cing tshun
386a5(phal chen): babyad / mkhas pa 'di la gnas pa sangs rgyas mchod byed cing // phyogs rnams kun tu ning dang chos kyi dbyings bkang ste/ rgyal ba mngon tu 'a dang chos kyi dbyings pakang /
386a6(phal chen): mngon tu mchod pas mchod byed 'phrogs pa med// son na kun ldan sa'i wA'i lha zhus bya// mkhas pa 'ad gnas shes rab snang bas 'gra kun kyai// mun pa kun pas tsham kyi
386a7(phal chen): yang rab tu ston// dbang phyug dam pa'i mthu yis 'gro ba'i 'dod chags gsel// de ngas rgyal sras nyon mang pa sal la mkhas shes bya// dil gnas pa de dag khams pa
386a8(phal chen): dbang phyug 'gyur// le shes tshul shes rig pa gsum po smin la mkhas// skad cig yung tsam gcig gis ting nge 'dzin gcig min thapa/ thugs bcu du rgyal
386b1(phal chen): dam pa gtsug min ston// 'din badrug gis rgyal smras sna rnams mngar bstan gyi// rgya char bskum brgya thug snang kyis bstan ma nas// sam na sa nas
386b2(phal chen): shesas 'dis// gnas brtag tu ri'i rgyal bzhin mi g.yo// rgyal sras thog ma gtsug lag kun gyis migs ste// sman gyi rnam pa kun gnas ra rgyal grangs bzhin na/
386b3(phal chen): khrims thos pas gnyis pa spros dang sras dang 'dra// rnam 'dal me tog ji bzhin gsum pa shes par bya// lam la mos bzhin mo 'khrugs 'ang 'phro 'thob pa ste/ drang srong gnas
386b4(phal chen): bzhin mkhas pa rnams kyi rten gyur pa'o// gnod sbyin nya shing 'dzin bzhin pasam yas lnga pa thob// rtana'i shing tog 'dra bar drug pa'i 'bras bu ste/ bdun pa sa 'dzin klung ni/
386b5(phal chen): shes rab chen pos thog/ 'khor phyag dbang ldan bzhin du brgyad pa dbang chen thob/ dgu pa dri ma sel ba dpal can lha min bzhin// bcu pa rgyal ba'i legs ldan ri rab tu
386b6(phal chen): gnas 'dra/ dang po smon lam 'gro ba gnyis pa gong ma tshul khrims tshogs// gsum pa skyed pa'i yon tan bzhi pa gcig gi dngos/ lnga pa ge mang drug pa shin taH
386b7(phal chen): pa'i dngos// brgyad pa blo gros yangs pa kun tu gcig min rgyan// dgu pa mkhas pa yangs pa kun tu gcig min rgyan// dgu pa mkhas pa ye shes pa ye she
386b8(phal chen): phra zhing za ba dang ldan// 'gro rgyud thams cad ye shes ldan pas rab tu gnon// bcu pa rgyal ba rnams las drag chos 'dzin te// rgyal sras spyod pa'i mi sbrul rgya ma
387a1(phal chen): de 'dra'o// spyad pa bcu 'das thog ma ra'i sems rab skye bar 'gyur// dka' thub brdul pas gnyis pa gsum gdum gyis// dag pas bzhi bzhin/
387a2(phal chen): byang bas lnga pa'o// drug brnon pas rtogs pa bdun pa ni byed pa// brgyad pa mthu tshon snying rje'i rgyal mtshan ldan pa yin// dgu la ye shes ldan pas thabs po'i spyod pa shes// badz+ra
387a3(phal chen): rgyal bas dbang bskur rgyal po dbang thob bzhin// yon tan rin can dag pas de bzhini rin du 'bar// phyogs rnams kun gyi zhing rnam bshig ste bgrang bar nus// rnam shes ga
387a4(phal chen): gise 'gro bkun sems shes par rung // nama'i'i dbyings kun sgra sgra gzhal bar nus srid kyi/ rgyal ba'i yon tan bskal pa khrag khrig bshad mi nus// de bzhin pa shes
387a5(phal chen): bdun bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis mngon pa ga nang ste/ yidi dga' bar byad skems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying pos de skad ces smras pa dang /
387a6(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das gzhan 'dul dbang byed kyi nang ngan zhugs shing ma ni par sangs rgyas nas/ ring par ma lon te nag bdun pa gnyis la bab ba ci/ kye+e'i rmyil
387a7(phal chen): gan med kha nang drir rini pa che'i snying pan bzhug sa pas/ byung chub sems dpa' rje'i snying bas bshad pa la mngon par dgas par mdzadadu/ nupa mas
387a8(phal chen): rdo rje'i snying pos bshang pa la mngon par dgas mdzad do// byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de dag thams cad dang lnga dang / klu dang / band sbyin dang // drin dang / blam yinapa/
387b1(phal chen): brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten gyi/ gon po dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / gtsang ma'i ris su gtogs pa'i khor thams cad kyang mngon par dga'o// shin tu rgya
387b2(phal chen): ba mdo sangs sangs rgyas phasra po che zhes bya ba las sa bcu pa'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa gcig pa'o// dam pa lnga bcu rtsa bzhi pa
387b3(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin kyil brlabs la// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po las stsogs pa thams cad byung /
387b4(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod la gnas pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bye bi khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de'i tshe 'khor
387b5(phal chen): kyi dkyil 'khor de nyid du/ phyogs bcu nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po stong ge'i khri chags pa med pa'i rgyun gyi snying po can la 'khod pa bcu 'thon par gyur
387b6(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i de dag re re zhing yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i khor seng ge'i khri chags pa med pa'i rgyan gyi snying po can la khod pa/ sangs rgyas kyi
387b7(phal chen): zhing brjod du med brjod du med pa'i yung brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin+da phra ba snyed kyis bskor cing mdun du byas pa sha stag pa
387b8(phal chen): byang chub sems de pa'i sems dpa' tshon pa ring gi thams cad kyang ming 'di zhes bya ba dgos// 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa can po kun tu stsa
388a1(phal chen): ba mdzod kyi snying pos byung ba zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dbang chen po zab mo'i 'dzod kyi snying pos byung bzhi bya ba dang / byang
388a2(phal chen): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dpal gyi gzi brjid kyi snying pos zhes bya ba dang // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpyang chen po sgro sgra zab mo rnam pa tha dad
388a3(phal chen): pa'i mdzod kyi snying pos byung ba zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje mi phyed pa'i gtsug gi mdzod kyi snying pos byung ba zhes bya ba dang /
388a4(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag gi gi las mi g.yo bang kun tu 'gro ba'i 'ad zer snang ba'i zi brjid kyi mdzad kyi snying pos byung ba zhes bya ba dang /
388a5(phal chen): chub sems dpa' sem+b+hasmra dpa' rten pa glagasu pa sman pa kun tu rnam par grags 'i 'od kyi ga'i brjid kyi mdzod kyi snying pos 'byung ba zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems
388a6(phal chen): dpa' sems dpa' chen po ro'i rgyal po mi g.yo ba'i 'od zer snang ba'i gzi brjid kyi mdzod kyi snying pos byung ba zhes bya ba dang // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun
388a7(phal chen): nus pazla ba'i gzugs rnams par dmigs pa'i 'od zer gyi rgyal po snang ba'i bzi brjid kyi mdzod kyi snying pos byung ba zhes zla ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems /
388a8(phal chen): chen pa skabs ba rnam par dag parlab pa med pa'i 'ad gzeng snang ba'i gzi brjid kyi mdzad kyi snying pos byeng ba zhes bya ba dag gi/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa 'che
388b1(phal chen): de dag de ltar thon ma thag du/ de'i mod la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po ma gtogs par byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de dag thams cad kyang ldang bar
388b2(phal chen): 'gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po'i 'od ma gtogs par 'od thams cad kyang mi snang bar 'gyur te/ thams cad kyang zil gis non par gyur to//
388b3(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi mchod pas bsams kyis mi khyab pa chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par khyab pa mang po'ang mngon par 'byung bar gyur te// 'di ltar spos rgyas kyi dbyings thams cad
388b4(phal chen): rgyas par khyab pa/ bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong kyi char mngon par bab par gyur to// me tog gi sprin chos kyi dbyings rgyas par khyidab la brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i
388b5(phal chen): char mngon par bab par gyur to/ dbyings thams cad rgyas par khyab pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi char mngon par bab par gyur te/ gdags kyi sprin chen gyi sprin chen gyi dbyings
388b6(phal chen): thams cad rgyas par khyab pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gas char mngon par bab par gyur te// gos kyi sgra chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par khyab pa bye ba khrig khrig gi tshor man
388b7(phal chen): bar gyur to// rin po che'i sprin chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par khyab pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gyi char mngon par bab par gyur to// rgyal mtshan gyi sprin chos kyi dbyings tham
389a1(phal chen): changad rgyas par khyab pa bye ba khrag khrig gi rtswa mngon par gyur to// na po che'i sprin chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par khyab pa byeb khrag khrig brgya stong gyi char mngon par
389a2(phal chen): par gyur to// rgyal mtshan gyi spro chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par khyab pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi char mngon par bab par gyur to// bdan gyi sprin chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgya
389a3(phal chen): pad+ma khyab pa b+h+yo ba khrug khrig brgya stong gi chang sa mngon par bab par gyur to// 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su dag pa'i sprin chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par khyab par bye ba jug
389a4(phal chen): tshig brgya stong gi sprin chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par khyab bo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi cher mngon par bab par gyur to// 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su dag pa 'i sbyin sa
389a5(phal chen): dbyings thams cad rgyas par khyab par bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi char mngon par bab par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi sprin chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par byed
389a6(phal chen): chag tshig brgya stong gyi chad mngon par bab par gyur to// 'od gzer gyi dra ba snang ba chen po'i sngon gyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par khyab pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi char mngon pa
389a7(phal chen): ba par gyur // de ban swA rtogs kyi gzhal med 'ang sa sbyin chos kyi dpyongs rnams ca rgyas par khyab pa rgyag zug tshas rgya dang kyi rgyu man pa bab bar byu /
389a8(phal chen): nga chung ba rtsams par bye 'i sngon chas kyi byung sa thams cad rgyas par khyab brgya ba drug chog dargya blang bcang mngan par bab bar byung // de ba'i gshin pa 'dug/
389b1(phal chen): tsun snang ba gos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par khyab pa bye ba khrag khrag brgya stong gi cher mngon par 'a'agyur te// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa 'dzin pa dag gi seng na rma
389b2(phal chen): grang bu de dag las byang chub sems dpa' de re'i seng ge'i khri rgyan rin po na rnam par dag pa re re dang / dmigs pa mang po de dag thams cad las dmigs pa re re las kyang
389b3(phal chen): rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa thams cad yongs su snang bar gyur to// dmigs pa mang po de dag thams cad las dmigs pa re re zhing yang sems can gyi khams 'byam klas
389b4(phal chen): pathams cad yongs su snang bar gyur to// dmigs pa mang po de dag thams cad las dmigs pa mang po de dag thams cad las padamigs re re zhing yang sems can g+h+r-i/ dmyas
389b5(phal chen): klas pa thams cad yangs su snang bar gyur to// dmigs pa mang po de dag thams cad las dmigs pa re re zhing yang de bzhin gshegs pa 'byam klas pa thams cad yongs su snang por gyur
389b6(phal chen): dmigs pa mang po de dag thams cad las dmigs pa re re zhing yang byang chub sems dpa' 'byam klas pa thams cad yongs su snang bar gyur to// dmigs pa mang po de dag
389b7(phal chen): thams cad yongs su snang bar gyur to// dmigs pa mang po de dag thams cad las dmigs pa re re zhing yang dus 'byam klas pa thams cad yongs su snang bar gyur to// dam
389b8(phal chen): pa mang po de dag las dmigs bA re re zhing yang 'jig rteg gyi khams thas cad kyi 'das pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa brjod du med pa'i sangs rgyas 'byud
390a1(phal chen): ba dang bcas pa// da ban du gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi re re nang padu 'dzag rten gyi 'ams thams cad kyi 'dig rten gyi khams 'byamasbas pa brjod du med pa
390a2(phal chen): sdug rgyu ba brgyas pa/ mthas pa ng+yas bzang ba dngas pa// de bzhin gshegs pa 'dun gyimal 'ang dang /
390a3(phal chen): pa/ ming gi 'khor lo dang bcas pa dang / mang po yongs su snang bar gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis snod kyi mtha'i mur thug pa'i dus dag dri 'jig rten gyi khams
390a4(phal chen): gang dang gang du byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyar par gyur pa de dag kyang yongs su snang bar gyur to// de bzhin gshes pa de dag gi zhabs kyi drung na 'khod cing pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad
390a5(phal chen): yongs su spyor pa yang yongs su snang bar gyur to// dmigs pa mang po de dag thams cad las dmigs pa re re zhing yang phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'bum klas pa
390a6(phal chen): brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa sangs rgyas skye ba dang bcas pa// chos kyi 'khor lo dang bcas pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa/ byang chub
390a7(phal chen): sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa/ sems can gdul ba dang bcas pa/ ming gyi 'khor lo dang bcas pa/ mang po yongs su snang bar gyur to// bya
390a8(phal chen): rnams dnga' de dag bya me 'i mtha' mur thugs pa'i dus dag du 'jig rten gyi khams gang du byang chub sems dpa'i spyod bsnyung bar 'gyur ba de dag kyang sangs su spang bar bye
390b1(phal chen): na gshegs pa de dag gzhangs kyi drung na 'khod cing pa rab tu phyin pa yongs su stod pa byed pa dag kyang yongs su snang bar gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa'adas
390b2(phal chen): 'di snyam du sems par gyur te// byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa ni gang dang gang nas lpags// de bzhin gshegs pa ni gang dang gang chu
390b3(phal chen): ljags de bzhin gshegs pa ni gang gyi zhabs kyi drung na phyin snyam ste// byang chub sems/ dpa' 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de dag thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpe
390b4(phal chen): sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po la 'di skad ces smras so// kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag lhags na gang nas lcags 'jig rten
390b5(phal chen): gyi khams 'byam klas pa ni gang shed nas// de bzhin gshegs khAT+wAM gi zhabs kyi drung nas 'dir phyin/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems chen po kun tu bzang pos// /
390b6(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil khor de dag thams cad la 'di skad ces smras so// kye rgyal ba'i sras ngag de bas na khyed nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa'a'
390b7(phal chen): dgra 'jig rten khams ni gang nas lcags// de bzhin gshegs pa ni gang zhig gi zhabs kyi drung nas byin pa yongs su brtags pa dang / yongs su dpyang pa gyis
390b8(phal chen): shig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chags pa med pa'i mig shin tu 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang // thams cad kyi rjes su song ba zhes bya ba dang / sa
391a1(phal chen): gyi dbyings shin tu rnam par bye ba zhes bya ba dang / mngon par shes pa thams cad dang ldan pa zhes bya ba dang // dmigs pa thams cad shin tu rnam
391a2(phal chen): phye ba'i snying po zhes bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi tshul mngon par shes pa dang / ldan pa zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems pa'i ting nge 'dzin de sangs rgyas kyi
391a3(phal chen): thams cad kyi gzhi rab tu rtogs pa zhes bya ba dag la mnyam par bzhag go// de ltar de dge la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin grangs med pa byes las
391a4(phal chen): brgya stong phrag brtu la// byang chub sems dpa' re res kyang mnyam par bzhag ste// kun gyis byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin/ gzhan dang gzhan
391a5(phal chen): sdug la snyoms par bzhag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas de dag kyang ma mthong ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa gang gi zhabs kyi drung na byang chub sems dpa
391a6(phal chen): de dag tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod pa de dag kyang mthong nas ting nge 'dzin de dag las langs te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po la
391a7(phal chen): bdi spyad ces smras so// kyi rgyal ba'i sras bdug cag byang chub sems dpa' re res kyang cha byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin grangs med pa bye bams /
391a8(phal chen): rgya stong zag bcu la mnyam par bzhag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams 'byams pa de dag kyang mthong / byang chub sems dpa' de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
391b1(phal chen): kyi drungad na tshangs par spyod pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag kyang ma mthong ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzung pos yang byang chub sems dang
391b2(phal chen): sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de dag la smras pa// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag dung du byang chub sems dpa' de dag 'jig rten gyi khams 'bum klas pa gang
391b3(phal chen): nas lhags pa dang // de bzhin gshegs pa gang gi zhabs kyi drung nus lhags pa rtags par gyis shig dpyad par gyis shig/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa
391b4(phal chen): de dag ni mthong bar dka'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang gi zhabs kyi drung na byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i de bzhin gshegs
391b5(phal chen): pa de dag kyang shin tu mthong bar dka'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag las byang chub sems dpa' re res kyang byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas
391b6(phal chen): rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la mnyam par gzhag go/ de ltar mnyam par gzhan kyang byang chub sems de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas
391b7(phal chen): ba de dag kyang ma mthong // sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grang gi zhabs drung na byang chub sems dpa' de dag tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod pa de bzhin gshegs pa de dag
391b8(phal chen): kyang ma mthong ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag ting nge 'dzin de dag las langs te// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po la 'di ska
392a1(phal chen): ces smras so// ce rgyal ba'i sras bdag cag byang chub sems dpa' re res byang chub sems dpa'i ting/ 'dzi sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la mnyam par bzhag
392a2(phal chen): kyang // 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa de dag kyang ma mthong ngo // gang gi zhabs kyi drang na byang chub sems dpa' de dag tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag kyang ma
392a3(phal chen): mthong ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po stan de las ni mkha'i dbyings su 'phags te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan brgya stang du mar g.yas phyogs su
392a4(phal chen): bskor ba byas nas// byang chub sems dpa' 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad 'di skad ces smras so// kyai rgyal ba'i sras dag de bzhin gshegs pa'o sgra chags pa ma med 'a ba rnyan na
392a5(phal chen): ldan pa dus gsum mtshungs par mnyam 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa thams cad kun tu khyab pa// chos kyi dbyings khong du chud pa 'gro ba thams cad kyi bsams pa ji lta ba po ni/
392a6(phal chen): durnam par dmigs pa 'di la ltos shig dang / rdo la 'jig rten gyi khams 'byamaklas pa thams cad kun tu khyab pa// chos kyi dbyings khong du chud pa 'gro bsam pa dza lta ba bzhin du rnam pa
392a7(phal chen): namigs pa 'di la ltos shig dang / de la 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa thams cad kyang gzugs bstan du gyur par snang ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa 'byam klas pa rnams na/
392a8(phal chen): kyang bzugs brnyan du gyur par snang ngo // byang chub sems dpa' 'byam klas pa thams cad kyang gzugs na du gyur par snang ngo // sems can gyi khams 'byem klas pa rdzas/
392b1(phal chen): gdugs sun du rlung pa byung du/ tsan+da du bzlam rnas pa thams cad byung gzugs brnyan du byur bar sna nga // rtul ba'is sa dug dngas na/ nad kyis slas
392b2(phal chen): blta ba'i mig dang ldan par byin gyi rlobs la/ shes rab kyi mig mkha'i dbyings kyi smai klas par byin gyis rlob ste/ ye shes yangs pa'i mgo dmigs pa thams cad kyi rjes su
392b3(phal chen): song ba khong du chud par gyis la// phyogs 'byam klas pa thams cad du byin gyis rlob ste// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku thams cad du mi gnas pa thams cad du mi yongs su brtsal
392b4(phal chen): ba'i lta bas ltos shig/ mngon par zhen pa thams cad las gyen du 'phags pa dang / srid pa thams cad la mngon par zhen pa med pa dang // shin tu phra ba'i tshul gyis stobs
392b5(phal chen): bcu'i stobs yongs su gnod par dang / dmigs pa chu ngu la rgya chen por 'jug pa'i blta bas ltos shing // de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis byang chub sems dpan
392b6(phal chen): sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po'i gdams ngag bzhin thal mo sbyar te// bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas sems shing rtog rtog pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs skye
392b7(phal chen): mthil gnyis kyi 'khor lo rtsibs stong yod pa la 'jig rten gi khams chos kyi dbyings kyi 'khor lo zhes bya ba yod par mthong bar gyur te/ 'jig rten gyi khams de
392b8(phal chen): na de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings kyi rgyan gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo // chos ston to/ de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas byang chub sems dang
393a1(phal chen): kun tu snang ba mdzod kyi steng bas byung bas zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' 'khorang sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa yang brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya
393a2(phal chen): stong phrag bcu rdub shin tu phra ba snyed kyis bskor cing // mdun tu byas so/ 'ongs nas seng ge'i khri chags pa med pa'i rgyan gyi snying po la 'jug go// bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs sbyi
393a3(phal chen): pa ri dgas yin pa'i byin pa lta bu gnyis la// 'jig rten gyi rims chags pa med pa'i snying po zhes bya ba yod te/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od rgya mtsho chags pa med cing drim ma
393a4(phal chen): pa'i snying po zhes b+ha ba bzhugs shing 'tsho snod de// chos ston to// de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas byang chub sems dpa' zab mo'i mdzod kyi snying pos byung ba zhes bya babyang chub sems

393a6(phal chen): ge'i bri chags pa med pa'i rgyan gyi snying po can la 'dug go// de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs pus mo gnyis kyi lha dang lnga 'jig rten gyi khams sa la snyam yod pa zhes bya ba yod/

393b2(phal chen): rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyan gyi snying po can zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dge ba sna tshogs kyi snying po zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo // chos ston to//

393b8(phal chen): rdul shin tu phra ba nye snyed kyis bskor cing mdun tu bya ste 'ongs nas seng ge'i khri chags pa med pa'i rgyan gyi snying po can la 'dug go/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kan 'dzig
394a1(phal chen): na gyi nas dpal tshe 'ad gzer rten po nyis b+ha ba 'ad// na de bzhin gzhag pa dngul gyi brgyan pa'i snying po zhes byang bzhug zhi rje skyong ngo // chos sanas/ dngas sa rgyas kyi ning nas byang chu sems

398a1(phal chen): sa dul du m+b+ha / sa rlu rgyu pa rgyus narnapa mas gyu
398a2(phal chen): bsam gyis mi khyab par 'jug par bya ba la thang rab tu gzhol bar gyur to// ye shes ma'i phrogs pa'i spyod yul yang rab tu 'byung ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa grangs med pa mthong shing rnam
